[03] ^b^paññā ceva sati cāpī^eb^ti. ^b^paññā^eb^ti yā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṃ kosallaṃ nepuññaṃ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī {bhūri (ka0)} medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā sampajaññaṃ patodo paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ paññāsatthaṃ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto paññāratanaṃ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi. ^b^satī^eb^ti yā sati anussati...pe0... sammāsatīti -- paññā ceva saticāpi, iccāyasmā ajito.

[03] ^b^nāmarūpañca mārisā^eb^ti. ^b^nāma^eb^nti cattāro arūpino khandhā. ^b^rūpa^eb^nti cattāro ca mahābhūtā catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ ^a^T0.0021^ea^. ^b^mārisā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ garuvacanaṃ sagāravasappatissādhivacanametaṃ mārisāti -- nāmarūpañca mārisa.

[03] ^b^etaṃ me puṭṭho pabrūhī^eb^ti. ^b^etaṃ me^eb^ti yaṃ pucchāmi yaṃ yācāmi yaṃ ajjhesāmi yaṃ pasādemi. ^b^puṭṭho^eb^ti pucchito yācito ajjhesito pasādito. ^b^pabrūhī^eb^ti brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi {vivarehi vibhajehi (ka0)} uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- etaṃ me puṭṭho pabrūhi.
[03] ^b^katthetaṃ uparujjhatī^eb^ti katthetaṃ nirujjhati vūpasammati atthaṃ gacchati paṭippassambhatīti. katthetaṃ uparujjhati. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``paññā ^a^V0.0029^ea^ ^a^M0.0033^ea^ ceva sati cāpi, [iccāyasmā ajito]
[27] nāmarūpañca mārisa.
[22] evaṃ me puṭṭho pabrūhi, katthetaṃ uparujjhatī''ti..
[21] ^b^yametaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi, ajita taṃ vadāmi te.^eb^
[27] ^b^yattha nāmañca rūpañca, asesaṃ uparujjhati.^eb^
[22] ^b^viññāṇassa nirodhena, etthetaṃ uparujjhati..^eb^
[03] ^b^yametaṃ pañhaṃ apucchī^eb^ti. ^b^yameta^eb^nti paññañca satiñca nāmarūpañca. ^b^apucchī^eb^ti apucchasi yācasi ajjhesati {ajjhesi (ka0)} pasādesīti -- yametaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi.

[03] ^b^ajita^eb^ ^a^T0.0022^ea^ ^b^taṃ vadāmi te^eb^ti. ^b^ajitā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^ta^eb^nti paññañca satiñca nāmarūpañca. ^b^vadāmī^eb^ti vadāmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti. ajita taṃ vadāmi te.

[03] ^b^yattha nāmañca rūpañca, asesaṃ uparujjhatī^eb^ti ^b^nāma^eb^nti cattāro arūpino khandhā. ^b^rūpa^eb^nti cattāro ca mahābhūtā catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ. ^b^asesa^eb^nti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ {pariyādāyavacanametaṃ (syā0 ka0)} asesanti. ^b^uparujjhatī^eb^ti nirujjhati vūpasammati atthaṃ gacchati paṭippassambhatīti. yattha nāmañca rūpañca asesaṃ uparujjhati.

[03] ^b^viññāṇassa nirodhena, etthetaṃ uparujjhatī^eb^ti sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena satta bhave ṭhapetvā anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca, etthete nirujjhanti vūpasammanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti. sakadāgāmimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena dve bhave ṭhapetvā pañcasu bhavesu ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca, etthete nirujjhanti vūpasammanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti. anāgāmimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena ekaṃ bhavaṃ ṭhapetvā rūpadhātuyā vā arūpadhātuyā vā ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca, etthete nirujjhanti vūpasammanti atthaṃ ^a^T0.0023^ea^ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti. arahattamaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca, etthete nirujjhanti vūpasammanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhanti ^a^M0.0034^ea^. arahato anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyantassa carimaviññāṇassa nirodhena paññā ca sati ca ^a^V0.0030^ea^ nāmañca rūpañca, etthete nirujjhanti vūpasammanti atthaṃ gacchanti paṭippassambhantīti -- viññāṇassa nirodhena etthetaṃ uparujjhati. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``yametaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi, ajita taṃ vadāmi te.
[27] yattha nāmañca rūpañca, asesaṃ uparujjhati.
[22] viññāṇassa nirodhena, etthetaṃ uparujjhatī''ti..
[21] ^b^ye ca saṅkhātadhammāse, ye ca sekhā^eb^ {sekkhā (syā0 ka0)} ^b^puthū idha.^eb^
[22] ^b^tesaṃ me nipako iriyaṃ, puṭṭho pabrūhi mārisa..^eb^

[03] ^b^ye ca saṅkhātadhammāse^eb^ti saṅkhātadhammā vuccanti arahanto khīṇāsavā. kiṃkāraṇā saṅkhātadhammā vuccanti arahanto khīṇāsavā? te saṅkhātadhammā ñātadhammā tulitadhammā tīritadhammā vibhūtadhammā vibhāvitadhammā. ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti saṅkhātadhammā ñātadhammā tulitadhammā tīritadhammā vibhūtadhammā vibhāvitadhammā. ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti saṅkhātadhammā...pe0... ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti saṅkhātadhammā... ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā''ti saṅkhātadhammā... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti saṅkhātadhammā ñātadhammā ^a^T0.0024^ea^ tulitadhammā tīritadhammā vibhūtadhammā vibhāvitadhammā. atha vā tesaṃ khandhā saṅkhātā dhātuyo saṅkhātā āyatanāni saṅkhātā gatiyo saṅkhātā upapattiyo saṅkhātā paṭisandhi saṅkhātā bhavā saṅkhātā saṃsārā saṅkhātā vaṭṭā saṅkhātā. atha vā te khandhapariyante ṭhitā dhātupariyante ṭhitā āyatanapariyante ṭhitā gatipariyante ṭhitā upapattipariyante ṭhitā paṭisandhipariyante ṭhitā bhavapariyante ṭhitā saṃsārapariyante ṭhitā vaṭṭapariyante ṭhitā antime bhave ṭhitā antime samussaye ṭhitā antimadehadharā arahanto.
[21] tesaṃ cāyaṃ {yāyaṃ (ka0)} pacchimako, carimoyaṃ samussayo.
[22] jātimaraṇasaṃsāro, natthi nesaṃ punabbhavoti..

[03] taṃkāraṇā saṅkhātadhammā vuccanti arahanto khīṇāsavāti. ^b^ye ca saṅkhātadhammāse, ye ca sekhā puthū idhā^eb^ti. ^b^sekhā^eb^ti kiṃkāraṇā vuccanti ^a^M0.0035^ea^ sekhā? sikkhantīti sekhā. kiñca sikkhanti? adhisīlampi sikkhanti, adhicittampi sikkhanti, adhipaññampi sikkhanti. katamā adhisīlasikkhā? idha bhikkhu sīlavā hoti pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno ^a^V0.0031^ea^ aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. khuddako sīlakkhandho mahanto sīlakkhandho sīlaṃ patiṭṭhā ādi caraṇaṃ saṃyamo saṃvaro mukhaṃ pamukhaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā -- ayaṃ adhisīlasikkhā.

[03] katamā ^a^T0.0025^ea^ adhicittasikkhā? idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ... dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ... tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati -- ayaṃ adhicittasikkhā.

[03] katamā adhipaññāsikkhā? idha bhikkhu paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā. so ``idaṃ dukkha''nti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, ``ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo''ti...pe0... ``ayaṃ dukkhanirodho''ti... ``ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā''ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. ``ime āsavā''ti...pe0... ``ayaṃ āsavasamudayo''ti... ``ayaṃ āsavanirodho''ti... ``ayaṃ āsavanirodhagāminī paṭipadā''ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. ``ayaṃ adhipaññāsikkhā''... imā tisso sikkhāyo āvajjantā sikkhanti jānantā sikkhanti passantā sikkhanti cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahantā sikkhanti saddhāya adhimuccantā sikkhanti vīriyaṃ {viriyaṃ (syā0)} paggaṇhantā sikkhanti satiṃ upaṭṭhapentā sikkhanti cittaṃ samādahantā sikkhanti paññāya pajānantā sikkhanti abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānantā sikkhanti pariññeyyaṃ parijānantā sikkhanti pahātabbaṃ pajahantā sikkhanti bhāvetabbaṃ bhāventā sikkhanti sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikarontā sikkhanti ācaranti samācaranti samādāya vattanti. taṃkāraṇā vuccanti -- sekhā. ^b^puthū^eb^ti bahukā. ete sekhā sotāpannā ca paṭipannā ca sakadāgāmino ca paṭipannā ca ^a^T0.0026^ea^ anāgāmino ca paṭipannā ca arahanto ca paṭipannā ca. ^b^idhā^eb^ti imissā diṭṭhiyā imissā khantiyā imissā ruciyā imasmiṃ ādāye imasmiṃ dhamme imasmiṃ vinaye imasmiṃ dhammavinaye imasmiṃ pāvacane imasmiṃ brahmacariye imasmiṃ satthusāsane imasmiṃ attabhāve imasmiṃ manussaloketi -- ye ca sekhā puthū idha.

[03] ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0036^ea^ ^b^me nipako iriyaṃ, puṭṭho pabrūhi mārisā^eb^ti tvampi nipako paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī medhāvī. tesaṃ saṅkhātadhammānañca sekkhānañca iriyaṃ cariyaṃ vutti pavatti ācaraṃ gocaraṃ vihāraṃ paṭipadaṃ. ^b^puṭṭho^eb^ti pucchito yācito ajjhesito pasādito. ^b^pabrūhī^eb^ti brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehi. ^b^mārisā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ garuvacanaṃ sagāravasappatissādhivacanametaṃ mārisāti -- tesaṃ me nipako iriyaṃ, puṭṭho pabrūhi mārisa. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``ye ^a^V0.0032^ea^ ca saṅkhātadhammāse, ye ca sekhā puthū idha.
[22] tesaṃ me nipako iriyaṃ, puṭṭho pabrūhi mārisā''ti..
[21] ^b^kāmesu nābhigijjheyya, manasānāvilo siyā.^eb^
[22] ^b^kusalo sabbadhammānaṃ, sato bhikkhu paribbaje..^eb^

[03] ^b^kāmesu nābhigijjheyyā^eb^ti. ^b^kāmā^eb^ti uddānato dve kāmā -- vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca. katame vatthukāmā? manāpikā rūpā manāpikā saddā manāpikā gandhā ^a^T0.0027^ea^ manāpikā rasā manāpikā phoṭṭhabbā, attharaṇā pāvuraṇā {pāpuraṇā (syā0)} dāsidāsā ajeḷakā kukkuṭasūkarā hatthigavāssavaḷavā khettaṃ vatthu hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ gāmanigamarājadhāniyo {rājaṭhāniyo (ka0)} raṭṭhañca janapado ca koso ca koṭṭhāgārañca -- yaṃ kiñci rajanīyavatthu vatthukāmā.

[03] api ca atītā kāmā anāgatā kāmā paccuppannā kāmā ajjhattā kāmā bahiddhā kāmā ajjhattabahiddhā kāmā, hīnā kāmā majjhimā kāmā paṇītā kāmā, āpāyikā kāmā mānusikā kāmā dibbā kāmā, paccupaṭṭhitā kāmā, nimmitā kāmā paranimmitā kāmā, pariggahitā kāmā apariggahitā kāmā, mamāyitā kāmā amamāyitā kāmā, sabbepi kāmāvacarā dhammā, sabbepi rūpāvacarā dhammā, sabbepi arūpāvacarā dhammā, taṇhāvatthukā taṇhārammaṇā, kāmanīyaṭṭhena rajanīyaṭṭhena madanīyaṭṭhena ramaṇīyaṭṭhena {natthi syā0 potthake mahāni0 1} kāmā. ime vuccanti vatthukāmā.

[03] katame kilesakāmā? chando kāmo rāgo kāmo chandarāgo kāmo saṅkappo kāmo rāgo kāmo saṅkapparāgo kāmo, yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasineho ^a^M0.0037^ea^ kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho kāmagedho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmupādānaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ --
[21] addasaṃ kāma te mūlaṃ, saṅkappā kāma jāyasi.
[22] na taṃ saṅkappayissāmi, evaṃ kāma na hehisīti..

[03] ime ^a^T0.0028^ea^ vuccanti kilesakāmā. gedho vuccati taṇhā, yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. ^b^kāmesu nābhigijjheyyā^eb^ti kilesakāmena vatthukāmesu nābhigijjheyya ^a^V0.0033^ea^ na palibundheyya {palibujjheyya (syā0)} agiddho assa agadhito amucchito anajjhāpanno {anajjhopanno (syā0)} vītagedho vigatagedho cattagedho vantagedho muttagedho pahīnagedho paṭinissaṭṭhagedho vītarāgo vigatarāgo cattarāgo vantarāgo muttarāgo pahīnarāgo paṭinissaṭṭharāgo nicchāto nibbuto sītibhūto sukhappaṭisaṃvedī brahmabhūtena attanā vihareyyāti -- kāmesu nābhigijjheyya.

[03] ^b^manasānāvilo siyā^eb^ti. ^b^mano^eb^ti yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjā manoviññāṇadhātu. kāyaduccaritena cittaṃ āvilaṃ hoti luḷitaṃ eritaṃ ghaṭṭitaṃ calitaṃ bhantaṃ avūpasantaṃ. vacīduccaritena...pe0... manoduccaritena... rāgena... dosena... mohena... kodhena... upanāhena... makkhena... paḷāsena... issāya... macchariyena... māyāya... sāṭheyyena... thambhena... sārambhena... mānena... atimānena... madena... pamādena... sabbakilesehi... sabbaduccaritehi... sabbaḍāhehi... sabbapariḷāhehi... sabbasantāpehi... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārehi cittaṃ āvilaṃ hoti luḷitaṃ eritaṃ ghaṭṭitaṃ calitaṃ bhantaṃ avūpasantaṃ. ^b^manasānāvilo siyā^eb^ti cittena anāvilo siyā -- aluḷito anerito aghaṭṭito acalito abhanto vūpasanto āvilakare kilese jaheyya pajaheyya vinodeyya byantīkareyya {byantiṃ kareyya (ka0)} anabhāvaṃ ^a^T0.0029^ea^ gameyya, āvilakarehi kilesehi ca ārato {ārato assa (ka0) mahāni0 18 passa} virato paṭivirato nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā vihareyyāti -- manasānāvilo siyā.

[03] ^b^kusalo^eb^ ^a^M0.0038^ea^ ^b^sabbadhammāna^eb^nti ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti kusalo sabbadhammānaṃ, ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti kusalo sabbadhammānaṃ, ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti kusalo sabbadhammānaṃ, ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā''ti kusalo sabbadhammānaṃ...pe0... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti kusalo sabbadhammānaṃ. evampi kusalo sabbadhammānaṃ.

[03] atha vā, aniccato kusalo sabbadhammānaṃ, dukkhato...pe0... rogato... gaṇḍato... sallato... aghato... ābādhato... parato... palokato... ītito... upaddavato... bhayato... upasaggato... calato... pabhaṅguto... addhuvato {adhuvato (ka0) mahāni0 13} ... atāṇato... aleṇato... asaraṇato... asaraṇībhūtato... rittato... tucchato... suññato... anattato... ādīnavato... vipariṇāmadhammato... asārakato... aghamūlato... vadhakato... vibhavato... sāsavato... saṅkhatato... mārāmisato... jātidhammato... jarādhammato... byādhidhammato... maraṇadhammato... sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadhammato ^a^V0.0034^ea^... saṃkilesikadhammato... samudayato... atthaṅgamato... assādato... ādīnavato... nissaraṇato kusalo sabbadhammānaṃ. evampi kusalo sabbadhammānaṃ.

[03] atha vā, khandhakusalo dhātukusalo āyatanakusalo paṭiccasamuppādakusalo satipaṭṭhānakusalo sammappadhānakusalo iddhipādakusalo indriyakusalo balakusalo bojjhaṅgakusalo maggakusalo phalakusalo ^a^T0.0030^ea^ nibbānakusalo. evampi kusalo sabbadhammānaṃ.

[03] atha vā, sabbadhammā vuccanti dvādasāyatanāni -- cakkhu ceva {cakkhuñceva (ka0)} rūpā ca, sotañca saddā ca, ghānañca gandhā ca, jivhā ca rasā ca, kāyo ca phoṭṭhabbā ca, mano ca dhammā ca. yato ca ajjhattikabāhiresu āyatanesu chandarāgo pahīno hoti ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato {anabhāvaṅgato (syā0)} āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo, ettāvatāpi kusalo sabbadhammānanti -- kusalo sabbadhammānaṃ.

[03] ^b^sato bhikkhu paribbaje^eb^ti. ^b^sato^eb^ti catūhi kāraṇehi sato -- kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato, vedanāsu vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^M0.0039^ea^ bhāvento sato, citte cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato, dhammesu dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato.

[03] aparehipi catūhi kāraṇehi sato -- asatiparivajjanāya sato, satikaraṇīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ katattā sato, satiparibandhānaṃ {satipaṭipakkhānaṃ (syā0) mahāni0 3} dhammānaṃ hatattā sato, satinimittānaṃ dhammānaṃ asammuṭṭhattā {appamuṭṭhattā (syā0)} sato.
[03] aparehipi catūhi kāraṇehi sato -- satiyā samannāgatattā sato, satiyā vasitattā sato, satiyā pāguññena samannāgatattā sato, satiyā apaccorohaṇatāya sato.

[03] aparehipi catūhi kāraṇehi sato -- satiyā samannāgatattā sato, santattā sato, samitattā sato, santadhammasamannāgatattā sato. buddhānussatiyā sato, dhammānussatiyā sato, saṅghānussatiyā sato, sīlānussatiyā sato, cāgānussatiyā sato, devatānussatiyā sato ^a^T0.0031^ea^, ānāpānassatiyā sato, maraṇassatiyā sato, kāyagatāsatiyā sato, upasamānussatiyā sato. yā sati anussati...pe0... sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo ekāyanamaggo, ayaṃ vuccati sati. imāya satiyā upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno ^a^V0.0035^ea^ {sampanno (ka0)} samannāgato, so vuccati sato. ^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bhinnattā bhikkhu -- sakkāyadiṭṭhi bhinnā hoti, vicikicchā bhinnā hoti, sīlabbataparāmāso bhinno hoti, rāgo bhinno hoti, doso bhinno hoti, moho bhinno hoti, māno bhinno hoti. bhinnā honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṃkilesikā ponobhavikā {ponobbhavikā (syā0 ka0)} sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.
[21] pajjena katena {pajjotakatena (ka0) su0 ni0 519} attanā, [sabhiyāti bhagavā]
[27] parinibbānagato vitiṇṇakaṅkho.
[22] vibhavañca bhavañca vippahāya, vusitavā khīṇapunabbhavo sa bhikkhūti..

[03] ^b^sato^eb^ ^a^M0.0040^ea^ ^b^bhikkhu paribbaje^eb^ti sato bhikkhu paribbaje, sato gaccheyya, sato tiṭṭheyya, sato nisīdeyya, sato seyyaṃ kappeyya, sato abhikkameyya, sato paṭikkameyya, sato ālokeyya, sato vilokeyya, sato samiñjeyya, sato pasāreyya, sato saṅghāṭipattacīvaraṃ dhāreyya, sato careyya vihareyya iriyeyya vatteyya pāleyya yapeyya yāpeyyāti -- sato bhikkhu paribbaje. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``kāmesu ^a^T0.0032^ea^ nābhigijjheyya, manasānāvilo siyā.
[22] kusalo sabbadhammānaṃ, sato bhikkhu paribbaje''ti..

[03] saha gāthāpariyosānā ye te brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ ekacchandā ekapayogā ekādhippāyā ekavāsanavāsitā, tesaṃ anekapāṇasahassānaṃ virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi -- ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti. tassa brāhmaṇassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci. saha arahattappattā ajinajaṭāvākacīratidaṇḍakamaṇḍalukesā ca massū ca antarahitā, bhaṇḍukāsāyavatthavasano saṅghāṭipattacīvaradharo anvatthapaṭipattiyā pañjaliko bhagavantaṃ namassamāno nisinno hoti -- ``satthā me bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī''ti.
[06] ajitamāṇavapucchāniddeso paṭhamo.
[21] ^b^kodha^eb^ ^a^T0.0033^ea^ ^a^V0.0036^ea^ ^b^santusito loke, [iccāyasmā tissametteyyo]^eb^
[27] ^b^kassa no santi iñjitā.^eb^
[26] ^b^ko ubhantamabhiññāya, majjhe mantā na lippati.^eb^
[22] ^b^kaṃ brūsi mahāpurisoti, ko idha sibbinimaccagā.. ^eb^
[03] ^b^kodha santusito loke^eb^ti ko loke tuṭṭho santuṭṭho attamano paripuṇṇasaṅkappoti -- kodha santusito loke.

[03] ^b^iccāyasmā^eb^ ^a^M0.0041^ea^ ^b^tissametteyyo^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi padasaṃsaggo padapāripūrī akkharasamavāyo byañjanasiliṭṭhatā padānupubbatāpetaṃ -- iccāti. ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ garuvacanaṃ sagāravasappatissādhivacanametaṃ -- āyasmāti. ^b^tisso^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpo. ^b^metteyyo^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa gottaṃ saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāroti -- iccāyasmā tissametteyyo.

[01] ^b^kassa no santi iñjitā^eb^ti taṇhiñjitaṃ diṭṭhiñjitaṃ māniñjitaṃ kilesiñjitaṃ kāmiñjitaṃ. kassime iñjitā natthi na santi na saṃvijjanti nupalabbhanti pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā ^a^T0.0034^ea^ abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti -- kassa no santi iñjitā.
[03] ^b^ko ubhantamabhiññāyā^eb^ti ko ubho ante abhiññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti -- ko ubhantamabhiññāya.
[01] ^b^majjhe mantā na lippatī^eb^ti majjhe mantāya na lippati, alitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti -- majjhe mantā na lippati.

[03] ^b^kaṃ brūsi mahāpuriso^eb^ti mahāpuriso aggapuriso seṭṭhapuriso viseṭṭhapuriso pāmokkhapuriso ^a^V0.0037^ea^ uttamapuriso padhānapuriso pavarapurisoti. kaṃ brūsi kaṃ kathesi kaṃ maññasi kaṃ bhaṇasi kaṃ passati kaṃ voharasīti -- kaṃ brūsi mahāpurisoti.
[03] ^b^ko idha sibbinimaccagā^eb^ti ko idha sibbiniṃ taṇhaṃ ajjhagā upaccagā atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti -- ko idha sibbinimaccagā. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``kodha santusito loke, [iccāyasmā tissametteyyo]
[27] kassa no santi iñjitā.
[26] ko ubhantamabhiññāya, majjhe mantā na lippati.
[22] kaṃ brūsi mahāpurisoti, ko ^a^T0.0035^ea^ idha sibbinimaccagā''ti..
[21] ^b^kāmesu^eb^ ^a^M0.0042^ea^ ^b^brahmacariyavā, [metteyyāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^vītataṇho sadā sato.^eb^
[22] ^b^saṅkhāya nibbuto bhikkhu, tassa no santi iñjitā..^eb^

[03] ^b^kāmesu brahmacariyavā^eb^ti. ^b^kāmā^eb^ti uddānato dve kāmā -- vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca...pe0... ime vuccanti vatthukāmā...pe0... ime vuccanti kilesakāmā. brahmacariyaṃ vuccati asaddhammasamāpattiyā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo. api ca, nippariyāyena brahmacariyaṃ vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ -- sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi. yo iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena upeto samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato, so vuccati brahmacariyavā. yathā ca dhanena dhanavāti vuccati, bhogena bhogavāti vuccati, yasena yasavāti ^a^T0.0036^ea^ vuccati, sippena sippavāti vuccati, sīlena sīlavāti vuccati, vīriyena vīriyavāti vuccati, paññāya paññavāti vuccati, vijjāya vijjavāti vuccati -- evameva yo iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena upeto samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato, so vuccati brahmacariyavāti -- kāmesu brahmacariyavā.
[03] ^b^metteyyā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gottena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- metteyyāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^vītataṇho^eb^ ^a^V0.0038^ea^ ^b^sadā sato^eb^ti. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti rūpataṇhā...pe0... dhammataṇhā. yassesā taṇhā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, so vuccati vītataṇho cattataṇho vantataṇho muttataṇho pahīnataṇho paṭinissaṭṭhataṇho vītarāgo cattarāgo vantarāgo muttarāgo pahīnarāgo paṭinissaṭṭharāgo nicchāto nibbuto sītibhūto sukhappaṭisaṃvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharati. ^b^sadā^eb^ti sadā sabbadā sabbakālaṃ niccakālaṃ dhuvakālaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ ^a^M0.0043^ea^ {pokhānupokhaṃ (syā0)} udakūmikajātaṃ avīcisantatisahitaṃ {avīci samaṅhisahitaṃ (syā0)} phassitaṃ {phusitaṃ (syā0)} purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ purimayāmaṃ majjhimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmaṃ kāḷe juṇhe vasse hemante gimhe purime vayokhandhe majjhime vayokhandhe pacchime vayokhandhe. ^b^sato^eb^ti catūhi kāraṇehi sato -- kāye ^a^T0.0037^ea^ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato, vedanāsu vedanānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato, citte cittānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato, dhammesu dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato...pe0... so vuccati satoti -- vītataṇho sadā sato.

[03] ^b^saṅkhāya nibbuto bhikkhū^eb^ti saṅkhā vuccati ñāṇaṃ. yā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi. ^b^saṅkhāyā^eb^ti saṅkhāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā, ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti saṅkhāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā, ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti...pe0... ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti... ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā''ti... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti saṅkhāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā.

[03] atha vā, aniccato saṅkhāya jānitvā...pe0... dukkhato... rogato... gaṇḍato... sallato...pe0... nissaraṇato saṅkhāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā. ^b^nibbuto^eb^ti rāgassa nibbāpitattā nibbuto, dosassa nibbāpitattā nibbuto, mohassa nibbāpitattā nibbuto, kodhassa... upanāhassa... makkhassa... paḷāsassa... issāya... macchariyassa... māyāya... sāṭheyyassa... thambhassa... sārambhassa... mānassa... atimānassa... madassa... pamādassa... sabbakilesānaṃ... sabbaduccaritānaṃ... sabbadarathānaṃ ^a^T0.0038^ea^... sabbapariḷāhānaṃ... sabbasantāpānaṃ... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṃ nibbāpitattā nibbuto. ^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bhinnattā bhikkhu...pe0... vusitavā khīṇapunabbhavo sa bhikkhūti -- saṅkhāya nibbuto bhikkhu.

[03] ^b^tassa no santi iñjitā^eb^ti. ^b^tassā^eb^ti arahato khīṇāsavassa. ^b^iñjitā^eb^ti taṇhiñjitaṃ diṭṭhiñjitaṃ māniñjitaṃ kilesiñjitaṃ kāmiñjitaṃ. tassime iñjitā ^a^M0.0044^ea^ natthi na santi na saṃvijjanti ^a^V0.0039^ea^ nupalabbhanti pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti -- tassa no santi iñjitā. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``kāmesu brahmacariyavā, [metteyyāti bhagavā]
[27] vītataṇho sadā sato.
[22] saṅkhāya nibbuto bhikkhu, tassa no santi iñjitā''ti..
[21] ^b^so ubhantamabhiññāya, majjhe mantā na lippati. ^eb^
[22] ^b^taṃ brūmi mahāpurisoti, so idha sibbinimaccagā.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^so ubhantamabhiññāya, majjhe mantā na lippatī^eb^ti. ^b^antā^eb^ti phasso eko anto, phassasamudayo dutiyo anto, phassanirodho majjhe; atītaṃ eko anto, anāgataṃ dutiyo anto, paccuppannaṃ majjhe; sukhā vedanā eko anto, dukkhā vedanā dutiyo anto, adukkhamasukhā vedanā majjhe; nāmaṃ eko anto, rūpaṃ dutiyo anto, viññāṇaṃ majjhe; cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni eko anto, cha bāhirāni āyatanāni dutiyo anto, viññāṇaṃ majjhe; sakkāyo eko anto, sakkāyasamudayo dutiyo anto, sakkāyanirodho majjhe. mantā vuccati paññā, yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi.

[03] ^b^lepā^eb^ti dve lepā -- taṇhālepo ca diṭṭhilepo ca. katamo taṇhālepo ^a^T0.0039^ea^? yāvatā taṇhāsaṅkhātena sīmakataṃ odhikataṃ {mariyādikataṃ odhikataṃ (syā0)} pariyantakataṃ pariggahitaṃ mamāyitaṃ -- ``idaṃ mama, etaṃ mama, ettakaṃ mama, ettāvatā mama rūpā saddā gandhā rasā phoṭṭhabbā attharaṇā pāvuraṇā dāsidāsā ajeḷakā kukkuṭasūkarā hatthigavāssavaḷavā khettaṃ vatthu hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ gāmanigamarājadhāniyo raṭṭhañca janapado ca koso ca koṭṭhāgārañca''. kevalampi mahāpathaviṃ taṇhāvasena mamāyati. yāvatā aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritaṃ -- ayaṃ taṇhālepo.

[03] katamo ^a^M0.0045^ea^ diṭṭhilepo? vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi, dasavatthukā micchādiṭṭhi, dasavatthukā antaggāhikā diṭṭhi, yā evarūpā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāro diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ gāho paṭiggāho abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo micchāpatho micchattaṃ ^a^V0.0040^ea^ titthāyatanaṃ vipariyesaggāho {vipariyesaggāho (bahūsu)} viparītaggāho vipallāsaggāho micchāgāho ayāthāvakasmiṃ yāthāvakanti gāho, yāvatā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni -- ayaṃ diṭṭhilepo.

[03] ^b^so ubhantamabhiññāya, majjhe mantā na lippatī^eb^ti so ubho ca ante majjhañca mantāya abhiññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā na lippati na palippati na upalippati, alitto asaṃlitto anupalitto nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti -- so ubhantamabhiññāya majjhe mantā na lippati.

[03] ^b^taṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0040^ea^ ^b^brūmi mahāpuriso^eb^ti mahāpuriso aggapuriso seṭṭhapuriso viseṭṭhapuriso pāmokkhapuriso uttamapuriso pavarapuriso, taṃ brūmi taṃ kathemi taṃ bhaṇāmi taṃ dīpemi taṃ voharāmi.

[03] āyasmā sāriputto {passa saṃ0 ni0 5.377} bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``mahāpuriso mahāpuriso'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, mahāpuriso hotī''ti? ``vimuttacittattā khvāhaṃ, sāriputta, mahāpurisoti vadāmi, avimuttacittattā no mahāpurisoti vadāmi.

[03] ``kathañca, sāriputta, vimuttacitto hoti? idha, sāriputta, bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ. tassa kāye kāyānupassino viharato cittaṃ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi. vedanāsu...pe0... citte... dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ. tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato cittaṃ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi. evaṃ kho, sāriputta, bhikkhu vimuttacitto hoti. vimuttacittattā khvāhaṃ, sāriputta, mahāpurisoti ^a^M0.0046^ea^ vadāmi, avimuttacittattā no mahāpurisoti vadāmī''ti -- taṃ brūmi mahāpurisoti.

[03] ^b^so idha sibbinimaccagā^eb^ti sibbinī vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ, yassesā sibbinī taṇhā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā. so sibbiniṃ taṇhaṃ accagā upaccagā ^a^T0.0041^ea^ atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti -- so idha sibbinimaccagā. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``so ^a^V0.0041^ea^ ubhantamabhiññāya, majjhe mantā na lippati.
[22] taṃ brūmi mahāpurisoti, so idha sibbinimaccagā''ti..

[03] saha gāthāpariyosānā ye te brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ ekacchandā ekapayogā ekādhippāyā ekavāsanavāsitā, tesaṃ anekapāṇasahassānaṃ virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi -- ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti. tassa brāhmaṇassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci. saha arahattappattā ajinajaṭāvākacīratidaṇḍakamaṇḍalukesā ca massū ca antarahitā. bhaṇḍukāsāyavatthavasano saṅghāṭipattacīvaradharo anvatthapaṭipattiyā pañjaliko bhagavantaṃ namassamāno nisinno hoti -- ``satthā me bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī''ti.
[06] tissametteyyamāṇavapucchāniddeso dutiyo.
[21] ^b^anejaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0042^ea^ ^b^mūladassāviṃ, [iccāyasmā puṇṇako]^eb^
[27] ^b^atthi pañhena āgamaṃ.^eb^
[26] ^b^kiṃnissitā isayo manujā, khattiyā brāhmaṇā devatānaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^yaññamakappayiṃsu puthūdha loke, pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^anejaṃ mūladassāvi^eb^nti ejā vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ sā ejā taṇhā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ^a^M0.0047^ea^ ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. tasmā buddho anejo. ejāya pahīnattā anejo. bhagavā lābhepi na iñjati, alābhepi na iñjati, yasepi na iñjati, ayasepi na iñjati, pasaṃsāyapi na iñjati, nindāyapi na iñjati, sukhepi na iñjati, dukkhepi na iñjati na calati na vedhati nappavedhatīti -- anejaṃ. ^b^mūladassāvi^eb^nti bhagavā mūladassāvī hetudassāvī nidānadassāvī sambhavadassāvī pabhavadassāvī samuṭṭhānadassāvī āhāradassāvī ārammaṇadassāvī paccayadassāvī samudayadassāvī.
[03] tīṇi akusalamūlāni -- lobho akusalamūlaṃ, doso akusalamūlaṃ, moho akusalamūlaṃ.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ ^a^V0.0042^ea^ bhagavatā -- {passa a0 ni0 3.112} ``tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, nidānāni ^a^T0.0043^ea^ kammānaṃ samudayāya. katamāni tīṇi? lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāya, doso nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāya, moho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāya. na, bhikkhave, lobhajena kammena dosajena kammena mohajena kammena devā paññāyanti, manussā paññāyanti, yā vā panaññāpi kāci sugatiyo. atha kho, bhikkhave, lobhajena kammena dosajena kammena mohajena kammena nirayo paññāyati, tiracchānayoni paññāyati, pettivisayo paññāyati, yā vā panaññāpi kāci duggatiyo niraye tiracchānayoniyā pettivisaye attabhāvābhinibbattiyā''. imāni tīṇi akusalamūlānīti bhagavā jānāti passati. evampi bhagavā mūladassāvī...pe0... samudayadassāvī. tīṇi kusalamūlāni -- alobho kusalamūlaṃ, adoso kusalamūlaṃ, amoho kusalamūlaṃ.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``tīṇimāni...pe0... na, bhikkhave, alobhajena kammena adosajena kammena amohajena kammena nirayo paññāyati, tiracchānayoni paññāyati, pettivisayo paññāyati, yā vā panaññāpi kāci duggatiyo. atha kho, bhikkhave, alobhajena kammena adosajena kammena amohajena kammena devā paññāyanti, manussā paññāyanti, yā vā panaññāpi kāci sugatiyo deve ca manusse ca attabhāvābhinibbattiyā''. imāni tīṇi kusalamūlānīti bhagavā jānāti passati. evampi bhagavā mūladassāvī...pe0... samudayadassāvī.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ ^a^M0.0048^ea^ bhagavatā -- ``ye keci, bhikkhave, dhammā akusalā akusalabhāgiyā akusalapakkhikā ^a^T0.0044^ea^ sabbe te avijjāmūlakā avijjāsamosaraṇā avijjāsamugghātā''. sabbe te samugghātaṃ gacchantīti bhagavā jānāti passati. evampi bhagavā mūladassāvī...pe0... samudayadassāvī.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``ye keci, bhikkhave, dhammā kusalā kusalabhāgiyā kusalapakkhikā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā. appamādo tesaṃ dhammānaṃ aggamakkhāyatī''ti bhagavā jānāti passati. evampi bhagavā mūladassāvī...pe0... samudayadassāvī.

[03] atha vā, bhagavā jānāti passati. ``avijjā mūlaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ, saṅkhārā mūlaṃ viññāṇassa ^a^V0.0043^ea^, viññāṇaṃ mūlaṃ nāmarūpassa, nāmarūpaṃ mūlaṃ saḷāyatanassa, saḷāyatanaṃ mūlaṃ phassassa, phasso mūlaṃ vedanāya, vedanā mūlaṃ taṇhāya, taṇhā mūlaṃ upādānassa, upādānaṃ mūlaṃ bhavassa, bhavo mūlaṃ jātiyā, jāti mūlaṃ jarāmaraṇassā''ti -- bhagavā jānāti passati. evampi bhagavā mūladassāvī...pe0... samudayadassāvī.

[03] atha vā, bhagavā jānāti passati. ``cakkhu mūlaṃ cakkhurogānaṃ, sotaṃ mūlaṃ sotarogānaṃ, ghānaṃ mūlaṃ ghānarogānaṃ, jivhā mūlaṃ jivhārogānaṃ, kāyo mūlaṃ kāyarogānaṃ, mano mūlaṃ cetasikānaṃ dukkhāna''nti -- bhagavā jānāti passati. evampi bhagavā mūladassāvī hetudassāvī nidānadassāvī sambhavadassāvī pabhavadassāvī samuṭṭhānadassāvī āhāradassāvī ārammaṇadassāvī paccayadassāvī samudayadassāvīti -- anejaṃ mūladassāvī.
[03] ^b^iccāyasmā puṇṇako^eb^ti ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... āyasmā puṇṇako ^a^T0.0045^ea^.

[03] ^b^atthi pañhena āgama^eb^nti pañhena atthiko āgatomhi, {pañhatthikāmha āgatā (bahūsu) passa mahāni0 192} pañhaṃ pucchitukāmo āgatomhi, pañhaṃ sotukāmo āgatomhīti -- evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṃ. atha vā, pañhatthikānaṃ pañhaṃ pucchitukāmānaṃ pañhaṃ sotukāmānaṃ āgamanaṃ abhikkamanaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ payirupāsanaṃ atthīti -- evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṃ. atha vā, pañhāgamo tuyhaṃ atthi, tvampi pahu tvamasi alamatto. mayā pucchitaṃ kathetuṃ visajjetuṃ vahassetaṃ bhāranti {visajjetuṃ sandassetuṃ bhaṇitunti (syā0) vahassu + etaṃ} -- evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṃ.

[03] ^b^kiṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0049^ea^ ^b^nissitā isayo manujā^eb^ti kiṃ nissitā āsitā allīnā upagatā ajjhositā adhimuttā. ^b^isayo^eb^ti isināmakā ye keci isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitā ājīvakā nigaṇṭhā jaṭilā tāpasā. ^b^manujā^eb^ti manussā vuccantīti -- kiṃ nissitā isayo manujā.

[03] ^b^khattiyā brāhmaṇā devatāna^eb^nti. ^b^khattiyā^eb^ti ye keci khattiyajātikā. ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^ti ye keci bhovādikā. ^b^devatāna^eb^nti ājīvakasāvakānaṃ ājīvakā devatā, nigaṇṭhasāvakānaṃ nigaṇṭhā devatā, jaṭilasāvakānaṃ jaṭilā devatā, paribbājakasāvakānaṃ paribbājakā devatā, aviruddhakasāvakānaṃ aviruddhakā {avaruddhakasāvakānaṃ avaruddhakā (syā0)} devatā, hatthivatikānaṃ hatthī devatā, assavatikānaṃ assā devatā, govatikānaṃ gāvo devatā, kukkuravatikānaṃ kukkurā devatā, kākavatikānaṃ kākā devatā, vāsudevavatikānaṃ vāsudevo devatā, baladevavatikānaṃ ^a^T0.0046^ea^ baladevo devatā, puṇṇabhaddavatikānaṃ ^a^V0.0044^ea^ puṇṇabhaddo devatā, maṇibhaddavatikānaṃ maṇibhaddo devatā, aggivatikānaṃ aggi devatā, nāgavatikānaṃ nāgā devatā, supaṇṇavatikānaṃ supaṇṇā devatā, yakkhavatikānaṃ yakkhā devatā, asuravatikānaṃ asurā devatā, gandhabbavatikānaṃ gandhabbā devatā, mahārājavatikānaṃ mahārājāno devatā, candavatikānaṃ cando devatā, sūriyavatikānaṃ sūriyo devatā, indavatikānaṃ indo devatā, brahmavatikānaṃ brahmā devatā, devavatikānaṃ devo devatā, disāvatikānaṃ disā devatā, ye yesaṃ dakkhiṇeyyā te tesaṃ devatāti -- khattiyabrāhmaṇā devatānaṃ.

[03] ^b^yaññamakappayiṃsu puthūdha loke^eb^ti yaññaṃ vuccati deyyadhammo cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ {mālāgandhaṃ vilepanaṃ (syā0) itivu0 75} seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ. ^b^yaññamakappayiṃsū^eb^ti yepi yaññaṃ esanti gavesanti pariyesanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ, tepi yaññaṃ kappenti. yepi yaññaṃ abhisaṅkharonti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ annaṃ pānaṃ...pe0... ^a^T0.0047^ea^ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ, tepi yaññaṃ kappenti. yepi yaññaṃ denti yajanti pariccajanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ annaṃ pānaṃ...pe0... seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ ^a^M0.0050^ea^, tepi yaññaṃ kappenti. ^b^puthū^eb^ti yaññā vā ete puthū, yaññayājakā {yaññayajakā (syā0)} vā ete puthū, dakkhiṇeyyā vā ete puthū. kathaṃ yaññā vā ete puthū? bahukānaṃ ete yaññā cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālaṃ gandhaṃ vilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ -- evaṃ yaññā vā ete puthū.
[03] kathaṃ yaññayājakā vā ete puthū? bahukā ete yaññayājakā khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca vessā ca suddā ca gahaṭṭhā ca pabbajitā ca devā ca manussā ca -- evaṃ yaññayājakā vā ete puthū.

[03] kathaṃ dakkhiṇeyyā vā ete puthū? bahukā ete dakkhiṇeyyā puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇā kapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakā {... vaṇibbakasāvakā (syā0) itivu0 75} -- evaṃ dakkhiṇeyyā vā ete puthū. ^b^idha loke^eb^ti manussaloketi yaññamakappayiṃsu -- puthūdha loke.

[03] ^b^pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi meta^eb^nti. ^b^pucchā^eb^ti tisso pucchā -- adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā, diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchā, vimaticchedanā pucchā. katamā adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā? pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ, tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya ^a^V0.0045^ea^ tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhūtatthāya vibhāvanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati -- ayaṃ adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā.

[03] katamā diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchā? pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ ^a^T0.0048^ea^ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ. aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati -- ayaṃ diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchā.

[03] katamā vimaticchedanā pucchā? pakatiyā saṃsayapakkhando {saṃsayapakkhanno (syā0)} hoti vimatipakkhando dveḷhakajāto -- ``evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho''ti! so vimaticchedanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati -- ayaṃ vimaticchedanā pucchā. imā tisso pucchā.

[03] aparāpi tisso pucchā -- manussapucchā, amanussapucchā, nimmitapucchā. katamā manussapucchā? manussā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchanti, bhikkhū pucchanti, bhikkhuniyo pucchanti, upāsakā pucchanti, upāsikāyo pucchanti, rājāno ^a^M0.0051^ea^ pucchanti, khattiyā pucchanti, brāhmaṇā pucchanti, vessā pucchanti, suddā pucchanti, gahaṭṭhā pucchanti, pabbajitā pucchanti -- ayaṃ manussapucchā.

[03] katamā amanussapucchā? amanussā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchanti, nāgā pucchanti, supaṇṇā pucchanti, yakkhā pucchanti, asurā pucchanti, gandhabbā pucchanti, mahārājāno pucchanti, indā pucchanti, brahmāno pucchanti, devatāyo pucchanti -- ayaṃ amanussapucchā.

[03] katamā nimmitapucchā? yaṃ bhagavā rūpaṃ abhinimmināti manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ ahīnindriyaṃ, so nimmito buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ^a^T0.0049^ea^ pañhaṃ pucchati; bhagavā visajjeti {vissajjeti (ka0)} -- ayaṃ nimmitapucchā. imā tisso pucchā.

[03] aparāpi tisso pucchā -- attatthapucchā, paratthapucchā, ubhayatthapucchā. aparāpi tisso pucchā -- diṭṭhadhammikatthapucchā, samparāyikatthapucchā, paramatthapucchā. aparāpi tisso pucchā -- anavajjatthapucchā, nikkilesatthapucchā, vodānatthapucchā. aparāpi tisso pucchā -- atītapucchā, anāgatapucchā, paccuppannapucchā. aparāpi tisso pucchā -- ajjhattapucchā, bahiddhāpucchā ^a^V0.0046^ea^, ajjhattabahiddhāpucchā. aparāpi tisso pucchā -- kusalapucchā, akusalapucchā, abyākatapucchā. aparāpi tisso pucchā -- khandhapucchā, dhātupucchā, āyatanapucchā. aparāpi tisso pucchā -- satipaṭṭhānapucchā, sammappadhānapucchā, iddhipādapucchā. aparāpi tisso pucchā -- indriyapucchā, balapucchā, bojjhaṅgapucchā. aparāpi tisso pucchā -- maggapucchā, phalapucchā, nibbānapucchā.

[03] ^b^pucchāmi^eb^ ^a^T0.0050^ea^ ^b^ta^eb^nti pucchāmi taṃ yācāmi taṃ ajjhesāmi taṃ pasādemi taṃ ``kathayassu me''ti pucchāmi taṃ. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ... sacchikā paññatti -- yadidaṃ bhagavāti. ^b^brūhi meta^eb^nti brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``anejaṃ mūladassāviṃ, [iccāyasmā puṇṇako]
[27] atthi pañhena āgamaṃ.
[26] kiṃ nissitā isayo manujā, khattiyā brāhmaṇā devatānaṃ.
[22] yaññamakappayiṃsu puthūdha loke, pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi meta''nti..
[21] ^b^ye^eb^ ^a^M0.0052^ea^ ^b^kecime isayo manujā, [puṇṇakāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^khattiyā brāhmaṇā devatānaṃ.^eb^
[26] ^b^yaññamakappayiṃsu puthūdha loke, āsīsamānā puṇṇaka itthattaṃ^eb^ {itthataṃ (syā0), itthabhāvaṃ (ka0)} ^b^.^eb^
[22] ^b^jaraṃ sitā yaññamakappayiṃsu..^eb^

[03] ^b^ye kecime isayo manujā^eb^ti. ^b^ye kecī^eb^ti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ -- ye kecīti. ^b^isayo^eb^ti isināmakā ye keci isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitā ājīvakā nigaṇṭhā ^a^T0.0051^ea^ jaṭilā tāpasā. ^b^manujā^eb^ti manussā vuccantīti -- ye kecime isayo manujā puṇṇakāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^khattiyā brāhmaṇā devatāna^eb^nti. ^b^khattiyā^eb^ti ye keci khattiyajātikā. ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^ti ye keci bhovādikā. ^b^devatāna^eb^nti ājīvakasāvakānaṃ ājīvakā devatā...pe0... disāvatikānaṃ disā devatā. ye yesaṃ dakkhiṇeyyā, te tesaṃ devatāti -- khattiyā brāhmaṇā devatānaṃ.

[03] ^b^yaññamakappayiṃsu^eb^ ^a^V0.0047^ea^ ^b^puthūdha loke^eb^ti. yaññaṃ vuccati deyyadhammo cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ annaṃ pānaṃ...pe0... seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ. ^b^yaññamakappayiṃsū^eb^ti yepi yaññaṃ esanti gavesanti pariyesanti...pe0... seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ, tepi yaññaṃ kappenti. ^b^puthū^eb^ti yaññā vā ete puthū, yaññayājakā vā ete puthū, dakkhiṇeyyā vā ete puthū...pe0... evaṃ dakkhiṇeyyā vā ete puthū. ^b^idha loke^eb^ti manussaloketi yaññamakappayiṃsu -- puthūdha loke.

[03] ^b^āsīsamānā puṇṇaka itthatta^eb^nti. ^b^āsīsamānā^eb^ti rūpapaṭilābhaṃ ^a^T0.0052^ea^ āsīsamānā, saddapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsamānā, gandhapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsamānā, rasapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsamānā, phoṭṭhabbapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsamānā, puttapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsamānā, dārapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsamānā, dhanapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsamānā, yasapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsamānā, issariyapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsamānā, khattiyamahāsālakule attabhāvapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsamānā, brāhmaṇamahāsālakule ^a^M0.0053^ea^ attabhāvapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsamānā, gahapatimahāsālakule attabhāvapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsamānā, cātumahārājikesu {cātummahārājikesu (syā0)} devesu attabhāvapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsamānā, tāvatiṃsesu devesu yāmesu devesu tusitesu devesu nimmānaratīsu devesu paranimmitavasavattīsu devesu brahmakāyikesu devesu attabhāvapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsamānā icchamānā sādiyamānā patthayamānā pihayamānā abhijappamānāti āsīsamānā.

[03] ^b^puṇṇaka itthatta^eb^nti ettha attabhāvābhinibbattiṃ āsīsamānā ettha khattiyamahāsālakule attabhāvābhinibbattiṃ āsīsamānā...pe0... ettha brahmakāyikesu devesu attabhāvābhinibbattiṃ āsīsamānā icchamānā sādiyamānā patthayamānā pihayamānā abhijappamānāti āsīsamānā ^a^T0.0053^ea^ -- puṇṇaka itthattaṃ.

[03] ^b^jaraṃ sitā yaññamakappayiṃsū^eb^ti jarānissitā byādhinissitā maraṇanissitā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsanissitā. yadeva te jātinissitā tadeva te jarānissitā. yadeva te jarānissitā tadeva te byādhinissitā. yadeva te byādhinissitā tadeva te maraṇanissitā. yadeva te maraṇanissitā tadeva te sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsanissitā. yadeva te sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsanissitā tadeva te gatinissitā. yadeva te gatinissitā tadeva te upapattinissitā. yadeva te upapattinissitā tadeva te paṭisandhinissitā. yadeva te paṭisandhinissitā tadeva te bhavanissitā. yadeva te bhavanissitā ^a^V0.0048^ea^ tadeva te saṃsāranissitā. yadeva te saṃsāranissitā tadeva te vaṭṭanissitā allīnā upagatā ajjhositā adhimuttāti -- jaraṃ sitā yaññamakappayiṃsu. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``ye kecime isayo manujā, [puṇṇakāti bhagavā]
[27] khattiyā brāhmaṇā devatānaṃ.
[26] yaññamakappayiṃsu puthūdha loke, āsīsamānā puṇṇaka itthattaṃ.
[22] jaraṃ sitā yaññamakappayiṃsū''ti..
[21] ^b^ye^eb^ ^a^M0.0054^ea^ ^b^kecime isayo manujā, [iccāyasmā puṇṇako]^eb^
[27] ^b^khattiyā^eb^ ^a^T0.0054^ea^ ^b^brāhmaṇā devatānaṃ.^eb^
[26] ^b^yaññamakappayiṃsu puthūdha loke, kaccisu te bhagavā yaññapathe appamattā.^eb^
[22] ^b^atāruṃ^eb^ {atāruṃ (syā0 ka0)} ^b^jātiñca jarañca mārisa, pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ..^eb^
[03] ^b^ye kecime isayo manujā^eb^ti. ^b^ye kecī^eb^ti...pe0....

[03] ^b^kaccisu te bhagavā yaññapathe appamattā^eb^ti. ^b^kaccisū^eb^ti saṃsayapucchā vimatipucchā dveḷhakapucchā anekaṃsapucchā -- ``evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho''ti -- kaccisu. ^b^te^eb^ti yaññayājakā vuccanti. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- kaccisu te bhagavā. ^b^yaññapathe appamattā^eb^ti yaññoyeva vuccati yaññapatho. yathā ariyamaggo ariyapatho devamaggo devapatho brahmamaggo brahmapatho, evameva yaññoyeva vuccati yaññapatho. ^b^appamattā^eb^ti yaññapathe appamattā sakkaccakārino sātaccakārino aṭṭhitakārino anolīnavuttino anikkhittacchandā anikkhittadhurā taccaritā tabbahulā taggarukā tanninnā tappoṇā tappabbhārā tadadhimuttā tadadhipateyyāti -- tepi yaññapathe appamattā. yepi yaññaṃ esanti gavesanti pariyesanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ annaṃ pānaṃ...pe0... seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ sakkaccakārino...pe0... tadadhipateyyā, tepi yaññapathe ^a^T0.0055^ea^ appamattā. yepi yaññaṃ abhisaṅkharonti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ annaṃ pānaṃ...pe0... seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ sakkaccakārino...pe0... tadadhipateyyā, tepi yaññapathe appamattā. yepi yaññaṃ denti yajanti pariccajanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ annaṃ pānaṃ...pe0... seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ sakkaccakārino ^a^V0.0049^ea^ ...pe0... tadadhipateyyā, tepi yaññapathe appamattāti -- kaccisu te bhagavā yaññapathe appamattā.

[03] ^b^atāruṃ jātiñca jarañca mārisā^eb^ti jarāmaraṇaṃ atariṃsu uttariṃsu patariṃsu samatikkamiṃsu vītivattiṃsu. ^b^mārisā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ garuvacanaṃ sagāravasappatissādhivacanametaṃ mārisāti -- atāru jātiñca jarañca mārisa.

[03] ^b^pucchāmi^eb^ ^a^M0.0055^ea^ ^b^taṃ bhagavā brūhi meta^eb^nti. ^b^pucchāmi ta^eb^nti pucchāmi taṃ yācāmi taṃ ajjhesāmi taṃ pasādemi taṃ kathayassu meti -- pucchāmi taṃ. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti -- yadidaṃ bhagavāti. ^b^brūhi meta^eb^nti brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``ye kecime isayo manujā, [iccāyasmā puṇṇako]
[27] khattiyā brāhmaṇā devatānaṃ.
[26] yaññamakappayiṃsu ^a^T0.0056^ea^ puthūdha loke, kaccisu te bhagavā yaññapathe appamattā.
[22] atāru jātiñca jarañca mārisa, pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi meta''nti..
[21] ^b^āsīsanti^eb^ {āsiṃsanti (syā0)} ^b^thomayanti, abhijappanti juhanti. [puṇṇakāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^kāmābhijappanti paṭicca lābhaṃ, te yājayogā bhavarāgarattā.^eb^
[22] ^b^nātariṃsu jātijaranti brūmi..^eb^

[03] ^b^āsīsanti thomayanti abhijappanti juhantī^eb^ti. ^b^āsīsantī^eb^ti rūpapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsanti, saddapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsanti, gandhapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsanti, rasapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsanti, phoṭṭhabbapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsanti, puttapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsanti, dārapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsanti, dhanapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsanti, yasapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsanti, issariyapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsanti, khattiyamahāsālakule attabhāvapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsanti, brāhmaṇamahāsālakule...pe0... gahapatimahāsālakule attabhāvapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsanti, cātumahārājikesu devesu...pe0... brahmakāyikesu devesu attabhāvapaṭilābhaṃ āsīsanti icchanti sādiyanti patthayanti pihayantīti -- āsīsanti.

[03] ^b^thomayantī^eb^ti ^a^V0.0050^ea^ yaññaṃ vā thomenti phalaṃ vā thomenti dakkhiṇeyye vā thomenti. kathaṃ yaññaṃ thomenti? suciṃ dinnaṃ {viyaṃ dinnaṃ (syā0)}, manāpaṃ dinnaṃ, paṇītaṃ dinnaṃ, kālena ^a^M0.0056^ea^ dinnaṃ, kappiyaṃ dinnaṃ, viceyya dinnaṃ, anavajjaṃ dinnaṃ, abhiṇhaṃ dinnaṃ ^a^T0.0057^ea^ dadaṃ cittaṃ pasāditanti -- thomenti kittenti vaṇṇenti pasaṃsanti. evaṃ yaññaṃ thomenti.
[03] kathaṃ phalaṃ thomenti? ito nidānaṃ rūpapaṭilābho bhavissati...pe0... brahmakāyikesu devesu attabhāvapaṭilābho bhavissatīti -- thomenti kittenti vaṇṇenti pasaṃsanti. evaṃ phalaṃ thomenti.

[03] kathaṃ dakkhiṇeyye thomenti? dakkhiṇeyyā jātisampannā gottasampannā ajjhāyakā mantadharā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ sākkharappabhedānaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ padakā veyyākaraṇā lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayāti, vītarāgā vā rāgavinayāya vā paṭipannā, vītadosā vā dosavinayāya vā paṭipannā, vītamohā vā mohavinayāya vā paṭipannā, saddhāsampannā sīlasampannā samādhisampannā paññāsampannā vimuttisampannā vimuttiñāṇadassanasampannāti -- thomenti kittenti vaṇṇenti pasaṃsanti. evaṃ dakkhiṇeyye thomentīti -- āsīsanti thomayanti.

[03] ^b^abhijappantī^eb^ti rūpapaṭilābhaṃ abhijappanti, saddapaṭilābhaṃ abhijappanti, gandhapaṭilābhaṃ abhijappanti, rasapaṭilābhaṃ abhijappanti...pe0... brahmakāyikesu devesu attabhāvapaṭilābhaṃ abhijappantīti ^a^T0.0058^ea^ -- āsīsanti thomayanti abhijappanti. ^b^juhantī^eb^ti juhanti denti yajanti pariccajanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyanti -- āsīsanti thomayanti abhijappanti juhanti puṇṇakāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^kāmābhijappanti paṭicca lābha^eb^nti rūpapaṭilābhaṃ paṭicca kāme abhijappanti, saddapaṭilābhaṃ paṭicca kāme abhijappanti...pe0... brahmakāyikesu devesu attabhāvapaṭilābhaṃ paṭicca kāme abhijappanti pajappantīti -- kāmābhijappanti paṭicca lābhaṃ.

[03] ^b^te yājayogā bhavarāgarattā nātariṃsu jātijaranti brūmī^eb^ti ^b^te^eb^ti yaññayājakā vuccanti, ^b^yājayogā^eb^ti yājayogesu yuttā payuttā āyuttā samāyuttā taccaritā tabbahulā taggarukā tanninnā ^a^V0.0051^ea^ tappoṇā tappabbhārā tadadhimuttā tadadhipateyyāti -- te yājayogā, ^b^bhavarāgarattā^eb^ti bhavarāgo vuccati yo bhavesu bhavacchando bhavarāgo bhavanandī ^a^M0.0057^ea^ bhavataṇhā bhavasineho bhavapariḷāho bhavamucchā bhavajjhosānaṃ. bhavarāgena bhavesu rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhosannā laggā laggitā palibuddhāti -- te yājayogā bhavarāgarattā.

[03] ^b^nātariṃsu jātijaranti brūmī^eb^ti te yājayogā bhavarāgarattā ^a^T0.0059^ea^ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ nātariṃsu na uttariṃsu na patariṃsu na samatikkamiṃsu na vītivattiṃsu, jātijarāmaraṇā anikkhantā anissaṭā anatikkantā asamatikkantā avītivattā antojātijarāmaraṇe parivattanti antosaṃsārapathe parivattanti. jātiyā anugatā jarāya anusaṭā byādhinā abhibhūtā maraṇena abbhāhatā atāṇā aleṇā asaraṇā asaraṇībhūtāti; brūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti -- te yājayogā bhavarāgarattā nātariṃsu jātijaranti brūmi. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``āsīsanti thomayanti, abhijappanti juhanti. [puṇṇakāti bhagavā]
[27] kāmābhijappanti paṭicca lābhaṃ, te yājayogā bhavarāgarattā.
[22] nātariṃsu jātijaranti brūmī''ti..
[21] ^b^te ce nātariṃsu yājayogā, [iccāyasmā puṇṇako]^eb^
[27] ^b^yaññehi jātiñca jarañca mārisa.^eb^
[26] ^b^atha ko carahi devamanussaloke, atāri jātiñca jarañca mārisa.^eb^
[22] ^b^pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^te ce nātariṃsu yājayogā^eb^ti te yaññayājakā yājayogā bhavarāgarattā jātijarāmaraṇaṃ nātariṃsu na uttariṃsu na patariṃsu na samatikkamiṃsu na vītivattiṃsu, jātijarāmaraṇā anikkhantā anissaṭā ^a^T0.0060^ea^ anatikkantā asamatikkantā avītivattā antojātijarāmaraṇe parivattanti antosaṃsārapathe parivattanti. jātiyā anugatā jarāya anusaṭā byādhinā abhibhūtā maraṇena abbhāhatā atāṇā aleṇā asaraṇā asaraṇībhūtāti -- te ce nātariṃsu yājayogā.
[03] ^b^iccāyasmā^eb^ ^a^V0.0052^ea^ ^b^puṇṇako^eb^ti. iccāti padasandhi...pe0... āyasmā puṇṇako.

[03] ^b^yaññehi^eb^ ^a^M0.0058^ea^ ^b^jātiñca jarañca mārisā^eb^ti. ^b^yaññehī^eb^ti yaññehi pahūtehi yaññehi vividhehi yaññehi puthūhi. ^b^mārisā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ garuvacanaṃ sagāravasappatissādhivacanametaṃ mārisāti -- yaññehi jātiñca jarañca mārisa.

[03] ^b^atha ko carahi devamanussaloke, atāri jātiñca jarañca mārisā^eb^ti atha ko eso sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya jātijarāmaraṇaṃ atari uttari patari samatikkami vītivattayi {vītivatti (ka0)}. ^b^mārisā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ garuvacanaṃ sagāravasappattissādhivacanametaṃ mārisāti -- atha ko carahi devamanussaloke, atāri jātiñca jarañca mārisa.

[03] ^b^pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi meta^eb^nti. ^b^pucchāmi ta^eb^nti pucchāmi taṃ yācāmi taṃ ajjhesāmi taṃ pasādemi taṃ kathayassu metanti -- pucchāmi taṃ. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti -- yadidaṃ bhagavāti. ^b^brūhi meta^eb^nti brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi ^a^T0.0061^ea^ paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``te ce nātariṃsu yājayogā, [iccāyasmā puṇṇako]
[27] yaññehi jātiñca jarañca mārisa.
[26] atha ko carahi devamanussaloke, atāri jātiñca jarañca mārisa.
[22] pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi meta''nti..
[21] ^b^saṅkhāya lokasmi^eb^ {lokasmiṃ (syā0 ka0)} ^b^paroparāni, [puṇṇakāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^yassiñjitaṃ natthi kuhiñci loke.^eb^
[22] ^b^santo vidhūmo anīgho nirāso, atāri so jātijaranti brūmi..^eb^

[03] ^b^saṅkhāya lokasmi paroparānī^eb^ti saṅkhā vuccati ñāṇaṃ yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi. ^b^paroparānī^eb^ti oraṃ vuccati sakattabhāvo, paraṃ vuccati parattabhāvo oraṃ vuccati sakarūpavedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ, paraṃ vuccati pararūpavedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ ^a^V0.0053^ea^ ^a^M0.0059^ea^; oraṃ vuccati cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, paraṃ vuccati cha bāhirāni āyatanāni. oraṃ vuccati manussaloko, paraṃ vuccati devaloko; oraṃ vuccati kāmadhātu, paraṃ vuccati rūpadhātu arūpadhātu; oraṃ vuccati kāmadhātu rūpadhātu, paraṃ vuccati arūpadhātu. ^b^saṅkhāya lokasmi paroparānī^eb^ti paroparāni aniccato saṅkhāya dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato...pe0... nissaraṇato saṅkhāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti -- saṅkhāya lokasmi paroparāni. ^b^puṇṇakāti bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^puṇṇakā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati ^a^T0.0062^ea^. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- puṇṇakāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^yassiñjitaṃ natthi kuhiñci loke^eb^ti. ^b^yassā^eb^ti arahato khīṇāsavassa. ^b^iñjita^eb^nti taṇhiñjitaṃ diṭṭhiñjitaṃ māniñjitaṃ kilesiñjitaṃ kāmiñjitaṃ. yassime iñjitā natthi na santi na saṃvijjanti nupalabbhanti, pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā. ^b^kuhiñcī^eb^ti kuhiñci kismiñci katthaci ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā ajjhattabahiddhā vā. ^b^loke^eb^ti apāyaloke...pe0... āyatanaloketi -- yassiñjitaṃ natthi kuhiñci loke.

[03] ^b^santo vidhūmo anīgho nirāso, atāri so jātijaranti brūmī^eb^ti. ^b^santo^eb^ti rāgassa santattā santo, dosassa...pe0... mohassa... kodhassa... upanāhassa... makkhassa... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṃ santattā samitattā vūpasamitattā vijjhātattā {nijjhātattā (ka0) mahāni0 18} nibbutattā vigatattā paṭipassaddhattā santo upasanto vūpasanto nibbuto paṭipassaddhoti santo; ^b^vidhūmo^eb^ti kāyaduccaritaṃ vidhūmitaṃ vidhamitaṃ sositaṃ visositaṃ byantīkataṃ {byantikataṃ (ka0)}, vacīduccaritaṃ...pe0... manoduccaritaṃ vidhūmitaṃ vidhamitaṃ ^a^T0.0063^ea^ sositaṃ visositaṃ byantīkataṃ, rāgo... doso... moho vidhūmito vidhamito sosito visosito byantīkato, kodho... upanāho... makkho... paḷāso... issā... macchariyaṃ... māyā... sāṭheyyaṃ... thambho... sārambho... māno... atimāno... mado... pamādo... sabbe kilesā sabbe duccaritā sabbe darathā sabbe pariḷāhā sabbe santāpā sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā vidhūmitā vidhamitā sositā visositā byantīkatā. atha vā, kodho vuccati dhūmo --
[21] māno ^a^M0.0060^ea^ hi te brāhmaṇa khāribhāro, kodho dhūmo bhasmani {gammani (syā0)} mosavajjaṃ.
[22] jivhā sujā hadayaṃ {tapparassa (syā0)} jotiṭṭhānaṃ, attā sudanto purisassa joti..

[03] api ^a^V0.0054^ea^ ca, dasahākārehi kodho jāyati -- anatthaṃ me acarīti kodho jāyati, anatthaṃ me caratīti kodho jāyati, anatthaṃ me carissatīti kodho jāyati, piyassa me manāpassa anatthaṃ acari, anatthaṃ carati, anatthaṃ carissatīti kodho jāyati, appiyassa me amanāpassa atthaṃ acari, atthaṃ carati, atthaṃ carissatīti kodho jāyati, aṭṭhāne vā pana kodho jāyati. yo evarūpo cittassa āghāto paṭighāto paṭighaṃ paṭivirodho kopo pakopo sampakopo doso padoso sampadoso cittassa byāpatti manopadoso kodho kujjhanā kujjhitattaṃ doso dussanā dussitattaṃ byāpatti byāpajjanā byāpajjitattaṃ ^a^T0.0064^ea^ virodho paṭivirodho caṇḍikkaṃ asuropo {assuropo (syā0)} anattamanatā cittassa -- ayaṃ vuccati kodho.

[03] api ca, kodhassa adhimattaparittatā veditabbā. atthi kañci {kiñci (ka0) mahāni0 85} kālaṃ kodho cittāvilakaraṇamatto hoti, na ca tāva mukhakulānavikulāno hoti. atthi kañci kālaṃ kodho mukhakulānavikulānamatto hoti, na ca tāva hanusañcopano hoti. atthi kañci kālaṃ kodho hanusañcopanamatto hoti, na ca tāva pharusavācaṃ nicchāraṇo {pharusavācanicchāraṇo (syā0)} hoti. atthi kañci kālaṃ kodho pharusavācaṃ nicchāraṇamatto hoti, na ca tāva disāvidisānuvilokano hoti. atthi kañci kālaṃ kodho disāvidisānuvilokanamatto hoti, na ca tāva daṇḍasatthaparāmasano hoti. atthi kañci kālaṃ kodho daṇḍasatthaparāmasanamatto hoti, na ca tāva daṇḍasatthābbhukkiraṇo hoti. atthi kañci kālaṃ kodho daṇḍasatthābbhukkiraṇamatto hoti, na ca tāva daṇḍasatthābhinipātano hoti. atthi kañci kālaṃ kodho daṇḍasatthābhinipātanamatto hoti, na ca tāva chinnavicchinnakaraṇo hoti. atthi kañci kālaṃ kodho chinnavicchinnakaraṇamatto hoti, na ^a^M0.0061^ea^ ca tāva sambhañjanapalibhañjano hoti. atthi kañci kālaṃ kodho sambhañjanapalibhañjanamatto hoti, na ca tāva aṅgamaṅgāpakaḍḍhano hoti. atthi kañci kālaṃ kodho aṅgamaṅgāpakaḍḍhanamatto hoti, na ca tāva jīvitāvoropano {jīvitapanāsano (syā0) mahāni0 85} hoti. atthi kañci kālaṃ kodho jīvitāvoropanamatto hoti, na ca tāva sabbacāgapariccāgāya ^a^T0.0065^ea^ saṇṭhito hoti. yato kodho paraṃ puggalaṃ ghātetvā attānaṃ ghāteti, ettāvatā kodho paramussadagato paramavepullapatto hoti. yassa so hoti kodho pahīno samucchinno vūpasanto paṭipassaddho abhabbuppattiko ñāṇagginā daḍḍho, so vuccati -- vidhūmo.

[03] kodhassa pahīnattā vidhūmo, kodhavatthussa pariññātattā vidhūmo, kodhahetussa pariññātattā vidhūmo, kodhahetussa upacchinnattā vidhūmo. ^b^anīgho^eb^ti rāgo nīgho, doso nīgho, moho nīgho, kodho nīgho, upanāho nīgho...pe0... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā nīghā. yassete nīghā pahīnā ^a^V0.0055^ea^ samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, so vuccati anīgho.

[03] ^b^nirāso^eb^ti āsā vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. yassesā āsā taṇhā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, so vuccati nirāso. ^b^jātī^eb^ti yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jāti sañjāti okkanti abhinibbatti khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho. ^b^jarā^eb^ti yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jarā jīraṇatā khaṇḍiccaṃ pāliccaṃ valittacatā āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripāko. ^b^santo vidhūmo anīgho nirāso, atāri so jātijaranti brūmī^eb^ti yo santo ca vidhūmo ca anīgho ca nirāso ca, so jātijarāmaraṇaṃ atari uttari patari samatikkami vītivattayīti ^a^T0.0066^ea^ brūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti -- santo vidhūmo anīgho nirāso, atāri so jātijaranti brūmi. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``saṅkhāya ^a^M0.0062^ea^ lokasmi paroparāni, [puṇṇakāti bhagavā]
[27] yassiñjitaṃ natthi kuhiñci loke.
[22] santo vidhūmo anīgho nirāso, atāri so jātijaranti brūmī''ti..
[03] sahagāthāpariyosānā...pe0... pañjaliko bhagavantaṃ namassamāno nisinno hoti -- ``satthā me bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī''ti.
[06] puṇṇakamāṇavapucchāniddeso tatiyo.
[21] ^b^pucchāmi^eb^ ^a^T0.0067^ea^ ^b^taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ, [iccāyasmā mettagū]^eb^
[27] ^b^maññāmi taṃ vedagū bhāvitattaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^kuto nu dukkhā samudāgatā ime, ye keci lokasmimanekarūpā..^eb^

[03] ^b^pucchāmi^eb^ ^a^V0.0056^ea^ ^b^taṃ bhagavā brūhi meta^eb^nti. ^b^pucchāmī^eb^ti tisso pucchā -- adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā, diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchā, vimaticchedanā pucchā. katamā adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā? pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ. tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhūtatthāya vibhāvanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati -- ayaṃ adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā.

[03] katamā diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchā? pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ. aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati -- ayaṃ diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchā.

[03] katamā vimaticchedanā pucchā? pakatiyā saṃsayapakkhando hoti vimatipakkhando dveḷhakajāto -- ``evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho''ti? so vimaticchedanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati -- ayaṃ vimaticchedanā pucchā. imā tisso pucchā.

[01] aparāpi ^a^T0.0068^ea^ tisso pucchā -- manussapucchā, amanussapucchā, nimmitapucchā. katamā manussapucchā? manussā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchanti, bhikkhū pucchanti, bhikkhuniyo pucchanti, upāsakā pucchanti, upāsikāyo pucchanti, rājāno pucchanti ^a^M0.0063^ea^ khattiyā pucchanti, brāhmaṇā pucchanti, vessā pucchanti, suddā pucchanti, gahaṭṭhā pucchanti, pabbajitā pucchanti -- ayaṃ manussapucchā.

[03] katamā amanussapucchā? amanussā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchanti, nāgā pucchanti, supaṇṇā pucchanti, yakkhā pucchanti, asurā pucchanti, gandhabbā pucchanti, mahārājāno pucchanti, indā pucchanti, brahmā pucchanti, devā pucchanti -- ayaṃ amanussapucchā.

[03] katamā nimmitapucchā? bhagavā rūpaṃ abhinimmināti manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ ahīnindriyaṃ. so nimmito buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchati. bhagavā visajjeti. ayaṃ nimmitapucchā. imā tisso pucchā.

[03] aparāpi tisso pucchā -- attatthapucchā, paratthapucchā, ubhayatthapucchā...pe0... aparāpi tisso ^a^V0.0057^ea^ pucchā -- diṭṭhadhammikatthapucchā, samparāyikatthapucchā ^a^T0.0069^ea^, paramatthapucchā... aparāpi tisso pucchā -- anavajjatthapucchā, nikkilesatthapucchā, vodānatthapucchā... aparāpi tisso pucchā -- atītapucchā, anāgatapucchā, paccuppannapucchā... aparāpi tisso pucchā -- ajjhattapucchā, bahiddhāpucchā, ajjhattabahiddhāpucchā... aparāpi tisso pucchā -- kusalapucchā, akusalapucchā, abyākatapucchā... aparāpi tisso pucchā -- khandhapucchā, dhātupucchā āyatanapucchā... aparāpi tisso pucchā -- satipaṭṭhānapucchā, sammappadhānapucchā, iddhipādapucchā... aparāpi tisso pucchā -- indriyapucchā, balapucchā, bojjhaṅgapucchā... aparāpi tisso pucchā -- maggapucchā, phalapucchā, nibbānapucchā....

[03] ^b^pucchāmi ta^eb^nti pucchāmi taṃ yācāmi taṃ ajjhesāmi taṃ pasādemi taṃ ``kathayassu me''ti pucchāmi taṃ. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti -- yadidaṃ bhagavāti. ^b^brūhi meta^eb^nti brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ.
[01] ^b^iccāyasmā mettagū^eb^ti iccāti padasandhi...pe0... iccāyasmā mettagū.

[03] ^b^maññāmi taṃ vedagū bhāvitatta^eb^nti. ^b^vedagū^eb^ti taṃ maññāmi, bhāvitattoti ^a^T0.0070^ea^ taṃ maññāmi, evaṃ jānāmi, evaṃ ājānāmi evaṃ paṭijānāmi evaṃ paṭivijjhāmi. ^b^vedagū bhāvitatto^eb^ti kathañca bhagavā vedagū? ^b^vedā^eb^ vuccanti catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ...pe0... dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīmaṃsā ^a^M0.0064^ea^ vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi. bhagavā tehi vedehi jātijarāmaraṇassa antagato antappatto koṭigato koṭippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto vosānagato vosānappatto tāṇagato tāṇappatto leṇagato leṇappatto saraṇagato saraṇappatto abhayagato abhayappatto accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbānagato nibbānappatto. vedānaṃ vā antagatoti vedagū; vedehi vā antagatoti vedagū; sattannaṃ vā dhammānaṃ viditattā vedagū; sakkāyadiṭṭhi viditā hoti, vicikicchā viditā hoti, sīlabbataparāmāso vidito hoti, rāgo doso moho māno vidito hoti, viditāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṃkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.
[21] vedāni ^a^V0.0058^ea^ viceyya kevalāni, [sabhiyāti bhagavā]
[27] samaṇānaṃ yānīdhatthi {yāni patthi (syā0), yāni atthi (ka0) su0 ni0 534} brāhmaṇānaṃ.
[26] sabbavedanāsu vītarāgo.
[22] sabbaṃ vedamaticca vedagū soti..
[03] evaṃ bhagavā vedagū.

[03] kathaṃ ^a^T0.0071^ea^ bhagavā bhāvitatto? bhagavā bhāvitakāyo bhāvitasīlo bhāvitacitto bhāvitapañño bhāvitasatipaṭṭhāno bhāvitasammappadhāno bhāvitaiddhipādo bhāvitaindriyo bhāvitabalo bhāvitabojjhaṅgo bhāvitamaggo, pahīnakileso paṭividdhākuppo sacchikatanirodho. dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, maggo bhāvito, nirodho sacchikato, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, aparitto mahanto gambhīro appameyyo duppariyogāḷho bahuratano sāgarūpamo {sāgarasamo (ka0)} chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgato hoti.

[03] cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano; upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno. sotena saddaṃ sutvā, ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā, jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā, manasā dhammaṃ ^a^M0.0065^ea^ viññāya neva sumano hoti na dummano; upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.

[03] cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā manāpaṃ rūpaṃ nābhigijjhati nābhihaṃsati {nābhipihayati (syā0) mahāni0 90} na rāgaṃ janeti. tassa ṭhitova kāyo hoti, ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ. cakkhunā kho paneva rūpaṃ disvā amanāpaṃ na maṅku hoti appatiṭṭhitacitto {appatiṭṭhīnacitto (syā0)} alīnamanaso {ādinamanaso (syā0) mahāni0 90} abyāpannacetaso. tassa ṭhitova kāyo hoti ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ. sotena saddaṃ sutvā...pe0... ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā... jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā... kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā... manasā dhammaṃ viññāya manāpaṃ ^a^T0.0072^ea^ nābhigijjhati nābhihaṃsati na rāgaṃ janeti. tassa ṭhitova kāyo hoti ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ. manasāyeva kho pana dhammaṃ viññāya amanāpaṃ na maṅku hoti. appatiṭṭhitacitto alīnamanaso abyāpannacetaso tassa ṭhitova kāyo hoti ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ.

[03] cakkhunā ^a^V0.0059^ea^ rūpaṃ disvā manāpāmanāpesu rūpesu ṭhitova kāyo hoti ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ. sotena saddaṃ sutvā...pe0... manasā dhammaṃ viññāya manāpāmanāpesu dhammesu ṭhitova kāyo hoti ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ ajjhattaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ suvimuttaṃ.

[03] cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā rajanīye na rajjati, dussanīye {dosanīye (syā0 ka0) mahāni0 90} na dussati, mohanīye na muyhati, kopanīye na kuppati, madanīye na majjati, kilesanīye na kilissati. sotena saddaṃ sutvā...pe0... manasā dhammaṃ viññāya rajanīye na rajjati, dussanīye na dussati, mohanīye na muyhati, kopanīye na kuppati, madanīye na majjati, kilesanīye na kilissati.

[03] diṭṭhe diṭṭhamatto, sute sutamatto, mute mutamatto, viññāte viññātamatto. diṭṭhe na limpati, sute na limpati, mute na limpati, viññāte na limpati. diṭṭhe anūpayo {anupayo (syā0), anusayo (ka0) mahāni0 90} anapāyo anissito appaṭibaddho ^a^M0.0066^ea^ vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharati. sute...pe0... mute ^a^T0.0073^ea^... viññāte anūpayo {anupayo (syā0), anusayo (ka0) mahāni0 90} anapāyo anissito appaṭibaddho vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharati.

[03] saṃvijjati bhagavato cakkhu, passati bhagavā cakkhunā rūpaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagavā. saṃvijjati bhagavato sotaṃ, suṇāti bhagavā sotena saddaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagavā. saṃvijjati bhagavato ghānaṃ, ghāyati bhagavā ghānena gandhaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagavā. saṃvijjati bhagavato jivhā, sāyati bhagavā jivhāya rasaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagavā. saṃvijjati bhagavato kāyo, phusati bhagavā kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagavā. saṃvijjati bhagavato mano, vijānāti bhagavā manasā dhammaṃ, chandarāgo bhagavato natthi, suvimuttacitto bhagavā.

[03] cakkhu rūpārāmaṃ rūparataṃ rūpasammuditaṃ, taṃ bhagavato {bhagavatā (syā0) mahāni0 90} dantaṃ guttaṃ rakkhitaṃ saṃvutaṃ; tassa ca saṃvarāya dhammaṃ deseti. sotaṃ saddārāmaṃ saddarataṃ...pe0... ghānaṃ gandhārāmaṃ gandharataṃ... jivhā rasārāmā rasaratā rasasammuditā, sā bhagavato dantā guttā rakkhitā saṃvutā; tassa ca saṃvarāya dhammaṃ deseti. kāyo phoṭṭhabbārāmo phoṭṭhabbarato phoṭṭhabbasammudito... mano dhammārāmo dhammarato ^a^V0.0060^ea^ dhammasammudito, so bhagavato danto gutto rakkhito saṃvuto; tassa ca saṃvarāya dhammaṃ deseti --
[21] ``dantaṃ nayanti samitiṃ, dantaṃ rājābhirūhati.
[22] danto ^a^T0.0074^ea^ seṭṭho manussesu, yotivākyaṃ titikkhati..
[21] ``varamassatarā dantā, ājānīyā ca {ājāniyāva (syā0) dha0 pa0 322} sindhavā.
[22] kuñjarā ca {kuñjarāva (syā0)} mahānāgā, attadanto tato varaṃ..
[21] ``na hi etehi yānehi, gaccheyya agataṃ disaṃ.
[22] yathāttanā sudantena, danto dantena gacchati..
[21] ``vidhāsu ^a^M0.0067^ea^ na vikampanti, vippamuttā punabbhavā.
[22] dantabhūmiṃ anuppattā, te loke vijitāvino..
[21] ``yassindriyāni bhāvitāni, ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca sabbaloke.
[22] nibbijjha imaṃ parañca lokaṃ, kālaṃ kaṅkhati bhāvito sa danto''ti {sudantoti (syā0) su0 ni0 521; mahāni0 90}..
[03] evaṃ bhagavā bhāvitattoti.

[03] ^b^maññāmi taṃ vedagū bhāvitattaṃ, kuto nu dukkhā samudāgatā ime^eb^ti. ^b^kuto nū^eb^ti saṃsayapucchā vimatipucchā dveḷhakapucchā anekaṃsapucchā -- ``evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho''ti -- kuto nu. ^b^dukkhā^eb^ti jātidukkhaṃ, jarādukkhaṃ, byādhidukkhaṃ, maraṇadukkhaṃ, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhaṃ, byasanaṃ dukkhaṃ, nerayikaṃ dukkhaṃ, tiracchānayonikaṃ dukkhaṃ, pettivisayikaṃ dukkhaṃ, mānusikaṃ dukkhaṃ, gabbhokkantimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, gabbhaṭṭhitimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, gabbhavuṭṭhānamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, jātassūpanibandhakaṃ dukkhaṃ, jātassa parādheyyakaṃ dukkhaṃ, attūpakkamaṃ dukkhaṃ, parūpakkamaṃ dukkhaṃ, dukkhadukkhaṃ, saṅkhāradukkhaṃ, vipariṇāmadukkhaṃ ^a^T0.0075^ea^, cakkhurogo sotarogo ghānarogo jivhārogo kāyarogo sīsarogo kaṇṇarogo mukharogo dantarogo kāso sāso pināso ḍāho jaro kucchirogo mucchā pakkhandikā sūlā visūcikā kuṭṭhaṃ gaṇḍo kilāso soso apamāro daddu kaṇḍu kacchu rakhasā vitacchikā lohitapittaṃ madhumeho aṃsā piḷakā bhagandalā pittasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā semhasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā vātasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā sannipātikā ābādhā utupariṇāmajā ābādhā visamaparihārajā ābādhā opakkamikā ābādhā kammavipākajā ābādhā sītaṃ uṇhaṃ jighacchā pipāsā uccāro passāvo ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassaṃ dukkhaṃ, mātumaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ ^a^V0.0061^ea^, pitumaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, bhātumaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, bhaginimaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, puttamaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, dhītumaraṇaṃ dukkhaṃ, ñātibyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ, rogabyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ, bhogabyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ, sīlabyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ, diṭṭhibyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ; yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ādito samudāgamanaṃ paññāyati, atthaṅgamato nirodho paññāyati, kammasannissito vipāko, vipākasannissitaṃ kammaṃ, nāmasannissitaṃ rūpaṃ, rūpasannissitaṃ ^a^M0.0068^ea^ nāmaṃ, jātiyā anugataṃ, jarāya anusaṭaṃ, byādhinā abhibhūtaṃ, maraṇena abbhāhataṃ, dukkhe patiṭṭhitaṃ, atāṇaṃ aleṇaṃ asaraṇaṃ asaraṇībhūtaṃ -- ime vuccanti dukkhā. ime dukkhā kuto samudāgatā kuto jātā kuto sañjātā kuto nibbattā kuto abhinibbattā kuto pātubhūtā kiṃnidānā kiṃsamudayā kiṃjātikā kiṃpabhavāti, imesaṃ dukkhānaṃ mūlaṃ pucchati hetuṃ pucchati nidānaṃ ^a^T0.0076^ea^ pucchati sambhavaṃ pucchati pabhavaṃ pucchati samuṭṭhānaṃ pucchati āhāraṃ pucchati ārammaṇaṃ pucchati paccayaṃ pucchati samudayaṃ pucchati papucchati yācati ajjhesati pasādetīti -- kuto nu dukkhā samudāgatā ime.

[03] ^b^ye keci lokasmimanekarūpā^eb^ti. ^b^ye kecī^eb^ti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ -- ye kecīti. ^b^lokasmi^eb^nti apāyaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhātuloke āyatanaloke. ^b^anekarūpā^eb^ti anekavidhā nānāppakārā dukkhāti -- ye keci lokasmimanekarūpā. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ, [iccāyasmā mettagū]
[27] maññāmi taṃ vedagū bhāvitattaṃ.
[22] kuto nu dukkhā samudāgatā ime, ye keci lokasmimanekarūpā''ti..
