[27] ^b^taṃ te pavakkhāmi yathā pajānaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^upadhinidānā pabhavanti dukkhā, ye keci lokasmimanekarūpā..^eb^

[03] ^b^dukkhassa ve maṃ pabhavaṃ apucchasī^eb^ti. ^b^dukkhassā^eb^ti jātidukkhassa jarādukkhassa byādhidukkhassa maraṇadukkhassa sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhassa. ^b^pabhavaṃ apucchasī^eb^ti dukkhassa mūlaṃ pucchasi hetuṃ pucchasi nidānaṃ pucchasi sambhavaṃ pucchasi ^a^T0.0077^ea^ pabhavaṃ pucchasi samuṭṭhānaṃ pucchasi āhāraṃ pucchasi ārammaṇaṃ pucchasi paccayaṃ pucchasi samudayaṃ pucchasi yācasi ajjhesasi pasādesīti -- dukkhassa ve maṃ pabhavaṃ apucchasi. ^b^mettagū^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ^a^V0.0062^ea^ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0069^ea^ gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- mettagūti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^taṃ te pavakkhāmi yathā pajāna^eb^nti. ^b^ta^eb^nti dukkhassa mūlaṃ pavakkhāmi hetuṃ pavakkhāmi nidānaṃ pavakkhāmi sambhavaṃ pavakkhāmi pabhavaṃ pavakkhāmi samuṭṭhānaṃ pavakkhāmi āhāraṃ pavakkhāmi ārammaṇaṃ pavakkhāmi paccayaṃ pavakkhāmi samudayaṃ pavakkhāmi ācikkhissāmi desessāmi paññapessāmi paṭṭhapessāmi vivarissāmi vibhajissāmi uttānīkarissāmi pakāsessāmīti -- taṃ te pavakkhāmi. ^b^yathā pajāna^eb^nti yathā pajānanto ājānanto vijānanto paṭivijānanto paṭivijjhanto. na itihītihaṃ na itikirāya na paramparāya na piṭakasampadāya {na piṭakasampadānena (ka0) mahāni0 156} na takkahetu na nayahetu na ākāraparivitakkena na diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā sāmaṃ sayamabhiññātaṃ attapaccakkhadhammaṃ taṃ kathayissāmīti -- taṃ te pavakkhāmi yathā pajānaṃ.

[03] ^b^upadhinidānā pabhavanti dukkhā^eb^ti. ^b^upadhī^eb^ti dasa upadhī -- taṇhūpadhi, diṭṭhūpadhi, kilesūpadhi, kammūpadhi, duccaritūpadhi, āhārūpadhi, paṭighūpadhi, catasso upādinnadhātuyo upadhī, cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni upadhī, cha viññāṇakāyā upadhī, sabbampi dukkhaṃ dukkhamanaṭṭhena {dukkhaṭṭhena (syā0)} upadhi. ime ^a^T0.0078^ea^ vuccanti dasa upadhī. ^b^dukkhā^eb^ti jātidukkhaṃ jarādukkhaṃ byādhidukkhaṃ maraṇadukkhaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhaṃ nerayikaṃ dukkhaṃ...pe0... diṭṭhibyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ. yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ādito samudāgamanaṃ paññāyati, atthaṅgamato nirodho paññāyati, kammasannissito vipāko, vipākasannissitaṃ kammaṃ, nāmasannissitaṃ rūpaṃ, rūpasannissitaṃ nāmaṃ, jātiyā anugataṃ, jarāya anusaṭaṃ, byādhinā abhibhūtaṃ, maraṇena abbhāhataṃ, dukkhe patiṭṭhitaṃ, atāṇaṃ aleṇaṃ asaraṇaṃ asaraṇībhūtaṃ -- ime vuccanti dukkhā. ime dukkhā upadhinidānā upadhihetukā upadhipaccayā upadhikāraṇā honti pabhavanti sambhavanti jāyanti sañjāyanti nibbattanti pātubhavantīti -- upadhinidānā pabhavanti dukkhā.

[03] ^b^ye keci lokasmimanekarūpā^eb^ti. ^b^ye kecī^eb^ti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ -- ye kecīti. ^b^lokasmi^eb^nti apāyaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhātuloke ^a^M0.0070^ea^ āyatanaloke. ^b^anekarūpā^eb^ti anekavidhā nānappakārā dukkhāti -- ye keci lokasmimanekarūpā. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``dukkhassa ^a^V0.0063^ea^ ve maṃ pabhavaṃ apucchasi, [mettagūti bhagavā]
[27] taṃ te pavakkhāmi yathā pajānaṃ.
[22] upadhinidānā pabhavanti dukkhā, ye keci lokasmimanekarūpā''ti..
[21] ^b^yo ve avidvā upadhiṃ karoti, punappunaṃ dukkhamupeti mando.^eb^
[22] ^b^tasmā pajānaṃ upadhiṃ na kayirā, dukkhassa jātippabhavānupassī..^eb^

[03] ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^T0.0079^ea^ ^b^ve avidvā upadhiṃ karotī^eb^ti. ^b^yo^eb^ti yo yādiso yathāyutto yathāvihito yathāpakāro yaṃṭhānappatto yaṃdhammasamannāgato khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā devo vā manusso vā. ^b^avidvā^eb^ti avijjāgato aññāṇī avibhāvī duppañño. ^b^upadhiṃ karotī^eb^ti taṇhūpadhiṃ karoti, diṭṭhūpadhiṃ karoti, kilesūpadhiṃ karoti, kammūpadhiṃ karoti, duccaritūpadhiṃ karoti, āhārūpadhiṃ karoti, paṭighūpadhiṃ karoti, catasso upādinnadhātuyo upadhī karoti, cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni upadhī karoti, cha viññāṇakāye upadhī karoti janeti sañjaneti nibbatteti abhinibbattetīti -- avidvā upadhiṃ karoti.

[03] ^b^punappunaṃ dukkhamupeti mando^eb^ti punappunaṃ jātidukkhaṃ jarādukkhaṃ byādhidukkhaṃ maraṇadukkhaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhaṃ eti samupeti upagacchati gaṇhāti parāmasati abhinivisatīti -- punappunaṃ dukkhamupeti. ^b^mando^eb^ti mando momuho avidvā avijjāgato aññāṇī avibhāvī duppaññoti -- punappunaṃ dukkhamupeti mando.

[03] ^b^tasmā pajānaṃ upadhiṃ na kayirā^eb^ti. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti taṃkāraṇā taṃhetu tappaccayā taṃnidānā etaṃ ādīnavaṃ sampassamāno upadhīsūti tasmā. ^b^pajāna^eb^nti pajānanto ājānanto vijānanto paṭivijānanto paṭivijjhanto, ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti pajānanto ājānanto ^a^T0.0080^ea^ vijānanto paṭivijānanto paṭivijjhanto ^a^M0.0071^ea^, ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti...pe0... ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti...pe0... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti pajānanto ājānanto vijānanto paṭivijānanto paṭivijjhanto. ^b^upadhiṃ na kayirā^eb^ti taṇhūpadhiṃ na kareyya, diṭṭhūpadhiṃ na kareyya, kilesūpadhiṃ na kareyya, duccaritūpadhiṃ na kareyya, āhārūpadhiṃ na kareyya, paṭighūpadhiṃ na kareyya, catasso upādinnadhātuyo upadhī na kareyya, cha ajjhattikāni ^a^V0.0064^ea^ āyatanāni upadhī na kareyya, cha viññāṇakāye upadhī na kareyya, na janeyya na sañjaneyya na nibbatteyya nābhinibbatteyyāti -- tasmā pajānaṃ upadhiṃ na kayirā.

[03] ^b^dukkhassā^eb^ti jātidukkhassa jarādukkhassa byādhidukkhassa maraṇadukkhassa sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhassa. ^b^pabhavānupassī^eb^ti dukkhassa mūlānupassī hetānupassī nidānānupassī sambhavānupassī pabhavānupassī samuṭṭhānānupassī āhārānupassī ārammaṇānupassī paccayānupassī samudayānupassī. anupassanā vuccati ñāṇaṃ. yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi. imāya anupassanāya paññāya upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato. so vuccati anupassīti -- dukkhassa jātippabhavānupassī. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``yo ve avidvā upadhiṃ karoti, punappunaṃ dukkhamupeti mando.
[22] tasmā ^a^T0.0081^ea^ pajānaṃ upadhiṃ na kayirā, dukkhassa jātippabhavānupassī''ti..
[21] ^b^yaṃ taṃ apucchimha akittayī no, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāma tadiṅgha brūhi.^eb^
[22] ^b^kathaṃ nu dhīrā vitaranti oghaṃ, jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañca.^eb^
[22] ^b^taṃ me munī sādhu viyākarohi, tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo..^eb^

[03] ^b^yaṃ taṃ apucchimha akittayī no^eb^ti yaṃ taṃ apucchimha ayācimha ajjhesimha pasādayimha. ^b^akittayī no^eb^ti kittitaṃ {akitti taṃ (syā0) evamīdisesu padesu atītavibhattivasena mahāni0 110} pakittitaṃ ācikkhitaṃ desitaṃ paññapitaṃ ^a^M0.0072^ea^ {paññāpitaṃ (ka0)} paṭṭhapitaṃ vivaritaṃ vibhattaṃ uttānīkataṃ pakāsitanti -- yaṃ taṃ apucchimha akittayī no.

[03] ^b^aññaṃ taṃ pucchāma tadiṅgha brūhī^eb^ti aññaṃ taṃ pucchāma, aññaṃ taṃ yācāma, aññaṃ taṃ ajjhesāma, aññaṃ taṃ pasādema, uttari taṃ pucchāma. ^b^tadiṅgha brūhī^eb^ti iṅgha brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- aññaṃ taṃ pucchāma tadiṅgha brūhi.

[03] ^b^kathaṃ nu dhīrā vitaranti oghaṃ, jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañcā^eb^ti. ^b^kathaṃ nū^eb^ti saṃsayapucchā vimatipucchā dveḷhakapucchā anekaṃsapucchā -- ``evaṃ nu kho, nanu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho''ti -- kathaṃ nu. ^b^dhīrā^eb^ti dhīrā paṇḍitā paññavanto buddhimanto ñāṇino vibhāvino medhāvino ^a^V0.0065^ea^. ^b^ogha^eb^nti kāmoghaṃ bhavoghaṃ diṭṭhoghaṃ avijjoghaṃ. ^b^jātī^eb^ti yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jāti sañjāti okkanti nibbatti abhinibbatti khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho. ^b^jarā^eb^ti yā ^a^T0.0082^ea^ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tamhi tamhi sattanikāye jarā jīraṇatā khaṇḍiccaṃ pāliccaṃ valittacatā āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripāko. ^b^soko^eb^ti ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa aññataraññatarena byasanena vā samannāgatassa aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena vā phuṭṭhassa soko socanā socitattaṃ antosoko antoparisoko antoḍāho antopariḍāho cetaso parijjhāyanā domanassaṃ sokasallaṃ. ^b^paridevo^eb^ti ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa aññataraññatarena byasanena vā samannāgatassa aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena vā phuṭṭhassa ādevo paridevo ādevanā paridevanā ādevitattaṃ paridevitattaṃ vācā palāpo {lāpo palāpo (syā0) dhammasaṅgaṇiye} vippalāpo lālappo lālappanā lālappitattaṃ {lālappāyanā lālappāyitattaṃ (bahūsu) jarāsuttaniddesaṭṭhakathā oloketabbā}.

[03] ^b^kathaṃ nu dhīrā vitaranti oghaṃ, jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañcā^eb^ti dhīrā kathaṃ oghañca jātiñca jarañca sokañca paridevañca taranti uttaranti pataranti samatikkamanti ^a^M0.0073^ea^ vītivattantīti -- kathaṃ nu dhīrā vitaranti oghaṃ, jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañca.

[03] ^b^taṃ me munī sādhu viyākarohī^eb^ti. ^b^ta^eb^nti yaṃ pucchāmi yaṃ yācāmi yaṃ ajjhesāmi yaṃ pasādemi. ^b^munī^eb^ti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ ^a^T0.0083^ea^. yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi. bhagavā tena ñāṇena samannāgato muni monappatto. tīṇi moneyyāni -- kāyamoneyyaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ manomoneyyaṃ.

[03] katamaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ? tividhānaṃ kāyaduccaritānaṃ pahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ. tividhaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ. kāyārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ. kāyapariññā kāyamoneyyaṃ. pariññāsahagato maggo kāyamoneyyaṃ. kāye chandarāgassa pahānaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ. kāyasaṅkhāranirodho catutthajjhānasamāpatti kāyamoneyyaṃ. idaṃ kāyamoneyyaṃ.

[03] katamaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ? catubbidhānaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ pahānaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ. catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ. vācārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ. vācāpariññā vacīmoneyyaṃ. pariññāsahagato ^a^V0.0066^ea^ maggo vacīmoneyyaṃ. vācāya chandarāgassa pahānaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ. vacīsaṅkhāranirodho dutiyajjhānasamāpatti vacīmoneyyaṃ. idaṃ vacīmoneyyaṃ.

[03] katamaṃ manomoneyyaṃ? tividhānaṃ manoduccaritānaṃ pahānaṃ manomoneyyaṃ. tividhaṃ manosucaritaṃ manomoneyyaṃ. cittārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ manomoneyyaṃ. cittapariññā manomoneyyaṃ. pariññāsahagato maggo manomoneyyaṃ. citte chandarāgassa pahānaṃ manomoneyyaṃ. cittasaṅkhāranirodho saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti manomoneyyaṃ. idaṃ manomoneyyaṃ ^a^T0.0084^ea^.
[21] kāyamuniṃ vacīmuniṃ {vācāmuniṃ (bahūsu) itivu0 67}, manomunimanāsavaṃ.
[22] muniṃ moneyyasampannaṃ, āhu sabbappahāyinaṃ..
[21] kāyamuniṃ vacīmuniṃ, manomunimanāsavaṃ.
[22] muniṃ moneyyasampannaṃ, āhu ninhātapāpakanti..

[03] imehi ^a^M0.0074^ea^ tīhi moneyyehi dhammehi samannāgatā. cha munino {munayo (syā0) mahāni0 14} -- agāramunino, anagāramunino, sekhamunino {sekkhamunino (syā0 ka0)}, asekhamunino, paccekamunino munimuninoti. katame agāramunino? ye te agārikā diṭṭhapadā viññātasāsanā -- ime agāramunino. katame anagāramunino? ye te pabbajitā diṭṭhapadā viññātasāsanā -- ime anagāramunino. satta sekhā sekhamunino. arahanto asekhamunino. paccekasambuddhā paccekamunino. tathāgatā arahanto sammāsambuddhā munimunino.
[21] na monena munī {muni (syā0 ka0) dha0 pa0 268} hoti, mūḷharūpo aviddasu.
[22] yo ca tulaṃva paggayha, varamādāya paṇḍito..
[21] pāpāni parivajjeti, sa munī tena so muni.
[22] yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccati..
[21] asatañca satañca ñatvā dhammaṃ, ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ca sabbaloke.
[22] devamanussehi pūjanīyo {pūjito (syā0 ka0) mahāni0 14}, saṅgajālamaticca ^a^T0.0085^ea^ {saṅga jālamaticca, su0 ni0 532} so munīti..

[03] ^b^sādhu viyākarohī^eb^ti taṃ sādhu ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- taṃ me munī sādhu viyākarohi. ^b^tathā hi te vidito esa^eb^ ^a^V0.0067^ea^ ^b^dhammo^eb^ti tathā hi te vidito tulito tīrito vibhūto vibhāvito esa dhammoti -- tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``yaṃ taṃ apucchimha akittayī no, aññaṃ taṃ pucchāma tadiṅgha brūhi.
[27] kathaṃ nu dhīrā vitaranti oghaṃ, jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañca.
[22] taṃ me munī sādhu viyākarohi, tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo''ti..
[21] ^b^kittayissāmi^eb^ ^a^M0.0075^ea^ ^b^te dhammaṃ, [mettagūti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^diṭṭhe dhamme anītihaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^yaṃ viditvā sato caraṃ, tare loke visattikaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^kittayissāmi te dhamma^eb^nti. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, cattāro satipaṭṭhāne, cattāro sammappadhāne, cattāro iddhipāde ^a^T0.0086^ea^, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅge, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ, nibbānañca, nibbānagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ kittayissāmi ācikkhissāmi desessāmi paññapessāmi paṭṭhapessāmi vivarissāmi vibhajissāmi uttānīkarissāmi pakāsissāmīti -- kittayissāmi te dhammaṃ. ^b^mettagū^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati.

[03] ^b^diṭṭhe dhamme anītiha^eb^nti. ^b^diṭṭhe dhamme^eb^ti diṭṭhe dhamme ñāte dhamme tulite dhamme tīrite dhamme vibhūte dhamme vibhāvite dhamme sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti...pe0... yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti diṭṭhe dhamme ñāte dhamme tulite dhamme tīrite dhamme vibhūte dhamme vibhāvite dhammeti -- evampi diṭṭhe dhamme kathayissāmi. atha vā, dukkhe diṭṭhe dukkhaṃ kathayissāmi, samudaye diṭṭhe samudayaṃ kathayissāmi, magge diṭṭhe maggaṃ kathayissāmi, nirodhe diṭṭhe nirodhaṃ kathayissāmīti -- evampi diṭṭhe dhamme kathayissāmi. atha vā, diṭṭhe dhamme sandiṭṭhikaṃ akālikaṃ ehipassikaṃ opaneyyikaṃ paccattaṃ veditabbaṃ viññūhīti -- evampi diṭṭhe dhamme kathayissāmīti diṭṭhe dhamme. ^b^anītiha^eb^nti na itihītihaṃ na itikirāya na paramparāya na piṭakasampadāya na takkahetu na nayahetu na ākāraparivitakkena na diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā, sāmaṃ sayamabhiññātaṃ attapaccakkhadhammaṃ, taṃ kathayissāmīti -- diṭṭhe dhamme anītihaṃ.

[03] ^b^yaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0068^ea^ ^b^viditvā sato cara^eb^nti yaṃ viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā ^a^T0.0087^ea^ vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā, ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā, ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti... ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti...pe0... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā. ^b^sato^eb^ti catūhi kāraṇehi sato -- kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato...pe0... so vuccati sato. ^b^cara^eb^nti ^a^M0.0076^ea^ caranto viharanto iriyanto vattento pālento yapento yāpentoti -- yaṃ viditvā sato caraṃ.

[03] ^b^tare loke visattika^eb^nti visattikā vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. ^b^visattikā^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena visattikā? visatāti visattikā, visālāti visattikā, visaṭāti visattikā, visamāti visattikā, visakkatīti visattikā, visaṃharatīti visattikā, visaṃvādikāti visattikā, visamūlāti visattikā, visaphalāti visattikā, visaparibhogāti visattikā, visālā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe kule gaṇe āvāse lābhe yase pasaṃsāya sukhe cīvare piṇḍapāte senāsane gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāre kāmadhātuyā rūpadhātuyā arūpadhātuyā kāmabhave rūpabhave arūpabhave saññābhave asaññābhave nevasaññānāsaññābhave ekavokārabhave catuvokārabhave pañcavokārabhave atīte anāgate paccuppanne diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu visaṭā vitthatāti visattikā. ^b^loke^eb^ti apāyaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhātuloke āyatanaloke. ^b^tare loke visattika^eb^nti ^a^T0.0088^ea^ loke vesā visattikā {yā sā loke visattikā (syā0) kāmasuttaniddesaṭṭhakathā oloketabbā}, loke vetaṃ visattikaṃ sato tareyya uttareyya patareyya samatikkameyya vītivatteyyāti -- tare loke visattikaṃ. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``kittayissāmi te dhammaṃ, [mettagūti bhagavā]
[27] diṭṭhe dhamme anītihaṃ.
[22] yaṃ viditvā sato caraṃ, tare loke visattika''nti..
[21] ^b^tañcāhaṃ abhinandāmi, mahesi dhammamuttamaṃ.^eb^
[27] ^b^yaṃ viditvā sato caraṃ, tare loke visattikaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^tañcāhaṃ abhinandāmī^eb^ti. ^b^ta^eb^nti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ byappathaṃ {byapathaṃ (syā0 ka0)} desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ {desanaṃ anusandhi (syā0)}. nandāmīti ^a^V0.0069^ea^ abhinandāmi modāmi anumodāmi icchāmi sādiyāmi yācāmi patthayāmi pihayāmi abhijappāmīti -- tañcāhaṃ abhinandāmi.

[03] ^b^mahesi^eb^ ^a^M0.0077^ea^ ^b^dhammamuttama^eb^nti. ^b^mahesī^eb^ti kiṃ mahesi bhagavā, mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī {esi gavesi (syā0) mahāni0 150} pariyesīti mahesi, mahantaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ...pe0... mahantaṃ paññākkhandhaṃ... mahantaṃ vimuttikkhandhaṃ... mahantaṃ vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahato tamokāyassa padālanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahato vipallāsassa pabhedanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahato taṇhāsallassa abbahanaṃ {abbūhanaṃ (bahūsu), abbūhaṃ (sī0 aṭṭha0)} esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahato ^a^T0.0089^ea^ diṭṭhisaṅghātassa viniveṭhanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahato mānadhajassa papātanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahato abhisaṅkhārassa vūpasamaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahato oghassa nittharaṇaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahato bhārassa nikkhepanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahato saṃsāravaṭṭassa upacchedaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahato santāpassa nibbāpanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahato pariḷāhassa paṭippassaddhiṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahato dhammadhajassa ussāpanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahante satipaṭṭhāne...pe0... mahante sammappadhāne... mahante iddhipāde... mahantāni indriyāni... mahantāni balāni... mahante bojjhaṅge... mahantaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ... mahantaṃ paramatthaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahesakkhehi sattehi esito gavesito pariyesito -- ``kahaṃ buddho, kahaṃ bhagavā, kahaṃ devadevo, kahaṃ narāsabho''ti mahesi. ^b^dhammamuttama^eb^nti dhammamuttaṃmaṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ. yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ. ^b^uttama^eb^nti aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ viseṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ dhammanti -- mahesi dhammamuttamaṃ.

[03] ^b^yaṃ viditvā sato cara^eb^nti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā, ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā, ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti... ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti...pe0... ``yaṃ ^a^T0.0090^ea^ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā. ^b^sato^eb^ti catūhi kāraṇehi sato -- kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ ^a^M0.0078^ea^ bhāvento sato, vedanāsu...pe0... citte... dhammesu... dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato... so vuccati sato. ^b^cara^eb^nti caranto viharanto iriyanto vattento pālento yapento yāpentoti -- yaṃ viditvā sato caraṃ.

[03] ^b^tare^eb^ ^a^V0.0070^ea^ ^b^loke visattika^eb^nti visattikā vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. ^b^visattikā^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena visattikā...pe0... visaṭā vitthatāti visattikā. ^b^loke^eb^ti apāyaloke...pe0... āyatanaloke. ^b^tare loke visattika^eb^nti loke vesā visattikā, loke vetaṃ visattikaṃ sato tareyya uttareyya patareyya samatikkameyya vītivatteyyāti -- tare loke visattikaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``tañcāhaṃ abhinandāmi, mahesi dhammamuttamaṃ.
[22] yaṃ viditvā sato caraṃ, tare loke visattika''nti..
[21] ^b^yaṃ kiñci sampajānāsi, [mettagūti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjhe.^eb^
[22] ^b^etesu nandiñca nivesanañca, panujja viññāṇaṃ bhave na tiṭṭhe..^eb^

[03] ^b^yaṃ kiñci sampajānāsī^eb^ti yaṃ kiñci pajānāsi ājānāsi vijānāsi paṭivijānāsi paṭivijjhasīti -- yaṃ kiñci sampajānāsi. ^b^mettagū^eb^ti ^a^T0.0091^ea^ bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- mettagūti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti. ^b^uddha^eb^nti anāgataṃ {uddhaṃ vuccati anāgataṃ (syā0 ka0)}; ^b^adho^eb^ti atītaṃ; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti paccuppannaṃ. ^b^uddha^eb^nti devaloko; ^b^adho^eb^ti nirayaloko; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti manussaloko. atha vā, ^b^uddha^eb^nti kusalā dhammā; ^b^adho^eb^ti akusalā dhammā; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti abyākatā dhammā. ^b^uddha^eb^nti arūpadhātu; ^b^adho^eb^ti kāmadhātu; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti rūpadhātu. ^b^uddha^eb^nti sukhā vedanā; ^b^adho^eb^ti dukkhā vedanā; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti adukkhamasukhā vedanā. ^b^uddha^eb^nti uddhaṃ pādatalā; ^b^adho^eb^ti ^a^M0.0079^ea^ adho kesamatthakā; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti vemajjheti -- uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjhe.

[03] ^b^etesu nandiñca nivesanañca, panujja viññāṇaṃ bhave na tiṭṭhe^eb^ti ^b^etesū^eb^ti ācikkhitesu desitesu paññapitesu paṭṭhapitesu vivaritesu vibhajitesu uttānīkatesu pakāsitesu. nandī vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. ^b^nivesana^eb^nti dve nivesanā -- taṇhānivesanā ca diṭṭhinivesanā ca. katamā taṇhā nivesanā? yāvatā taṇhāsaṅkhātena ^a^V0.0071^ea^ ...pe0... ayaṃ taṇhānivesanā. katamā diṭṭhinivesanā? vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi ^a^T0.0092^ea^ ...pe0... ayaṃ diṭṭhinivesanā.

[03] ^b^panujja viññāṇa^eb^nti puññābhisaṅkhārasahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ, apuññābhisaṅkhārasahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ, āneñjābhisaṅkhārasahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ. etesu nandiñca nivesanañca abhisaṅkhārasahagatañca viññāṇaṃ nujja panujja nuda panuda jaha pajaha vinodehi byantīkarohi anabhāvaṃ gamehīti -- etesu nandiñca nivesanañca panujja viññāṇaṃ.

[03] ^b^bhave na tiṭṭhe^eb^ti. ^b^bhavā^eb^ti dve bhavā -- kammabhavo ca paṭisandhiko ca punabbhavo. katamo kammabhavo? puññābhisaṅkhāro apuññābhisaṅkhāro āneñjābhisaṅkhāro -- ayaṃ kammabhavo. katamo paṭisandhiko punabbhavo? paṭisandhikā rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ -- ayaṃ paṭisandhiko punabbhavo. ^b^bhave na tiṭṭhe^eb^ti nandiñca nivesanañca abhisaṅkhārasahagataṃ viññāṇañca kammabhavañca paṭisandhikañca punabbhavaṃ pajahanto vinodento byantīkaronto anabhāvaṃ gamento kammabhave na tiṭṭheyya paṭisandhike punabbhave na tiṭṭheyya na santiṭṭheyyāti -- panujja viññāṇaṃ bhave na tiṭṭhe. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``yaṃ kiñci sampajānāsi, [mettagūti bhagavā]
[27] uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjhe.
[22] etesu nandiñca nivesanañca, panujja viññāṇaṃ bhave na tiṭṭhe''ti..
[21] ^b^evaṃvihārī sato appamatto,^eb^
[27] ^b^bhikkhu^eb^ ^a^T0.0093^ea^ ^b^caraṃ hitvā mamāyitāni.^eb^
[22] ^b^jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañca, idheva vidvā pajaheyya dukkhaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^evaṃvihārī^eb^ ^a^M0.0080^ea^ ^b^sato appamatto^eb^ti. ^b^evaṃvihārī^eb^ti nandiñca nivesanañca abhisaṅkhārasahagataviññāṇañca kammabhavañca paṭisandhikañca punabbhavaṃ pajahanto vinodento byantīkaronto anabhāvaṃ gamentoti -- evaṃvihārī. ^b^sato^eb^ti catūhi kāraṇehi sato -- kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento...pe0... so vuccati sato. ^b^appamatto^eb^ti sakkaccakārī sātaccakārī aṭṭhitakārī anolīnavuttī {anolīnavuttiko (ka0) mahāni0 14} anikkhittacchando anikkhittadhuro appamatto kusalesu dhammesu -- ``kathāhaṃ {kadāhaṃ (syā0)} aparipūraṃ vā sīlakkhandhaṃ paripūreyyaṃ, paripūraṃ vā sīlakkhandhaṃ tattha ^a^V0.0072^ea^ tattha paññāya anuggaṇheyya''nti yo tattha chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī {appaṭivāni (ka0) mahāni0 14} ca sati ca sampajaññañca ātappaṃ padhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ anuyogo appamatto appamādo kusalesu dhammesu. ``kathāhaṃ aparipūraṃ vā samādhikkhandhaṃ...pe0... paññākkhandhaṃ... vimuttikkhandhaṃ... vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ paripūreyyaṃ paripūraṃ vā vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ tattha tattha paññāya anuggaṇheyya''nti yo tattha chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañca ātappaṃ padhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ anuyogo appamatto appamādo kusalesu dhammesu. ``kathāhaṃ apariññātaṃ vā dukkhaṃ parijāneyyaṃ, appahīne vā kilese pajaheyyaṃ ^a^T0.0094^ea^, abhāvitaṃ vā maggaṃ bhāveyyaṃ, asacchikataṃ vā nirodhaṃ sacchikareyya''nti yo tattha chando ca vāyāmo ca ussāho ca ussoḷhī ca appaṭivānī ca sati ca sampajaññañca ātappaṃ padhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ anuyogo appamatto appamādo kusalesu dhammesūti -- evaṃvihārī sato appamatto.

[03] ^b^bhikkhu caraṃ hitvā mamāyitānī^eb^ti. ^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti puthujjanakalyāṇako {kalyāṇaputhujjano (syā0), evamīdisesu ṭhānesu} vā bhikkhu sekkho vā bhikkhu. ^b^cara^eb^nti caranto viharanto iriyanto vattento pālento yapento yāpento. ^b^mamattā^eb^ti dve mamattā -- taṇhāmamattañca diṭṭhimamattañca...pe0... idaṃ taṇhāmamattaṃ...pe0... idaṃ diṭṭhimamattaṃ... taṇhāmamattaṃ pahāya diṭṭhimamattaṃ paṭinissajjitvā mamatte jahitvā cajitvā pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti -- bhikkhu caraṃ hitvā mamāyitāni.

[03] ^b^jātiṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0081^ea^ ^b^jaraṃ sokapariddavañca, idheva vidvā pajaheyya dukkha^eb^nti. ^b^jātī^eb^ti yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ...pe0... ^a^T0.0095^ea^ ^b^jara^eb^nti yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ...pe0... ^b^soko^eb^ti ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa...pe0... ^b^paridevo^eb^ti ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa...pe0... ^b^idhā^eb^ti imissā diṭṭhiyā...pe0... imasmiṃ manussaloke. ^b^vidvā^eb^ti vijjāgato ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī. ^b^dukkha^eb^nti jātidukkhaṃ...pe0... domanassupāyāsadukkhaṃ. ^b^jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañca, idheva vidvā pajaheyya dukkha^eb^nti vijjāgato ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī idheva jātiñca jarañca sokapariddavañca dukkhañca pajaheyya vinodeyya byantīkareyya anabhāvaṃ gameyyāti -- jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañca, idheva vidvā pajaheyya dukkhaṃ. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``evaṃvihārī sato appamatto, bhikkhu caraṃ hitvā mamāyitāni.
[22] jātiṃ jaraṃ sokapariddavañca, idheva vidvā pajaheyya dukkha''nti..
[21] ^b^etābhinandāmi^eb^ ^a^T0.0096^ea^ ^a^V0.0073^ea^ ^b^vaco mahesino, sukittitaṃ gotamanūpadhīkaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^addhā hi bhagavā pahāsi dukkhaṃ, tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo..^eb^

[03] ^b^etābhinandāmi vaco mahesino^eb^ti. ^b^eta^eb^nti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ byappathaṃ desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ nandāmi abhinandāmi modāmi anumodāmi icchāmi sādiyāmi patthayāmi pihayāmi abhijappāmi. ^b^mahesino^eb^ti kiṃ mahesi bhagavā? mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi...pe0... kahaṃ narāsabhoti mahesīti -- etābhinandāmi vaco mahesino.

[03] ^b^sukittitaṃ gotamanūpadhīka^eb^nti. ^b^sukittita^eb^nti sukittitaṃ suācikkhitaṃ sudesitaṃ supaññapitaṃ supaṭṭhapitaṃ suvivaritaṃ suvibhajitaṃ sūttānīkataṃ supakāsitanti -- sukittitaṃ. ^b^gotamanūpadhīka^eb^nti upadhī vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca. upadhippahānaṃ upadhivūpasamaṃ upadhipaṭinissaggaṃ upadhipaṭipassaddhaṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- sukittitaṃ gotamanūpadhīkaṃ.

[03] ^b^addhā^eb^ ^a^M0.0082^ea^ ^b^hi bhagavā pahāsi dukkha^eb^nti. ^b^addhā^eb^ti ekaṃsavacanaṃ nissaṃsayavacanaṃ nikkaṅkhāvacanaṃ advejjhavacanaṃ adveḷhakavacanaṃ nirodhavacanaṃ appaṇakavacanaṃ avatthāpanavacanametaṃ -- addhāti. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti. ^b^pahāsi^eb^ ^a^T0.0097^ea^ ^b^dukkha^eb^nti jātidukkhaṃ jarādukkhaṃ byādhidukkhaṃ maraṇadukkhaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhaṃ pahāsi pajahi vinodesi byantīkarosi anabhāvaṃ gamesīti -- addhā hi bhagavā pahāsi dukkhaṃ.
[03] ^b^tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo^eb^ti tathā hi te vidito tulito tīrito vibhūto vibhāvito esa dhammoti -- tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``etābhinandāmi vaco mahesino, sukittitaṃ gotamanūpadhīkaṃ.
[22] addhā hi bhagavā pahāsi dukkhaṃ, tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo''ti..
[21] ^b^te cāpi nūnappajaheyyu dukkhaṃ, ye tvaṃ munī aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyya.^eb^
[22] ^b^taṃ taṃ namassāmi samecca nāga, appeva maṃ bhagavā aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyya..^eb^

[03] ^b^te^eb^ ^a^V0.0074^ea^ ^b^cāpi nūnappajaheyyu dukkha^eb^nti. ^b^te cāpī^eb^ti khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca vessā ca suddā ca gahaṭṭhā ca pabbajitā ca devā ca manussā ca. ^b^pajaheyyu dukkha^eb^nti jātidukkhaṃ jarādukkhaṃ byādhidukkhaṃ maraṇadukkhaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhaṃ pajaheyyuṃ vinodeyyuṃ byantīkareyyuṃ anabhāvaṃ gameyyunti -- te cāpi nūnappajaheyyu dukkhaṃ.

[03] ^b^ye^eb^ ^a^T0.0098^ea^ ^b^tvaṃ munī aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyyā^eb^ti. ^b^ye^eb^ti khattiye ca brāhmaṇe ca vesse ca sudde ca gahaṭṭhe ca pabbajite ca deve ca manusse ca. ^b^tva^eb^nti bhagavantaṃ bhaṇati. ^b^munī^eb^ti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ...pe0... saṅgajālamaticca so muni. ^b^aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyyā^eb^ti aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyya sakkaccaṃ ovadeyya abhiṇhaṃ ovadeyya punappunaṃ ovadeyya anusāseyyāti -- ye tvaṃ munī aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyya.

[03] ^b^taṃ taṃ namassāmi samecca nāgā^eb^ti. ^b^ta^eb^nti bhagavantaṃ bhaṇati. ^b^namassāmī^eb^ti kāyena vā namassāmi, vācāya vā namassāmi, cittena vā namassāmi, anvatthapaṭipattiyā ^a^M0.0083^ea^ vā namassāmi, dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā vā namassāmi, sakkaromi garuṃ karomi {garukaromi (syā0)} mānemi pūjemi. ^b^sameccā^eb^ti samecca abhisamecca samāgantvā abhisamāgantvā sammukhā taṃ namassāmi. ^b^nāgā^eb^ti nāgo ca bhagavā āguṃ na karotīti -- nāgo, na gacchatīti -- nāgo, na āgacchatīti -- nāgo. kathaṃ bhagavā āguṃ na karotīti -- nāgo? āgu vuccati pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṃkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.
[21] āguṃ na karoti kiñci loke, [sabhiyāti bhagavā]
[27] sabbasaṃyoge {sabbayoge (ka0), su0 ni0 527} visajja bandhanāni.
[22] sabbattha na sajjatī vimutto, nāgo tādi pavuccate tathattāti..
[03] evaṃ ^a^T0.0099^ea^ bhagavā āguṃ na karotīti -- nāgo.

[03] kathaṃ bhagavā na gacchatīti -- nāgo. bhagavā na chandāgatiṃ gacchati, na dosāgatiṃ gacchati, na mohāgatiṃ gacchati, na bhayāgatiṃ gacchati, na rāgavasena gacchati, na dosavasena gacchati, na mohavasena gacchati, na mānavasena gacchati, na diṭṭhivasena gacchati, na uddhaccavasena gacchati, na vicikicchāvasena gacchati, na anusayavasena gacchati, na vaggehi dhammehi yāyati nīyati {niyyati (syā0 ka0)} vuyhati saṃharīyati. evaṃ bhagavā na gacchatīti -- nāgo.

[03] kathaṃ ^a^V0.0075^ea^ bhagavā na āgacchatīti -- nāgo. sotāpattimaggena ye kilesā pahīnā te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchati. sakadāgāmimaggena...pe0... anāgāmimaggena... arahattamaggena ye kilesā pahīnā te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchati. evaṃ bhagavā na āgacchatīti nāgoti -- taṃ taṃ namassāmi samecca nāga.

[03] ^b^appeva maṃ bhagavā aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyyā^eb^ti appeva maṃ bhagavā aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyya sakkaccaṃ ovadeyya abhiṇhaṃ ovadeyya punappunaṃ ovadeyya anusāseyyāti -- appeva maṃ bhagavā aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyya. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``te ^a^M0.0084^ea^ cāpi nūnappajaheyyu dukkhaṃ, ye tvaṃ munī aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyya.
[22] taṃ taṃ namassāmi samecca nāga, appeva ^a^T0.0100^ea^ maṃ bhagavā aṭṭhitaṃ ovadeyyā''ti..
[21] ^b^yaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vedagumābhijaññā, akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asattaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^addhā hi so oghamimaṃ atāri, tiṇṇo ca pāraṃ akhilo akaṅkho..^eb^

[03] ^b^yaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vedagumābhijaññā^eb^ti. ^b^brāhmaṇo^eb^ti sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo. sakkāyadiṭṭhi bāhitā hoti, vicikicchā bāhitā hoti, sīlabbataparāmāso bāhito hoti, rāgo bāhito hoti, doso bāhito hoti, moho bāhito hoti, māno bāhito hoti. bāhitāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṃkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.
[21] bāhitvā sabbapāpakāni, [sabhiyāti bhagavā]
[27] vimalo sādhusamāhito ṭhitatto.
[22] saṃsāramaticca kevalī so, asito {anissito (syā0) su0 ni0 524} tādi pavuccate sa brahmā..

[03] ^b^vedagū^eb^ti vedo vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ...pe0... sabbaṃ vedamaticca vedagū soti. ^b^abhijaññā^eb^ti abhijāneyya ājāneyya vijāneyya paṭivijāneyya paṭivijjheyyāti -- yaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vedagumābhijaññā.

[03] ^b^akiñcanaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0101^ea^ ^b^kāmabhave asatta^eb^nti. ^b^akiñcana^eb^nti rāgakiñcanaṃ dosakiñcanaṃ mohakiñcanaṃ mānakiñcanaṃ ^a^V0.0076^ea^ diṭṭhikiñcanaṃ kilesakiñcanaṃ duccaritakiñcanaṃ, yassete kiñcanā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, so vuccati akiñcano. ^b^kāmā^eb^ti uddānato dve kāmā -- vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca...pe0... ime vuccanti vatthukāmā...pe0... ime vuccanti kilesakāmā. ^b^bhavā^eb^ti dve bhavā -- kammabhavo ca paṭisandhiko ca punabbhavo ^a^M0.0085^ea^ ...pe0... ayaṃ paṭisandhiko punabbhavo. ^b^akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asatta^eb^nti akiñcanaṃ puggalaṃ kāmabhave ca asattaṃ alaggaṃ alaggitaṃ apalibuddhaṃ nikkhantaṃ nissaṭaṃ vippamuttaṃ visaññuttaṃ vimariyādikatena cetasā viharantanti -- akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asattaṃ.

[03] ^b^addhā hi so oghamimaṃ atārī^eb^ti. ^b^addhā^eb^ti ekaṃsavacanaṃ...pe0... avatthāpanavacanametaṃ -- addhāti. ^b^ogha^eb^nti kāmoghaṃ bhavoghaṃ diṭṭhoghaṃ avijjoghaṃ. ^b^atārī^eb^ti uttari patari samatikkami vītivattayīti -- addhā hi so oghamimaṃ atāri.

[03] ^b^tiṇṇo ca pāraṃ akhilo akaṅkho^eb^ti. ^b^tiṇṇo^eb^ti kāmoghaṃ tiṇṇo, bhavoghaṃ tiṇṇo, diṭṭhoghaṃ tiṇṇo, avijjoghaṃ tiṇṇo, saṃsārapathaṃ tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo {nittiṇṇo (syā0)} atikkanto samatikkanto vītivatto. so vutthavāso {vuṭṭhavāso (syā0) mahāni0 6} ciṇṇacaraṇo gataddho gatadiso gatakoṭiko pālitabrahmacariyo uttamadiṭṭhippatto bhāvitamaggo, pahīnakileso paṭividdhākuppo sacchikatanirodho ^a^T0.0102^ea^. dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, maggo bhāvito, nirodho sacchikato, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ. so ukkhittapaligho saṃkiṇṇaparikkho abbuḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto pañcaṅgavippahīno chaḷaṅgasamannāgato ekārakkho caturāpasseno panuṇṇapaccekasacco {paṇunnapaccekasacco (ka0)} samavayasaṭṭhesano anāvilasaṅkappo passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro suvimuttacitto suvimuttapañño kevalī vusitavā uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattippatto. so neva ācināti na apacināti, apacinitvā ṭhito. neva pajahati na upādiyati, pajahitvā ṭhito. neva visineti na ussineti, visinetvā ṭhito. neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti, vidhūpetvā ṭhito. asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgatattā ṭhito. asekkhena samādhikkhandhena...pe0... paññākkhandhena... vimuttikkhandhena... vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena samannāgatattā ṭhito. saccaṃ sampaṭipādayitvā {paṭipādayitvā (syā0)} ṭhito. ejaṃ samatikkamitvā ṭhito. kilesaggiṃ pariyādiyitvā ṭhito. aparigamanatāya ṭhito. kathaṃ {kaṭaṃ (syā0) kāmasuttaniddesaṭṭhakathā oloketabbā} samādāya ṭhito? vimuttipaṭisevanatāya ṭhito ^a^M0.0086^ea^. mettāya pārisuddhiyā ṭhito. karuṇāya ^a^V0.0077^ea^ ...pe0... muditāya... upekkhāya pārisuddhiyā ṭhito. accantapārisuddhiyā ṭhito. atammayatāya {akammaññatāya (syā0)} pārisuddhiyā ṭhito. vimuttattā ṭhito. santussitattā ṭhito. khandhapariyante ṭhito. dhātupariyante ṭhito. āyatanapariyante ṭhito. gatipariyante ^a^T0.0103^ea^ ṭhito. upapattipariyante ṭhito. paṭisandhipariyante ṭhito. bhavapariyante ṭhito. saṃsārapariyante ṭhito. vaṭṭapariyante ṭhito. antimabhave ṭhito. antime samussaye ṭhito. antimadehadharo arahā.
[21] tassāyaṃ pacchimako bhavo, carimoyaṃ samussayo.
[22] jātimaraṇasaṃsāro, natthi tassa punabbhavoti..

[03] ^b^tiṇṇo ca pāra^eb^nti pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ. yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ. so pāragato pārappatto antagato antappatto koṭigato koṭippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto vosānagato vosānappatto tāṇagato tāṇappatto leṇagato leṇappatto saraṇagato saraṇappatto abhayagato abhayappatto accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbānagato nibbānappatto. so vuttavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo...pe0... jātimaraṇasaṃsāro, natthi tassa punabbhavoti -- tiṇṇo ca pāraṃ.

[01] ^b^akhilo^eb^ti rāgo khilo, doso khilo, moho khilo, kodho khilo, upanāho khilo...pe0... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā khilā. yassete khilā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā so vuccati akhilo. ^b^akaṅkho^eb^ti dukkhe kaṅkhā, dukkhasamudaye kaṅkhā, dukkhanirodhe kaṅkhā, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya kaṅkhā, pubbante kaṅkhā, aparante kaṅkhā, pubbantāparante kaṅkhā, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu ^a^T0.0104^ea^ dhammesu kaṅkhā, yā evarūpā kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā kaṅkhāyitattaṃ vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṃ dvedhāpatho saṃsayo anekaṃsaggāho āsappanā parisappanā apariyogāhanā chambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho. yassete kaṅkhā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā so ^a^M0.0087^ea^ vuccati akaṅkhoti -- tiṇṇo ca pāraṃ akhilo akaṅkho. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``yaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vedagumābhijaññā, akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asattaṃ.
[22] addhā hi so oghamimaṃ atāri, tiṇṇo ca pāraṃ akhilo akaṅkho''ti..
[21] ^b^vidvā^eb^ ^a^V0.0078^ea^ ^b^ca yo vedagū naro idha,^eb^ ^b^bhavābhave saṅgamimaṃ visajja.^eb^
[22] ^b^so vītataṇho anīgho nirāso, atāri so jātijaranti brūmi..^eb^

[03] ^b^vidvā ca yo vedagū naro idhā^eb^ti. ^b^vidvā^eb^ti vijjāgato ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī. ^b^yo^eb^ti yo yādiso...pe0... manusso vā. ^b^vedagū^eb^ti vedā vuccanti catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīmaṃsā vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi {ñāṇaṃ...pe0... sabbavedamaticca vedagū soti. (syā0) passa mahāni0 81}. tehi vedehi jātijarāmaraṇassa antagato antappatto koṭigato koṭippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto vosānagato vosānappatto tāṇagato tāṇappatto leṇagato leṇappatto saraṇagato saraṇappatto abhayagato abhayappatto accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbānagato nibbānappatto. vedānaṃ vā antagatoti vedagū, vedehi vā antagatoti vedagū, sattannaṃ vā dhammānaṃ viditattā vedagū. sakkāyadiṭṭhi viditā hoti, vicikicchā...pe0... sīlabbataparāmāso... rāgo... doso... moho... māno vidito hoti. viditāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṃkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.
[21] vedāni viceyya kevalāni, [sabhiyāti bhagavā]
[27] samaṇānaṃ yānīdhatthi brāhmaṇānaṃ.
[22] sabbavedanāsu vītarāgo, sabbaṃ vedamaticca vedagū so..

[03] ^b^naro^eb^ti ^a^M0.0088^ea^ satto naro mānavo poso puggalo jīvo jāgu {jātu (syā0)} jantu indagu {indagū (syā0)} manujo. ^b^idhā^eb^ti imissā diṭṭhiyā...pe0... imasmiṃ ^a^T0.0105^ea^ manussaloketi -- vidvā ca yo vedagū naro idha.

[03] ^b^bhavābhave saṅgamimaṃ visajjā^eb^ti. ^b^bhavābhave^eb^ti bhavābhave kammabhave punabbhave kāmabhave, kammabhave kāmabhave punabbhave rūpabhave, kammabhave rūpabhave punabbhave arūpabhave, kammabhave arūpabhave punabbhave punappunabhave, punappunagatiyā punappunaupapattiyā punappunapaṭisandhiyā punappunāttabhāvābhinibbattiyā. ^b^saṅgā^eb^ti satta saṅgā -- rāgasaṅgo, dosasaṅgo, mohasaṅgo, mānasaṅgo, diṭṭhisaṅgo, kilesasaṅgo, duccaritasaṅgo. ^b^visajjā^eb^ti saṅge vosajjetvā vā visajja. atha vā, saṅge bandhe vibandhe ābandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane phoṭayitvā {mocayitvā (syā0)} vā visajja. yathā yānaṃ vā vayhaṃ vā rathaṃ vā sakaṭaṃ vā sandamānikaṃ vā sajjaṃ visajjaṃ karonti vikopenti -- evameva te saṅge vosajjetvā vā visajja. atha vā, saṅge bandhe vibandhe ^a^V0.0079^ea^ ābandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane phoṭayitvā vā visajjāti -- bhavābhave saṅgamimaṃ visajja.

[03] ^b^so vītataṇho anīgho nirāso, atāri so jātijaranti brūmī^eb^ti. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti rūpataṇhā...pe0... dhammataṇhā... yassesā taṇhā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, so vuccati vītataṇho vigatataṇho cattataṇho vantataṇho muttataṇho pahīnataṇho paṭinissaṭṭhataṇho ^a^T0.0106^ea^ vītarāgo cattarāgo pahīnarāgo paṭinissaṭṭharāgo nicchāto nibbuto sītibhūto sukhappaṭisaṃvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharatīti -- so vītataṇho. ^b^anīgho^eb^ti rāgo nīgho, doso nīgho, moho nīgho, kodho nīgho, upanāho nīgho...pe0... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā nīghā. yassete nīghā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, so vuccati anīgho. ^b^nirāso^eb^ti āsā vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. yassesā āsā taṇhā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭipassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, so vuccati nirāso. ^b^jātī^eb^ti yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ...pe0... āyatanānaṃ paṭilābho. ^b^jarā^eb^ti yā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ ^a^M0.0089^ea^ ...pe0... indriyānaṃ paripāko. ayaṃ vuccati jarā. ^b^so vītataṇho anīgho nirāso, atāri so jātijaranti brūmī^eb^ti yo so vītataṇho anīgho ca nirāso ca, so kho jātijarāmaraṇaṃ atari uttari patari samatikkami vītivattayīti brūmi ācikkhāmi ^a^T0.0107^ea^ desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti -- so vītataṇho anīgho nirāso, atāri so jātijaranti brūmi. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``vidvā ca yo vedagū naro idha, bhavābhave saṅgamimaṃ visajja.
[22] so vītataṇho anīgho nirāso, atāri so jātijaranti brūmī''ti..
[03] saha gāthāpariyosānā...pe0... satthā me, bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmīti.
[06] mettagūmāṇavapucchāniddeso catuttho.
[21] ^b^pucchāmi^eb^ ^a^T0.0108^ea^ ^a^V0.0080^ea^ ^b^taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ, [iccāyasmā dhotako]^eb^
[27] ^b^vācābhikaṅkhāmi mahesi tuyhaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^tava sutvāna nigghosaṃ, sikkhe nibbānamattano.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi meta^eb^nti. ^b^pucchāmī^eb^ti tisso pucchā -- adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā, diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchā, vimaticchedanā pucchā...pe0... imā tisso pucchā...pe0... nibbānapucchā. ^b^pucchāmi ta^eb^nti pucchāmi taṃ yācāmi taṃ ajjhesāmi taṃ pasādemi taṃ, kathayassu meti -- pucchāmi taṃ. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti. ^b^brūhi meta^eb^nti brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ.

[03] ^b^iccāyasmā dhotako^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ garuvacanaṃ sagāravasappatissādhivacanametaṃ āyasmāti. ^b^dhotako^eb^ti tassa ^a^M0.0090^ea^ brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpoti -- iccāyasmā dhotako.

[03] ^b^vācābhikaṅkhāmi mahesi tuyha^eb^nti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ byappathaṃ desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ kaṅkhāmi abhikaṅkhāmi icchāmi sādiyāmi patthayāmi pihayāmi abhijappāmi. ^b^mahesī^eb^ti kiṃ mahesi bhagavā? mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ ^a^T0.0109^ea^ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi...pe0... kahaṃ narāsabhoti mahesīti -- vācābhikaṅkhāmi mahesi tuyhaṃ.
[03] ^b^tava sutvāna nigghosa^eb^nti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ byappathaṃ desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ sutvā suṇitvā uggahetvā upadhārayitvā upalakkhayitvāti -- tava sutvāna nigghosaṃ.

[03] ^b^sikkhe nibbānamattano^eb^ti. ^b^sikkhā^eb^ti tisso sikkhā -- adhisīlasikkhā, adhicittasikkhā, adhipaññāsikkhā...pe0... ayaṃ adhipaññāsikkhā. ^b^nibbānamattano^eb^ti attano rāgassa nibbāpanāya, dosassa nibbāpanāya, mohassa nibbāpanāya, kodhassa nibbāpanāya ^a^V0.0081^ea^, upanāhassa nibbāpanāya...pe0... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṃ samāya upasamāya vūpasamāya nibbāpanāya paṭinissaggāya paṭipassaddhiyā adhisīlampi sikkheyya, adhicittampi sikkheyya, adhipaññampi sikkheyya. imā tisso sikkhāyo āvajjanto sikkheyya, jānanto sikkheyya, passanto sikkheyya, paccavekkhanto sikkheyya, cittaṃ padahanto sikkheyya, saddhāya adhimuccanto sikkheyya, vīriyaṃ paggaṇhanto sikkheyya, satiṃ upaṭṭhapento sikkheyya, cittaṃ samādahanto sikkheyya, paññāya pajānanto sikkheyya, abhiññeyyaṃ abhijānanto sikkheyya, pariññeyyaṃ parijānanto sikkheyya, pahātabbaṃ pajahanto sikkheyya, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvento sikkheyya, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikaronto sikkheyya, ācareyya samācareyya samādāya vatteyyāti -- sikkhe nibbānamattano. tenāha so ^a^T0.0110^ea^ brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ, [iccāyasmā dhotako]
[27] vācābhikaṅkhāmi mahesi tuyhaṃ.
[22] tava sutvāna nigghosaṃ, sikkhe nibbānamattano''ti..
[21] ^b^tenahātappaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0091^ea^ ^b^karohi, [dhotakāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^idheva nipako sato.^eb^

[03] ^b^tenahātappaṃ karohī^eb^ti ātappaṃ karohi, ussāhaṃ karohi, ussoḷhiṃ karohi, thāmaṃ karohi, dhitiṃ karohi, vīriyaṃ karohi, chandaṃ janehi sañjanehi upaṭṭhapehi samuṭṭhapehi nibbattehi abhinibbattehīti -- tenahātappaṃ karohi.
[03] ^b^dhotakā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- dhotakāti bhagavā.
