[22] ito sutvāna nigghosaṃ, sikkhe nibbānamattano''ti..
[21] ^b^passāmahaṃ devamanussaloke,^eb^ ^b^akiñcanaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0112^ea^ ^b^brāhmaṇamiriyamānaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^taṃ taṃ namassāmi samantacakkhu, pamuñca maṃ sakka kathaṃkathāhi..^eb^

[03] ^b^passāmahaṃ devamanussaloke^eb^ti. ^b^devā^eb^ti tayo devā -- sammutidevā, upapattidevā, visuddhidevā. katame sammutidevā? sammutidevā vuccanti rājāno ca rājakumārā ca deviyo ca. ime vuccanti sammutidevā. katame upapattidevā? upapattidevā vuccanti cātumahārājikā devā tāvatiṃsā devā yāmā devā tusitā devā nimmānaratī devā paranimmitavasavattī devā brahmakāyikā devā ye ca devā taduttari {tatrupari (syā0)}. ime vuccanti upapattidevā. katame visuddhidevā? visuddhidevā vuccanti tathāgatasāvakā arahanto khīṇāsavā ye ca paccekabuddhā. ime vuccanti visuddhidevā. bhagavā sammutidevānañca upapattidevānañca visuddhidevānañca devo ca atidevo ca devātidevo ca sīhasīho nāganāgo gaṇigaṇī munimunī rājarājā. ^b^passāmahaṃ devamanussaloke^eb^ti manussaloke devaṃ passāmi atidevaṃ passāmi devātidevaṃ passāmi dakkhāmi olokemi nijjhāyāmi upaparikkhāmīti -- passāmahaṃ devamanussaloke.

[03] ^b^ākiñcanaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0083^ea^ ^b^brāhmaṇamiriyamāna^eb^nti. ^b^akiñcana^eb^nti rāgakiñcanaṃ dosakiñcanaṃ mohakiñcanaṃ mānakiñcanaṃ diṭṭhikiñcanaṃ kilesakiñcanaṃ duccaritakiñcanaṃ, te kiñcanā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā, tasmā ^a^T0.0113^ea^ buddho akiñcano. ^b^brāhmaṇo^eb^ti bhagavā sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo -- sakkāyadiṭṭhi bāhitā hoti, vicikicchā bāhitā hoti, sīlabbataparāmāso bāhito hoti, rāgo bāhito hoti, doso bāhito ^a^M0.0093^ea^ hoti, moho bāhito hoti, māno bāhito hoti, bāhitāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṃkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.
[21] bāhitvā sabbapāpakāni, [sabhiyāti bhagavā]
[27] vimalo sādhusamāhito ṭhitatto.
[22] saṃsāramaticca kevalī so, asito tādi pavuccate sa brahmāti..
[03] ^b^iriyamāna^eb^nti carantaṃ viharantaṃ iriyantaṃ vattentaṃ pālentaṃ yapentaṃ yāpentanti -- akiñcanaṃ brāhmaṇamiriyamānaṃ.

[03] ^b^taṃ taṃ namassāmi samantacakkhū^eb^ti. ^b^ta^eb^nti bhagavantaṃ bhaṇati. ^b^namassāmī^eb^ti kāyena vā namassāmi, vācāya vā namassāmi, cittena vā namassāmi, anvatthapaṭipattiyā vā namassāmi, dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā vā namassāmi sakkaromi garuṃ karomi mānemi pūjemi. ^b^samantacakkhū^eb^ti samantacakkhu vuccati sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. bhagavā sabbaññutañāṇena upeto samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato.
[21] ``na tassa addiṭṭhamidhatthi {adiṭṭhamidhatthi (syā0 ka0) mahāni0 156} kiñci, atho ^a^T0.0114^ea^ aviññātamajānitabbaṃ.
[22] sabbaṃ abhiññāsi yadatthi neyyaṃ, tathāgato tena samantacakkhū''ti..
[03] taṃ taṃ namassāmi samantacakkhu.

[03] ^b^pamuñca maṃ sakka kathaṃkathāhī^eb^ti. ^b^sakkā^eb^ti sakko bhagavā sakyakulā pabbajitotipi sakko. atha vā, aḍḍho {addho (syā0 ka0)} mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko. tassimāni dhanāni, seyyathidaṃ -- saddhādhanaṃ sīladhanaṃ hiridhanaṃ ottappadhanaṃ sutadhanaṃ cāgadhanaṃ paññādhanaṃ satipaṭṭhānadhanaṃ sammappadhānadhanaṃ ^a^V0.0084^ea^ iddhipādadhanaṃ indriyadhanaṃ baladhanaṃ bojjhaṅgadhanaṃ maggadhanaṃ phaladhanaṃ nibbānadhanaṃ. imehi anekavidhehi dhanaratanehi aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko. atha vā, sakko pahu visavī alamatto sūro vīro vikkanto abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṃsotipi sakko ^a^M0.0094^ea^. kathaṃkathā vuccati vicikicchā. dukkhe kaṅkhā, dukkhasamudaye kaṅkhā, dukkhanirodhe kaṅkhā, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya kaṅkhā, pubbante kaṅkhā, aparante kaṅkhā, pubbantāparante kaṅkhā, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhā. yā evarūpā kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā kaṅkhāyitattaṃ vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṃ dvedhāpatho saṃsayo anekaṃsaggāho āsappanā parisappanā apariyogāhanā chambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho. ^b^pamuñca maṃ sakka kathaṃkathāhī^eb^ti muñca maṃ pamuñca maṃ mocehi maṃ pamocehi maṃ uddhara maṃ samuddhara maṃ ^a^T0.0115^ea^ vuṭṭhāpehi maṃ kathaṃkathāsallatoti -- pamuñca maṃ sakka kathaṃkathāhi. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``passāmahaṃ devamanussaloke, akiñcanaṃ brāhmaṇamiriyamānaṃ.
[22] taṃ taṃ namassāmi samantacakkhu, pamuñca maṃ sakka kathaṃkathāhī''ti..
[21] ^b^nāhaṃ sahissāmi pamocanāya, kathaṃkathiṃ dhotaka kañci loke.^eb^
[22] ^b^dhammañca seṭṭhaṃ ājānamāno, evaṃ tuvaṃ oghamimaṃ taresi..^eb^

[03] ^b^nāhaṃ sahissāmi^eb^ {samīhāmi (ka0)} ^b^pamocanāyā^eb^ti nāhaṃ taṃ sakkomi muñcituṃ pamuñcituṃ mocetuṃ pamocetuṃ uddharituṃ samuddharituṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃ kathaṃkathāsallatoti. evampi nāhaṃ sahissāmi pamocanāya. atha vā, na īhāmi na samīhāmi na ussahāmi na vāyamāmi na ussāhaṃ karomi na ussoḷhiṃ karomi na thāmaṃ karomi na dhitiṃ karomi na vīriyaṃ karomi na chandaṃ janemi na sañjanemi na nibbattemi na abhinibbattemi assaddhe puggale acchandike kusīte hīnavīriye appaṭipajjamāne dhammadesanāyāti. evampi nāhaṃ sahissāmi pamocanāya. atha vā, natthañño koci mocetā. te yadi moceyyuṃ sakena thāmena sakena ^a^T0.0116^ea^ balena sakena vīriyena sakena parakkamena sakena purisathāmena sakena purisabalena sakena purisavīriyena sakena purisaparakkamena attanā sammāpaṭipadaṃ ^a^M0.0095^ea^ anulomapaṭipadaṃ apaccanīkapaṭipadaṃ anvatthapaṭipadaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjamānā moceyyunti. evampi nāhaṃ sahissāmi pamocanāya.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``so vata, cunda, attanā palipapalipanno paraṃ palipapalipannaṃ uddharissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. so vata, cunda, attanā adanto avinīto aparinibbuto ^a^V0.0085^ea^ paraṃ damessati vinessati parinibbāpessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti. evampi nāhaṃ sahissāmi pamocanāya.
[03] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --
[21] ``attanā hi {attanāva (bahūsu) dha0 pa0 165} kataṃ pāpaṃ, attanā saṃkilissati.
[27] attanā akataṃ pāpaṃ, attanāva visujjhati.
[22] suddhi asuddhi paccattaṃ, nāñño aññaṃ visodhaye''ti..
[03] evampi nāhaṃ sahissāmi pamocanāya.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, tiṭṭhateva nibbānaṃ tiṭṭhati nibbānagāmimaggo tiṭṭhāmahaṃ samādapetā, atha ca pana mama sāvakā mayā evaṃ ovadiyamānā evaṃ anusāsiyamānā appekacce accantaniṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ ārādhenti ekacce nārādhentīti. ettha kyāhaṃ, brāhmaṇa karomi? maggakkhāyī, brāhmaṇa, tathāgato. maggaṃ buddho ācikkhati. attanā paṭipajjamānā mucceyyunti {muñceyyunti (syā0)}. evampi nāhaṃ sahissāmi pamocanāya''.

[03] ^b^kathaṃkathiṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0117^ea^ ^b^dhotaka kañci loke^eb^ti kathaṃkathiṃ puggalaṃ sakaṅkhaṃ sakhilaṃ sadveḷhakaṃ savicikicchaṃ. ^b^kañcī^eb^ti kañci khattiyaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā vessaṃ vā suddaṃ vā gahaṭṭhaṃ vā pabbajitaṃ vā devaṃ vā manussaṃ vā. ^b^loke^eb^ti apāyaloke...pe0... āyatanaloketi -- kathaṃkathiṃ dhotaka kañci loke.

[03] ^b^dhammañca seṭṭhaṃ ājānamāno^eb^ti dhammaṃ seṭṭhaṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ. yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ. ^b^seṭṭha^eb^nti aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ viseṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ dhammaṃ ājānamāno vijānamāno paṭivijānamāno paṭivijjhamānoti -- dhammañca seṭṭhaṃ ājānamāno.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0096^ea^ ^b^tuvaṃ oghamimaṃ taresī^eb^ti evaṃ kāmoghaṃ bhavoghaṃ diṭṭhoghaṃ avijjoghaṃ tareyyāsi uttareyyāsi patareyyāsi samatikkameyyāsi vītivatteyyāsīti -- evaṃ tuvaṃ oghamimaṃ taresi. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``nāhaṃ ^a^V0.0086^ea^ sahissāmi pamocanāya, kathaṃkathiṃ dhotaka kañci loke.
[22] dhammañca seṭṭhaṃ ājānamāno, evaṃ tuvaṃ oghamimaṃ taresī''ti..
[21] ^b^anusāsa brahme karuṇāyamāno, vivekadhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^yathāhaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0118^ea^ ^b^ākāsova^eb^ {ākāso ca (syā0)} ^b^abyāpajjamāno^eb^ {abyāpajjhamāno (syā0)}, ^b^idheva santo asito careyyaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^anusāsa brahme karuṇāyamāno^eb^ti anusāsa brahme anuggaṇha brahme anukampa brahmeti -- anusāsa brahme. ^b^karuṇāyamāno^eb^ti karuṇāyamāno anudayamāno {anuddayamāno (bahūsu)} anurakkhamāno anuggaṇhamāno anukampamānoti -- anusāsa brahme karuṇāyamāno.

[03] ^b^vivekadhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijañña^eb^nti vivekadhammaṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ. yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ. ^b^yamahaṃ vijañña^eb^nti yamahaṃ jāneyyaṃ ājāneyyaṃ vijāneyyaṃ paṭivijāneyyaṃ paṭivijjheyyaṃ adhigaccheyyaṃ phasseyyaṃ sacchikareyyanti -- vivekadhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ.

[03] ^b^yathāhaṃ ākāsova abyāpajjamāno^eb^ti yathā ākāso na pajjati na gaṇhati {natthi... syā0 ... potthake} na bajjhati na palibajjhati, evaṃ apajjamāno agaṇhamāno abajjhamāno apalibajjhamānoti -- evampi ākāsova abyāpajjamāno. yathā ākāso na rajjati lākhāya vā haliddiyā {haliddena (syā0)} vā nīliyā {nīlena (syā0)} vā mañjeṭṭhāya vā evaṃ arajjamāno adussamāno amuyhamāno akilissamānoti {akiliyamāno (syā0)} -- evampi ākāsova abyāpajjamāno. yathā ākāso na ^a^M0.0097^ea^ kuppati na byāpajjati na patilīyati {patiṭṭhiyati (ka0)} na paṭihaññati, evaṃ akuppamāno abyāpajjamāno appatilīyamāno appaṭihaññamāno ^a^T0.0119^ea^ appaṭihatamānoti -- evampi ākāsova abyāpajjamāno.

[03] ^b^idheva santo asito careyya^eb^nti. ^b^idheva santo^eb^ti idheva santo idheva samāno idheva nisinno samāno imasmiṃyeva āsane nisinno samāno imissāyeva parisāya nisinno samānoti, evampi -- idheva santo. atha vā, idheva santo upasanto vūpasanto nibbuto paṭippassaddhoti, evampi -- idheva santo. ^b^asito^eb^ti dve nissayā -- taṇhānissayo ca diṭṭhinissayo ca...pe0... ayaṃ taṇhānissayo...pe0... ayaṃ diṭṭhinissayo... taṇhānissayaṃ pahāya diṭṭhinissayaṃ paṭinissajjitvā cakkhuṃ anissito, sotaṃ anissito, ghānaṃ anissito, jivhaṃ anissito, kāyaṃ anissito, manaṃ anissito, rūpe... sadde... gandhe ^a^V0.0087^ea^... rase... phoṭṭhabbe... dhamme... kulaṃ... gaṇaṃ... āvāsaṃ... lābhaṃ... yasaṃ... pasaṃsaṃ... sukhaṃ... cīvaraṃ... piṇḍapātaṃ... senāsanaṃ... gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ... kāmadhātuṃ... rūpadhātuṃ... arūpadhātuṃ... kāmabhavaṃ... rūpabhavaṃ... arūpabhavaṃ... saññābhavaṃ... asaññābhavaṃ... nevasaññānāsaññābhavaṃ... ekavokārabhavaṃ... catuvokārabhavaṃ... pañcavokārabhavaṃ... atītaṃ... anāgataṃ... paccuppannaṃ... diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbe {diṭṭhaṃ, sutaṃ, mutaṃ, viññātaṃ, sabbe. mahāni0 46 passitabbaṃ} dhamme asito anissito anallīno anupagato anajjhosito anadhimutto nikkhanto nissaṭo {nissaṭṭho (syā0)} vippamutto visaṃyutto vimariyādikatena cetasā. ^b^careyya^eb^nti careyyaṃ vihareyyaṃ iriyeyyaṃ vatteyyaṃ yapeyyaṃ yāpeyyanti -- idheva santo asito careyyaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``anusāsa ^a^T0.0120^ea^ brahme karuṇāyamāno, vivekadhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ.
[22] yathāhaṃ ākāsova abyāpajjamāno, idheva santo asito careyya''nti..
[21] ^b^kittayissāmi te santiṃ, [dhotakāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^diṭṭhe dhamme anītihaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^yaṃ viditvā sato caraṃ, tare loke visattikaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^kittayissāmi^eb^ ^a^M0.0098^ea^ ^b^te santi^eb^nti rāgassa santiṃ, dosassa santiṃ, mohassa santiṃ, kodhassa santiṃ, upanāhassa...pe0... makkhassa... paḷāsassa... issāya... macchariyassa... māyāya... sāṭheyyassa... thambhassa... sārambhassa... mānassa... atimānassa... madassa... pamādassa... sabbakilesānaṃ... sabbaduccaritānaṃ... sabbadarathānaṃ... sabbapariḷāhānaṃ... sabbasantāpānaṃ... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṃ santiṃ upasantiṃ vūpasantiṃ nibbutiṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ kittayissāmi pakittayissāmi ācikkhissāmi desessāmi paññapessāmi paṭṭhapessāmi vivarissāmi vibhajissāmi uttānīkarissāmi pakāsissāmīti -- kittayissāmi te santiṃ.
[03] ^b^dhotakāti bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^dhotakā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- dhotakāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^diṭṭhe dhamme anītiha^eb^nti. ^b^diṭṭhe dhamme^eb^ti diṭṭhe dhamme ^a^T0.0121^ea^ ñāte dhamme tulite dhamme tīrite dhamme vibhūte dhamme vibhāvite dhamme sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti...pe0... yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti diṭṭhe dhamme ñāte dhamme tulite dhamme tīrite dhamme vibhāvite dhamme vibhūte ^a^V0.0088^ea^ dhammeti, evampi -- diṭṭhe dhamme...pe0.... atha vā, dukkhe diṭṭhe dukkhaṃ kathayissāmi, samudaye diṭṭhe samudayaṃ kathayissāmi, magge diṭṭhe maggaṃ kathayissāmi, nirodhe diṭṭhe nirodhaṃ kathayissāmīti, evampi -- diṭṭhe dhamme...pe0.... atha vā, sandiṭṭhikaṃ akālikaṃ ehipassikaṃ opaneyyikaṃ {opanayikaṃ (syā0 ka0)} paccattaṃ veditabbaṃ viññūhīti, evampi -- diṭṭhe dhamme. ^b^anītiha^eb^nti na itihītihaṃ na itikirāya na paramparāya na piṭakasampadāya na takkahetu na nayahetu na ākāraparivitakkena na diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā sāmaṃ sayamabhiññātaṃ attapaccakkhadhammaṃ, taṃ kathayissāmīti -- diṭṭhe dhamme anītihaṃ.

[03] ^b^yaṃ viditvā sato cara^eb^nti yaṃ viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā; ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā; ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti...pe0... ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti...pe0... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā ^a^M0.0099^ea^. ^b^sato^eb^ti catūhi kāraṇehi sato -- kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato...pe0... so vuccati sato. ^b^cara^eb^nti caranto viharanto iriyanto vattento pālento yapento yāpentoti -- yaṃ viditvā sato caraṃ ^a^T0.0122^ea^.

[03] ^b^tare loke visattika^eb^nti visattikā vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. ^b^visattikā^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena visattikā...pe0... visaṭā vitthatāti visattikā. ^b^loke^eb^ti apāyaloke...pe0... āyatanaloke. ^b^tare loke visattika^eb^nti loke vesā visattikā, loke vetaṃ visattikaṃ sato tareyya uttareyya patareyya samatikkameyya vītivatteyyāti -- tare loke visattikaṃ. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``kittayissāmi te santiṃ, [dhotakāti bhagavā]
[27] diṭṭhe dhamme anītihaṃ.
[22] yaṃ viditvā sato caraṃ, tare loke visattika''nti..
[21] ^b^tañcāhaṃ abhinandāmi, mahesi santimuttamaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^yaṃ viditvā sato caraṃ, tare loke visattikaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^tañcāhaṃ abhinandāmī^eb^ti. ^b^ta^eb^nti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ byappathaṃ desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ nandāmi ^a^V0.0089^ea^ abhinandāmi modāmi anumodāmi icchāmi sādiyāmi patthayāmi pihayāmi abhijappāmīti -- tañcāhaṃ abhinandāmi.

[01] ^b^mahesisantimuttama^eb^nti. ^b^mahesī^eb^ti kiṃ mahesi bhagavā? mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahantaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ...pe0... kahaṃ narāsabhoti mahesi. ^b^santimuttama^eb^nti santi vuccati ^a^T0.0123^ea^ amataṃ nibbānaṃ. yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ. ^b^uttama^eb^nti aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ viseṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaranti -- mahesi santimuttamaṃ.

[03] ^b^yaṃ viditvā sato cara^eb^nti yaṃ viditaṃ katvā...pe0... ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā; ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti... ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti...pe0... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā ^a^M0.0100^ea^ vibhūtaṃ katvā. ^b^sato^eb^ti catūhi kāraṇehi sato -- kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato...pe0... so vuccati sato. ^b^cara^eb^nti caranto...pe0... yāpentoti -- yaṃ viditvā sato caraṃ.

[03] ^b^tare loke visattika^eb^nti. visattikā vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. ^b^visattikā^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena visattikā...pe0... visaṭā vitthatāti visattikā. ^b^loke^eb^ti apāyaloke...pe0... āyatanaloke. ^b^tare loke visattika^eb^nti loke vesā visattikā, loke vetaṃ visattikaṃ sato tareyyaṃ uttareyyaṃ...pe0... vītivatteyyanti -- tare loke visattikaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``tañcāhaṃ abhinandāmi, mahesi santimuttamaṃ.
[22] yaṃ ^a^T0.0124^ea^ viditvā sato caraṃ, tare loke visattika''nti..
[21] ^b^yaṃ kiñci sampajānāsi, [dhotakāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjhe.^eb^
[22] ^b^etaṃ viditvā saṅgoti loke, bhavābhavāya mākāsi taṇhaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^yaṃ kiñci sampajānāsī^eb^ti yaṃ kiñci sampajānāsi ājānāsi paṭivijānāsi paṭivijjhasīti -- yaṃ kiñci sampajānāsi. ^b^dhotakāti bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^dhotakā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ^a^V0.0090^ea^ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- dhotakāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti. ^b^uddha^eb^nti anāgataṃ; ^b^adho^eb^ti atītaṃ; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti paccuppannaṃ. ^b^uddha^eb^nti devaloko; ^b^adho^eb^ti apāyaloko; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti manussaloko. atha vā, ^b^uddha^eb^nti kusalā dhammā; ^b^adho^eb^ti akusalā dhammā; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti abyākatā dhammā. ^b^uddha^eb^nti arūpadhātu; ^b^adho^eb^ti kāmadhātu; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti rūpadhātu. ^b^uddha^eb^nti sukhā vedanā; ^b^adho^eb^ti ^a^M0.0101^ea^ dukkhā vedanā; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti adukkhamasukhā vedanā. ^b^uddha^eb^nti uddhaṃ pādatalā; ^b^adho^eb^ti adho kesamatthakā; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti vemajjheti -- uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjhe.

[03] ^b^etaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0125^ea^ ^b^viditvā saṅgoti loke^eb^ti saṅgo eso lagganaṃ etaṃ bandhanaṃ etaṃ palibodho esoti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti -- etaṃ viditvā saṅgoti loke.

[03] ^b^bhavābhavāya mākāsi taṇha^eb^nti. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā...pe0... dhammataṇhā. ^b^bhavābhavāyā^eb^ti bhavābhavāya kammabhavāya punabbhavāya kāmabhavāya, kammabhavāya kāmabhavāya punabbhavāya rūpabhavāya, kammabhavāya rūpabhavāya punabbhavāya arūpabhavāya, kammabhavāya arūpabhavāya punabbhavāya punappunabbhavāya, punappunagatiyā punappunaupapattiyā punappunapaṭisandhiyā punappunāttabhāvābhinibbattiyā taṇhaṃ mākāsi mā janesi mā sañjanesi mā nibbattesi mābhinibbattesi, pajaha vinodehi byantīkarohi anabhāvaṃ gamehīti -- bhavābhavāya mākāsi taṇhanti. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``yaṃ kiñci sampajānāsi, [dhotakāti bhagavā]
[27] uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjhe.
[22] etaṃ viditvā saṅgoti loke, bhavābhavāya mākāsi taṇha''nti..
[03] saha gāthāpariyosānā...pe0... satthā me, bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmīti.
[06] dhotakamāṇavapucchāniddeso pañcamo.
[21] ^b^eko^eb^ ^a^T0.0126^ea^ ^a^V0.0091^ea^ ^b^ahaṃ sakka mahantamoghaṃ, [iccāyasmā upasīvo]^eb^
[27] ^b^anissito no visahāmi tārituṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^ārammaṇaṃ^eb^ {āramaṇaṃ (ka0)} ^b^brūhi samantacakkhu, yaṃ nissito oghamimaṃ tareyyaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^eko^eb^ ^a^M0.0102^ea^ ^b^ahaṃ sakka mahantamogha^eb^nti. ^b^eko^eb^ti puggalo vā me dutiyo natthi, dhammo vā me dutiyo natthi, yaṃ vā puggalaṃ nissāya dhammaṃ vā nissāya mahantaṃ kāmoghaṃ bhavoghaṃ diṭṭhoghaṃ avijjoghaṃ tareyyaṃ uttareyyaṃ patareyyaṃ samatikkameyyaṃ vītivatteyyanti. ^b^sakkā^eb^ti sakko. bhagavā sakyakulā pabbajitotipi sakko. atha vā, aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko. tassimāni dhanāni, seyyathidaṃ -- saddhādhanaṃ sīladhanaṃ hiridhanaṃ ottappadhanaṃ sutadhanaṃ cāgadhanaṃ paññādhanaṃ satipaṭṭhānadhanaṃ...pe0... nibbānadhanaṃ. imehi anekehi dhanaratanehi aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko. atha vā, sakko pahu visavī alamatto sūro vīro vikkanto abhīrū achambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṃsotipi sakkoti -- eko ahaṃ sakka mahantamoghaṃ.
[03] ^b^iccāyasmā upasīvo^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0.... ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ...pe0.... ^b^upasīvo^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ...pe0... abhilāpoti -- iccāyasmā upasīvo.

[03] ^b^anissito^eb^ ^a^T0.0127^ea^ ^b^no visahāmi tāritu^eb^nti. ^b^anissito^eb^ti puggalaṃ vā anissito dhammaṃ vā anissito no visahāmi na ussahāmi na sakkomi na paṭibalo mahantaṃ kāmoghaṃ bhavoghaṃ diṭṭhoghaṃ avijjoghaṃ tarituṃ uttarituṃ patarituṃ samatikkamituṃ vītivattitunti -- anissito no visahāmi tārituṃ.

[03] ^b^ārammaṇaṃ brūhi samantacakkhū^eb^ti ārammaṇaṃ ālambaṇaṃ nissayaṃ upanissayaṃ brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehi. ^b^samantacakkhū^eb^ti samantacakkhu vuccati sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. bhagavā tena sabbaññutañāṇena upeto samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato.
[27] na ^a^V0.0092^ea^ tassa adiṭṭhamidhatthi kiñci, atho aviññātamajānitabbaṃ.
[22] sabbaṃ abhiññāsi yadatthi neyyaṃ, tathāgato tena samantacakkhūti..
[03] ārammaṇaṃ brūhi samantacakkhu.

[03] ^b^yaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0103^ea^ ^b^nissito oghamimaṃ tareyya^eb^nti. ^b^yaṃ nissito^eb^ti yaṃ puggalaṃ vā nissito dhammaṃ vā nissito mahantaṃ kāmoghaṃ bhavoghaṃ diṭṭhoghaṃ avijjoghaṃ tareyyaṃ uttareyyaṃ patareyyaṃ samatikkameyyaṃ vītivatteyyanti -- yaṃ nissito oghamimaṃ tareyyaṃ ^a^T0.0128^ea^. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``eko ahaṃ sakka mahantamoghaṃ, [iccāyasmā upasīvo]
[27] anissito no visahāmi tārituṃ.
[22] ārammaṇaṃ brūhi samantacakkhu, yaṃ nissito oghamimaṃ tareyya''nti..
[21] ^b^ākiñcaññaṃ pekkhamāno satimā, [upasīvāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^natthīti nissāya tarassu oghaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^kāme pahāya virato kathāhi, taṇhakkhayaṃ nattamahābhipassa^eb^ {rattamahābhipassa (syā0) passa abhidhānaganthe abyayavagge} ^b^..^eb^

[03] ^b^ākiñcaññaṃ pekkhamāno satimā^eb^ti so brāhmaṇo pakatiyā ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ lābhīyeva nissayaṃ na jānāti -- ``ayaṃ me nissayo''ti. tassa bhagavā nissayañca ācikkhati uttariñca niyyānapathaṃ. ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ sato samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā tattha jāte cittacetasike dhamme aniccato pekkhamāno, dukkhato...pe0... rogato... gaṇḍato... sallato... aghato... ābādhato... parato... palokato... ītito... upaddavato... bhayato... upasaggato... calato... pabhaṅguto... addhuvato... atāṇato... aleṇato... asaraṇato... asaraṇībhūtato... rittato... tucchato... suññato... anattato... ādīnavato... vipariṇāmadhammato... asārakato... aghamūlato... bhavato... vibhavato... sāsavato... saṅkhatato... mārāmisato... jātidhammato... jarādhammato... byādhidhammato... maraṇadhammato... sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadhammato ^a^T0.0129^ea^... samudayadhammato... atthaṅgamato... assādato... ādīnavato... nissaraṇato pekkhamāno dakkhamāno olokayamāno nijjhāyamāno upaparikkhamāno.

[03] ^b^satimā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0093^ea^ ^a^M0.0104^ea^ yā sati anussati paṭissati...pe0... sammāsati -- ayaṃ vuccati sati. imāya satiyā upeto hoti...pe0... samannāgato, so vuccati satimāti -- ākiñcaññaṃ pekkhamāno satimā.
[03] ^b^upasīvāti bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^upasīvā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- upasīvāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^natthīti nissāya tarassu ogha^eb^nti natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti. kiṃkāraṇā natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti? viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ sato samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā taññeva viññāṇaṃ abhāveti, vibhāveti, antaradhāpeti, natthi kiñcīti passati. taṃkāraṇā natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ nissāya upanissāya ālambaṇaṃ karitvā kāmoghaṃ bhavoghaṃ diṭṭhoghaṃ avijjoghaṃ tarassu uttarassu patarassu samatikkamassu vītivattassūti -- natthīti nissāya tarassu oghaṃ.

[03] ^b^kāme pahāya virato kathāhī^eb^ti. ^b^kāmā^eb^ti uddānato dve kāmā -- vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca...pe0... ime vuccanti vatthukāmā ^a^T0.0130^ea^ ...pe0... ime vuccanti kilesakāmā. ^b^kāme pahāyā^eb^ti vatthukāme parijānitvā kilesakāme pahāya pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti -- kāme pahāya. ^b^virato kathāhī^eb^ti kathaṃkathā vuccati vicikicchā. dukkhe kaṅkhā...pe0... chambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho kathaṃkathāya ārato virato paṭivirato nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti -- evampi virato kathāhi...pe0... atha vā, dvattiṃsāya tiracchānakathāya ārato virato paṭivirato nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti evampi virato kathāhīti -- kāme pahāya virato kathāhi.

[03] ^b^taṇhakkhayaṃ nattamahābhipassā^eb^ti. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti rūpataṇhā...pe0... dhammataṇhā. ^b^nattaṃ^eb^ vuccati ratti. ^b^aho^eb^ti divaso. rattiñca divā ca taṇhakkhayaṃ rāgakkhayaṃ dosakkhayaṃ mohakkhayaṃ gatikkhayaṃ upapattikkhayaṃ paṭisandhikkhayaṃ bhavakkhayaṃ saṃsārakkhayaṃ ^a^M0.0105^ea^ vaṭṭakkhayaṃ passa abhipassa dakkha olokaya nijjhāya upaparikkhāti -- taṇhakkhayaṃ nattamahābhipassa. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``ākiñcaññaṃ ^a^V0.0094^ea^ pekkhamāno satimā, [upasīvāti bhagavā]
[27] natthīti nissāya tarassu oghaṃ.
[22] kāme pahāya virato kathāhi, taṇhakkhayaṃ ^a^T0.0131^ea^ nattamahābhipassā''ti..
[21] ^b^sabbesu kāmesu yo vītarāgo, [iccāyasmā upasīvo]^eb^
[27] ^b^ākiñcaññaṃ nissito hitvā maññaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^saññāvimokkhe paramedhimutto, tiṭṭhe nu so tattha anānuyāyī..^eb^

[03] ^b^sabbesu kāmesu yo vītarāgo^eb^ti. ^b^sabbesū^eb^ti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ sabbesūti. ^b^kāmesū^eb^ti ^b^kāmā^eb^ti uddānato dve kāmā -- vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca...pe0... ime vuccanti vatthukāmā...pe0... ime vuccanti kilesakāmā. sabbesu kāmesu yo vītarāgoti. sabbesu kāmesu yo vītarāgo vigatarāgo cattarāgo vantarāgo muttarāgo pahīnarāgo paṭinissaṭṭharāgo vikkhambhanatoti -- sabbesu kāmesu yo vītarāgo.
[03] ^b^iccāyasmā upasīvo^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0.... ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ...pe0.... ^b^upasīvo^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ...pe0... abhilāpoti -- iccāyasmā upasīvo.

[03] ^b^ākiñcaññaṃ nissito hitvā mañña^eb^nti. heṭṭhimā cha samāpattiyo hitvā cajitvā pariccajitvā atikkamitvā samatikkamitvā vītivattitvā ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ nissito allīno upagato samupagato ajjhosito adhimuttoti -- ākiñcaññaṃ nissito ^a^T0.0132^ea^ hitvā maññaṃ.

[03] ^b^saññāvimokkhe paramedhimutto^eb^ti saññāvimokkhā vuccanti satta saññāsamāpattiyo. tāsaṃ saññāsamāpattīnaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattivimokkho {vimokkhā (ka0) evamaññesu padesu bahuvacanena} aggo ca seṭṭho ca viseṭṭho ca pāmokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca, parame agge seṭṭhe viseṭṭhe pāmokkhe uttame pavare ^a^M0.0106^ea^ adhimuttivimokkhena adhimutto tatrādhimutto tadadhimutto taccarito tabbahulo taggaruko tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro tadadhimutto tadadhipateyyoti -- saññāvimokkhe paramedhimutto.

[03] ^b^tiṭṭhe nu so tattha anānuyāyī^eb^ti. ^b^tiṭṭhe nū^eb^ti saṃsayapucchā vimatipucchā dveḷhakapucchā anekaṃsapucchā ^a^V0.0095^ea^, ``evaṃ nu kho, nanu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho''ti -- tiṭṭhe nu. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti ākiñcaññāyatane. ^b^anānuyāyī^eb^ti anānuyāyī aviccamāno {avedhamāno (syā0)} avigacchamāno anantaradhāyamāno aparihāyamāno...pe0.... atha vā, arajjamāno adussamāno amuyhamāno akilissamānoti -- tiṭṭhe nu so tattha anānuyāyī. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[27] ``sabbesu kāmesu yo vītarāgo, [iccāyasmā upasīvo]
[21] ākiñcaññaṃ nissito hitvā maññaṃ.
[22] saññāvimokkhe paramedhimutto, tiṭṭhe nu so tattha anānuyāyī''ti..
[21] ^b^sabbesu^eb^ ^a^T0.0133^ea^ ^b^kāmesu yo vītarāgo, [upasīvāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^ākiñcaññaṃ nissito hitvā maññaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^saññāvimokkhe paramedhimutto, tiṭṭheyya so tattha anānuyāyī..^eb^

[03] ^b^sabbesu kāmesu yo vītarāgo^eb^ti. ^b^sabbesū^eb^ti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ sabbesūti. ^b^kāmesū^eb^ti ^b^kāmā^eb^ti uddānato dve kāmā -- vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca...pe0... ime vuccanti vatthukāmā...pe0... ime vuccanti kilesakāmā. ^b^sabbesu kāmesu yo vītarāgo^eb^ti sabbesu kāmesu yo vītarāgo...pe0... paṭinissaṭṭharāgo vikkhambhanatoti -- sabbesu kāmesu yo vītarāgo.
[03] ^b^upasīvāti bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^upasīvā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- upasīvāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^ākiñcaññaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0107^ea^ ^b^nissito hitvā mañña^eb^nti. heṭṭhimā cha samāpattiyo hitvā cajitvā pariccajitvā atikkamitvā samatikkamitvā vītivattitvā ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ nissito allīno upagato samupagato ajjhosito adhimuttoti -- ākiñcaññaṃ nissito hitvā maññaṃ.

[03] ^b^saññāvimokkhe paramedhimutto^eb^ti saññāvimokkhā vuccanti satta ^a^T0.0134^ea^ saññāsamāpattiyo. tāsaṃ saññāsamāpattīnaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattivimokkho aggo ca seṭṭho ca viseṭṭho ca pāmokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca, parame agge seṭṭhe viseṭṭhe pāmokkhe uttame pavare adhimuttivimokkhena ^a^V0.0096^ea^ adhimutto tatrādhimutto tadadhimutto...pe0... tadadhipateyyoti -- saññāvimokkhe paramedhimutto.

[03] ^b^tiṭṭheyya so tattha anānuyāyī^eb^ti. ^b^tiṭṭheyyā^eb^ti tiṭṭheyya saṭṭhikappasahassāni. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti ākiñcaññāyatane. ^b^anānuyāyī^eb^ti anānuyāyī aviccamāno avigacchamāno anantaradhāyamāno aparihāyamāno. atha vā, arajjamāno adussamāno amuyhamāno akilissamānoti -- tiṭṭheyya so tattha anānuyāyī. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``sabbesu kāmesu yo vītarāgo, [upasīvāti bhagavā]
[27] ākiñcaññaṃ nissito hitvā maññaṃ.
[22] saññāvimokkhe paramedhimutto, tiṭṭheyya so tattha anānuyāyī''ti..
[21] ^b^tiṭṭhe ce so tattha anānuyāyī, pūgampi vassāni^eb^ {vassānaṃ (syā0 ka0)} ^b^samantacakkhu.^eb^
[22] ^b^tattheva so sītisiyā vimutto, cavetha^eb^ ^a^T0.0135^ea^ ^b^viññāṇaṃ tathāvidhassa..^eb^

[03] ^b^tiṭṭhe ce so tattha anānuyāyī^eb^ti sace so tiṭṭheyya saṭṭhikappasahassāni. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti ākiñcaññāyatane. ^b^anānuyāyī^eb^ti anānuyāyī aviccamāno avigacchamāno anantaradhāyamāno aparihāyamāno. atha vā, arajjamāno adussamāno amuyhamāno akilissamānoti -- tiṭṭhe ce so tattha anānuyāyī.

[03] ^b^pūgampi^eb^ ^a^M0.0108^ea^ ^b^vassāni samantacakkhū^eb^ti. ^b^pūgampi vassānī^eb^ti pūgampi vassāni bahūni vassāni {bahunnaṃ vassānaṃ (syā0)} bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni bahūni kappāni bahūni kappasatāni bahūni kappasahassāni bahūni kappasatasahassāni. ^b^samantacakkhū^eb^ti samantacakkhu vuccati sabbaññutañāṇaṃ...pe0... tathāgato tena samantacakkhūti -- pūgampi vassāni samantacakkhu.

[03] ^b^tattheva so sītisiyā vimutto, cavetha viññāṇaṃ tathāvidhassā^eb^ti tattheva so sītibhāvamanuppatto nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tatheva tiṭṭheyya. atha vā, tassa viññāṇaṃ caveyya ucchijjeyya nasseyya vinasseyya na bhaveyyāti punabbhavapaṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ nibbatteyya kāmadhātuyā vā rūpadhātuyā vā arūpadhātuyā vāti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ ^a^V0.0097^ea^ samāpannassa sassatañca ucchedañca pucchati. udāhu tattheva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyeyya ^a^T0.0136^ea^. atha vā, tassa viññāṇaṃ caveyya puna paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ nibbatteyya kāmadhātuyā vā rūpadhātuyā vā arūpadhātuyā vāti, ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upapannassa parinibbānañca paṭisandhiñca pucchati. ^b^tathāvidhassā^eb^ti tathāvidhassa tādisassa tassaṇṭhitassa tappakārassa tappaṭibhāgassa ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upapannassāti -- tattheva so sītisiyā vimutto, cavetha viññāṇaṃ tathāvidhassa. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``tiṭṭhe ce so tattha anānuyāyī, pūgampi vassāni samantacakkhu.
[22] tattheva so sītisiyā vimutto, cavetha viññāṇaṃ tathāvidhassā''ti..
[21] ^b^acci yathā vātavegena khittā, [upasīvāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^atthaṃ paleti na upeti saṅkhaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^evaṃ munī nāmakāyā vimutto, atthaṃ paleti na upeti saṅkhaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^acci yathā vātavegena khittā^eb^ti acci vuccati jālasikhā. ^b^vātā^eb^ti puratthimā vātā pacchimā vātā uttarā vātā dakkhiṇā vātā sarajā vātā arajā vātā sītā vātā uṇhā vātā parittā vātā adhimattā ^a^M0.0109^ea^ vātā {kāḷavātā (ka0)} verambhavātā pakkhavātā supaṇṇavātā tālapaṇṇavātā vidhūpanavātā. ^b^vātavegena khittā^eb^ti vātavegena khittā ^a^T0.0137^ea^ {khittaṃ (syā0) evamaññesu padesu niggahītantavasena} ukkhittā nunnā paṇunnā khambhitā vikkhambhitāti -- acci yathā vātavegena khittā. ^b^upasīvāti bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^upasīvā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- upasīvāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^atthaṃ paleti na upeti saṅkha^eb^nti. ^b^atthaṃ paletī^eb^ti atthaṃ paleti, atthaṃ gameti, atthaṃ gacchati nirujjhati vūpasamati paṭippassambhati. ^b^na upeti saṅkha^eb^nti saṅkhaṃ {amukaṃ nāma disaṃ gatoti saṅkhaṃ (syā0)} na upeti, uddesaṃ na upeti, gaṇanaṃ na upeti, paṇṇattiṃ na upeti, ``puratthimaṃ vā disaṃ gatā, pacchimaṃ vā disaṃ gatā, uttaraṃ vā disaṃ gatā, dakkhiṇaṃ vā disaṃ gatā uddhaṃ vā gatā, adho vā gatā, tiriyaṃ vā gatā, vidisaṃ vā gatā''ti, so hetu natthi, paccayo natthi, kāraṇaṃ natthi, yena saṅkhaṃ gaccheyyāti -- atthaṃ paleti na upeti saṅkhaṃ.

[03] ^b^evaṃ munī nāmakāyā vimutto^eb^ti. ^b^eva^eb^nti opammasampaṭipādanaṃ. ^b^munī^eb^ti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ ^a^V0.0098^ea^ ...pe0... saṅgajālamaticca so muni. ^b^nāmakāyā vimutto^eb^ti so muni pakatiyā pubbeva rūpakāyā vimutto. tadaṅgaṃ samatikkamā {tadaṅgaṃ samatikkamma (ka0)} vikkhambhanappahānena pahīno. tassa munino bhavantaṃ āgamma cattāro ariyamaggā paṭiladdhā honti. catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ paṭiladdhattā nāmakāyo ca rūpakāyo ca pariññātā honti. nāmakāyassa ca rūpakāyassa ca pariññātattā nāmakāyā ca rūpakāyā ca mutto vimutto suvimutto accantānupādāvimokkhenāti -- evaṃ munī nāmakāyā vimutto.

[03] ^b^atthaṃ paleti na upeti saṅkha^eb^nti. ^b^atthaṃ paletī^eb^ti anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati. ^b^na upeti saṅkha^eb^nti anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā ^a^T0.0138^ea^ parinibbuto saṅkhaṃ na upeti, uddesaṃ na upeti, gaṇanaṃ na upeti, paṇṇattiṃ na upeti -- khattiyoti vā brāhmaṇoti vā vessoti vā suddoti vā gahaṭṭhoti vā pabbajitoti vā devoti vā manussoti vā rūpīti vā arūpīti vā saññīti vā asaññīti vā nevasaññīnāsaññīti vā. so hetu natthi paccayo natthi kāraṇaṃ natthi ^a^M0.0110^ea^ yena saṅkhaṃ gaccheyyāti -- atthaṃ paleti na upeti saṅkhaṃ. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``acci yathā vātavegena khittā, [upasīvāti bhagavā]
[27] atthaṃ paleti na upeti saṅkhaṃ.
[22] evaṃ munī nāmakāyā vimutto, atthaṃ paleti na upeti saṅkha''nti..
[21] ^b^atthaṅgato so uda vā so natthi, udāhu ve sassatiyā arogo.^eb^
[22] ^b^taṃ me munī sādhu viyākarohi, tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo..^eb^
[03] ^b^atthaṅgato so uda vā so natthī^eb^ti so atthaṅgato udāhu natthi so niruddho ucchinno vinaṭṭhoti -- atthaṅgato so uda vā so natthi.
[03] ^b^udāhu ve sassatiyā arogo^eb^ti udāhu nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṃ tatheva tiṭṭheyyāti -- udāhu ve sassatiyā ^a^T0.0139^ea^ arogo.

[03] ^b^taṃ me munī sādhu viyākarohī^eb^ti. ^b^ta^eb^nti yaṃ pucchāmi yaṃ yācāmi yaṃ ajjhesāmi yaṃ pasādemi. ^b^munī^eb^ti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ...pe0... saṅgajālamaticca so muni. ^b^sādhu viyākarohī^eb^ti ^a^V0.0099^ea^ sādhu ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- taṃ me munī sādhu viyākarohi.
[03] ^b^tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo^eb^ti tathā hi te vidito tulito tīrito vibhūto vibhāvito esa dhammoti -- tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``atthaṅgato so uda vā so natthi, udāhu ve sassatiyā arogo.
[22] taṃ me munī sādhu viyākarohi, tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo''ti..
[21] ^b^atthaṅgatassa^eb^ ^a^M0.0111^ea^ ^b^na pamāṇamatthi, [upasīvāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^yena naṃ vajjuṃ taṃ tassa natthi.^eb^
[22] ^b^sabbesu dhammesu samūhatesu, samūhatā vādapathāpi sabbe..^eb^

[03] ^b^atthaṅgatassa na pamāṇamatthī^eb^ti atthaṅgatassa anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa rūpapamāṇaṃ natthi, vedanāpamāṇaṃ natthi, saññāpamāṇaṃ natthi, saṅkhārapamāṇaṃ natthi, viññāṇapamāṇaṃ ^a^T0.0140^ea^ natthi, na atthi na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati pahīnaṃ samucchinnaṃ vūpasantaṃ paṭippassaddhaṃ abhabbuppattikaṃ ñāṇagginā daḍḍhanti -- atthaṅgatassa na pamāṇamatthi. ^b^upasīvāti bhagavā^eb^ti ^b^upasīvā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- upasīvāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^yena naṃ vajjuṃ taṃ tassa natthī^eb^ti yena taṃ rāgena {yena rāgena (syā0 ka0) mahāni0 94} vadeyyuṃ, yena dosena vadeyyuṃ, yena mohena vadeyyuṃ, yena mānena vadeyyuṃ, yāya diṭṭhiyā vadeyyuṃ, yena uddhaccena vadeyyuṃ, yāya vicikicchāya vadeyyuṃ, yehi anusayehi vadeyyuṃ -- rattoti vā duṭṭhoti vā mūḷhoti vā vinibaddhoti vā parāmaṭṭhoti vā vikkhepagatoti vā aniṭṭhaṅgatoti {aniṭṭhāgatoti (ka0)} vā thāmagatoti vā, te abhisaṅkhārā pahīnā. abhisaṅkhārānaṃ pahīnattā gatiyā yena taṃ vadeyyuṃ -- nerayikoti vā tiracchānayonikoti vā pettivisayikoti vā manussoti vā devoti vā rūpīti vā arūpīti vā saññīti vā asaññīti vā nevasaññīnāsaññīti vā, so hetu natthi paccayo natthi kāraṇaṃ natthi yena vadeyyuṃ katheyyuṃ bhaṇeyyuṃ dīpeyyuṃ vohareyyunti -- yena naṃ vajjuṃ taṃ tassa natthi.

[03] ^b^sabbesu^eb^ ^a^V0.0100^ea^ ^b^dhammesu samūhatesū^eb^ti sabbesu dhammesu sabbesu khandhesu sabbesu āyatanesu sabbāsu dhātūsu sabbāsu gatīsu sabbāsu upapattīsu sabbāsu paṭisandhīsu sabbesu bhavesu sabbesu saṃsāresu sabbesu ^a^T0.0141^ea^ vaṭṭesu ūhatesu samūhatesu uddhatesu samuddhatesu uppāṭitesu samuppāṭitesu pahīnesu samucchinnesu vūpasantesu paṭippassaddhesu abhabbuppattikesu ñāṇagginā daḍḍhesūti -- sabbesu dhammesu samūhatesu.

[03] ^b^samūhatā^eb^ ^a^M0.0112^ea^ ^b^vādapathāpi sabbe^eb^ti vādapathā vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca. tassa vādā ca vādapathā ca adhivacanāni ca adhivacanapathā ca nirutti ca niruttipathā ca paññatti ca paññattipathā ca ūhatā samūhatā uddhatā samuddhatā uppāṭitā samuppāṭitā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti -- samūhatā vādapathāpi sabbe. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``atthaṅgatassa na pamāṇamatthi, [upasīvāti bhagavā]
[27] yena naṃ vajjuṃ taṃ tassa natthi.
[22] sabbesu dhammesu samūhatesu, samūhatā vādapathāpi sabbe''ti..
[03] saha gāthāpariyosānā ye te brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ...pe0... pañjaliko namassamāno nisinno hoti -- satthā me, bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmīti.
[06] upasīvamāṇavapucchāniddeso chaṭṭho.
[21] ^b^santi^eb^ ^a^T0.0142^ea^ ^b^loke munayo, [iccāyasmā nando]^eb^
[27] ^b^janā vadanti tayidaṃ kathaṃsu.^eb^
[22] ^b^ñāṇūpapannaṃ muni no vadanti, udāhu ve jīvitenūpapannaṃ^eb^ {jīvikenūpapannaṃ (syā0)} ^b^..^eb^

[03] ^b^santi loke munayo^eb^ti. ^b^santī^eb^ti santi saṃvijjanti atthi upalabbhanti. ^b^loke^eb^ti apāyaloke...pe0... āyatanaloke. ^b^munayo^eb^ti munināmakā ājīvakā nigaṇṭhā jaṭilā tāpasā ^a^V0.0101^ea^. (devā loke munayoti sañjānanti, na ca te munayo) {( ) etthantare pāṭho natthi syā0 potthake} ti. santi loke munayo. ^b^iccāyasmā nando^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0.... ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ...pe0.... ^b^nando^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ...pe0... abhilāpoti -- iccāyasmā nando.

[03] ^b^janā^eb^ ^a^M0.0113^ea^ ^b^vadanti tayidaṃ kathaṃsū^eb^ti. ^b^janā^eb^ti khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca vessā ca suddā ca gahaṭṭhā ca pabbajitā ca devā ca manussā ca. ^b^vadantī^eb^ti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharanti. ^b^tayidaṃ kathaṃsū^eb^ti saṃsayapucchā vimatipucchā dveḷhakapucchā anekaṃsapucchā ``evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho''ti -- janā vadanti tayidaṃ kathaṃsu.

[03] ^b^ñāṇūpapannaṃ muni no vadantī^eb^ti ^a^T0.0143^ea^. aṭṭha samāpattiñāṇena vā pañcābhiññāñāṇena vā upetaṃ samupetaṃ upāgataṃ samupāgataṃ upapannaṃ samupapannaṃ samannāgataṃ muniṃ vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharantīti -- ñāṇūpapannaṃ muni no vadanti.

[03] ^b^udāhu ve jīvitenūpapanna^eb^nti udāhu anekavividhātiparamadukkarakārikalūkhajīvitānuyogena upetaṃ samupetaṃ upāgataṃ samupāgataṃ upapannaṃ samupapannaṃ samannāgataṃ muniṃ vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharantīti -- udāhu ve jīvitenūpapannaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``santi loke munayo, [iccāyasmā nando]
[27] janā vadanti tayidaṃ kathaṃsu.
[22] ñāṇūpapannaṃ muni no vadanti, udāhu ve jīvitenūpapanna''nti..
[21] ^b^na diṭṭhiyā na sutiyā na ñāṇena,^eb^
[27] ^b^munīdha nanda kusalā vadanti.^eb^
[22] ^b^visenikatvā^eb^ {viseniṃkatvā (ka0) mahāni0 68} ^b^anīghā nirāsā, caranti ye te munayoti brūmi..^eb^

[03] ^b^na diṭṭhiyā na sutiyā na ñāṇenā^eb^ti. ^b^na diṭṭhiyā^eb^ti na diṭṭhasuddhiyā. ^b^na sutiyā^eb^ti na sutasuddhiyā. ^b^na ñāṇenā^eb^ti napi aṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇena napi pañcābhiññāñāṇena napi micchāñāṇenāti -- na diṭṭhiyā na sutiyā na ñāṇena.

[03] ^b^munīdha nanda kusalā vadantī^eb^ti. ^b^kusalā^eb^ti ye te khandhakusalā ^a^T0.0144^ea^ dhātukusalā āyatanakusalā ^a^V0.0102^ea^ paṭiccasamuppādakusalā satipaṭṭhānakusalā sammappadhānakusalā iddhipādakusalā indriyakusalā balakusalā bojjhaṅgakusalā ^a^M0.0114^ea^ maggakusalā phalakusalā nibbānakusalā diṭṭhasuddhiyā vā sutasuddhiyā vā aṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇena vā pañcābhiññāñāṇena vā micchāñāṇena vā diṭṭhena vā sutena vā upetaṃ samupetaṃ upāgataṃ samupāgataṃ upapannaṃ samupapannaṃ samannāgataṃ muniṃ na vadanti na kathenti na bhaṇanti na dīpayanti na voharantīti -- munīdha nanda kusalā vadanti.

[03] ^b^visenikatvā anīghā nirāsā, caranti ye te munayoti brūmī^eb^ti senā vuccati mārasenā, kāyaduccaritaṃ mārasenā, vacīduccaritaṃ mārasenā, manoduccaritaṃ mārasenā, rāgo mārasenā, doso mārasenā, moho mārasenā, kodho...pe0... upanāho... makkho... paḷāso... issā... macchariyaṃ... māyā... sāṭheyyaṃ... thambho... sārambho... māno... atimāno... mado... pamādo... sabbe kilesā sabbe duccaritā sabbe darathā sabbe pariḷāhā sabbe santāpā sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā mārasenā. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --
[21] ``kāmā te paṭhamā senā, dutiyā arati vuccati.
[22] tatiyā khuppipāsā te, catutthī taṇhā pavuccati..
[21] ``pañcamaṃ thinamiddhaṃ te, chaṭṭhā bhīrū pavuccati.
[27] sattamī vicikicchā te, makkho thambho te aṭṭhamo.
[22] lābho siloko sakkāro, micchāladdho ca yo yaso..
[21] ``yo ^a^T0.0145^ea^ cattānaṃ samukkaṃse, pare ca avajānāti.
[27] esā namuci te senā {esā te namuci senā (syā0 ka0) su0 ni0 441}, kaṇhassābhippahārinī.
[22] na naṃ asūro jināti, jetvā ca labhate sukha''nti..

[03] yato catūhi ariyamaggehi sabbā ca mārasenā sabbe ca paṭisenikarā {viseniṃkatvā (ka0) mahāni0 68} kilesā jitā ca parājitā ca bhaggā vippaluggā {vippaluggatā (syā0) passa mahāni0 28} parammukhā, tena vuccanti visenikatvā. ^b^anīghā^eb^ti rāgo nīgho, doso nīgho, moho nīgho, kodho nīgho, upanāho nīgho...pe0... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā nīghā. yesaṃ ete nīghā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā te vuccanti anīghā. ^b^nirāsā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0115^ea^ āsā vuccati taṇhā. yo ^a^V0.0103^ea^ rāgo sārāgo...pe0... avijjā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. yesaṃ esā āsā taṇhā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā, te vuccanti nirāsā arahanto khīṇāsavā. ^b^visenikatvā anīghā nirāsā, caranti ye te munayoti brūmī^eb^ti ye te visenikatvāva anīghā ca nirāsā ca caranti viharanti iriyanti vattenti pālenti yapenti yāpenti, te loke munayoti brūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti -- visenikatvā anīghā nirāsā, caranti ye te munayoti brūmi. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``na diṭṭhiyā na sutiyā na ñāṇena, munīdha ^a^T0.0146^ea^ nanda kusalā vadanti.
[22] visenikatvā anīghā nirāsā, caranti ye te munayoti brūmī''ti..
[21] ^b^ye kecime samaṇabrāhmaṇāse, [iccāyasmā nando]^eb^
[27] ^b^diṭṭhassutenāpi vadanti suddhiṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^sīlabbatenāpi vadanti suddhiṃ, anekarūpena vadanti suddhiṃ..^eb^
[21] ^b^kaccissu te bhagavā tattha yatā carantā, atāru jātiñca jarañca mārisa.^eb^
[22] ^b^pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^ye kecime samaṇabrāhmaṇāse^eb^ti. ^b^ye kecī^eb^ti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ -- ye kecīti. ^b^samaṇā^eb^ti ye keci ito bahiddhā pabbajjūpagatā paribbājakasamāpannā. ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^ti ye keci bhovādikāti -- ye kecime samaṇabrāhmaṇāse. ^b^iccāyasmā nando^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0.... ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ...pe0.... ^b^nando^eb^ti. tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ...pe0... abhilāpoti -- iccāyasmā nando.

[03] ^b^anekarūpena vadanti suddhi^eb^nti anekavidhakotūhalamaṅgalena {anekavidhavatta kutūhalamaṅgalena (syā0)} suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharantīti -- anekarūpena vadanti suddhiṃ.

[03] ^b^kaccisu te bhagavā tattha yatā carantā^eb^ti. ^b^kaccissū^eb^ti saṃsayapucchā vimatipucchā dveḷhakapucchā anekaṃsapucchā, ``evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho, kiṃ nu kho, kathaṃ nu kho''ti -- kaccissu. ^b^te^eb^ti diṭṭhigatikā. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- kaccissu te bhagavā. ^b^tattha yatā carantā^eb^ti. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti sakāya diṭṭhiyā sakāya khantiyā sakāya ruciyā sakāya laddhiyā. ^b^yatā^eb^ti yattā paṭiyattā {yatā paṭiyatā (syā0)} guttā gopitā rakkhitā saṃvutā. ^b^carantā^eb^ti ^a^T0.0148^ea^ carantā viharantā iriyantā vattentā pālentā yapentā yāpentāti -- kaccissu te bhagavā tattha yatā carantā.

[03] ^b^atāru jātiñca jarañca mārisā^eb^ti jātijarāmaraṇaṃ atariṃsu uttariṃsu patariṃsu samatikkamiṃsu vītivattiṃsu. ^b^mārisā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ garuvacanaṃ sagāravasappatissādhivacanametaṃ -- mārisāti -- atāru jātiñca jarañca mārisa.

[03] ^b^ye kecime samaṇabrāhmaṇāse^eb^ti. ^b^ye kecī^eb^ti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ -- ye kecīti. ^b^samaṇā^eb^ti ye keci ito bahiddhā pabbajjūpagatā paribbājakasamāpannā. ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^ti ye keci bhovādikāti -- ye kecime samaṇabrāhmaṇāse. ^b^nandāti bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^nandā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- nandāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^diṭṭhassutenāpi vadanti suddhi^eb^nti diṭṭhenapi suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharanti; sutenapi suddhiṃ...pe0... diṭṭhassutenapi suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharantīti -- diṭṭhassutenāpi vadanti suddhiṃ.

[03] ^b^kiñcāpi te tattha yatā carantī^eb^ti. ^b^kiñcāpī^eb^ti padasandhi padasaṃsaggo padapāripūrī akkharasamavāyo byañjanasiliṭṭhatā padānupubbatāpetaṃ -- kiñcāpīti. ^b^te^eb^ti diṭṭhigatikā. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0106^ea^ sakāya diṭṭhiyā sakāya khantiyā sakāya ruciyā sakāya laddhiyā. ^b^yatā^eb^ti yattā paṭiyattā guttā gopitā rakkhitā saṃvutā. ^b^carantī^eb^ti caranti viharanti iriyanti vattenti pālenti yapenti yāpentīti -- kiñcāpi te tattha yatā caranti.

[22] ^b^atāri jātiñca jarañca mārisa, pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^ye kecime samaṇabrāhmaṇāse^eb^ti. ^b^ye kecī^eb^ti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ -- ye kecīti. ^b^samaṇā^eb^ti ye keci ito bahiddhā pabbajjūpagatā paribbājakasamāpannā. ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^ti ye keci bhovādikāti -- ye kecime samaṇabrāhmaṇāse. ^b^iccāyasmā^eb^ ^a^T0.0152^ea^ ^b^nando^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... iccāyasmā nando.

[03] ^b^diṭṭhassutenāpi vadanti suddhi^eb^nti diṭṭhenapi suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharanti; sutenāpi suddhiṃ...pe0... diṭṭhassutenāpi ^a^V0.0107^ea^ suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharantīti -- diṭṭhassutenāpi vadanti suddhiṃ.

[03] ^b^sīlabbatenāpi vadanti suddhi^eb^nti sīlenāpi suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharanti; vatenāpi suddhiṃ...pe0... voharanti; sīlabbatenāpi suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharantīti -- sīlabbatenāpi vadanti suddhiṃ.

[03] ^b^anekarūpena vadanti suddhi^eb^nti anekavidhakotūhalamaṅgalena suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ vadanti kathenti bhaṇanti dīpayanti voharantīti -- anekarūpena vadanti suddhiṃ.

[03] ^b^te ce munī brūsi anoghatiṇṇe^eb^ti. ^b^te ce^eb^ti diṭṭhigatike. ^b^munī^eb^ti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ...pe0... saṅgajālamaticca so muni ^a^T0.0153^ea^. ^b^brūsi anoghatiṇṇe^eb^ti kāmoghaṃ bhavoghaṃ diṭṭhoghaṃ avijjoghaṃ atiṇṇe anatikkante asamatikkante avītivatte antojātijarāmaraṇe parivattente antosaṃsārapathe parivattente jātiyā anugate jarāya anusaṭe byādhinā abhibhūte maraṇena abbhāhate atāṇe aleṇe asaraṇe asaraṇībhūte. ^b^brūsī^eb^ti brūsi ācikkhasi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivarasi ^a^M0.0120^ea^ vibhajasi uttānīkarosi pakāsesīti -- te ce munī brūsi anoghatiṇṇe.

[03] ^b^atha ko carahi devamanussaloke, atāri jātiñca jarañca mārisā^eb^ti atha ko eso sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya jātijarāmaraṇaṃ atari uttari patari samatikkami vītivattayi. ^b^mārisā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ garuvacanaṃ sagāravasappatissādhivacanametaṃ mārisāti -- atha ko carahi devamanussaloke, atāri jātiñca jarañca mārisa.

[03] ^b^pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi meta^eb^nti. ^b^pucchāmi ta^eb^nti pucchāmi taṃ yācāmi taṃ ajjhesāmi taṃ pasādemi taṃ. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti. ^b^brūhi meta^eb^nti brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- pucchāmi taṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``ye ^a^V0.0108^ea^ kecime samaṇabrāhmaṇāse, [iccāyasmā nando]
[27] diṭṭhassutenāpi ^a^T0.0154^ea^ vadanti suddhiṃ.

[03] ^b^nāhaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0121^ea^ ^b^sabbe samaṇabrāhmaṇāse, nandāti bhagavā jātijarāya nivutāti brūmī^eb^ti nāhaṃ, nanda, sabbe samaṇabrāhmaṇā jātijarāya āvutā nivutā ovutā pihitā paṭicchannā paṭikujjitāti vadāmi. atthi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā yesaṃ jāti ca jarāmaraṇañca pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammāti brūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi ^a^T0.0155^ea^ vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti -- nāhaṃ sabbe samaṇabrāhmaṇāse nandāti bhagavā jātijarāya nivutāti brūmi.

[03] ^b^ye sīdha diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā, sīlabbataṃ vāpi pahāya sabba^eb^nti ye sabbā diṭṭhasuddhiyo pahāya jahitvā pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvā. ye sabbā sutasuddhiyo pahāya...pe0... ye sabbā mutasuddhiyo pahāya, ye sabbā diṭṭhasutamutasuddhiyo pahāya ye sabbā sīlasuddhiyo pahāya, ye sabbā vatasuddhiyo pahāya, ye sabbā sīlabbatasuddhiyo pahāya jahitvā pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti -- ye sīdha diṭṭhaṃva sutaṃ mutaṃ vā, sīlabbataṃ vāpi pahāya sabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^anekarūpampi pahāya sabba^eb^nti anekavidhakotūhalamaṅgalena suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ pahāya jahitvā pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti -- anekarūpampi pahāya sabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^taṇhaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0109^ea^ ^b^pariññāya anāsavā se, te ve narā oghatiṇṇāti brūmī^eb^ti. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhā. ^b^taṇhaṃ pariññāyā^eb^ti taṇhaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā -- ñātapariññāya, tīraṇapariññāya, pahānapariññāya. katamā ñātapariññā? taṇhaṃ jānāti {pajānāti (syā0) parijānāti (ka0) mahāni0 13} ``ayaṃ rūpataṇhā, ayaṃ saddataṇhā, ayaṃ gandhataṇhā, ayaṃ rasataṇhā, ayaṃ phoṭṭhabbataṇhā, ayaṃ ^a^T0.0156^ea^ dhammataṇhā''ti jānāti passati -- ayaṃ ñātapariññā.
[03] katamā tīraṇapariññā? evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā taṇhaṃ tīreti aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato...pe0... nissaraṇato tīreti -- ayaṃ tīraṇapariññā.

[03] katamā ^a^M0.0122^ea^ pahānapariññā? evaṃ tīrayitvā taṇhaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``yo, bhikkhave, taṇhāya chandarāgo taṃ pajahatha. evaṃ sā taṇhā pahīnā bhavissati ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā''. ayaṃ pahānapariññā. ^b^taṇhaṃ pariññāyā^eb^ti taṇhaṃ imāhi tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā. ^b^anāsavā^eb^ti cattāro āsavā -- kāmāsavo, bhavāsavo, diṭṭhāsavo, avijjāsavo. yesaṃ ime āsavā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā, te vuccanti anāsavā arahanto khīṇāsavā -- taṇhaṃ pariññāya anāsavā.

[03] ^b^te ve narā oghatiṇṇāti brūmī^eb^ti ye taṇhaṃ pariññāya anāsavā, te kāmoghaṃ tiṇṇā bhavoghaṃ tiṇṇā diṭṭhoghaṃ tiṇṇā avijjoghaṃ tiṇṇā sabbasaṃsārapathaṃ tiṇṇā uttiṇṇā nittiṇṇā atikkantā samatikkantā vītivattāti brūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti -- taṇhaṃ pariññāya anāsavāse ^a^T0.0157^ea^ te ve narā oghatiṇṇāti brūmi. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``nāhaṃ sabbe samaṇabrāhmaṇāse, [nandāti bhagavā]
[27] jātijarāya nivutāti brūmi.
[22] ye sīdha diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā, sīlabbataṃ vāpi pahāya sabbaṃ..
[21] anekarūpampi pahāya sabbaṃ, taṇhaṃ pariññāya anāsavāse.
[22] te ve narā oghatiṇṇāti brūmī''ti..
[21] ^b^etābhinandāmi^eb^ ^a^V0.0110^ea^ ^b^vaco mahesino, sukittitaṃ gotamanūpadhīkaṃ.^eb^

[21] ^b^anekarūpampi pahāya sabbaṃ, taṇhaṃ pariññāya anāsavāse.^eb^
[22] ^b^ahampi te oghatiṇṇāti brūmi..^eb^

[03] ^b^etābhinandāmi^eb^ ^a^M0.0123^ea^ ^b^vaco mahesino^eb^ti. ^b^eta^eb^nti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ byappathaṃ desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ nandāmi abhinandāmi modāmi anumodāmi icchāmi sādiyāmi patthayāmi pihayāmi abhijappāmi. ^b^mahesino^eb^ti kiṃ mahesi bhagavā? mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi...pe0... kahaṃ narāsabhoti mahesīti -- etābhinandāmi vaco mahesino.

[03] ^b^sukittitaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0158^ea^ ^b^gotamanūpadhīka^eb^nti. ^b^sukittita^eb^nti sukittitaṃ suācikkhitaṃ {svācikkhitaṃ (ka0)} sudesitaṃ supaññapitaṃ supaṭṭhapitaṃ suvivaṭaṃ suvibhattaṃ sūttānīkataṃ supakāsitaṃ. ^b^gotamanūpadhīka^eb^nti upadhī vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca. upadhippahānaṃ upadhivūpasamaṃ upadhinissaggaṃ upadhipaṭippassaddhaṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- sukittitaṃ gotamanūpadhīkaṃ.

[03] ^b^ye sīdha diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā, sīlabbataṃ vāpi pahāya sabba^eb^nti ye sabbā diṭṭhasuddhiyo pahāya jahitvā pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvā. ye sabbā sutasuddhiyo...pe0... ye sabbā mutasuddhiyo... ye sabbā diṭṭhasutamutasuddhiyo... ye sabbā sīlasuddhiyo... ye sabbā vatasuddhiyo... ye sabbā sīlabbatasuddhiyo pahāya jahitvā pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti -- ye sīdha diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā, sīlabbataṃ vāpi pahāya sabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^anekarūpampi pahāya sabba^eb^nti anekavidhakotūhalamaṅgalena suddhiṃ visuddhiṃ parisuddhiṃ muttiṃ vimuttiṃ parimuttiṃ pahāya jahitvā pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti -- anekarūpampi pahāya sabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^taṇhaṃ pariññāya anāsavāse, ahampi te oghatiṇṇāti brūmī^eb^ti. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhā. ^b^taṇhaṃ pariññāyā^eb^ti taṇhaṃ tīhi ^a^T0.0159^ea^ pariññāhi parijānitvā -- ñātapariññāya, tīraṇapariññāya {tiraṇapariññāya (syā0)}, pahānapariññāya. katamā ñātapariññā ^a^V0.0111^ea^? taṇhaṃ jānāti -- ayaṃ rūpataṇhā, ayaṃ saddataṇhā, ayaṃ gandhataṇhā, ayaṃ rasataṇhā, ayaṃ phoṭṭhabbataṇhā, ayaṃ dhammataṇhāti jānāti passati -- ayaṃ ñātapariññā.

[03] katamā tīraṇapariññā? evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā taṇhaṃ tīreti {tireti (syā0)} aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato ^a^M0.0124^ea^ palokato ītito upaddavato bhayato upasaggato calato pabhaṅguto addhuvato atāṇato aleṇato asaraṇato asaraṇībhūtato rittato tucchato suññato anattato ādīnavato vipariṇāmadhammato asārakato aghamūlato vadhakato vibhavato sāsavato saṅkhatato mārāmisato jātidhammato jarādhammato byādhidhammato maraṇadhammato sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadhammato saṃkilesadhammato samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇato tīreti -- ayaṃ tīraṇapariññā.
[03] katamā pahānapariññā? evaṃ tīrayitvā taṇhaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti -- ayaṃ pahānapariññā.

[01] ^b^taṇhaṃ pariññāyā^eb^ti taṇhaṃ imāhi tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā. ^b^anāsavā^eb^ti cattāro āsavā -- kāmāsavo, bhavāsavo, diṭṭhāsavo, avijjāsavo. yesaṃ ime āsavā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā, te vuccanti anāsavā ^a^T0.0160^ea^ arahanto khīṇāsavā. ^b^taṇhaṃ pariññāya anāsavāse, ahampi te oghatiṇṇā^eb^ti. ^b^brūmī^eb^ti ye taṇhaṃ pariññāya anāsavā, ahampi te kāmoghaṃ tiṇṇā bhavoghaṃ tiṇṇā diṭṭhoghaṃ tiṇṇā avijjoghaṃ tiṇṇā sabbasaṃsārapathaṃ tiṇṇā uttiṇṇā nittiṇṇā atikkantā samatikkantā vītivattāti brūmi vadāmiti -- taṇhaṃ pariññāya anāsavāse, ahampi te oghatiṇṇāti brūmi. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``etābhinandāmi vaco mahesino, sukittitaṃ gotamanūpadhīkaṃ.
[22] ye sīdha diṭṭhaṃ va sutaṃ mutaṃ vā, sīlabbataṃ vāpi pahāya sabbaṃ..
[21] anekarūpampi pahāya sabbaṃ, taṇhaṃ pariññāya anāsavāse.
[22] ahampi te oghatiṇṇāti brūmī''ti..
[06] nandamāṇavapucchāniddeso sattamo.
[21] ^b^ye^eb^ ^a^T0.0161^ea^ ^a^V0.0112^ea^ ^a^M0.0125^ea^ ^b^me pubbe viyākaṃsu, [iccāyasmā hemako]^eb^
[27] ^b^huraṃ gotamasāsanā.^eb^
[26] ^b^iccāsi iti bhavissati, sabbaṃ taṃ itihītihaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhanaṃ, nāhaṃ tattha abhiramiṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^ye me pubbe viyākaṃsū^eb^ti yo ca bāvarī brāhmaṇo ye caññe tassa ācariyā, te sakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ sakaṃ khantiṃ sakaṃ ruciṃ sakaṃ laddhiṃ sakaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ sakaṃ adhippāyaṃ byākaṃsu ācikkhiṃsu desayiṃsu paññapiṃsu paṭṭhapiṃsu vivariṃsu vibhajiṃsu uttānīakaṃsu pakāsesunti -- ye me pubbe viyākaṃsu. ^b^iccāyasmā hemako^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... padānupubbatāpetaṃ -- iccāti. ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ...pe0.... ^b^hemako^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ...pe0... abhilāpoti -- iccāyasmā hemako.

[03] ^b^huraṃ gotamasāsanā^eb^ti huraṃ gotamasāsanā paraṃ gotamasāsanā pure gotamasāsanā paṭhamataraṃ gotamasāsanā buddhasāsanā jinasāsanā tathāgatasāsanā {tathāgatasāsanā devasāsanā (ka0)} arahantasāsanāti -- huraṃ gotamasāsanā.
[01] ^b^iccāsi iti bhavissatī^eb^ti evaṃ kira āsi, evaṃ kira bhavissatīti ^a^T0.0162^ea^ -- iccāsi iti bhavissati.

[03] ^b^sabbaṃ taṃ itihītiha^eb^nti sabbaṃ taṃ itihītihaṃ itikirāya paraṃparāya piṭakasampadāya takkahetu nayahetu ākāraparivitakkena diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā na sāmaṃ sayamabhiññātaṃ na attapaccakkhadhammaṃ kathayiṃsūti -- sabbaṃ taṃ itihītihaṃ.

[03] ^b^sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhana^eb^nti sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhanaṃ vitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ saṅkappavaḍḍhanaṃ kāmavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ byāpādavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ vihiṃsāvitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ ñātivitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ janapadavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ amarāvitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ parānudayatāpaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ anavaññattipaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhananti -- sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhanaṃ.
[03] ^b^nāhaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0113^ea^ ^a^M0.0126^ea^ ^b^tattha abhirami^eb^nti nāhaṃ tattha abhiramiṃ na vindiṃ nādhigacchiṃ na paṭilabhinti -- nāhaṃ tattha abhiramiṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``ye me pubbe viyākaṃsu, [iccāyasmā hemako]
[27] huraṃ gotamasāsanā.
[26] iccāsi iti bhavissati, sabbaṃ taṃ itihītihaṃ.
[22] sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhanaṃ, nāhaṃ tattha abhirami''nti..
[21] ^b^tvañca me dhammamakkhāhi, taṇhānigghātanaṃ muni.^eb^
[22] ^b^yaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0163^ea^ ^b^viditvā sato caraṃ, tare loke visattikaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^tvañca me dhammamakkhāhī^eb^ti. ^b^tva^eb^nti bhagavantaṃ bhaṇati. ^b^dhammamakkhāhī^eb^ti. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, cattāro satipaṭṭhāne cattāro sammappadhāne cattāro iddhipāde pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅge ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ nibbānañca nibbānagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ akkhāhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- tvañca me dhammamakkhāhi.

[03] ^b^taṇhānigghātanaṃ munī^eb^ti. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti -- rūpataṇhā...pe0... dhammataṇhā. taṇhānigghātanaṃ taṇhāpahānaṃ taṇhāvūpasamaṃ taṇhāpaṭinissaggaṃ taṇhāpaṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ. ^b^munī^eb^ti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ...pe0... saṅgajālamaticca so munīti -- taṇhānigghātanaṃ muni.

[03] ^b^yaṃ viditvā sato cara^eb^nti yaṃ viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā. ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā, ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti...pe0... ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti...pe0... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti viditaṃ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā ^a^T0.0164^ea^ vibhūtaṃ katvā. ^b^sato^eb^ti catūhi kāraṇehi sato -- kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato...pe0... so vuccati sato. ^b^cara^eb^nti caranto viharanto iriyanto vattento pālento yapento yāpentoti -- yaṃ viditvā sato caraṃ.

[03] ^b^tare^eb^ ^a^V0.0114^ea^ ^b^loke visattika^eb^nti visattikā vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. ^b^visattikā^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena ^a^M0.0127^ea^ visattikā...pe0... visaṭā vitthatāti visattikā. ^b^loke^eb^ti apāyaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhātuloke āyatanaloke. ^b^tare loke visattika^eb^nti loke vesā visattikā loke vetaṃ visattikaṃ sato tareyyaṃ uttareyyaṃ patareyyaṃ samatikkameyyaṃ vītivatteyyanti -- tare loke visattikaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``tvañca me dhammamakkhāhi, taṇhānigghātanaṃ muni.
[22] yaṃ viditvā sato caraṃ, tare loke visattika''nti..
[21] ^b^idha diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu, piyarūpesu hemaka.^eb^
[22] ^b^chandarāgavinodanaṃ, nibbānapadamaccutaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^idha diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesū^eb^ti. ^b^diṭṭha^eb^nti cakkhunā diṭṭhaṃ; ^b^suta^eb^nti sotena sutaṃ; ^b^muta^eb^nti ghānena ghāyitaṃ jivhāya sāyitaṃ kāyena phuṭṭhaṃ; ^b^viññāta^eb^nti manasā viññātanti -- idha diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu.

[03] ^b^piyarūpesu^eb^ ^a^T0.0165^ea^ ^b^hemakā^eb^ti kiñca loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ? cakkhu {cakkhuṃ (syā0 ka0)} loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, sotaṃ loke...pe0... ghānaṃ loke... jivhā loke... kāyo loke... mano loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ; rūpā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, saddā loke... gandhā loke... rasā loke... phoṭṭhabbā loke... dhammā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ; cakkhuviññāṇaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, sotaviññāṇaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, ghānaviññāṇaṃ loke... jivhāviññāṇaṃ loke... kāyaviññāṇaṃ loke... manoviññāṇaṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, cakkhusamphasso loke... sotasamphasso loke... ghānasamphasso loke... jivhāsamphasso loke... kāyasamphasso loke... manosamphasso loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ; cakkhusamphassajā vedanā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ... sotasamphassajā vedanā... ghānasamphassajā vedanā... jivhāsamphassajā vedanā... kāyasamphassajā vedanā... manosamphassajā vedanā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ; rūpasaññā loke... saddasaññā loke... gandhasaññā loke... rasasaññā loke... phoṭṭhabbasaññā loke... dhammasaññā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, rūpasañcetanā ^a^M0.0128^ea^ loke... saddasañcetanā loke... gandhasañcetanā loke... rasasañcetanā loke... phoṭṭhabbasañcetanā loke... dhammasañcetanā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ; rūpataṇhā loke... saddataṇhā loke... gandhataṇhā loke... rasataṇhā loke ^a^V0.0115^ea^... phoṭṭhabbataṇhā loke... dhammataṇhā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ; rūpavitakko loke... saddavitakko loke... gandhavitakko loke... rasavitakko loke... phoṭṭhabbavitakko loke... dhammavitakko loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ; rūpavicāro loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, saddavicāro loke... gandhavicāro loke... rasavicāro loke... phoṭṭhabbavicāro ^a^T0.0166^ea^ loke... dhammavicāro loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpanti -- piyarūpesu hemaka.

[03] ^b^chandarāgavinodana^eb^nti. ^b^chandarāgo^eb^ti yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasineho kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmupādānaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ. ^b^chandarāgavinodana^eb^nti chandarāgappahānaṃ chandarāgavūpasamaṃ chandarāgapaṭinissaggaṃ chandarāgapaṭippassaddhaṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- chandarāgavinodanaṃ.
[03] ^b^nibbānapadamaccuta^eb^nti nibbānapadaṃ tāṇapadaṃ leṇapadaṃ saraṇapadaṃ abhayapadaṃ. ^b^accuta^eb^nti niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti -- nibbānapadamaccutaṃ. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``idha diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu, piyarūpesu hemaka.
[22] chandarāgavinodanaṃ, nibbānapadamaccuta''nti..
[21] ^b^etadaññāya ye satā, diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutā.^eb^
[22] ^b^upasantā ca te sadā, tiṇṇā loke visattikaṃ.. ^eb^

[01] ^b^etadaññāya ye satā^eb^ti. ^b^eta^eb^nti amataṃ nibbānaṃ. yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ. ^b^aññāyā^eb^ti aññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā. ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti aññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā. ``sabbe ^a^T0.0167^ea^ saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti... ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti...pe0... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti aññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā ^a^M0.0129^ea^ vibhūtaṃ katvā. ^b^ye^eb^ti arahanto khīṇāsavā. ^b^satā^eb^ti catūhi kāraṇehi satā -- kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvitattā satā...pe0... te vuccanti satāti -- etadaññāya ye satā.

[03] ^b^diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutā^eb^ti. ^b^diṭṭhadhammā^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammā ñātadhammā tulitadhammā tīritadhammā vibhūtadhammā ^a^V0.0116^ea^ vibhāvitadhammā. ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti diṭṭhadhammā...pe0... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti diṭṭhadhammā ñātadhammā tulitadhammā tīritadhammā vibhūtadhammā vibhāvitadhammā. ^b^abhinibbutā^eb^ti rāgassa nibbāpitattā nibbutā, dosassa nibbāpitattā nibbutā, mohassa nibbāpitattā nibbutā, kodhassa...pe0... upanāhassa... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṃ santattā samitattā vūpasamitattā nijjhātattā nibbutattā vigatattā paṭippasaddhattā santā upasantā vūpasantā nibbutā paṭippassaddhāti -- diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutā.

[03] ^b^upasantā ca te sadā^eb^ti. ^b^upasantā^eb^ti rāgassa upasamitattā nibbāpitattā upasantā...pe0... dosassa... mohassa... kodhassa... upanāhassa...pe0... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṃ santattā samitattā vūpasamitattā nijjhātattā nibbutattā vigatattā paṭippasaddhattā santā upasantā vūpasantā nibbutā paṭippassaddhāti upasantā. ^b^te^eb^ti arahanto khīṇāsavā. ^b^sadā^eb^ti sadā ^a^T0.0168^ea^ sabbakālaṃ niccakālaṃ dhuvakālaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ udakūmikajātaṃ avīcisantatisahitaṃ phassitaṃ purebhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ purimayāmaṃ majjhimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmaṃ kāḷe juṇhe vasse hemante gimhe purime vayokhandhe majjhime vayokhandhe pacchime vayokhandheti -- upasantā ca te sadā.

[03] ^b^tiṇṇā loke visattika^eb^nti visattikā vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. ^b^visattikā^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena visattikā...pe0... visaṭā vitthatāti visattikā. ^b^loke^eb^ti apāyaloke...pe0... āyatanaloke. ^b^tiṇṇā loke visattika^eb^nti loke vesā visattikā loke vetaṃ visattikaṃ tiṇṇā uttiṇṇā nitthiṇṇā atikkantā samatikkantā vītivattāti -- tiṇṇā loke visattikaṃ. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``etadaññāya ^a^M0.0130^ea^ ye satā, diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutā.
[22] upasantā ca te sadā, tiṇṇā loke visattika''nti..
[03] saha gāthāpariyosānā...pe0... satthā me bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmīti.
[06] hemakamāṇavapucchāniddeso aṭṭhamo.
[21] ^b^yasmiṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0169^ea^ ^a^V0.0117^ea^ ^b^kāmā na vasanti, [iccāyasmā todeyyo]^eb^
[27] ^b^taṇhā yassa na vijjati.^eb^
[22] ^b^kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo, vimokkho tassa kīdiso..^eb^

[03] ^b^yasmiṃ kāmā na vasantī^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāmā na vasanti na saṃvasanti na āvasanti na parivasantīti -- yasmiṃ kāmā na vasanti. ^b^iccāyasmā todeyyo^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... padānupubbatāpetaṃ -- iccāti. ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ...pe0.... ^b^todeyyo^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ...pe0... abhilāpoti -- iccāyasmā todeyyo.
[03] ^b^taṇhā yassa na vijjatī^eb^ti taṇhā yassa natthi na sati na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti -- taṇhā yassa na vijjati.
[03] ^b^kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo^eb^ti kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti -- kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo.
[01] ^b^vimokkho tassa kīdiso^eb^ti vimokkho tassa kīdiso kiṃsaṇṭhito kiṃpakāro kiṃpaṭibhāgo icchitabboti vimokkhaṃ pucchatīti -- vimokkho ^a^T0.0170^ea^ tassa kīdiso. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``yasmiṃ kāmā na vasanti, [iccāyasmā todeyyo]
[27] taṇhā yassa na vijjati.
[22] kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo, vimokkho tassa kīdiso''ti..
[21] ^b^yasmiṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0131^ea^ ^b^kāmā na vasanti, [todeyyāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^taṇhā yassa na vijjati.^eb^
[22] ^b^kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo, vimokkho tassa nāparo.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^yasmiṃ kāmā na vasantī^eb^ti. ^b^yasmi^eb^nti yasmiṃ puggale arahante khīṇāsave. ^b^kāmā^eb^ti uddānato ^a^V0.0118^ea^ dve kāmā -- vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca...pe0... ime vuccanti vatthukāmā...pe0... ime vuccanti kilesakāmā. ^b^yasmiṃ kāmā na vasantī^eb^ti yasmiṃ kāmā na vasanti na saṃvasanti na āvasanti na parivasantīti -- yasmiṃ kāmā na vasanti.
[03] ^b^todeyyāti bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^todeyyā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- todeyyāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^taṇhā yassa na vijjatī^eb^ti. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhā. ^b^yassā^eb^ti arahato khīṇāsavassa. ^b^taṇhā yassa na vijjatī^eb^ti taṇhā yassa ^a^T0.0171^ea^ natthi na sati na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati, pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti -- taṇhā yassa na vijjati.

[03] ^b^kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo^eb^ti kathaṃkathā vuccati vicikicchā. dukkhe kaṅkhā...pe0... chambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho. ^b^yo^eb^ti yo so arahaṃ khīṇāsavo. ^b^kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo^eb^ti kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivattoti -- kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo.
[01] ^b^vimokkho tassa nāparo^eb^ti natthi tassa aparo vimokkho. yena vimokkhena vimucceyya vimutto so. kataṃ tassa vimokkhena karaṇīyanti -- vimokkho tassa nāparo. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``yasmiṃ kāmā na vasanti, [todeyyāti bhagavā]
[27] taṇhā yassa na vijjati.
[22] kathaṃkathā ca yo tiṇṇo, vimokkho tassa nāparo''ti..
[21] ^b^nirāsaso^eb^ ^a^M0.0132^ea^ ^b^so uda āsasāno, paññāṇavā so uda paññakappī.^eb^
[22] ^b^muniṃ ahaṃ sakka yathā vijaññaṃ, taṃ me viyācikkha samantacakkhu..^eb^

[03] ^b^nirāsaso so uda āsasāno^eb^ti nittaṇho so, udāhu ^a^T0.0172^ea^ sataṇho rūpe āsīsati {āsiṃsati (syā0)}, sadde...pe0... gandhe... rase... phoṭṭhabbe... kulaṃ... gaṇaṃ... āvāsaṃ... lābhaṃ... yasaṃ... pasaṃsaṃ... sukhaṃ... cīvaraṃ... piṇḍapātaṃ... senāsanaṃ... gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ... kāmadhātuṃ ^a^V0.0119^ea^... rūpadhātuṃ... arūpadhātuṃ... kāmabhavaṃ... rūpabhavaṃ... arūpabhavaṃ... saññābhavaṃ... asaññābhavaṃ... nevasaññānāsaññābhavaṃ... ekavokārabhavaṃ... catuvokārabhavaṃ... pañcavokārabhavaṃ... atītaṃ... anāgataṃ... paccuppannaṃ... diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbe dhamme āsīsati sādiyati pattheti piheti abhijappatīti -- nirāsaso so uda āsasāno.

[03] ^b^paññāṇavā so uda paññakappī^eb^ti. ^b^paññāṇavā so^eb^ti paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī. ^b^uda paññakappī^eb^ti udāhu aṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇena vā pañcābhiññāñāṇena vā micchāñāṇena vā taṇhākappaṃ vā diṭṭhikappaṃ vā kappeti janeti sañjaneti nibbatteti abhinibbattetīti -- paññāṇavā so uda paññakappī.

[03] ^b^muniṃ ahaṃ sakka yathā vijañña^eb^nti. ^b^sakkā^eb^ti sakko bhagavā. sakyakulā pabbajitotipi sakko. atha vā, aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko. tassimāni dhanāni, seyyathidaṃ -- saddhādhanaṃ sīladhanaṃ hiridhanaṃ ottappadhanaṃ sutadhanaṃ cāgadhanaṃ paññādhanaṃ satipaṭṭhānadhanaṃ sammappadhānadhanaṃ iddhipādadhanaṃ indriyadhanaṃ baladhanaṃ bojjhaṅgadhanaṃ maggadhanaṃ phaladhanaṃ nibbānadhananti. tehi anekavidhehi dhanaratanehi ^a^T0.0173^ea^ aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko. atha vā, pahu visavī alamatto sūro vīro vikkanto abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṃsotipi sakko. ^b^muniṃ ahaṃ sakka yathā vijañña^eb^nti sakka yathāhaṃ muniṃ jāneyyaṃ ājāneyyaṃ vijāneyyaṃ paṭivijāneyyaṃ paṭivijjheyyanti -- muniṃ ahaṃ sakka yathā vijaññaṃ.

[03] ^b^taṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0133^ea^ ^b^me viyācikkha samantacakkhū^eb^ti. ^b^ta^eb^nti yaṃ pucchāmi yaṃ yācāmi yaṃ ajjhesāmi yaṃ pasādemi. ^b^viyācikkhā^eb^ti ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehi. ^b^samantacakkhū^eb^ti samantacakkhu vuccati sabbaññutañāṇaṃ...pe0... tathāgato tena samantacakkhūti -- taṃ me viyācikkha samantacakkhu. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``nirāsaso so uda āsasāno, paññāṇavā so uda paññakappī.
[22] muniṃ ahaṃ sakka yathā vijaññaṃ, taṃ me viyācikkha samantacakkhū''ti..
[21] ^b^nirāsaso so na ca āsasāno, paññāṇavā so na ca paññakappī.^eb^
[22] ^b^evampi todeyya muniṃ vijāna, akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asattaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^nirāsaso^eb^ ^a^V0.0120^ea^ ^b^so na ca āsasāno^eb^ti nittaṇho so. na so sataṇho ^a^T0.0174^ea^ rūpe nāsīsati. sadde...pe0... gandhe... diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbe dhamme nāsīsati na icchati na sādiyati na pattheti na piheti nābhijappatīti -- nirāsaso so na ca āsasāno.

[03] ^b^paññāṇavā so na ca paññakappī^eb^ti. ^b^paññāṇavā^eb^ti paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī. ^b^na ca paññakappī^eb^ti aṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇena vā pañcābhiññāñāṇena vā micchāñāṇena vā taṇhākappaṃ vā na kappeti diṭṭhikappaṃ vā na kappeti na janeti na sañjaneti na nibbatteti nābhinibbattetīti -- paññāṇavā so na ca paññakappī.

[03] ^b^evampi todeyya muniṃ vijānā^eb^ti. ^b^munī^eb^ti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ...pe0... saṅgajālamaticca so muni. ^b^evampi todeyya muniṃ vijānā^eb^ti todeyya, evaṃ muniṃ jāna paṭijāna paṭivijāna paṭivijjhāti -- evampi todeyya muniṃ vijāna.

[03] ^b^akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asatta^eb^nti. ^b^akiñcana^eb^nti rāgakiñcanaṃ dosakiñcanaṃ mohakiñcanaṃ mānakiñcanaṃ diṭṭhikiñcanaṃ kilesakiñcanaṃ duccaritakiñcanaṃ. yassetāni {yassete (syā0)} kiñcanāni ^a^M0.0134^ea^ {kiñcanā (syā0)} pahīnāni samucchinnāni vūpasantāni paṭippassaddhāni abhabbuppattikāni ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāni, so vuccati akiñcano. ^b^kāmā^eb^ti uddānato dve kāmā -- vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca...pe0... ime vuccanti vatthukāmā...pe0... ime vuccanti kilesakāmā. ^b^bhavā^eb^ti dve bhavā -- kammabhavo ^a^T0.0175^ea^ ca paṭisandhiko ca punabbhavo...pe0... ayaṃ paṭisandhiko punabbhavo.

[03] ^b^akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asatta^eb^nti akiñcanaṃ puggalaṃ kāme ca bhave ca asattaṃ alaggaṃ alaggitaṃ apalibuddhaṃ nikkhantaṃ nissaṭaṃ vippamuttaṃ visaññuttaṃ vimariyādikatena cetasā viharantanti -- akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asattaṃ. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``nirāsaso so na ca āsasāno, paññāṇavā so na ca paññakappī.
[22] evampi todeyya muniṃ vijāna, akiñcanaṃ kāmabhave asattanti..
[03] saha gāthāpariyosānā...pe0... satthā me bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmīti.
[06] todeyyamāṇavapucchāniddeso navamo.
[21] ^b^majjhe^eb^ ^a^T0.0176^ea^ ^a^V0.0121^ea^ ^b^sarasmiṃ tiṭṭhataṃ, [iccāyasmā kappo]^eb^
[27] ^b^oghe jāte mahabbhaye.^eb^
[26] ^b^jarāmaccuparetānaṃ, dīpaṃ pabrūhi mārisa.^eb^
[22] ^b^tvañca me dīpamakkhāhi, yathāyidaṃ nāparaṃ siyā.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^majjhe sarasmiṃ tiṭṭhata^eb^nti saro vuccati saṃsāro āgamanaṃ gamanaṃ gamanāgamanaṃ kālaṃ gati bhavābhavo cuti ca upapatti ca nibbatti ca bhedo ca jāti ca jarā ca maraṇañca. saṃsārassa purimāpi koṭi na paññāyati, pacchimāpi koṭi na paññāyati; majjheva saṃsāre sattā ṭhitā patiṭṭhitā allīnā upagatā ajjhositā adhimuttā.

[03] kathaṃ ^a^M0.0135^ea^ saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati? ettakā jātiyo vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni jātisatāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni jātisahassāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni jātisatasahassāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti ^a^T0.0177^ea^, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakā jātikoṭiyo vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni jātikoṭisatāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni jātikoṭisahassāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti, hevaṃ natthi. evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni jātikoṭisatasahassāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati.

[03] ettakāni vassāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni vassasatāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni vassasahassāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni ^a^V0.0122^ea^ vassasatasahassāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakā vassakoṭiyo vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni vassakoṭisatāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na ^a^T0.0178^ea^ vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni vassakoṭisahassāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni vassakoṭisatasahassāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati.

[03] ettakāni kappāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni kappasatāni vaṭṭaṃ ^a^M0.0136^ea^ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni kappasahassāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni kappasatasahassāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakā kappakoṭiyo vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni kappakoṭisatāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni kappakoṭisahassāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni kappakoṭisatasahassāni vaṭṭaṃ vatti, tato ^a^T0.0179^ea^ paraṃ na vattatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``anamataggoyaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ. evaṃ dīgharattaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ tibbaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ byasanaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ, kaṭasī vaḍḍhitā {kaṭasīvavaḍḍhitaṃ (syā0) passa saṃ0 ni0 2.124}. yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṃ alaṃ virajjituṃ alaṃ vimuccitu''nti. evampi saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati.

[03] kathaṃ saṃsārassa pacchimā koṭi na paññāyati? ettakā jātiyo vaṭṭaṃ vattissati, tato paraṃ na vattissatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa pacchimā koṭi na paññāyati. ettakāni ^a^V0.0123^ea^ jātisatāni, ettakāni jātisahassāni, ettakāni jātisatasahassāni, ettakā jātikoṭiyo, ettakāni jātikoṭisatāni, ettakāni jātikoṭisahassāni, ettakāni jātikoṭisatasahassāni, ettakāni vassāni, ettakāni vassasatāni, ettakāni vassasahassāni, ettakāni vassasatasahassāni, ettakā vassakoṭiyo, ettakāni vassakoṭisatāni, ettakāni vassakoṭisahassāni, ettakāni vassakoṭisatasahassāni, ettakāni kappāni, ettakāni kappasatāni, ettakāni kappasahassāni, ettakāni kappasatasahassāni, ettakā kappakoṭiyo, ettakāni kappakoṭisatāni ^a^M0.0137^ea^, ettakāni kappakoṭisahassāni, ettakāni kappakoṭisatasahassāni ^a^T0.0180^ea^ vaṭṭaṃ vattissati, tato paraṃ na vattissatīti hevaṃ natthi, evampi saṃsārassa pacchimā koṭi na paññāyati. evampi saṃsārassa purimāpi koṭi na paññāyati, pacchimāpi koṭi na paññāyati, majjheva saṃsāre sattā ṭhitā patiṭṭhitā allīnā upagatā ajjhositā adhimuttāti -- majjhe sarasmiṃ tiṭṭhataṃ. ^b^iccāyasmā kappo^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0.... ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ...pe0.... ^b^kappo^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ...pe0... abhilāpoti -- iccāyasmā kappo.

[03] ^b^oghe jāte mahabbhaye^eb^ti kāmoghe bhavoghe diṭṭhoghe avijjoghe jāte sañjāte nibbatte abhinibbatte pātubhūte. ^b^mahabbhaye^eb^ti jātibhaye jarābhaye byādhibhaye maraṇabhayeti -- oghe jāte mahabbhaye.

[03] ^b^jarāmaccuparetāna^eb^nti jarāya phuṭṭhānaṃ paretānaṃ samohitānaṃ samannāgatānaṃ. maccunā phuṭṭhānaṃ paretānaṃ samohitānaṃ samannāgatānaṃ, jātiyā anugatānaṃ jarāya anusaṭānaṃ byādhinā abhibhūtānaṃ maraṇena abbhāhatānaṃ atāṇānaṃ aleṇānaṃ asaraṇānaṃ asaraṇībhūtānanti -- jarāmaccuparetānaṃ.

[03] ^b^dīpaṃ pabrūhi mārisā^eb^ti dīpaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ saraṇaṃ gatiṃ parāyanaṃ {gatiparāyanaṃ (syā0) evamuparipi} brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi ^a^T0.0181^ea^ uttānīkarohi pakāsehi. ^b^mārisā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ garuvacanaṃ sagāravasappatissādhivacanametaṃ mārisāti -- dīpaṃ pabrūhi mārisa.

[03] ^b^tvañca me dīpamakkhāhī^eb^ti. ^b^tva^eb^nti bhagavantaṃ bhaṇati. ^b^dīpamakkhāhī^eb^ti dīpaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ saraṇaṃ gatiṃ parāyanaṃ akkhāhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- tvañca me dīpamakkhāhi.

[03] ^b^yathāyidaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0124^ea^ ^b^nāparaṃ siyā^eb^ti yathayidaṃ dukkhaṃ idheva nirujjheyya vūpasameyya atthaṃ gaccheyya paṭippassambheyya punapaṭisandhikaṃ dukkhaṃ na nibbatteyya, kāmadhātuyā vā rūpadhātuyā vā arūpadhātuyā vā kāmabhave vā rūpabhave vā ^a^M0.0138^ea^ arūpabhave vā saññābhave vā asaññābhave vā nevasaññānāsaññābhave vā ekavokārabhave vā catuvokārabhave vā pañcavokārabhave vā punagatiyā vā upapattiyā vā paṭisandhiyā vā bhave vā saṃsāre vā vaṭṭe vā na janeyya na sañjaneyya na nibbatteyya nābhinibbatteyya. idheva nirujjheyya vūpasameyya atthaṃ gaccheyya paṭippassambheyyāti -- yathāyidaṃ nāparaṃ siyā. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``majjhe sarasmiṃ tiṭṭhataṃ, [iccāyasmā kappo]
[27] oghe jāte mahabbhaye.
[26] jarāmaccuparetānaṃ, dīpaṃ pabrūhi mārisa.
[22] tvañca ^a^T0.0182^ea^ me dīpamakkhāhi, yathāyidaṃ nāparaṃ siyā''ti..
[21] ^b^majjhe sarasmiṃ tiṭṭhataṃ, [kappāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^oghe jāte mahabbhaye.^eb^
[22] ^b^jarāmaccuparetānaṃ, dīpaṃ pabrūmi kappa te..^eb^

[03] ^b^majjhe sarasmiṃ tiṭṭhata^eb^nti saro vuccati saṃsāro āgamanaṃ gamanaṃ gamanāgamanaṃ kālaṃ gati bhavābhavo, cuti ca upapatti ca nibbatti ca bhedo ca jāti ca jarā ca maraṇañca. saṃsārassa purimāpi koṭi na paññāyati, pacchimāpi koṭi na paññāyati. majjheva saṃsāre sattā ṭhitā patiṭṭhitā allīnā upagatā ajjhositā adhimuttā.
