[03] kathaṃ saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati...pe0... evaṃ saṃsārassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati. kathaṃ saṃsārassa pacchimā koṭi na paññāyati...pe0... evaṃ saṃsārassa pacchimā koṭi na paññāyati. evaṃ saṃsārassa purimāpi koṭi na paññāyati, pacchimāpi koṭi na paññāyati. majjheva saṃsāre sattā ṭhitā patiṭṭhitā allīnā upagatā ajjhositā adhimuttāti -- majjhe sarasmiṃ tiṭṭhataṃ. ^b^kappāti bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^kappā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- kappāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^oghe^eb^ ^a^T0.0183^ea^ ^a^V0.0125^ea^ ^b^jāte mahabbhaye^eb^ti kāmoghe bhavoghe diṭṭhoghe avijjoghe jāte sañjāte nibbatte abhinibbatte pātubhūte. ^b^mahabbhaye^eb^ti jātibhaye jarābhaye byādhibhaye maraṇabhayeti -- oghe jāte mahabbhaye.

[03] ^b^jarāmaccuparetāna^eb^nti ^a^M0.0139^ea^ jarāya phuṭṭhānaṃ paretānaṃ samohitānaṃ samannāgatānaṃ, maccunā phuṭṭhānaṃ paretānaṃ samohitānaṃ samannāgatānaṃ jātiyā anugatānaṃ jarāya anusaṭānaṃ byādhinā abhibhūtānaṃ maraṇena abbhāhatānaṃ atāṇānaṃ aleṇānaṃ asaraṇānaṃ asaraṇībhūtānanti -- jarāmaccuparetānaṃ.

[03] ^b^dīpaṃ pabrūmi kappa te^eb^ti dīpaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ saraṇaṃ gatiṃ parāyanaṃ brūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti -- dīpaṃ pabrūmi kappa te. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``majjhe sarasmiṃ tiṭṭhataṃ, [kappāti bhagavā]
[27] oghe jāte mahabbhaye.
[22] jarāmaccuparetānaṃ, dīpaṃ pabrūmi kappa te''ti..
[21] ^b^akiñcanaṃ anādānaṃ, etaṃ dīpaṃ anāparaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^nibbānaṃ iti naṃ brūmi, jarāmaccuparikkhayaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^akiñcanaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0184^ea^ ^b^anādāna^eb^nti. ^b^kiñcana^eb^nti -- rāgakiñcanaṃ dosakiñcanaṃ mohakiñcanaṃ mānakiñcanaṃ diṭṭhikiñcanaṃ kilesakiñcanaṃ duccaritakiñcanaṃ; kiñcanappahānaṃ kiñcanavūpasamaṃ {kiñcanavūpasamo (syā0) evamīdisesu ṭhānesu} kiñcanapaṭinissaggaṃ {kiñcanapaṭinissaggo (syā0)} kiñcanapaṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- akiñcanaṃ. ^b^anādāna^eb^nti ādānaṃ vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. ādānappahānaṃ ādānavūpasamaṃ ādānapaṭinissaggaṃ ādānapaṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- akiñcanaṃ anādānaṃ.

[03] ^b^etaṃ dīpaṃ anāpara^eb^nti etaṃ dīpaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ saraṇaṃ gati parāyanaṃ. ^b^anāpara^eb^nti tamhā paro añño dīpo natthi. atha kho so evaṃ dīpo aggo ca seṭṭho ca viseṭṭho ca pāmokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro cāti -- etaṃ dīpaṃ anāparaṃ.

[03] ^b^nibbānaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0126^ea^ ^b^iti naṃ brūmī^eb^ti vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. vānappahānaṃ vānavūpasamaṃ vānapaṭinissaggaṃ vānapaṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ. ^b^itī^eb^ti padasandhi padasaṃsaggo padapāripūrī akkharasamavāyo byañjanasiliṭṭhatā padānupubbatāpetaṃ -- itīti. ^b^brūmī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0140^ea^ brūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti -- nibbānaṃ iti naṃ brūmi.
[03] ^b^jarāmaccuparikkhaya^eb^nti jarāmaraṇassa pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- jarāmaccuparikkhayaṃ. tenāha ^a^T0.0185^ea^ bhagavā --
[21] ``akiñcanaṃ anādānaṃ, etaṃ dīpaṃ anāparaṃ.
[22] nibbānaṃ iti naṃ brūmi, jarāmaccuparikkhaya''nti..
[21] ^b^etadaññāya ye satā, diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutā.^eb^
[22] ^b^na te māravasānugā, na te mārassa paddhagū^eb^ {paṭṭhagū (syā0 ka0)} ^b^..^eb^

[03] ^b^etadaññāya ye satā^eb^ti. ^b^eta^eb^nti amataṃ nibbānaṃ. yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ. ^b^aññāyā^eb^ti aññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā, ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti...pe0... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti aññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā. ^b^ye^eb^ti arahanto khīṇāsavā. ^b^satā^eb^ti catūhi kāraṇehi satā -- kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāventā {bhāvitattā (ka0)} satā...pe0... te vuccanti satāti -- etadaññāya ye satā.

[03] ^b^diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutā^eb^ti. ^b^diṭṭhadhammā^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammā ñātadhammā tulitadhammā tīritadhammā vibhūtadhammā vibhāvitadhammā. ^b^abhinibbutā^eb^ti rāgassa nibbāpitattā nibbutā, dosassa...pe0... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṃ santattā samitattā vūpasamitattā nijjhātattā nibbutattā paṭippassaddhattā santā upasantā vūpasantā nibbutā paṭippassaddhāti -- diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutā.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^T0.0186^ea^ ^b^te māravasānugā^eb^ti. ^b^māro^eb^ti yo so māro kaṇho adhipati antagū namuci pamattabandhu. ^b^na te māravasānugā^eb^ti na te mārassa vase vattanti, nāpi māro tesu vasaṃ vatteti ^a^V0.0127^ea^. te mārañca mārapakkhañca mārapāsañca mārabaḷisañca {mārabalisañca (ka0)} mārāmisañca māravisayañca māranivāsañca māragocarañca mārabandhanañca abhibhuyya abhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā pariyādiyitvā madditvā caranti viharanti iriyanti vattenti pālenti yapenti yāpentīti -- na te māravasānugā.

[03] ^b^na^eb^ ^a^M0.0141^ea^ ^b^te mārassa paddhagū^eb^ti na te mārassa paddhā paddhacarā {paṭṭhā paṭṭhacarā (syā0 ka0)} paricārikā siyā; buddhassa te bhagavato paddhā paddhacarā paricārikā siyāti -- na te mārassa paddhagū. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``etadaññāya ye satā, diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutā.
[22] na te māravasānugā, na te mārassa paddhagū''ti..
[03] saha gāthāpariyosānā...pe0... satthā me bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmīti.
[06] kappamāṇavapucchāniddeso dasamo.
[21] ^b^sutvānahaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0187^ea^ ^b^vīra akāmakāmiṃ, [iccāyasmā jatukaṇṇi]^eb^
[27] ^b^oghātigaṃ puṭṭhumakāmamāgamaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^santipadaṃ brūhi sahajanetta, yathātacchaṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^sutvānahaṃ vīra akāmakāmi^eb^nti sutvā suṇitvā uggahetvā upadhāretvā upalakkhayitvā. itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ...pe0... buddho bhagavāti -- sutvānahaṃ. ^b^vīrā^eb^ti vīro bhagavā. vīriyavāti vīro, pahūti vīro, visavīti vīro, alamattoti vīro, sūroti vīro, vikkanto abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṃsoti vīro.
[21] virato idha sabbapāpakehi, nirayadukkhaṃ aticca vīriyavā {viriyavā (syā0) su0 ni0 536} so.
[22] so vīriyavā padhānavā, vīro tādi pavuccate tathattāti..

[03] sutvānahaṃ vīra. ^b^akāmakāmi^eb^nti. ^b^kāmā^eb^ti uddānato dve kāmā -- vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ^a^V0.0128^ea^ ca...pe0... ime vuccanti vatthukāmā...pe0... ime vuccanti kilesakāmā. buddhassa bhagavato vatthukāmā pariññātā, kilesakāmā pahīnā. vatthukāmānaṃ pariññātattā kilesakāmānaṃ ^a^T0.0188^ea^ pahīnattā ^a^M0.0142^ea^ bhagavā na kāme kāmeti, na kāme pattheti, na kāme piheti, na kāme abhijappati. ye kāme kāmenti, kāme patthenti, kāme pihenti, kāme abhijappanti, te kāmakāmino rāgarāgino saññāsaññino. bhagavā na kāme kāmeti, na kāme pattheti, na kāme piheti, na kāme abhijappati. tasmā buddho akāmo nikkāmo cattakāmo vantakāmo muttakāmo pahīnakāmo paṭinissaṭṭhakāmo vītarāgo vigatarāgo cattarāgo vantarāgo muttarāgo pahīnarāgo paṭinissaṭṭharāgo nicchāto nibbuto sītibhūto sukhappaṭisaṃvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharatīti -- sutvānahaṃ vīra amakāmakāmiṃ.

[03] ^b^iccāyasmā jatukaṇṇī^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... padānupubbatāpetaṃ -- iccāti. ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ sagāravasappatissādhivacanametaṃ āyasmāti. ^b^jatukaṇṇī^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa gottaṃ saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāroti -- iccāyasmā jatukaṇṇi.

[03] ^b^oghātigaṃ puṭṭhumakāmamāgama^eb^nti. ^b^oghātiga^eb^nti oghātigaṃ oghaṃ atikkantaṃ samatikkantaṃ vītivattanti -- oghātigaṃ. ^b^puṭṭhu^eb^nti puṭṭhuṃ pucchituṃ yācituṃ ajjhesituṃ pasādetuṃ. ^b^akāmamāgama^eb^nti akāmaṃ puṭṭhuṃ nikkāmaṃ cattakāmaṃ vantakāmaṃ muttakāmaṃ pahīnakāmaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhakāmaṃ vītarāgaṃ vigatarāgaṃ cattarāgaṃ vantarāgaṃ muttarāgaṃ pahīnarāgaṃ paṭinissaṭṭharāgaṃ āgamhā āgatamhā upāgatamhā sampattamhā tayā saddhiṃ samāgatamhāti -- oghātigaṃ puṭṭhumakāmamāgamaṃ.

[03] ^b^santipadaṃ brūhi sahajanettā^eb^ti. ^b^santī^eb^ti ekena ākārena santipi santipadampi {santipadanti (ka0)} taṃyeva amataṃ nibbānaṃ. yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ ^a^T0.0189^ea^. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``santametaṃ padaṃ, paṇītametaṃ padaṃ, yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbāna''nti. athāparenākārena ye dhammā santādhigamāya santiphusanāya santisacchikiriyāya saṃvattanti, seyyathidaṃ -- cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo ^a^M0.0143^ea^ aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo -- ime vuccanti santipadā. santipadaṃ tāṇapadaṃ leṇapadaṃ saraṇapadaṃ abhayapadaṃ accutapadaṃ amatapadaṃ nibbānapadaṃ brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehi. ^b^sahajanettā^eb^ti nettaṃ vuccati sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. buddhassa bhagavato ^a^V0.0129^ea^ nettañca jinabhāvo ca bodhiyā mūle apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe uppanno, tasmā buddho sahajanettoti -- santipadaṃ brūhi sahajanetta.

[03] ^b^yathātacchaṃ bhagavā brūhi meta^eb^nti yathātacchaṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ...pe0... nirodho nibbānaṃ. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti. ^b^brūhi meta^eb^nti brūhi ācikkhāhi...pe0... pakāsehīti -- yathātacchaṃ bhagavā brūhi metaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``sutvānahaṃ vīra akāmakāmiṃ, [iccāyasmā jatukaṇṇi]
[27] oghātigaṃ ^a^T0.0190^ea^ puṭṭhumakāmamāgamaṃ.
[22] santipadaṃ brūhi sahajanetta, yathātacchaṃ bhagavā brūhi meta''nti..
[21] ^b^bhagavā hi kāme abhibhuyya iriyati, ādiccova pathaviṃ tejī tejasā.^eb^
[27] ^b^parittapaññassa me bhūripañño, ācikkha dhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^jātijarāya idha vippahānaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^bhagavā hi kāme abhibhuyya iriyatī^eb^ti. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti. ^b^kāmā^eb^ti uddānato dve kāmā -- vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca...pe0... ime vuccanti vatthukāmā...pe0... ime vuccanti kilesakāmā. bhagavā vatthukāme parijānitvā kilesakāme pahāya abhibhuyya abhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā pariyādiyitvā carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpetīti -- bhagavā hi kāme abhibhuyya iriyati.

[03] ^b^ādiccova pathaviṃ tejī tejasā^eb^ti ādicco vuccati sūriyo {suriyo (syā0)}. pathavī vuccati jagatī {jarā (syā0)}. yathā sūriyo tejī tejena samannāgato pathaviṃ ^a^M0.0144^ea^ abhibhuyya abhibhavitvā ajjhottharitvā pariyādiyitvā santāpayitvā sabbaṃ ākāsagataṃ tamagataṃ abhivihacca andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dassayitvā ākāse antalikkhe gaganapathe {gamanapathe (syā0) aṭṭhakathā oloketabbā} gacchati, evameva ^a^T0.0191^ea^ bhagavā ñāṇatejī ñāṇatejena samannāgato sabbaṃ abhisaṅkhārasamudayaṃ...pe0... kilesatamaṃ avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ñāṇālokaṃ dassetvā vatthukāme parijānitvā kilesakāme pahāya abhibhuyya abhibhavitvā ^a^V0.0130^ea^ ajjhottharitvā pariyādiyitvā madditvā carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpetīti -- ādiccova pathaviṃ tejī tejasā.

[03] ^b^parittapaññassa me bhūripañño^eb^ti ahamasmi parittapañño omakapañño lāmakapañño chatukkapañño. tvampi mahāpañño puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño. bhūri vuccati pathavī. bhagavā tāya pathavisamāya paññāya vipulāya vitthatāya samannāgatoti -- parittapaññassa me bhūripañño.

[03] ^b^ācikkha dhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijañña^eb^nti. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, cattāro satipaṭṭhāne...pe0... nibbānañca nibbānagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehi. ^b^yamahaṃ vijañña^eb^nti yamahaṃ jāneyyaṃ ājāneyyaṃ vijāneyyaṃ paṭijāneyyaṃ paṭivijjheyyaṃ adhigaccheyyaṃ phasseyyaṃ sacchikareyyanti -- ācikkha dhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ.

[03] ^b^jātijarāya idha vippahāna^eb^nti idheva jātijarāya maraṇassa ^a^T0.0192^ea^ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- jātijarāya idha vippahānaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``bhagavā hi kāme abhibhuyya iriyati, ādiccova pathaviṃ tejī tejasā.
[27] parittapaññassa me bhūripañño, ācikkha dhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ.
[22] jātijarāya idha vippahāna''nti..
[21] ^b^kāmesu^eb^ ^a^M0.0145^ea^ ^b^vinaya gedhaṃ, [jatukaṇṇīti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato.^eb^
[22] ^b^uggahitaṃ nirattaṃ vā, mā te vijjittha kiñcanaṃ.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^kāmesu vinaya gedha^eb^nti. ^b^kāmā^eb^ti uddānato dve kāmā -- vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca...pe0... ime vuccanti vatthukāmā...pe0... ime vuccanti kilesakāmā. ^b^gedha^eb^nti gedho vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. ^b^kāmesu vinaya gedha^eb^nti kāmesu gedhaṃ vinaya paṭivinaya pajaha vinodehi byantīkarohi anabhāvaṃ gamehīti -- kāmesu ^a^V0.0131^ea^ vinaya gedhaṃ. ^b^jatukaṇṇī^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gottena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- jatukaṇṇīti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato^eb^ti. ^b^nekkhamma^eb^nti sammāpaṭipadaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ ^a^T0.0193^ea^ apaccanīkapaṭipadaṃ anvatthapaṭipadaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ sīlesu paripūrakāritaṃ indriyesu guttadvārataṃ bhojane mattaññutaṃ jāgariyānuyogaṃ satisampajaññaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhāne cattāro sammappadhāne cattāro iddhipāde pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅge ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ nibbānañca nibbānagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ khemato tāṇato leṇato saraṇato saraṇībhūtato abhayato accutato amatato nibbānato daṭṭhuṃ passitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti -- nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato.

[03] ^b^uggahitaṃ nirattaṃ vā^eb^ti. ^b^uggahita^eb^nti taṇhāvasena diṭṭhivasena gahitaṃ parāmaṭṭhaṃ abhiniviṭṭhaṃ ajjhositaṃ adhimuttaṃ. ^b^nirattaṃ vā^eb^ti nirattaṃ vā muñcitabbaṃ vijahitabbaṃ vinoditabbaṃ byantīkātabbaṃ anabhāvaṃ gametabbanti -- uggahitaṃ nirattaṃ vā.

[03] ^b^mā te vijjittha kiñcana^eb^nti rāgakiñcanaṃ dosakiñcanaṃ mohakiñcanaṃ mānakiñcanaṃ diṭṭhikiñcanaṃ kilesakiñcanaṃ duccaritakiñcanaṃ. idaṃ kiñcanaṃ {ime kiñcanā (ka0)} tuyhaṃ mā vijjittha mā pavijjittha mā saṃvijjittha pajaha vinodehi byantīkarohi anabhāvaṃ gamehīti -- mā te vijjittha kiñcanaṃ. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``kāmesu ^a^M0.0146^ea^ vinaya gedhaṃ, [jatukaṇṇīti bhagavā]
[27] nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato.
[22] uggahitaṃ nirattaṃ vā, mā ^a^T0.0194^ea^ te vijjittha kiñcana''nti..
[21] ^b^yaṃ pubbe taṃ visosehi, pacchā te māhu kiñcanaṃ. ^eb^
[22] ^b^majjhe ce no gahessasi, upasanto carissasi.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^yaṃ pubbe taṃ visosehī^eb^ti atīte saṅkhāre ārabbha ye kilesā uppajjeyyuṃ te kilese sosehi visosehi sukkhāpehi visukkhāpehi abījaṃ karohi pajaha vinodehi byantīkarohi anabhāvaṃ gamehīti -- evampi yaṃ pubbe taṃ visosehi. atha vā, ye atītā kammābhisaṅkhārā avipakkavipākā ^a^V0.0132^ea^ te kammābhisaṅkhāre sosehi visosehi sukkhāpehi visukkhāpehi abījaṃ {avījaṃ (syā0)} karohi pajaha vinodehi byantīkarohi anabhāvaṃ gamehīti -- evampi yaṃ pubbe taṃ visosehi.

[03] ^b^pacchā te māhu kiñcana^eb^nti pacchā vuccati anāgate saṅkhāre ārabbha rāgakiñcanaṃ dosakiñcanaṃ mohakiñcanaṃ mānakiñcanaṃ diṭṭhikiñcanaṃ kilesakiñcanaṃ duccaritakiñcanaṃ. idaṃ kiñcanaṃ tuyhaṃ mā ahu mā ahosi mā janesi {mā janehi (syā0) tathāvasesesu dvīsu padesupi} mā sañjanesi mābhinibbattesi pajaha vinodehi byantīkarohi anabhāvaṃ gamehīti -- pacchā te māhu kiñcanaṃ.

[03] ^b^majjhe ce no gahessasī^eb^ti majjhe vuccati paccuppannaṃ rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ. paccuppanne saṅkhāre taṇhāvasena diṭṭhivasena na gahessasi na taṇhissasi na parāmasissasi na nandissasi nābhinandissasi na ajjhosissasi. abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ ^a^T0.0195^ea^ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahissasi vinodessasi byantīkarissasi anabhāvaṃ gamessasīti -- majjhe ce no gahessasi.

[03] ^b^upasanto carissasī^eb^ti rāgassa upasamitattā upasanto carissasi, dosassa...pe0... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṃ santattā samitattā upasamitattā vūpasamitattā nijjhātattā nibbutattā vigatattā paṭippassaddhattā santo upasanto vūpasanto nibbuto paṭippassaddho carissasi viharissasi iriyissasi ^a^M0.0147^ea^ vattissasi pālessasi yapessasi yāpessasīti -- upasanto carissasi. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``yaṃ pubbe taṃ visosehi, pacchā te māhu kiñcanaṃ.
[22] majjhe ce no gahessasi, upasanto carissasī''ti..
[21] ^b^sabbaso nāmarūpasmiṃ, vītagedhassa brāhmaṇa.^eb^
[22] ^b^āsavāssa na vijjanti, yehi maccuvasaṃ vaje..^eb^

[03] ^b^sabbaso nāmarūpasmiṃ vītagedhassa brāhmaṇā^eb^ti. ^b^sabbaso^eb^ti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ sabbasoti. ^b^nāma^eb^nti cattāro arūpino khandhā. ^b^rūpa^eb^nti cattāro ca mahābhūtā catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpaṃ. ^b^gedho^eb^ vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. ^b^sabbaso nāmarūpasmiṃ vītagedhassa brāhmaṇā^eb^ti sabbaso ^a^V0.0133^ea^ nāmarūpasmiṃ vītagedhassa vigatagedhassa cattagedhassa vantagedhassa muttagedhassa ^a^T0.0196^ea^ pahīnagedhassa paṭinissaṭṭhagedhassa vītarāgassa vigatarāgassa cattarāgassa vantarāgassa muttarāgassa pahīnarāgassa paṭinissaṭṭharāgassāti -- sabbaso nāmarūpasmiṃ vītagedhassa brāhmaṇa.

[03] ^b^āsavāssa na vijjantī^eb^ti. ^b^āsavā^eb^ti cattāro āsavā -- kāmāsavo, bhavāsavo, diṭṭhāsavo, avijjāsavo. ^b^assā^eb^ti arahato khīṇāsavassa. ^b^na vijjantī^eb^ti ime āsavā tassa natthi na santi na saṃvijjanti nupalabbhanti pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti -- āsavāssa na vijjanti.

[03] ^b^yehi maccuvasaṃ vaje^eb^ti yehi āsavehi maccuno vā vasaṃ gaccheyya, maraṇassa vā vasaṃ gaccheyya, mārapakkhassa vā vasaṃ gaccheyya; te āsavā tassa natthi na santi na saṃvijjanti nupalabbhanti pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāti -- yehi maccuvasaṃ vaje. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``sabbaso nāmarūpasmiṃ, vītagedhassa brāhmaṇa.
[22] āsavāssa na vijjanti, yehi maccuvasaṃ vaje''ti..
[03] saha ^a^M0.0148^ea^ gāthāpariyosānā...pe0... satthā me bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmīti.
[06] jatukaṇṇimāṇavapucchāniddeso ekādasamo.
[21] ^b^okañjahaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0197^ea^ ^b^taṇhacchidaṃ anejaṃ, [iccāyasmā bhadrāvudho]^eb^
[27] ^b^nandiñjahaṃ oghatiṇṇaṃ vimuttaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^kappañjahaṃ abhiyāce sumedhaṃ, sutvāna nāgassa apanamissanti^eb^ {apagamissanti (ka0)} ^b^ito..^eb^

[03] ^b^okañjahaṃ taṇhacchidaṃ aneja^eb^nti. ^b^okañjaha^eb^nti rūpadhātuyā yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upāyupādānā {upayupādānā (ka0)} cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, te buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ^a^V0.0134^ea^ ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. tasmā buddho okañjaho. vedanādhātuyā...pe0... saññādhātuyā... saṅkhāradhātuyā... viññāṇadhātuyā yo chando yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye upāyupādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā, te buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. tasmā buddho okañjaho.

[03] ^b^taṇhacchida^eb^nti. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti rūpataṇhā...pe0... dhammataṇhā. sā taṇhā buddhassa bhagavato chinnā ucchinnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā. tasmā buddho taṇhacchido. ^b^anejo^eb^ti ejā vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo ^a^T0.0198^ea^ ...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. sā ejā taṇhā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. tasmā buddho anejo. ejāya pahīnattā anejo bhagavā lābhepi na iñjati, alābhepi na iñjati, yasepi na iñjati, ayasepi na iñjati, pasaṃsāyapi na iñjati, nindāyapi na iñjati, sukhepi na iñjati, dukkhepi na iñjati na calati na vedhati na pavedhati na sampavedhatīti. tasmā buddho anejoti ^a^M0.0149^ea^ -- okañjahaṃ taṇhacchidaṃ anejaṃ. ^b^iccāyasmā bhadrāvudho^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti, piyavacanaṃ...pe0... ^b^bhadrāvudho^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ...pe0... abhilāpoti -- iccāyasmā bhadrāvudho.

[03] ^b^nandiñjahaṃ oghatiṇṇaṃ vimutta^eb^nti nandī vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. sā nandī sā taṇhā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. tasmā buddho nandiñjaho. ^b^oghatiṇṇa^eb^nti bhagavā kāmoghaṃ tiṇṇo bhavoghaṃ tiṇṇo diṭṭhoghaṃ tiṇṇo avijjoghaṃ tiṇṇo sabbasaṃsārapathaṃ tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivatto. so vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo...pe0... jātimaraṇasaṃsāro natthi tassa ^a^T0.0199^ea^ punabbhavoti -- nandiñjahaṃ oghatiṇṇaṃ. ^b^vimutta^eb^nti bhagavato rāgā cittaṃ muttaṃ vimuttaṃ suvimuttaṃ, dosā cittaṃ... mohā cittaṃ...pe0... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārehi cittaṃ muttaṃ vimuttaṃ suvimuttanti -- nandiñjahaṃ oghatiṇṇaṃ vimuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^kappañjahaṃ abhiyāce sumedha^eb^nti. ^b^kappā^eb^ti dve kappā -- taṇhākappo ca diṭṭhikappo ca...pe0... ayaṃ taṇhākappo...pe0... ayaṃ diṭṭhikappo. buddhassa bhagavato taṇhākappo pahīno diṭṭhikappo paṭinissaṭṭho. taṇhākappassa pahīnattā diṭṭhikappassa paṭinissaṭṭhattā tasmā buddho kappañjaho ^a^V0.0135^ea^. ^b^abhiyāce^eb^ti yācāmi abhiyācāmi ajjhesāmi sādiyāmi patthayāmi pihayāmi jappāmi abhijappāmi. ^b^sumedhā^eb^ vuccati paññā. yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi. bhagavā imāya medhāya paññāya upeto samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato. tasmā buddho sumedhoti -- kappañjahaṃ abhiyāce sumedhaṃ.

[03] ^b^sutvāna nāgassa apanamissanti ito^eb^ti. ^b^nāgassā^eb^ti nāgo. bhagavā āguṃ na karotīti nāgo, na gacchatīti nāgo, na āgacchatīti nāgo...pe0... evaṃ bhagavā na gacchatīti nāgo. ^b^sutvāna nāgassa apanamissanti ito^eb^ti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ byappathaṃ desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ ^a^T0.0200^ea^ sutvā suṇitvā uggahetvā upadhārayitvā upalakkhayitvā ito apanamissanti vajissanti pakkamissanti disāvidisaṃ gamissantīti -- sutvāna nāgassa apanamissanti ito. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``okañjahaṃ ^a^M0.0150^ea^ taṇhacchidaṃ anejaṃ, [iccāyasmā bhadrāvudho]
[27] nandiñjahaṃ oghatiṇṇaṃ vimuttaṃ.
[22] kappañjahaṃ abhiyāce sumedhaṃ, sutvāna nāgassa apanamissanti ito''ti..
[21] ^b^nānājanā janapadehi saṅgatā, tava vīra vākyaṃ abhikaṅkhamānā.^eb^
[22] ^b^tesaṃ tuvaṃ sādhu viyākarohi, tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo..^eb^

[01] ^b^nānājanā janapadehi saṅgatā^eb^ti. ^b^nānājanā^eb^ti khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca vessā ca suddā ca gahaṭṭhā ca pabbajitā ca devā ca manussā ca. ^b^janapadehi saṅgatā^eb^ti aṅgā ca magadhā ca kaliṅgā ca kāsiyā ca kosalā ca vajjiyā ca mallā ca cetiyamhā ca {cetiyamhā ca sāgaramhā ca (syā0)} vaṃsā ca kurumhā ca pañcālā ca macchā ca surasenā ca assakā ca avantiyā ca yonā {yonakā (ka0) mahāni0 55} ca kambojā ca. ^b^saṅgatā^eb^ti saṅgatā samāgatā samohitā sannipatitāti -- nānājanā janapadehi saṅgatā.
[03] ^b^tava vīra vākyaṃ abhikaṅkhamānā^eb^ti. ^b^vīrā^eb^ti vīro. bhagavā vīriyavāti vīro, pahūti vīro, visavīti vīro, alamattoti ^a^T0.0201^ea^ vīro, vigatalomahaṃsotipi vīro.
[21] virato idha sabbapāpakehi, nirayadukkhaṃ aticca vīriyavā so.
[22] so vīriyavā padhānavā, vīro tādi pavuccate tathattāti..

[03] ^b^tava^eb^ ^a^V0.0136^ea^ ^b^vīra vākyaṃ abhikaṅkhamānā^eb^ti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ byappathaṃ desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ. ^b^abhikaṅkhamānā^eb^ti abhikaṅkhamānā icchamānā sādiyamānā patthayamānā pihayamānā abhijappamānāti -- tava vīra vākyaṃ abhikaṅkhamānā.

[03] ^b^tesaṃ tuvaṃ sādhu viyākarohī^eb^ti. ^b^tesa^eb^nti tesaṃ khattiyānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vessānaṃ suddānaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ pabbajitānaṃ devānaṃ manussānaṃ. ^b^tuva^eb^nti bhagavantaṃ bhaṇati. ^b^sādhu viyākarohī^eb^ti sādhu ācikkhāhi desehi ^a^M0.0151^ea^ paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- tesaṃ tuvaṃ sādhu viyākarohi.
[03] ^b^tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo^eb^ti tathā hi te vidito tulito tīrito vibhūto vibhāvito esa dhammoti -- tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``nānājanā janapadehi saṅgatā, tava vīra vākyaṃ abhikaṅkhamānā.
[22] tesaṃ tuvaṃ sādhu viyākarohi, tathā ^a^T0.0202^ea^ hi te vidito esa dhammo''ti..
[21] ^b^ādānataṇhaṃ vinayetha sabbaṃ, [bhadrāvudhāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjhe.^eb^
[22] ^b^yaṃ yañhi lokasmimupādiyanti, teneva māro anveti jantuṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^ādānataṇhaṃ vinayetha sabba^eb^nti ādānataṇhaṃ vuccati rūpataṇhā...pe0... ādānataṇhāti kiṃkāraṇā vuccati ādānataṇhā? tāya taṇhāya rūpaṃ ādiyanti upādiyanti gaṇhanti parāmasanti abhinivisanti. vedanaṃ...pe0... saññaṃ... saṅkhāre... viññāṇaṃ... gatiṃ... upapattiṃ... paṭisandhiṃ... bhavaṃ... saṃsāraṃ... vaṭṭaṃ ādiyanti upādiyanti gaṇhanti parāmasanti abhinivisanti. taṃkāraṇā vuccati ādānataṇhā. ^b^ādānataṇhaṃ vinayetha sabba^eb^nti sabbaṃ ādānataṇhaṃ vinayeyya paṭivinayeyya pajaheyya vinodeyya byantīkareyya anabhāvaṃ gameyyāti -- ādānataṇhaṃ vinayetha sabbaṃ. ^b^bhadrāvudhāti bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^bhadrāvudhā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- bhadrāvudhāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti. ^b^uddha^eb^nti anāgataṃ; ^b^adho^eb^ti atītaṃ; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti ^a^V0.0137^ea^ paccuppannaṃ. ^b^uddha^eb^nti devaloko; ^b^adho^eb^ti nirayaloko; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti manussaloko. atha vā, ^b^uddha^eb^nti kusalā dhammā; ^b^adho^eb^ti akusalā dhammā; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti abyākatā dhammā. ^b^uddha^eb^nti arūpadhātu; ^b^adho^eb^ti kāmadhātu; ^b^tiriyañcāpi^eb^ ^a^T0.0203^ea^ ^b^majjhe^eb^ti rūpadhātu. ^b^uddha^eb^nti sukhā vedanā; ^b^adho^eb^ti dukkhā vedanā; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti adukkhamasukhā vedanā. ^b^uddha^eb^nti uddhaṃ pādatalā; ^b^adho^eb^ti ^a^M0.0152^ea^ adho kesamatthakā; ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti vemajjheti -- uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjhe.

[03] ^b^yaṃ yañhi lokasmimupādiyantī^eb^ti yaṃ yaṃ rūpagataṃ vedanāgataṃ saññāgataṃ saṅkhāragataṃ viññāṇagataṃ ādiyanti upādiyanti gaṇhanti parāmasanti abhinivisanti. ^b^lokasmi^eb^nti apāyaloke...pe0... āyatanaloketi -- yaṃ yañhi lokasmimupādiyanti.

[03] ^b^teneva māro anveti jantu^eb^nti teneva kammābhisaṅkhāravasena paṭisandhiko khandhamāro dhātumāro āyatanamāro gatimāro upapattimāro paṭisandhimāro bhavamāro saṃsāramāro vaṭṭamāro anveti anugacchati anvāyiko hoti. ^b^jantu^eb^nti sattaṃ janaṃ naraṃ māṇavaṃ {mānavaṃ (syā0)} posaṃ puggalaṃ jīvaṃ jāguṃ jantuṃ indaguṃ manujanti -- teneva māro anveti jantuṃ. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``ādānataṇhaṃ vinayetha sabbaṃ, [bhadrāvudhāti bhagavā]
[27] uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjhe.
[22] yaṃ yañhi lokasmimupādiyanti, teneva māro anveti jantu''nti..
[21] ^b^tasmā^eb^ ^a^T0.0204^ea^ ^b^pajānaṃ na upādiyetha,^eb^ ^b^bhikkhu sato kiñcanaṃ sabbaloke.^eb^
[22] ^b^ādānasatte iti pekkhamāno, pajaṃ imaṃ maccudheyye visattaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^tasmā pajānaṃ na upādiyethā^eb^ti. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti tasmā taṃkāraṇā taṃhetu tappaccayā taṃnidānā, etaṃ ādīnavaṃ sampassamāno ādānataṇhāyāti -- tasmā. ^b^pajāna^eb^nti jānanto pajānanto ājānanto vijānanto paṭivijānanto paṭivijjhanto ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti...pe0... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti jānanto pajānanto ājānanto vijānanto paṭivijānanto paṭivijjhanto. ^b^na upādiyethā^eb^ti rūpaṃ nādiyeyya na upādiyeyya na gaṇheyya na parāmaseyya nābhiniviseyya; vedanaṃ...pe0... saññaṃ... saṅkhāre... viññāṇaṃ... gatiṃ ^a^V0.0138^ea^... upapattiṃ... paṭisandhiṃ... bhavaṃ... saṃsāraṃ... vaṭṭaṃ nādiyeyya na upādiyeyya na gaṇheyya na parāmaseyya nābhiniviseyyāti -- tasmā pajānaṃ na upādiyetha.

[03] ^b^bhikkhu^eb^ ^a^M0.0153^ea^ ^b^sato kiñcanaṃ sabbaloke^eb^ti. ^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti puthujjanakalyāṇako vā bhikkhu, sekkho vā bhikkhu. ^b^sato^eb^ti catūhi kāraṇehi sato -- kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato...pe0... so vuccati satoti -- bhikkhu sato. ^b^kiñcana^eb^nti kiñci rūpagataṃ vedanāgataṃ saññāgataṃ saṅkhāragataṃ viññāṇagataṃ. ^b^sabbaloke^eb^ti ^a^T0.0205^ea^ sabbāpāyaloke sabbamanussaloke sabbadevaloke sabbakhandhaloke sabbadhātuloke sabbāayatanaloketi -- bhikkhu sato kiñcanaṃ sabbaloke.

[03] ^b^ādānasatte iti pekkhamāno^eb^ti ādānasattā vuccanti ye rūpaṃ ādiyanti upādiyanti gaṇhanti parāmasanti abhinivisanti; vedanaṃ...pe0... saññaṃ... saṅkhāre... viññāṇaṃ... gatiṃ... upapattiṃ... paṭisandhiṃ... bhavaṃ... saṃsāraṃ... vaṭṭaṃ ādiyanti upādiyanti gaṇhanti parāmasanti abhinivisanti. ^b^itī^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... padānupubbatāpetaṃ itīti. ^b^pekkhamāno^eb^ti pekkhamāno dakkhamāno dissamāno passamāno olokayamāno nijjhāyamāno upaparikkhamānoti -- ādānasatte iti pekkhamāno.

[03] ^b^pajaṃ imaṃ maccudheyye visatta^eb^nti. ^b^pajā^eb^ti sattādhivacanaṃ maccudheyyā vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca. pajā maccudheyye māradheyye maraṇadheyye sattā visattā āsattā laggā laggitā palibuddhā. yathā bhittikhile vā nāgadante vā bhaṇḍaṃ sattaṃ visattaṃ āsattaṃ laggaṃ laggitaṃ palibuddhaṃ, evameva pajā maccudheyye māradheyye maraṇadheyye sattā visattā āsattā laggā laggitā palibuddhāti -- pajaṃ imaṃ maccudheyye visattaṃ. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``tasmā pajānaṃ na upādiyetha, bhikkhu ^a^T0.0206^ea^ sato kiñcanaṃ sabbaloke.
[22] ādānasatte iti pekkhamāno, pajaṃ imaṃ maccudheyye visatta''nti..
[03] saha gāthāpariyosānā...pe0... satthā me bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmīti.
[06] bhadrāvudhamāṇavapucchāniddeso dvādasamo.
[21] ^b^jhāyiṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0207^ea^ ^a^V0.0139^ea^ ^a^M0.0154^ea^ ^b^virajamāsīnaṃ, [iccāyasmā udayo]^eb^
[27] ^b^katakiccaṃ anāsavaṃ.^eb^
[26] ^b^pāraguṃ sabbadhammānaṃ, atthi pañhena āgamaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^aññāvimokkhaṃ pabrūhi^eb^ {saṃbrūhi (syā0)}, avijjāya pabhedanaṃ..b^

[03] ^b^jhāyiṃ virajamāsīna^eb^nti. ^b^jhāyi^eb^nti jhāyī bhagavā. paṭhamenapi jhānena jhāyī, dutiyenapi jhānena jhāyī, tatiyenapi jhānena jhāyī, catutthenapi jhānena jhāyī, savitakkasavicārenapi jhānena jhāyī, avitakkavicāramattenapi jhānena jhāyī, avitakkāvicārenapi jhānena jhāyī, sappītikenapi jhānena jhāyī, nippītikenapi jhānena jhāyī, sātasahagatenapi jhānena jhāyī, upekkhāsahagatenapi jhānena jhāyī, suññatenapi jhānena jhāyī, animittenapi jhānena jhāyī, appaṇihitenapi jhānena jhāyī, lokiyenapi jhānena jhāyī, lokuttarenapi jhānena jhāyī jhānarato ekattamanuyutto sadatthagarukoti -- jhāyiṃ. ^b^viraja^eb^nti rāgo rajo, doso rajo, moho rajo, kodho rajo, upanāho rajo...pe0... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā rajā. te rajā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. tasmā ^a^T0.0208^ea^ buddho arajo virajo nirajo rajāpagato rajavippahīno rajavippayutto sabbarajavītivatto.
[21] rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati,
[27] rāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ rajoti.
[22] etaṃ rajaṃ vippajahitvā {paṭivinoditvā (ka0) mahāni0 209} cakkhumā, tasmā jino vigatarajoti vuccati..
[21] doso rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati, dosassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ rajoti.
[22] etaṃ rajaṃ vippajahitvā cakkhumā, tasmā jino vigatarajoti vuccati..
[21] moho ^a^M0.0155^ea^ rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati, mohassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ rajoti.
[22] etaṃ rajaṃ vippajahitvā cakkhumā, tasmā jino vigatarajoti vuccatīti.. --
[03] ^b^āsīna^eb^nti nisinno bhagavā pāsāṇake cetiyeti -- āsīno.
[21] nagassa {nagarassa (ka0)} passe āsīnaṃ, muniṃ dukkhassa pāraguṃ.
[22] sāvakā payirupāsanti, tevijjā maccuhāyinoti..

[03] evampi bhagavā āsīno. atha vā, bhagavā sabbossukkapaṭippassaddhattā āsīno vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo...pe0... jātimaraṇasaṃsāro natthi tassa punabbhavoti. evampi bhagavā āsīnoti -- jhāyiṃ virajamāsīnaṃ ^a^T0.0209^ea^.
[03] ^b^iccāyasmā udayo^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ...pe0... ^b^udayo^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ...pe0... abhilāpoti -- iccāyasmā udayo.
[03] ^b^katakiccaṃ anāsava^eb^nti buddhassa bhagavato kiccākiccaṃ karaṇīyākaraṇīyaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ. tasmā buddho katakicco.
[21] yassa ca visatā {yassa paripatā (syā0) passa mahāni0 202} natthi, chinnasotassa bhikkhuno.
[22] kiccākiccappahīnassa, pariḷāho na vijjatīti..

[03] ^b^katakiccaṃ anāsava^eb^nti. ^b^āsavā^eb^ti cattāro āsavā -- kāmāsavo, bhavāsavo, diṭṭhāsavo, avijjāsavo. te āsavā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. tasmā buddho anāsavoti -- katakiccaṃ anāsavaṃ.

[03] ^b^pāraguṃ sabbadhammāna^eb^nti bhagavā sabbadhammānaṃ abhiññāpāragū pariññāpāragū pahānapāragū bhāvanāpāragū sacchikiriyāpāragū samāpattipāragū. abhiññāpāragū sabbadhammānaṃ, pariññāpāragū sabbadukkhānaṃ, pahānapāragū sabbakilesānaṃ, bhāvanāpāragū catunnaṃ maggānaṃ, sacchikiriyāpāragū nirodhassa, samāpattipāragū sabbasamāpattīnaṃ. so vasippatto pāramippatto ariyasmiṃ sīlasmiṃ; vasippatto ^a^T0.0210^ea^ ^a^M0.0156^ea^ pāramippatto ariyasmiṃ samādhismiṃ; vasippatto pāramippatto ariyāya paññāya; vasippatto pāramippatto ariyāya vimuttiyā. so pāragato pārappatto antagato antappatto koṭigato ^a^V0.0141^ea^ koṭippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto vosānagato vosānappatto tāṇagato tāṇappatto leṇagato leṇappatto saraṇagato saraṇappatto abhayagato abhayappatto accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbānagato nibbānappatto. so vuttavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo...pe0... jātimaraṇasaṃsāro natthi tassa punabbhavoti -- pāraguṃ sabbadhammānaṃ.

[03] ^b^atthi pañhena āgama^eb^nti pañhena atthiko āgatomhi, pañhaṃ pucchitukāmo āgatomhi, pañhaṃ sotukāmo āgatomhīti, evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṃ. atha vā, pañhatthikānaṃ pañhaṃ pucchitukāmānaṃ pañhaṃ sotukāmānaṃ āgamanaṃ abhikkamanaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ payirupāsanaṃ atthīti, evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṃ. atha vā, pañhāgamo tuyhaṃ atthi, tvampi pahu tvamasi alamatto mayā pucchitaṃ kathetuṃ visajjetuṃ, vahassetaṃ bhāranti, evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṃ.

[03] ^b^aññāvimokkhaṃ pabrūhī^eb^ti aññāvimokkho vuccati arahattavimokkho. arahattavimokkhaṃ pabrūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- aññāvimokkhaṃ pabrūhi.
[03] ^b^avijjāya^eb^ ^a^T0.0211^ea^ ^b^pabhedana^eb^nti avijjāya bhedanaṃ pabhedanaṃ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhaṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- avijjāya pabhedanaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``jhāyiṃ virajamāsīnaṃ, [iccāyasmā udayo]
[21] katakiccaṃ anāsavaṃ.
[22] pāraguṃ sabbadhammānaṃ, atthi pañhena āgamaṃ.
[27] aññāvimokkhaṃ pabrūhi, avijjāya pabhedana''nti..
[21] ^b^pahānaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0157^ea^ ^b^kāmacchandānaṃ, [udayāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^domanassāna cūbhayaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^thinassa^eb^ {thīnassa (syā0)} ^b^ca panūdanaṃ, kukkuccānaṃ nivāraṇaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^pahānaṃ kāmacchandāna^eb^nti. ^b^chando^eb^ti yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā kāmasineho kāmapipāsā kāmapariḷāho kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmupādānaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ. ^b^pahānaṃ kāmacchandāna^eb^nti kāmacchandānaṃ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ ^a^V0.0142^ea^ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- pahānaṃ kāmacchandānaṃ. ^b^udayāti bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^udayā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... ^a^T0.0212^ea^ sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- udayāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^domanassāna cūbhaya^eb^nti. ^b^domanassā^eb^ti yaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ, cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā. ^b^domanassāna cūbhaya^eb^nti kāmacchandassa ca domanassassa ca ubhinnaṃ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- domanassāna cūbhayaṃ.

[03] ^b^thinassa ca panūdana^eb^nti. ^b^thina^eb^nti yā cittassa akalyatā akammaññatā olīyanā sallīyanā līnā līyanā līyitattaṃ thinaṃ thiyanā {thīnaṃ thīyanā (syā0)} thiyitattaṃ cittassa. ^b^panūdana^eb^nti thinassa ca panūdanaṃ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- thinassa ca panūdanaṃ.

[03] ^b^kukkuccānaṃ nivāraṇa^eb^nti. ^b^kukkucca^eb^nti hatthakukkuccampi kukkuccaṃ, pādakukkuccampi kukkuccaṃ, hatthapādakukkuccampi kukkuccaṃ. akappiye kappiyasaññitā, kappiye akappiyasaññitā...pe0... avajje vajjasaññitā, vajje avajjasaññitā. yaṃ evarūpaṃ kukkuccaṃ kukkuccāyanā kukkuccāyitattaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho, idaṃ vuccati kukkuccaṃ. api ca, dvīhi kāraṇehi uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho -- katattā ca akatattā ca. kathaṃ katattā ca akatattā ca uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho? ``kataṃ me kāyaduccaritaṃ, akataṃ me kāyasucarita''nti uppajjati ^a^T0.0213^ea^ kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho ^a^M0.0158^ea^. ``kataṃ me vacīduccaritaṃ, akataṃ me vacīsucarita''nti...pe0... ``kataṃ me manoduccaritaṃ, akataṃ me manosucarita''nti...pe0... ``kato me pāṇātipāto, akatā me pāṇātipātā veramaṇī''ti...pe0... ``kataṃ me adinnādānaṃ, akatā me adinnādānā veramaṇī''ti...pe0... ``kato me kāmesumicchācāro, akatā me kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī''ti...pe0... ``kato me musāvādo, akatā me musāvādā veramaṇī''ti...pe0... ``katā me pisuṇā vācā {pisuṇavācā (ka0)}, akatā me pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī''ti...pe0... ``katā me pharusā vācā, akatā me pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī''ti...pe0... ``kato me samphappalāpo, akatā me samphappalāpā veramaṇī''ti...pe0... ``katā me abhijjhā, akatā me anabhijjhā''ti...pe0... ``kato me byāpādo, akato me abyāpādo''ti...pe0... ``katā me micchādiṭṭhi, akatā me sammādiṭṭhī''ti ^a^V0.0143^ea^, uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho. evaṃ katattā ca akatattā ca uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.

[03] atha vā, ``sīlesumhi aparipūrakārī''ti uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho; ``indriyesumhi aguttadvāro''ti...pe0... ``bhojane amattaññumhī''ti... ``jāgariyaṃ ananuyuttomhī''ti... ``na satisampajaññena samannāgatomhī''ti... ``abhāvitā me cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti, cattāro sammappadhānāti cattāro iddhipādāti, pañcindriyānīti, pañca balānīti, satta ^a^T0.0214^ea^ bojjhaṅgāti, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo''ti... ``dukkhaṃ me apariññātaṃ, samudayo me appahīno, maggo me abhāvito, nirodho me asacchikato''ti uppajjati kukkuccaṃ cetaso vippaṭisāro manovilekho.
[03] ^b^kukkuccānaṃ nivāraṇa^eb^nti kukkuccānaṃ āvaraṇaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ pahānaṃ upasamaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- kukkuccānaṃ nivāraṇaṃ. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``pahānaṃ kāmacchandānaṃ, [udayāti bhagavā]
[27] domanassāna cūbhayaṃ.
[22] thinassa ca panūdanaṃ, kukkuccānaṃ nivāraṇa''nti..
[21] ^b^upekkhāsatisaṃsuddhaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0159^ea^, ^b^dhammatakkapurejavaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^aññāvimokkhaṃ pabrūmi, avijjāya pabhedanaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^upekkhāsatisaṃsuddha^eb^nti. ^b^upekkhā^eb^ti yā catutthe jhāne upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā cittasamatā {cittasamatho (syā0) mahāni0 207} cittappassaddhatā majjhattatā cittassa. ^b^satī^eb^ti yā catutthe jhāne upekkhaṃ ārabbha sati anussati...pe0... sammāsati. ^b^upekkhāsatisaṃsuddha^eb^nti catutthe jhāne upekkhā ca sati ca suddhā honti visuddhā saṃsuddhā parisuddhā pariyodātā anaṅgaṇā vigatūpakkilesā mudubhūtā kammaniyā ṭhitā āneñjappattāti -- upekkhāsatisaṃsuddhaṃ.

[03] ^b^dhammatakkapurejava^eb^nti dhammatakko vuccati sammāsaṅkappo. so ^a^T0.0215^ea^ ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti, evampi dhammatakkapurejavaṃ. atha vā, dhammatakko vuccati sammādiṭṭhi. sā ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti ^a^V0.0144^ea^, evampi dhammatakkapurejavaṃ. atha vā, dhammatakko vuccati catunnaṃ maggānaṃ pubbabhāgavipassanā. sā ādito hoti, purato hoti, pubbaṅgamo hoti aññāvimokkhassāti -- evampi dhammatakkapurejavaṃ.

[03] ^b^aññāvimokkhaṃ pabrūmī^eb^ti aññāvimokkho vuccati arahattavimokkho. arahattavimokkhaṃ pabrūmi ācikkhāmi desemi paññapemi paṭṭhapemi vivarāmi vibhajāmi uttānīkaromi pakāsemīti -- aññāvimokkhaṃ pabrūmi.

[03] ^b^avijjāya pabhedana^eb^nti. ^b^avijjā^eb^ti dukkhe aññāṇaṃ...pe0... avijjā moho akusalamūlaṃ. ^b^pabhedana^eb^nti avijjāya pabhedanaṃ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- avijjāya pabhedanaṃ. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``upekkhāsatisaṃsuddhaṃ, dhammatakkapurejavaṃ.
[22] aññāvimokkhaṃ pabrūmi, avijjāya pabhedana''nti..
[21] ^b^kiṃsu saṃyojano loko, kiṃsu tassa vicāraṇaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^kissassa vippahānena, nibbānaṃ iti vuccati..^eb^

[03] ^b^kiṃsu^eb^ ^a^M0.0160^ea^ ^b^saṃyojano loko^eb^ti lokassa saṃyojanaṃ lagganaṃ ^a^T0.0216^ea^ bandhanaṃ upakkileso. kena loko yutto payutto āyutto samāyutto laggo laggito palibuddhoti -- kiṃsu saṃyojano loko.

[03] ^b^kiṃsu tassa vicāraṇa^eb^nti kiṃsu tassa cāraṇaṃ vicāraṇaṃ paṭivicāraṇaṃ. kena loko carati vicarati paṭivicaratīti -- kiṃsu tassa vicāraṇaṃ. ^b^kissassa vippahānena nibbānaṃ iti vuccatī^eb^ti kissassa vippahānena vūpasamena paṭinissaggena paṭippassaddhiyā nibbānaṃ iti vuccati pavuccati kathīyati bhaṇīyati dīpīyati voharīyatīti -- kissassa vippahānena nibbānaṃ iti vuccati. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``kiṃsu saṃyojano loko, kiṃsu tassa vicāraṇaṃ.
[22] kissassa vippahānena, nibbānaṃ iti vuccatī''ti..
[21] ^b^nandisaṃyojano^eb^ ^a^V0.0145^ea^ ^b^loko, vitakkassa vicāraṇā.^eb^
[22] ^b^taṇhāya vippahānena, nibbānaṃ iti vuccati..^eb^

[03] ^b^nandisaṃyojano loko^eb^ti nandī vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati nandī. yā nandī lokassa saṃyojanaṃ lagganaṃ bandhanaṃ upakkileso, imāya nandiyā loko yutto payutto āyutto samāyutto laggo laggito palibuddhoti -- nandisaṃyojano loko.

[03] ^b^vitakkassa vicāraṇā^eb^ti. ^b^vitakkā^eb^ti nava vitakkā -- kāmavitakko, byāpādavitakko, vihiṃsāvitakko, ñātivitakko janapadavitakko ^a^T0.0217^ea^, amarāvitakko, parānudayatāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto vitakko. ime vuccanti nava vitakkā. ime nava vitakkā lokassa cāraṇā vicāraṇā paṭivicāraṇā. imehi navahi vitakkehi loko carati vicarati paṭivicaratīti -- vitakkassa vicāraṇā.

[03] ^b^taṇhāya vippahānena nibbānaṃ iti vuccatī^eb^ti. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti rūpataṇhā...pe0... dhammataṇhā. ^b^taṇhāya vippahānena nibbānaṃ iti vuccatī^eb^ti taṇhāya vippahānena vūpasamena paṭinissaggena paṭippassaddhiyā nibbānaṃ iti vuccati pavuccati kathīyati bhaṇīyati dīpīyati voharīyatīti -- taṇhāya vippahānena nibbānaṃ iti vuccati. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``nandisaṃyojano ^a^M0.0161^ea^ loko, vitakkassa vicāraṇā.
[22] taṇhāya vippahānena, nibbānaṃ iti vuccatī''ti..
[21] ^b^kathaṃ satassa carato, viññāṇaṃ uparujjhati.^eb^
[22] ^b^bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamā, taṃ suṇoma vaco tava..^eb^
[03] ^b^kathaṃ satassa carato^eb^ti kathaṃ satassa sampajānassa carato viharato iriyato vattayato pālayato yapayato yāpayatoti -- kathaṃ satassa carato.
[03] ^b^viññāṇaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0146^ea^ ^b^uparujjhatī^eb^ti viññāṇaṃ nirujjhati vūpasammati atthaṃ ^a^T0.0218^ea^ gacchati paṭippassambhatīti -- viññāṇaṃ uparujjhati.

[01] ^b^bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamā^eb^ti buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhuṃ pucchituṃ yācituṃ ajjhesituṃ pasādetuṃ āgamhā āgatamhā upāgatamhā sampattamhā, ``tayā saddhiṃ samāgatamhā''ti -- bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamā.

[03] ^b^taṃ suṇoma vaco tavā^eb^ti. ^b^ta^eb^nti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ byappathaṃ desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ suṇoma uggaṇhāma dhārema upadhārema upalakkhemāti -- taṃ suṇoma vaco tava. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``kathaṃ satassa carato, viññāṇaṃ uparujjhati.
[22] bhagavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamā, taṃ suṇoma vaco tavā''ti..
[21] ^b^ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, vedanaṃ nābhinandato.^eb^
[22] ^b^evaṃ satassa carato, viññāṇaṃ uparujjhati..^eb^

[01] ^b^ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca vedanaṃ nābhinandato^eb^ti ajjhattaṃ vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti {na ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati (syā0)}, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti; bahiddhā vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti; ajjhattabahiddhā vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ^a^M0.0162^ea^ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ ^a^T0.0219^ea^ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti. ajjhattaṃ samudayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī {idaṃ padaṃ natthi syā0 potthake} viharanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti; ajjhattaṃ vayadhammānupassī vedanāsu ^a^V0.0147^ea^ vedanānupassī viharanto...pe0... ajjhattaṃ samudayavayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto...pe0... bahiddhā samudayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti; bahiddhā vayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto...pe0... bahiddhā samudayavayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto...pe0... ajjhattabahiddhā samudayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto...pe0... ajjhattabahiddhā vayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto...pe0... ajjhattabahiddhā samudayavayadhammānupassī vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti. imehi dvādasahi ākārehi vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto...pe0... anabhāvaṃ gameti.

[01] atha vā, vedanaṃ aniccato passanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti. vedanaṃ dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato...pe0... nissaraṇato passanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti ^a^T0.0220^ea^ byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti. imehi cattālīsāya {dvācattāḷīsāya (syā0)} ākārehi vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharanto vedanaṃ nābhinandati nābhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanaṃ abhivadanaṃ ajjhosānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ abhinivesaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gametīti -- ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca vedanaṃ nābhinandato.
[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0163^ea^ ^b^satassa carato^eb^ti evaṃ satassa sampajānassa carato viharato iriyato vattayato pālayato yapayato yāpayatoti -- evaṃ satassa carato.

[03] ^b^viññāṇaṃ uparujjhatī^eb^ti puññābhisaṅkhārasahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ apuññābhisaṅkhārasahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ āneñjābhisaṅkhārasahagataṃ viññāṇaṃ nirujjhati vūpasammati atthaṃ gacchati paṭippassambhatīti -- viññāṇaṃ uparujjhatī. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, vedanaṃ nābhinandato.
[22] evaṃ satassa carato, viññāṇaṃ uparujjhatī''ti..
[03] saha gāthāpariyosānā...pe0... satthā me, bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmīti.
[06] udayamāṇavapucchāniddeso terasamo.
[21] ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^T0.0221^ea^ ^a^V0.0148^ea^ ^b^atītaṃ ādisati, [iccāyasmā posālo]^eb^
[27] ^b^anejo chinnasaṃsayo.^eb^
[22] ^b^pāraguṃ^eb^ {pāragū (syā0 ka0)} ^b^sabbadhammānaṃ, atthi pañhena āgamaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^yo atītaṃ ādisatī^eb^ti. ^b^yo^eb^ti yo so bhagavā sayambhū. anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto, balesu ca vasībhāvaṃ. ^b^atītaṃ ādisatī^eb^ti bhagavā attano ca paresañca atītampi ādisati, anāgatampi ādisati, paccuppannampi ādisati.

[03] kathaṃ bhagavā attano atītaṃ ādisati? bhagavā attano atītaṃ ekampi jātiṃ ādisati, dvepi jātiyo ādisati, tissopi jātiyo ādisati, catassopi jātiyo ādisati, pañcapi jātiyo ādisati, dasapi jātiyo ādisati, vīsampi jātiyo ādisati, tiṃsampi jātiyo ādisati, cattālīsampi jātiyo ādisati ^a^M0.0164^ea^, paññāsampi jātiyo ādisati, jātisatampi...pe0... jātisahassampi... jātisatasahassampi... anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe... anekepi vivaṭṭakappe... anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe ādisati -- ``amutrāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapādiṃ; tatrāpāsiṃ ^a^T0.0222^ea^ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto idhūpapanno''ti. iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ ādisati. evaṃ bhagavā attano atītaṃ ādisati.

[03] kathaṃ bhagavā paresaṃ atītaṃ ādisati? bhagavā paresaṃ atītaṃ ekampi jātiṃ ādisati, dvepi jātiyo ādisati...pe0... anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe ādisati -- ``amutrāsi evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapādi; tatrāpāsi evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto idhūpapanno''ti. iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ ādisati. evaṃ bhagavā paresaṃ atītaṃ ādisati.

[03] bhagavā ^a^V0.0149^ea^ pañca jātakasatāni bhāsanto attano ca paresañca atītaṃ ādisati, mahāpadāniyasuttantaṃ {mahādhaniyasuttaṃ (syā0)} bhāsanto attano ca paresañca atītaṃ ādisati, mahāsudassaniyasuttantaṃ bhāsanto attano ca paresañca atītaṃ ādisati, mahāgovindiyasuttantaṃ bhāsanto attano ca paresañca atītaṃ ādisati, maghadeviyasuttantaṃ bhāsanto attano ca paresañca atītaṃ ādisati.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``atītaṃ kho, cunda, addhānaṃ ārabbha tathāgatassa satānusāriñāṇaṃ {satānussariyañāṇaṃ (ka0) passa dī0 ni0 3.187} hoti. so yāvatakaṃ ākaṅkhati tāvatakaṃ ^a^T0.0223^ea^ anussarati. anāgatañca kho, cunda...pe0... paccuppannañca kho, cunda, addhānaṃ ārabbha tathāgatassa bodhijaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati -- `ayamantimā jāti, natthidāni punabbhavo'''ti.

[03] indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṃ ^a^M0.0165^ea^ {indriyaparopariyattiñāṇaṃ (ka0) aṭṭhakathā oloketabbā} tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ, sattānaṃ āsayānusayañāṇaṃ tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ, yamakapāṭihīre ñāṇaṃ {yamakapāṭihiriyañāṇaṃ (syā0)} tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ, mahākaruṇāsamāpattiyā ñāṇaṃ tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ, sabbaññutañāṇaṃ tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ, anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ, sabbattha asaṅgamappaṭihatamanāvaraṇañāṇaṃ tathāgatassa tathāgatabalaṃ. evaṃ bhagavā attano ca paresañca atītampi ādisati anāgatampi ādisati paccuppannampi ādisati ācikkhati deseti paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti pakāsetīti -- yo atītaṃ ādisati.
[03] ^b^iccāyasmā posālo^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ...pe0... ^b^posālo^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ...pe0... abhilāpoti -- iccāyasmā posālo.

[03] ^b^anejo chinnasaṃsayo^eb^ti ejā vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ. sā ejā taṇhā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. tasmā buddho anejo. ejāya pahīnattā anejo. bhagavā lābhepi na iñjati...pe0... ^a^T0.0224^ea^ dukkhepi na iñjati na calati na vedhati nappavedhati na sampavedhatīti anejo. ^b^chinnasaṃsayo^eb^ti saṃsayo vuccati vicikicchā. dukkhe kaṅkhā...pe0... chambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho. so saṃsayo buddhassa bhagavato pahīno chinno ucchinno samucchinno vūpasanto paṭinissaggo paṭippassaddho abhabbuppattiko ñāṇagginā daḍḍho. tasmā buddho chinnasaṃsayoti -- anejo chinnasaṃsayo.

[03] ^b^pāraguṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0150^ea^ ^b^sabbadhammāna^eb^nti bhagavā sabbadhammānaṃ abhiññāpāragū pariññāpāragū pahānapāragū bhāvanāpāragū sacchikiriyāpāragū samāpattipāragū abhiññāpāragū sabbadhammānaṃ...pe0... jātimaraṇasaṃsāro natthi tassa punabbhavoti -- pāragū sabbadhammānaṃ.
[03] ^b^atthi pañhena āgama^eb^nti pañhena atthiko āgatomhi...pe0... ``vahassetaṃ bhāra''nti -- atthi pañhena āgamaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``yo ^a^M0.0166^ea^ atītaṃ ādisati, [iccāyasmā posālo]
[27] anejo chinnasaṃsayo.
[22] pāraguṃ sabbadhammānaṃ, atthi pañhena āgama''nti..
[21] ^b^vibhūtarūpasaññissa, sabbakāyappahāyino.^eb^
[27] ^b^ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, natthi kiñcīti passato. ^eb^
[22] ^b^ñāṇaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0225^ea^ ^b^sakkānupucchāmi, kathaṃ neyyo tathāvidho..^eb^

[03] ^b^vibhūtarūpasaññissā^eb^ti katamā rūpasaññā? rūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ -- ayaṃ rūpasaññā. ^b^vibhūtarūpasaññissā^eb^ti catasso arūpasamāpattiyo paṭiladdhassa {lābhissa (syā0)} rūpasaññā vibhūtā honti vigatā atikkantā samatikkantā vītivattāti -- vibhūtarūpasaññissa.
[03] ^b^sabbakāyappahāyino^eb^ti sabbo tassa paṭisandhiko rūpakāyo pahīno, tadaṅgasamatikkamā vikkhambhanappahānena pahīno tassa rūpakāyoti -- sabbakāyappahāyino.

[03] ^b^ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, natthi kiñcīti passato^eb^ti. ^b^natthi kiñcī^eb^ti ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti. kiṃkāraṇā? natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti. yaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ sato samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā taññeva viññāṇaṃ abhāveti, vibhāveti, antaradhāpeti, ``natthi kiñcī''ti passati -- taṃkāraṇā natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattīti -- ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca natthi kiñcīti passato.

[03] ^b^ñāṇaṃ sakkānupucchāmī^eb^ti. ^b^sakkā^eb^ti -- sakko. bhagavā sakyakulā pabbajitotipi sakko ^a^V0.0151^ea^ ...pe0... pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṃsotipi sakko. ^b^ñāṇaṃ sakkānupucchāmī^eb^ti tassa ñāṇaṃ pucchāmi, paññaṃ ^a^T0.0226^ea^ pucchāmi, sambuddhaṃ pucchāmi. ``kīdisaṃ kiṃsaṇṭhitaṃ kiṃpakāraṃ kiṃpaṭibhāgaṃ ñāṇaṃ icchitabba''nti -- ñāṇaṃ sakkānupucchāmi.

[03] ^b^kathaṃ neyyo tathāvidho^eb^ti kathaṃ so netabbo vinetabbo anunetabbo paññapetabbo nijjhāpetabbo pekkhetabbo pasādetabbo? kathaṃ tena {kathamassa (syā0)} uttari ñāṇaṃ uppādetabbaṃ? ^b^tathāvidho^eb^ti tathāvidho tādiso ^a^M0.0167^ea^ tassaṇṭhito tappakāro tappaṭibhāgo yo so ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattilābhīti -- kathaṃ neyyo tathāvidho. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``vibhūtarūpasaññissa, sabbakāyappahāyino.
[27] ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, natthi kiñcīti passato.
[22] ñāṇaṃ sakkānupucchāmi, kathaṃ neyyo tathāvidho''ti..
[21] ^b^viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo sabbā, [posālāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^abhijānaṃ tathāgato.^eb^
[22] ^b^tiṭṭhantamenaṃ jānāti, dhimuttaṃ tapparāyaṇaṃ.^eb^

[03] ^b^viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo sabbā^eb^ti bhagavā abhisaṅkhāravasena catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo jānāti, paṭisandhivasena satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo jānāti. kathaṃ bhagavā abhisaṅkhāravasena catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo jānāti? vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``rūpupayaṃ {rūpūpāyaṃ (syā0 ka0) passa saṃ0 ni0 3.53} vā, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ tiṭṭheyya {tiṭṭhati (syā0 ka0)}, rūpārammaṇaṃ rūpappatiṭṭhaṃ nandūpasecanaṃ vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjeyya. vedanupayaṃ vā, bhikkhave...pe0... saññupayaṃ vā, bhikkhave...pe0... saṅkhārupayaṃ vā, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ tiṭṭheyya, saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ saṅkhārappatiṭṭhaṃ nandūpasecanaṃ vuddhiṃ ^a^T0.0227^ea^ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjeyyā''ti. evaṃ bhagavā abhisaṅkhāravasena catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo jānāti.

[03] kathaṃ bhagavā paṭisandhivasena satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo jānāti? vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``santi, bhikkhave, sattā nānattakāyā nānattasaññino -- seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā. ayaṃ paṭhamā viññāṇaṭṭhiti.
[03] ``santi ^a^V0.0152^ea^, bhikkhave, sattā nānattakāyā ekattasaññino, seyyathāpi devā brahmakāyikā paṭhamābhinibbattā. ayaṃ dutiyā viññāṇaṭṭhiti.
[03] ``santi, bhikkhave, sattā ekattakāyā nānattasaññino, seyyathāpi devā ābhassarā. ayaṃ tatiyā viññāṇaṭṭhiti.
[03] ``santi ^a^M0.0168^ea^, bhikkhave, sattā ekattakāyā ekattasaññino, seyyathāpi devā subhakiṇhā. ayaṃ catutthī {catutthā (syā0) passa a0 ni0 7.44} viññāṇaṭṭhiti.

[03] ``santi, bhikkhave, sattā sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā, ananto ākāsoti ākāsānañcāyatanūpagā. ayaṃ pañcamī {pañcamā (syā0)} viññāṇaṭṭhiti.
[03] ``santi, bhikkhave, sattā sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma, anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanūpagā. ayaṃ chaṭṭhī {chaṭṭho (syā0)} viññāṇaṭṭhiti.

[03] ``santi, bhikkhave, sattā sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma, natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā. ayaṃ sattamī {sattamā (syā0)} viññāṇaṭṭhiti''. evaṃ bhagavā ^a^T0.0228^ea^ paṭisandhivasena satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo jānātīti -- viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo sabbā.
[03] ^b^posālāti bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^posālā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- posālāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^abhijānaṃ tathāgato^eb^ti. ^b^abhijāna^eb^nti abhijānanto vijānanto paṭivijānanto paṭivijjhanto tathāgato. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``atītaṃ cepi kho, cunda, hoti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasañhitaṃ, na taṃ tathāgato byākaroti. atītaṃ cepi, cunda, hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasañhitaṃ, tampi tathāgato na byākaroti. atītaṃ cepi kho, cunda, hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasañhitaṃ, tatra kālaññū tathāgato hoti tasseva pañhassa veyyākaraṇāya. anāgataṃ cepi, cunda, hoti...pe0... paccuppannaṃ cepi, cunda, hoti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ anatthasañhitaṃ, na taṃ tathāgato byākaroti. paccuppannaṃ cepi, cunda, hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ anatthasañhitaṃ, tampi tathāgato ^a^V0.0153^ea^ na byākaroti. paccuppannaṃ cepi, cunda, hoti bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasañhitaṃ, tatra kālaññū tathāgato hoti tassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇāya. iti kho, cunda, atītānāgatapaccuppannesu dhammesu tathāgato kālavādī bhūtavādī atthavādī dhammavādī vinayavādī. tasmā tathāgatoti vuccati.

[03] ``yaṃ kho, cunda, sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ ^a^M0.0169^ea^ anuvicaritaṃ manasā ^a^T0.0229^ea^, sabbaṃ taṃ tathāgatena abhisambuddhaṃ. tasmā tathāgatoti vuccati. yañca, cunda, rattiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhati, yañca rattiṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati, yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti no aññathā. tasmā tathāgatoti vuccati. yathāvādī, cunda, tathāgato tathākārī; yathākārī tathāvādī. iti yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī. tasmā tathāgatoti vuccati. sadevake, cunda, loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī. tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatī''ti -- abhijānaṃ tathāgato.

[03] ^b^tiṭṭhantamenaṃ jānātī^eb^ti bhagavā idhatthaññeva {idhaṭṭhaññeva (syā0)} jānāti kammābhisaṅkhāravasena -- ``ayaṃ puggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjissatī''ti. bhagavā idhatthaññeva jānāti kammābhisaṅkhāravasena -- ``ayaṃ puggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā tiracchānayoniṃ upapajjissatī''ti. bhagavā idhatthaññeva jānāti kammābhisaṅkhāravasena -- ``ayaṃ puggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pettivisayaṃ upapajjissatī''ti. bhagavā idhatthaññeva jānāti kammābhisaṅkhāravasena -- ``ayaṃ puggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā manussesu uppajjissatī''ti. bhagavā idhatthaññeva jānāti kammābhisaṅkhāravasena -- ``ayaṃ puggalo suppaṭipanno kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ ^a^T0.0230^ea^ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissatī''ti.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``idha panāhaṃ, sāriputta, ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi -- `tathāyaṃ puggalo paṭipanno, tathā ca iriyati, tañca maggaṃ samārūḷho, yathā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjissatī'ti.

[03] ``idha panāhaṃ, sāriputta, ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi -- `tathāyaṃ ^a^V0.0154^ea^ puggalo paṭipanno tathā ca iriyati tañca maggaṃ samārūḷho, yathā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā tiracchānayoniṃ upapajjissatī'ti.

[03] ``idha ^a^M0.0170^ea^ panāhaṃ, sāriputta, ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi -- `tathāyaṃ puggalo paṭipanno tathā ca iriyati tañca maggaṃ samārūḷho, yathā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pettivisayaṃ upapajjissatī'ti.

[03] ``idha panāhaṃ, sāriputta, ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi -- `tathāyaṃ puggalo paṭipanno tathā ca iriyati tañca maggaṃ samārūḷho, yathā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā manussesu uppajjissatī'ti.

[03] ``idha panāhaṃ, sāriputta, ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi -- `tathāyaṃ puggalo paṭipanno tathā ca iriyati tañca maggaṃ samārūḷho, yathā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissatī'ti.

[03] ``idha panāhaṃ, sāriputta, ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi -- `tathāyaṃ puggalo paṭipanno tathā ca iriyati tañca maggaṃ samārūḷho, yathā ^a^T0.0231^ea^ āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī'''ti -- tiṭṭhantamenaṃ jānāti.

[03] ^b^dhimuttaṃ tapparāyaṇa^eb^nti. ^b^dhimutta^eb^nti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ. dhimuttanti vimokkhena dhimuttaṃ tatrādhimuttaṃ tadadhimuttaṃ tadādhipateyyaṃ. atha vā, bhagavā jānāti -- ``ayaṃ puggalo rūpādhimutto saddādhimutto gandhādhimutto rasādhimutto phoṭṭhabbādhimutto kulādhimutto gaṇādhimutto āvāsādhimutto lābhādhimutto yasādhimutto pasaṃsādhimutto sukhādhimutto cīvarādhimutto piṇḍapātādhimutto senāsanādhimutto gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārādhimutto suttantādhimutto vinayādhimutto abhidhammādhimutto āraññakaṅgādhimutto piṇḍapātikaṅgādhimutto paṃsukūlikaṅgādhimutto tecīvarikaṅgādhimutto sapadānacārikaṅgādhimutto khalupacchābhattikaṅgādhimutto nesajjikaṅgādhimutto yathāsanthatikaṅgādhimutto paṭhamajjhānādhimutto dutiyajjhānādhimutto tatiyajjhānādhimutto catutthajjhānādhimuttoākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattādhimutto viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattādhimutto ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattādhimutto nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattādhimutto''tidhimuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^tapparāyaṇa^eb^nti ^a^V0.0155^ea^ ^a^M0.0171^ea^ ākiñcaññāyatanamayaṃ tapparāyaṇaṃ kammaparāyaṇaṃ vipākaparāyaṇaṃ kammagarukaṃ paṭisandhigarukaṃ ^a^T0.0232^ea^. atha vā, bhagavā jānāti -- ``ayaṃ puggalo rūpaparāyaṇo...pe0... nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiparāyaṇo''ti -- dhimuttaṃ tapparāyaṇaṃ. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo sabbā, [posālāti bhagavā]
[27] abhijānaṃ tathāgato.
[22] tiṭṭhantamenaṃ jānāti, dhimuttaṃ tapparāyaṇa''nti..
[21] ^b^ākiñcaññāsambhavaṃ ñatvā, nandisaṃyojanaṃ iti.^eb^
[27] ^b^evametaṃ abhiññāya, tato tattha vipassati.^eb^
[22] ^b^etaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathaṃ tassa, brāhmaṇassa vusīmato..^eb^

[03] ^b^ākiñcaññāsambhavaṃ ñatvā^eb^ti ākiñcaññāsambhavoti vuccati ākiñcaññāyatanasaṃvattaniko kammābhisaṅkhāro. ākiñcaññāyatanasaṃvattanikaṃ kammābhisaṅkhāraṃ ākiñcaññāsambhavoti ñatvā, laggananti ñatvā, bandhananti ñatvā, palibodhoti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti -- ākiñcaññāsambhavaṃ ñatvā.

[03] ^b^nandisaṃyojanaṃ itī^eb^ti ^b^nandisaṃyojanaṃ^eb^ vuccati arūparāgo. arūparāgena taṃ kammaṃ laggaṃ laggitaṃ palibuddhaṃ arūparāgaṃ nandisaṃyojananti ñatvā, laggananti ñatvā, bandhananti ñatvā, palibodhoti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ ^a^T0.0233^ea^ katvā. ^b^itī^eb^ti padasandhi padasaṃsaggo padapāripūrī akkharasamavāyo byañjanasiliṭṭhatā padānupubbatāpetaṃ itīti -- nandisaṃyojanaṃ iti.
[03] ^b^evametaṃ abhiññāyā^eb^ti evaṃ etaṃ abhiññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti -- evametaṃ abhiññāya.

[03] ^b^tato tattha vipassatī^eb^ti. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā tattha jāte cittacetasike dhamme aniccato vipassati, dukkhato vipassati, rogato...pe0... nissaraṇato ^a^V0.0156^ea^ vipassati dakkhati oloketi nijjhāyati upaparikkhatīti -- tato tattha vipassati.
[03] ^b^etaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathaṃ tassā^eb^ti etaṃ ñāṇaṃ tacchaṃ bhūtaṃ yāthāvaṃ aviparītaṃ tassāti -- etaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathaṃ tassa.

[03] ^b^brāhmaṇassa^eb^ ^a^M0.0172^ea^ ^b^vusīmato^eb^ti. ^b^brāhmaṇo^eb^ti sattannaṃ dhammānaṃ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo...pe0... asito tādi pavuccate sa brahmāti. ^b^brāhmaṇassa vusīmato^eb^ti puthujjanakalyāṇaṃ upādāya satta sekkhā appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya vasanti saṃvasanti āvasanti parivasanti; arahā vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññā vimutto; so vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo...pe0... jātimaraṇasaṃsāro; natthi tassa punabbhavoti -- brāhmaṇassa ^a^T0.0234^ea^ vusīmato. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``ākiñcaññāsambhavaṃ ñatvā, nandisaṃyojanaṃ iti.
[27] evametaṃ abhiññāya, tato tattha vipassati.
[22] etaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathaṃ tassa, brāhmaṇassa vusīmato''ti..
[03] saha gāthāpariyosānā...pe0... satthā me, bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmīti.
[06] posālamāṇavapucchāniddeso cuddasamo.
[21] ^b^dvāhaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0235^ea^ ^a^V0.0157^ea^ ^b^sakkaṃ apucchissaṃ, [iccāyasmā mogharājā]^eb^
[27] ^b^na me byākāsi cakkhumā.^eb^
[22] ^b^yāvatatiyañca devīsi^eb^ {devisi (syā0)}, ^b^byākarotīti me sutaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^dvāhaṃ sakkaṃ apucchissa^eb^nti so brāhmaṇo dvikkhattuṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi. tassa bhagavā pañhaṃ puṭṭho na byākāsi -- ``tadantarā {cakkhusamanantarā (syā0)} imassa brāhmaṇassa indriyaparipāko bhavissatī''ti. ^b^sakka^eb^nti sakko. bhagavā sakyakulā pabbajitotipi sakko. atha vā, aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko. tassimāni dhanāni, seyyathidaṃ -- saddhādhanaṃ sīladhanaṃ hiridhanaṃ ottappadhanaṃ sutadhanaṃ cāgadhanaṃ paññādhanaṃ satipaṭṭhānadhanaṃ sammappadhānadhanaṃ iddhipādadhanaṃ indriyadhanaṃ baladhanaṃ bojjhaṅgadhanaṃ maggadhanaṃ phaladhanaṃ nibbānadhanaṃ. imehi anekavidhehi dhanaratanehi aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko. atha vā, sakko ^a^M0.0173^ea^ pahu visavī alamatto sūro vīro vikkanto abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṃsotipi sakko. ^b^dvāhaṃ sakkaṃ apucchissa^eb^nti dvāhaṃ sakkaṃ apucchissaṃ ayācissaṃ ajjhesissaṃ pasādayissanti -- dvāhaṃ sakkaṃ apucchissaṃ.

[03] ^b^iccāyasmā mogharājā^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti ^a^T0.0236^ea^ piyavacanaṃ...pe0... ^b^mogharājā^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ...pe0... abhilāpoti -- iccāyasmā mogharājā.

[03] ^b^na me byākāsi cakkhumā^eb^ti. ^b^na me byākāsī^eb^ti na me byākāsi na ācikkhi na desesi na paññapesi na paṭṭhapesi na vivari na vibhaji na uttānīakāsi na pakāsesi. ^b^cakkhumā^eb^ti bhagavā pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā -- maṃsacakkhunāpi cakkhumā, dibbacakkhunāpi {dibbena cakkhunāpi (ka0)} cakkhumā, paññācakkhunāpi cakkhumā, buddhacakkhunāpi cakkhumā, samantacakkhunāpi cakkhumā.

[03] kathaṃ bhagavā maṃsacakkhunāpi cakkhumā? maṃsacakkhumhi bhagavato pañca vaṇṇā saṃvijjanti -- nīlo ca vaṇṇo, pītako ca vaṇṇo, lohitako ca vaṇṇo, kaṇho ca vaṇṇo, odāto ca vaṇṇo. yattha ca akkhilomāni patiṭṭhitāni taṃ nīlaṃ hoti sunīlaṃ pāsādikaṃ dassaneyyaṃ umāpupphasamānaṃ {ummārapupphasamānaṃ (syā0) mahāni0 156}. tassa parato pītakaṃ hoti supītakaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ pāsādikaṃ ^a^V0.0158^ea^ dassaneyyaṃ kaṇikārapupphasamānaṃ. ubhato ca akkhikūṭāni bhagavato lohitakāni honti sulohitakāni pāsādikāni dassaneyyāni indagopakasamānāni. majjhe kaṇhaṃ hoti sukaṇhaṃ alūkhaṃ siniddhaṃ pāsādikaṃ dassaneyyaṃ addāriṭṭhakasamānaṃ {aḷāriṭṭhakasamānaṃ (syā0)}. tassa parato odātaṃ hoti suodātaṃ setaṃ paṇḍaraṃ pāsādikaṃ dassaneyyaṃ osadhitārakasamānaṃ. tena bhagavā pākatikena maṃsacakkhunā attabhāvapariyāpannena purimasucaritakammābhinibbattena samantā yojanaṃ passati divā ceva rattiñca ^a^T0.0237^ea^. yadā hi caturaṅgasamannāgato andhakāro hoti sūriyo ca atthaṅgato {atthaṅgamito (syā0 ka0)} hoti; kāḷapakkho ca uposatho hoti, tibbo ca vanasaṇḍo hoti, mahā ca kāḷamegho {akālamegho (syā0 ka0) passa mahāni0 156} abbhuṭṭhito hoti. evarūpe caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre samantā ^a^M0.0174^ea^ yojanaṃ passati. natthi so kuṭṭo vā kavāṭaṃ vā pākāro vā pabbato vā gaccho vā latā vā āvaraṇaṃ rūpānaṃ dassanāya. ekaṃ ce tilaphalaṃ nimittaṃ katvā tilavāhe pakkhipeyya, taṃyeva tilaphalaṃ uddhareyya. evaṃ parisuddhaṃ bhagavato pākatikaṃ maṃsacakkhu. evaṃ bhagavā maṃsacakkhunāpi cakkhumā.

[03] kathaṃ bhagavā dibbena cakkhunāpi cakkhumā? bhagavā dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe; sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajānāti -- ``ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena samannāgatā manoduccaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ upavādakā micchādiṭṭhikā micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā, te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapannā; ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena samannāgatā manosucaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ anupavādakā sammādiṭṭhikā sammādiṭṭhikammasamādānā, te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā''ti. iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate, yathākammūpage satte pajānāti. ākaṅkhamāno ca bhagavā ekampi lokadhātuṃ passeyya, dvepi lokadhātuyo passeyya, tissopi lokadhātuyo passeyya, catassopi lokadhātuyo passeyya, pañcapi lokadhātuyo passeyya, dasapi lokadhātuyo passeyya, vīsampi lokadhātuyo passeyya, tiṃsampi lokadhātuyo passeyya, cattālīsampi lokadhātuyo passeyya, paññāsampi lokadhātuyo passeyya, satampi lokadhātuyo passeyya, sahassimpi cūḷanikaṃ lokadhātuṃ passeyya, dvisahassimpi majjhimikaṃ lokadhātuṃ passeyya, tisahassimpi lokadhātuṃ passeyya, mahāsahassimpi {tisahassiṃ mahāsahassampi (ka0)} lokadhātuṃ passeyya, yāvatakaṃ vā {yāvatā (sī0 ka0)} pana ākaṅkheyya tāvatakaṃ passeyya. evaṃ parisuddhaṃ bhagavato dibbacakkhu. evaṃ bhagavā dibbena cakkhunāpi cakkhumā.

[03] kathaṃ ^a^T0.0238^ea^ ^a^V0.0159^ea^ ^a^M0.0175^ea^ bhagavā paññācakkhunāpi cakkhumā? bhagavā mahāpañño puthupañño javanapañño hāsapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño paññāpabhedakusalo pabhinnañāṇo adhigatapaṭisambhidappatto catuvesārajjappatto dasabaladhārī purisāsabho purisasīho purisanāgo purisājañño purisadhorayho anantañāṇo anantatejo anantayaso aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavā netā vinetā anunetā paññāpetā nijjhāpetā pekkhetā pasādetā. so hi bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā, maggaññū maggavidū maggakovido maggānugā ca pana etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā.

[03] so hi bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passati, cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī {dhammasāmi (syā0 ka0)} tathāgato. natthi tassa bhagavato aññātaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ asacchikataṃ aphassitaṃ {aphusitaṃ (syā0 ka0)} paññāya. atītaṃ anāgataṃ paccuppannaṃ {atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ (syā0)} upādāya sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchanti. yaṃ kiñci neyyaṃ nāma atthi jānitabbaṃ {atthi dhammaṃ jānitabbaṃ (ka0)} attattho vā parattho vā ubhayattho vā diṭṭhadhammiko vā attho samparāyiko vā attho uttāno vā attho gambhīro vā attho gūḷho vā attho paṭicchanno vā attho neyyo vā attho nīto vā attho anavajjo vā attho nikkileso vā attho vodāno vā attho paramattho ^a^T0.0239^ea^ vā {paramattho vā attho (ka0)}, sabbaṃ taṃ anto buddhañāṇe parivattati.

[03] sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇānuparivatti, sabbaṃ vacīkammaṃ ñāṇānuparivatti, sabbaṃ manokammaṃ ñāṇānuparivatti. atīte buddhassa bhagavato appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ, anāgate appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ, paccuppanne appaṭihataṃ ñāṇaṃ, yāvatakaṃ neyyaṃ tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ tāvatakaṃ neyyaṃ. neyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ neyyaṃ, neyyaṃ atikkamitvā ñāṇaṃ nappavattati, ñāṇaṃ atikkamitvā neyyapatho natthi. aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino te dhammā. yathā dvinnaṃ samuggapaṭalānaṃ sammāphusitānaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ uparimaṃ ^a^M0.0176^ea^ nātivattati, uparimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ nātivattati, aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino; evameva buddhassa bhagavato neyyañca ñāṇañca aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino. yāvatakaṃ neyyaṃ tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ tāvatakaṃ neyyaṃ, neyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ neyyaṃ. neyyaṃ atikkamitvā ñāṇaṃ nappavattati, ñāṇaṃ atikkamitvā neyyapatho natthi. aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino te dhammā.

[03] sabbadhammesu ^a^V0.0160^ea^ buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavattati. sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanapaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhapaṭibaddhā manasikārapaṭibaddhā cittuppādapaṭibaddhā. sabbasattesu buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavattati. sabbesañca sattānaṃ bhagavā āsayaṃ jānāti, anusayaṃ ^a^T0.0240^ea^ jānāti, caritaṃ jānāti, adhimuttiṃ jānāti, apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre suviññāpaye duviññāpaye bhabbābhabbe satte jānāti. sadevako loko samārako sabrahmako sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī pajā sadevamanussā antobuddhañāṇe parivattati.

[03] yathā ye keci macchakacchapā antamaso timitimiṅgalaṃ {timitipiṅgalaṃ (ka0)} upādāya antomahāsamudde parivattanti, evameva sadevako loko samārako loko sabrahmako loko sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī pajā sadevamanussā antobuddhañāṇe parivattati. yathā ye keci pakkhī antamaso garuḷaṃ venateyyaṃ upādāya ākāsassa padese parivattanti, evameva yepi te sāriputtasamā paññāya samannāgatā tepi buddhañāṇassa padese parivattanti; buddhañāṇaṃ devamanussānaṃ paññaṃ pharitvā abhibhavitvā tiṭṭhati.

[03] yepi te khattiyapaṇḍitā brāhmaṇapaṇḍitā gahapatipaṇḍitā samaṇapaṇḍitā nipuṇā kataparappavādā vālavedhirūpā vobhindantā {te bhindantā (syā0 ka0)} maññe caranti paññāgatena diṭṭhigatāni, te pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā abhisaṅkharitvā tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchanti gūḷhāni ca paṭicchannāni. kathitā visajjitā ca te pañhā bhagavatā {bhagavato (ka0)} honti niddiṭṭhakāraṇā. upakkhittakā ca te bhagavato sampajjanti. atha kho bhagavāva tattha atirocati -- yadidaṃ paññāyāti. evaṃ bhagavā paññācakkhunāpi cakkhumā.

[03] kathaṃ ^a^M0.0177^ea^ bhagavā buddhacakkhunāpi cakkhumā? bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ ^a^T0.0241^ea^ volokento {olokento (ka0)} addasa satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre suviññāpaye duviññāpaye appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassāvino {para ... dassāvine (ka0)} viharante. seyyathāpi nāma uppaliniyaṃ vā paduminiyaṃ vā puṇḍarīkiniyaṃ vā appekaccāni uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake saṃvaḍḍhāni udakānuggatāni antonimuggaposīni {antonimmuggaposīni (ka0)}, appekaccāni uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake saṃvaḍḍhāni samodakaṃ ṭhitāni, appekaccāni uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake saṃvaḍḍhāni udakā accuggamma tiṭṭhanti anupalittāni udakena; evamevaṃ bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento addasa satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye ^a^V0.0161^ea^ svākāre dvākāre suviññāpaye duviññāpaye appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassāvino viharante. jānāti bhagavā -- ``ayaṃ puggalo rāgacarito, ayaṃ dosacarito, ayaṃ mohacarito, ayaṃ vitakkacarito, ayaṃ saddhācarito, ayaṃ ñāṇacarito''ti. rāgacaritassa bhagavā puggalassa asubhakathaṃ katheti; dosacaritassa bhagavā puggalassa mettābhāvanaṃ ācikkhati; mohacaritassa bhagavā puggalassa uddese paripucchāya kālena dhammassavane kālena dhammasākacchāya garusaṃvāse niveseti; vitakkacaritassa bhagavā puggalassa ānāpānassatiṃ ācikkhati; saddhācaritassa bhagavā puggalassa pasādanīyaṃ nimittaṃ ^a^T0.0242^ea^ ācikkhati buddhasubodhiṃ {buddhasubuddhataṃ (ka0)} dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiṃ sīlāni ca; attano ñāṇacaritassa bhagavā puggalassa vipassanānimittaṃ ācikkhati aniccākāraṃ dukkhākāraṃ anattākāraṃ.
[21] ``sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhito, yathāpi passe janataṃ samantato.
[21] tathūpamaṃ dhammamayaṃ sumedha, pāsādamāruyha samantacakkhu.
[22] sokāvatiṇṇaṃ {sokāvakiṇṇaṃ (syā0)} janatamapetasoko, avekkhassu jātijarābhibhūta''nti..
[03] evaṃ ^a^M0.0178^ea^ bhagavā buddhacakkhunāpi cakkhumā.
[03] kathaṃ bhagavā samantacakkhunāpi cakkhumā? samantacakkhu vuccati sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. bhagavā sabbaññutañāṇena upeto samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato.
[21] ``na tassa addiṭṭhamidhatthi kiñci, atho aviññātamajānitabbaṃ.
[22] sabbaṃ abhiññāsi yadatthi neyyaṃ, tathāgato tena samantacakkhū''ti..
[03] evaṃ bhagavā samantacakkhunāpi cakkhumāti -- na me byākāsi cakkhumā.

[03] ^b^yāvatatiyañca devīsi, byākarotīti me suta^eb^nti yāvatatiyaṃ buddho sahadhammikaṃ pañhaṃ puṭṭho byākaroti no saṃsāretīti {sampāyatīti (syā0)} -- evaṃ ^a^T0.0243^ea^ mayā uggahitaṃ, evaṃ mayā upadhāritaṃ, evaṃ mayā upalakkhitaṃ. ^b^devīsī^eb^ti bhagavā ceva isi cāti -- devīsi. yathā rājā pabbajitā vuccanti rājisayo, brāhmaṇā pabbajitā vuccanti brāhmaṇisayo, evameva bhagavā devo ceva isi cāti -- devīsi.

[03] atha ^a^V0.0162^ea^ vā, bhagavā pabbajitotipi isi. mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī pariyesītipi isi. mahantaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ...pe0... mahantaṃ paññākkhandhaṃ... mahantaṃ vimuttikkhandhaṃ... mahantaṃ vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī pariyesītipi isi. mahato tamokāyassa padālanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesītipi isi. mahato vipallāsassa pabhedanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesītipi isi. mahato taṇhāsallassa abbahanaṃ... mahato diṭṭhisaṅghāṭassa viniveṭhanaṃ... mahato mānaddhajassa papātanaṃ... mahato abhisaṅkhārassa vūpasamaṃ... mahato oghassa nittharaṇaṃ... mahato bhārassa nikkhepanaṃ... mahato saṃsāravaṭṭassa upacchedaṃ... mahato santāpassa nibbāpanaṃ... mahato pariḷāhassa paṭippassaddhiṃ... mahato dhammaddhajassa ussāpanaṃ esī gavesī pariyesītipi isi. mahante satipaṭṭhāne... mahante sammappadhāne... mahantāni indriyāni... mahantāni balāni... mahante bojjhaṅge... mahantaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ... mahantaṃ paramatthaṃ ṃ1ataṃ nibbānaṃ esī gavesī pariyesītipi isi. mahesakkhehi vā sattehi esito gavesito pariyesito -- ``kahaṃ ^a^M0.0179^ea^ buddho, kahaṃ bhagavā, kahaṃ devadevo, kahaṃ narāsabho''tipi isīti -- yāvatatiyañca devīsi byākarotīti me sutaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``dvāhaṃ ^a^T0.0244^ea^ sakkaṃ apucchissaṃ, [iccāyasmā mogharājā]
[21] na me byākāsi cakkhumā.
[22] yāvatatiyañca devīsi, byākarotīti me suta''nti..
[21] ^b^ayaṃ loko paro loko, brahmaloko sadevako.^eb^
[22] ^b^diṭṭhiṃ te nābhijānāti, gotamassa yasassino..^eb^
[03] ^b^ayaṃ loko paro loko^eb^ti. ^b^ayaṃ loko^eb^ti manussaloko. ^b^paro loko^eb^ti manussalokaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbo paro lokoti -- ayaṃ loko paro loko.
[03] ^b^brahmaloko sadevako^eb^ti sadevako loko samārako sabrahmako sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī pajā sadevamanussāti -- brahmaloko sadevako.

[03] ^b^diṭṭhiṃ te nābhijānātī^eb^ti tuyhaṃ diṭṭhiṃ khantiṃ ruciṃ laddhiṃ ajjhāsayaṃ adhippāyaṃ loko na jānāti -- ``ayaṃ evaṃdiṭṭhiko evaṃkhantiko evaṃruciko evaṃladdhiko evaṃajjhāsayo evaṃadhippāyo''ti ^a^V0.0163^ea^ na jānāti na passati na dakkhati nādhigacchati na vindati na paṭilabhatīti -- diṭṭhiṃ te nābhijānāti.

[03] ^b^gotamassa yasassino^eb^ti bhagavā yasappattoti yasassī. atha vā, bhagavā sakkato garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānantipi yasassīti -- gotamassa yassino. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``ayaṃ ^a^T0.0245^ea^ loko paro loko, brahmaloko sadevako.
[22] diṭṭhiṃ te nābhijānāti, gotamassa yasassino''ti..
[21] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0180^ea^ ^b^abhikkantadassāviṃ, atthi pañhena āgamaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^kathaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passati..^eb^
[03] ^b^evaṃ abhikkantadassāvi^eb^nti evaṃ abhikkantadassāviṃ aggadassāviṃ seṭṭhadassāviṃ viseṭṭhadassāviṃ pāmokkhadassāviṃ uttamadassāviṃ paramadassāvinti -- evaṃ abhikkantadassāviṃ.
[03] ^b^atthi pañhena āgama^eb^nti pañhena atthiko āgatomhi...pe0... vahassetaṃ bhāranti, evampi atthi pañhena āgamaṃ.
[03] ^b^kathaṃ lokaṃ avekkhanta^eb^nti kathaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ paccavekkhantaṃ tulayantaṃ tīrayantaṃ vibhāvayantaṃ vibhūtaṃ karontanti -- kathaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ.
[03] ^b^maccurājā na passatī^eb^ti maccurājā na passati na dakkhati nādhigacchati na vindati na paṭilabhatīti -- maccurājā na passati. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``evaṃ abhikkantadassāviṃ, atthi pañhena āgamaṃ.
[22] kathaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passatī''ti..
[21] ^b^suññato^eb^ ^a^V0.0164^ea^ ^b^lokaṃ avekkhassu, mogharāja sadā sato. ^eb^
[27] ^b^attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhacca, evaṃ maccutaro siyā.^eb^
[22] ^b^evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passati..^eb^

[03] ^b^suññato^eb^ ^a^T0.0246^ea^ ^b^lokaṃ avekkhassū^eb^ti. ^b^loko^eb^ti nirayaloko tiracchānaloko pettivisayaloko manussaloko devaloko khandhaloko dhātuloko āyatanaloko ayaṃ loko paro loko brahmaloko sadevako {sadevako loko (ka0)}. aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ``loko lokoti, bhante, vuccati. kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, lokoti vuccatī''ti? ``lujjatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā lokoti vuccati. kiñca lujjati? cakkhu kho bhikkhu lujjati, rūpā lujjanti, cakkhuviñāṇaṃ lujjati, cakkhusamphasso lujjati, yampidaṃ {yamidaṃ (ka0) passa saṃ0 ni0 4.82} cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi lujjati; sotaṃ lujjati, gandhā lujjanti...pe0... kāyo lujjati ^a^M0.0181^ea^, phoṭṭhabbā lujjanti; mano lujjati, dhammā lujjanti, manoviññāṇaṃ lujjati, manosamphasso lujjati; yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi lujjati. lujjatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā lokoti vuccati''.

[03] ^b^suññato lokaṃ avekkhassū^eb^ti dvīhi kāraṇehi suññato lokaṃ avekkhati -- avasiyapavattasallakkhaṇavasena {avassiyapavatta ... (syā0)} vā tucchasaṅkhārasamanupassanāvasena vā. kathaṃ avasiyapavattasallakkhaṇavasena suññato lokaṃ avekkhati? rūpe vaso na labbhati, vedanāya vaso na labbhati, saññāya vaso ^a^T0.0247^ea^ na labbhati, saṅkhāresu vaso na labbhati, viññāṇe vaso na labbhati. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā {passa saṃ0 ni0 3.59} -- ``rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, anattā. rūpañca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyya; labbhetha ca rūpe -- `evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī'ti. yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ anattā, tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattati na ca labbhati rūpe -- `evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī'ti.

[03] ``vedanā anattā. vedanā ca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṃ vedanā ābādhāya saṃvatteyya; labbhetha ca vedanāya -- `evaṃ me vedanā hotu, evaṃ me vedanā mā ahosī'ti. yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, vedanā anattā, tasmā vedanā ābādhāya saṃvattati, na ca labbhati vedanāya -- `evaṃ me vedanā hotu, evaṃ me vedanā mā ahosī'ti.

[03] ``saññā ^a^V0.0165^ea^ anattā. saññā ca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṃ saññā ābādhāya saṃvatteyya; labbhetha ca saññāya -- `evaṃ me saññā hotu, evaṃ me saññā mā ahosī'ti. yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, saññā anattā, tasmā saññā ābādhāya saṃvattati, na ca labbhati saññāya -- `evaṃ me saññā hotu, evaṃ me saññā mā ahosī'ti.
