[03] ``saṅkhārā anattā. saṅkhārā ca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissaṃsu, nayidaṃ saṅkhārā ābādhāya saṃvatteyyuṃ; labbhetha ca saṅkhāresu -- `evaṃ me saṅkhārā hontu, evaṃ me saṅkhārā mā ahesu'nti. yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave ^a^M0.0182^ea^, saṅkhārā ^a^T0.0248^ea^ anattā, tasmā saṅkhārā ābādhāya saṃvattanti, na ca labbhati saṅkhāresu -- `evaṃ me saṅkhārā hontu, evaṃ me saṅkhārā mā ahesu'nti.

[03] ``viññāṇaṃ anattā. viññāṇañca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṃ viññāṇaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyya; labbhetha ca viññāṇe -- `evaṃ me viññāṇaṃ hotu, evaṃ me viññāṇaṃ mā ahosī'ti. yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṃ anattā, tasmā viññāṇaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattati, na ca labbhati viññāṇe -- `evaṃ me viññāṇaṃ hotu, evaṃ me viññāṇaṃ mā ahosī'''ti.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``nāyaṃ, bhikkhave, kāyo tumhākaṃ, napi aññesaṃ {paresaṃ (syā0) passa saṃ0 ni0 2.37}. purāṇamidaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayitaṃ vedaniyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. tatra kho, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaṃyeva sādhukaṃ yoniso manasi karoti -- `iti imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjati; imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti, imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhati, yadidaṃ -- avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti -- evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti'''.

[03] ``avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho, saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho ^a^T0.0249^ea^ ...pe0... jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā nirujjhanti ^a^V0.0166^ea^, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotī''ti. evaṃ avasiyapavattasallakkhaṇavasena suññato lokaṃ avekkhati.

[03] kathaṃ tucchasaṅkhārasamanupassanāvasena suññato lokaṃ avekkhati? rūpe sāro na labbhati, vedanāya sāro na labbhati, saññāya sāro na labbhati, saṅkhāresu sāro na labbhati, viññāṇe sāro na labbhati; rūpaṃ assāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagataṃ niccasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena vā attasārasārena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena ^a^M0.0183^ea^ vā. vedanā assārā nissārā sārāpagatā...pe0... saññā assārā nissārā sārāpagatā... saṅkhārā assārā nissārā sārāpagatā... viññāṇaṃ assāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagataṃ niccasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena vā attasārasārena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā. yathā naḷo assāro nissāro sārāpagato, yathā ca eraṇḍo...pe0... yathā ca udumbaro assāro nissāro sārāpagato, yathā ca setagaccho {setavaccho (ka0)} assāro nissāro ^a^T0.0250^ea^ sārāpagato, yathā ca pālibhaddako {pāḷibhaddako (ka0)} assāro nissāro sārāpagato, yathā ca pheṇapiṇḍo {pheṇupiṇḍo (syā0)} assāro nissāro sārāpagato, yathā ca udakapubbuḷaṃ {pubbulakaṃ (syā0)} assāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagataṃ, yathā ca marīci assārā nissārā sārāpagatā, yathā kadalikkhandho assāro nissāro sārāpagato, yathā māyā assārā nissārā sārāpagatā -- evameva rūpaṃ assāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagataṃ niccasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena vā attasārasārena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā. vedanā assārā nissārā sārāpagatā...pe0... saññā assārā nissārā sārāpagatā... saṅkhārā assārā nissārā sārāpagatā... viññāṇaṃ assāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagataṃ niccasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena vā attasārasārena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā. evaṃ tucchasaṅkhārasamanupassanāvasena suññato lokaṃ avekkhati. imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi suññato lokaṃ avekkhati.

[03] api ca, chahākārehi suññato lokaṃ avekkhati. cakkhu suññaṃ {syā0 ... potthake imasmiṃ ṭhāne aññathā dissati} attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā, sotaṃ suññaṃ...pe0... ghānaṃ suññaṃ... jivhā suññā... kāyo suñño... mano suñño attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā. rūpā suññā...pe0... saddā suññā... gandhā suññā... rasā suññā... phoṭṭhabbā suññā... dhammā suññā attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā ^a^V0.0167^ea^. cakkhuviññāṇaṃ suññaṃ...pe0... manoviññāṇaṃ suññaṃ... cakkhusamphasso suñño ^a^M0.0184^ea^ ... manosamphasso suñño... cakkhusamphassajā vedanā suññā... manosamphassajā vedanā suññā... rūpasaññā suññā... dhammasaññā suññā... rūpasañcetanā suññā... dhammasañcetanā suññā... rūpataṇhā suññā... rūpavitakko suñño... rūpavicāro suñño... dhammavicāro suñño attena vā attaniyena vā niccena vā dhuvena vā sassatena vā avipariṇāmadhammena vā. evaṃ chahākārehi suññato lokaṃ avekkhati.

[03] api ca, dasahākārehi suññato lokaṃ avekkhati. rūpaṃ rittato tucchato suññato ^a^T0.0251^ea^ anattato asārakato vadhakato vibhavato aghamūlato sāsavato saṅkhatato; vedanaṃ...pe0... saññaṃ... saṅkhāre... viññāṇaṃ... cutiṃ... upapattiṃ... paṭisandhiṃ... bhavaṃ... saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ rittato tucchato suññato anattato asārakato vadhakato vibhavato aghamūlato sāsavato saṅkhatato. evaṃ dasahākārehi suññato lokaṃ avekkhati.

[03] api ca, dvādasahākārehi suññato lokaṃ avekkhati. rūpaṃ na satto na jīvo na naro na māṇavo na itthī na puriso na attā na attaniyaṃ nāhaṃ na mama na koci na kassaci; vedanā...pe0... saññā... saṅkhārā... viññāṇaṃ na satto na jīvo na naro na māṇavo na itthī na puriso na attā na attaniyaṃ nāhaṃ na mama na koci na kassaci. evaṃ dvādasahākārehi suññato lokaṃ avekkhati.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``yaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ taṃ pajahatha. taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati. kiñca, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ? rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ; taṃ pajahatha. taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati. vedanā, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ; taṃ pajahatha. sā vo pahīnā dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati. saññā, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ; taṃ pajahatha. sā vo pahīnā dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati. saṅkhārā, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ; te pajahatha. te vo pahīnā dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti. viññāṇaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ; taṃ pajahatha. taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya ^a^T0.0252^ea^ bhavissati. seyyathāpi ^a^M0.0185^ea^ {taṃ kiṃ maññatha (syā0 ka0) passa saṃ0 ni0 3.33}, bhikkhave, yaṃ imasmiṃ jetavane tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ taṃ jano hareyya vā ḍaheyya vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā kareyya. api nu tumhākaṃ evamassa -- `amhe jano harati vā ḍahati vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karotī'ti? `no hetaṃ, bhante'. `taṃ kissa hetu'? `na hi no etaṃ, bhante, attā vā attaniyaṃ vā'ti. evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaṃ na ^a^V0.0168^ea^ tumhākaṃ taṃ pajahatha; taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati. kiñca, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ? rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ; taṃ pajahatha. taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati. vedanā...pe0... saññā... saṅkhārā... viññāṇaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ; taṃ pajahatha. taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī''ti. evampi suññato lokaṃ avekkhati.

[03] āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ```suñño {suññato (ka0) passa saṃ0 ni0 4.85} loko, suñño loko'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, suñño lokoti vuccatī''ti? ``yasmā ca kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā, tasmā suñño lokoti vuccati. kiñcānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā? cakkhu kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā. rūpā suññā...pe0... cakkhuviññāṇaṃ suññaṃ... cakkhusamphasso suñño... yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā. sotaṃ suññaṃ... saddā suññā... ghānaṃ suññaṃ... gandhā suññā... jivhā suññā... rasā suññā... kāyo suñño ^a^T0.0253^ea^... phoṭṭhabbā suññā... mano suñño... dhammā suññā... manoviññāṇaṃ suññaṃ... manosamphasso suñño... yampidaṃ suññaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā. yasmā ca kho, ānanda, suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā, tasmā suñño lokoti vuccatī''ti. evampi suññato lokaṃ avekkhati.
[21] ``suddhaṃ dhammasamuppādaṃ, suddhasaṅkhārasantatiṃ.
[22] passantassa yathābhūtaṃ, na bhayaṃ hoti gāmaṇi..
[21] ``tiṇakaṭṭhasamaṃ ^a^M0.0186^ea^ lokaṃ, yadā paññāya passati.
[22] nāññaṃ {na aññaṃ (sī0 syā0 ka0)} patthayate kiñci, aññatrappaṭisandhiyā''ti..
[03] evampi suññato lokaṃ avekkhati.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā {passa saṃ0 ni0 4.246} -- ``evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rūpaṃ samannesati yāvatā rūpassa gati, vedanaṃ samannesati yāvatā vedanāya gati, saññaṃ samannesati yāvatā saññāya gati, saṅkhāre samannesati yāvatā saṅkhārānaṃ gati, viññāṇaṃ samannesati yāvatā viññāṇassa gati ^a^V0.0169^ea^. tassa rūpaṃ {tassa bhikkhuno rūpaṃ (syā0)} samannesato yāvatā rūpassa gati, vedanaṃ...pe0... saññaṃ... saṅkhāre... viññāṇaṃ samannesato yāvatā viññāṇassa gati, yampissa taṃ hoti ahanti vā mamanti vā asmīti vā, tampi ^a^T0.0254^ea^ tassa na hotī''ti. evampi suññato lokaṃ avekkhati.
[03] ^b^suññato lokaṃ avekkhassū^eb^ti suññato lokaṃ avekkhassu paccavekkhassu dakkhassu tulehi tīrehi vibhāvehi vibhūtaṃ karohīti -- suññato lokaṃ avekkhassu.

[03] ^b^mogharāja sadā sato^eb^ti. ^b^mogharājā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^sadā^eb^ti sabbakālaṃ...pe0... pacchime vayokhandhe. ^b^sato^eb^ti catūhi kāraṇehi sato -- kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato...pe0... so vuccati satoti -- mogharāja sadā sato.

[03] ^b^attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhaccā^eb^ti attānudiṭṭhi vuccati vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi. idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinīto sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ attani vā rūpaṃ rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ, vedanaṃ...pe0... saññaṃ... saṅkhāre... viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ attani vā viññāṇaṃ viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ. yā evarūpā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāro diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ gāho paṭiggāho abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo micchāpatho micchattaṃ titthāyatanaṃ vipariyesaggāho viparītaggāho vipallāsaggāho micchāgāho ^a^T0.0255^ea^ ayāthāvakasmiṃ ^a^M0.0187^ea^ yāthāvakanti gāho yāvatā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni, ayaṃ attānudiṭṭhi. ^b^attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhaccā^eb^ti attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhacca samūhacca {uhacca samuhacca (ka0) saddanītiyā pana sameti} uddharitvā samuddharitvā uppāṭayitvā samuppāṭayitvā pajahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti -- attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhacca.
[03] ^b^evaṃ maccutaro siyā^eb^ti evaṃ maccupi tareyyāsi, jarāpi tareyyāsi, maraṇampi tareyyāsi uttareyyāsi patareyyāsi samatikkameyyāsi vītivatteyyāsīti -- evaṃ maccutaro siyā.
[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0170^ea^ ^b^lokaṃ avekkhanta^eb^nti evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ paccavekkhantaṃ tulayantaṃ tīrayantaṃ vibhāvayantaṃ vibhūtaṃ karontanti -- evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ.

[03] ^b^maccurājā na passatī^eb^ti maccupi maccurājā, māropi maccurājā, maraṇampi maccurājā. ^b^na passatī^eb^ti maccurājā na passatī na dakkhati nādhigacchati na vindati na paṭilabhati. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, āraññiko migo araññe pavane caramāno vissattho gacchati vissattho {vissaṭṭho (ka0)} tiṭṭhati vissattho nisīdati vissattho seyyaṃ kappeti. taṃ kissa hetu? anāpāthagato {anāpātagato (ka0)}, bhikkhave, luddassa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu andhamakāsi {antamakāsi (ka0) passa ma0 ni0 1.271} māraṃ, apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ ^a^T0.0256^ea^ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato'.

[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ... catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu andhamakāsi māraṃ, apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato'.

[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā, paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā, nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā, ananto ākāsoti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati. ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu ^a^M0.0188^ea^ andhamakāsi māraṃ, apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato'.
[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati...pe0....
[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati...pe0....
[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati...pe0....

[03] ``puna ^a^V0.0171^ea^ caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati; paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti. ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu andhamakāsi māraṃ, apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato, tiṇṇo loke visattika'nti. so vissattho gacchati vissattho tiṭṭhati vissattho nisīdati vissattho seyyaṃ kappeti. taṃ kissa hetu? anāpāthagato bhikkhu pāpimato''ti -- maccurājā na passati. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``suññato ^a^T0.0257^ea^ lokaṃ avekkhassu, mogharāja sadā sato.
[22] attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhacca, evaṃ maccutaro siyā.
[21] evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passatī''ti..
[03] saha gāthāpariyosānā...pe0... satthā me, bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmīti.
[06] mogharājamāṇavapucchāniddeso pannarasamo.
[21] ^b^jiṇṇohamasmi^eb^ ^a^T0.0258^ea^ ^b^abalo vītavaṇṇo^eb^ {vivaṇṇo (syā0)}, ^b^[iccāyasmā piṅgiyo]^eb^
[27] ^b^nettā na suddhā savanaṃ na phāsu.^eb^
[21] ^b^māhaṃ nassaṃ momuho antarāva^eb^ {antarāya (syā0 ka0)}, ^b^ācikkha dhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^jātijarāya idha vippahānaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^jiṇṇohamasmi^eb^ ^a^M0.0189^ea^ ^b^abalo vītavaṇṇo^eb^ti. ^b^jiṇṇohamasmī^eb^ti jiṇṇo vuḍḍho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto vīsavassasatiko jātiyā. ^b^abalo^eb^ti dubbalo appabalo appathāmo. ^b^vītavaṇṇo^eb^ti vītavaṇṇo vigatavaṇṇo vigacchitavaṇṇo. yā sā purimā subhā vaṇṇanibhā sā antarahitā, ādīnavo pātubhūtoti -- jiṇṇohamasmi abalo vītavaṇṇo.
[03] ^b^iccāyasmā piṅgiyo^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0.... ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ...pe0.... ^b^piṅgiyo^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ...pe0... abhilāpoti -- iccāyasmā piṅgiyo.

[01] ^b^nettā^eb^ ^a^V0.0172^ea^ ^b^na suddhā savanaṃ na phāsū^eb^ti nettā asuddhā avisuddhā aparisuddhā avodātā. no tathā cakkhunā rūpe passāmīti -- nettā na suddhā. ^b^savanaṃ na phāsū^eb^ti sotaṃ asuddhaṃ avisuddhaṃ aparisuddhaṃ avodātaṃ. no tathā sotena saddaṃ suṇomīti -- nettā na suddhā savanaṃ na phāsu.

[03] ^b^māhaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0259^ea^ ^b^nassaṃ momuho antarāvā^eb^ti. ^b^māhaṃ nassa^eb^nti māhaṃ nassa māhaṃ vinassaṃ māhaṃ panassaṃ. ^b^momuho^eb^ti mohamuho avijjāgato aññāṇī avibhāvī duppañño. ^b^antarāvā^eb^ti tuyhaṃ dhammaṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭipadaṃ maggaṃ anaññāya anadhigantvā aviditvā appaṭilabhitvā aphassayitvā asacchikaritvā antarāyeva kālaṅkareyyanti -- māhaṃ nassaṃ momuho antarāva.

[03] ^b^ācikkha dhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijañña^eb^nti. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, cattāro satipaṭṭhāne, cattāro sammappadhāne, cattāro iddhipāde, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅge, ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ, nibbānañca nibbānagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti -- ācikkha dhammaṃ. ^b^yamahaṃ vijañña^eb^nti yamahaṃ jāneyyaṃ ājāneyyaṃ vijāneyyaṃ paṭivijāneyyaṃ paṭivijjheyyaṃ adhigaccheyyaṃ phasseyyaṃ sacchikareyyanti -- ācikkha dhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ.
[03] ^b^jātijarāya idha vippahāna^eb^nti idheva jātijarāmaraṇassa pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- jātijarāya idha vippahānaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``jiṇṇohamasmi ^a^M0.0190^ea^ abalo vītavaṇṇo, [iccāyasmā piṅgiyo]
[27] nettā na suddhā savanaṃ na phāsu.
[26] māhaṃ ^a^T0.0260^ea^ nassaṃ momuho antarāva, ācikkha dhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ.
[22] jātijarāya idha vippahāna''nti..
[21] ^b^disvāna rūpesu vihaññamāne, [piṅgiyāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^ruppanti rūpesu janā pamattā.^eb^
[22] ^b^tasmā tuvaṃ piṅgiya appamatto, jahassu rūpaṃ apunabbhavāya..^eb^

[03] ^b^disvāna rūpesu vihaññamāne^eb^ti. ^b^rūpa^eb^nti cattāro ca mahābhūtā catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya ^a^V0.0173^ea^ rūpaṃ. sattā rūpahetu rūpappaccayā rūpakāraṇā haññanti vihaññanti upahaññanti upaghātiyanti {upaghātayanti (syā0 ka0)}. rūpe sati vividhakammakāraṇā {vividhakammakaraṇāni (ka0)} kārenti. kasāhipi tāḷenti, vettehipi tāḷenti, aḍḍhadaṇḍakehipi tāḷenti, hatthampi chindanti, pādampi chindanti, hatthapādampi chindanti, kaṇṇampi chindanti, nāsampi chindanti, kaṇṇanāsampi chindanti, bilaṅgathālikampi karonti, saṅkhamuṇḍikampi karonti, rāhumukhampi karonti, jotimālikampi karonti, hatthapajjotikampi karonti, erakavattikampi karonti, cīrakavāsikampi karonti, eṇeyyakampi karonti, baḷisamaṃsikampi karonti, kahāpaṇikampi karonti, khārāpatacchikampi {khārāpaṭicchikampi (ka0)} karonti, palighaparivattikampi karonti, palālapīṭhakampi karonti, tattenapi telena osiñcanti, sunakhehipi khādāpenti, jīvantampi sūle uttāsenti, asināpi sīsaṃ chindanti. evaṃ ^a^T0.0261^ea^ sattā rūpahetu rūpappaccayā rūpakāraṇā haññanti vihaññanti upahaññanti upaghātiyanti. evaṃ haññamāne vihaññamāne upahaññamāne upaghātiyamāne disvā passitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti -- disvāna rūpesu vihaññamāne.
[03] ^b^piṅgiyāti bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^piṅgiyā^eb^ti bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- piṅgiyāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^ruppanti^eb^ ^a^M0.0191^ea^ ^b^rūpesu janā pamattā^eb^ti. ^b^ruppantī^eb^ti ruppanti kuppanti pīḷayanti {pīḷiyanti (syā0 ka0)} ghaṭṭayanti, byādhitā domanassitā honti. cakkhurogena ruppanti kuppanti pīḷayanti ghaṭṭayanti, byādhitā domanassitā honti. sotarogena...pe0... kāyarogena...pe0... ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassehi ruppanti kuppanti pīḷayanti ghaṭṭayanti, byādhitā domanassitā hontīti -- ruppanti rūpesu.

[03] atha vā, cakkhusmiṃ hīyamāne hāyamāne parihāyamāne vemāne {vihāyamāne (ka0)} vigacchamāne antaradhāyamāne ruppanti...pe0... domanassitā honti. sotasmiṃ...pe0... ghānasmiṃ... jivhāya... kāyasmiṃ... rūpasmiṃ... saddasmiṃ... gandhasmiṃ... rasasmiṃ... phoṭṭhabbasmiṃ... kulasmiṃ... gaṇasmiṃ... āvāsasmiṃ... lābhasmiṃ... yasasmiṃ... pasaṃsāya... sukhasmiṃ... cīvarasmiṃ... piṇḍapātasmiṃ... senāsanasmiṃ... gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārasmiṃ hīyamāne hāyamāne parihāyamāne vemāne vigacchamāne antaradhāyamāne ruppanti kuppanti pīḷayanti ghaṭṭayanti, byādhitā domanassitā hontīti -- evampi ruppanti rūpesu.

[03] ^b^janā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0174^ea^ khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca ^a^T0.0262^ea^ vessā ca suddā ca gahaṭṭhā ca pabbajitā ca devā ca manussā ca. ^b^pamattā^eb^ti pamādo vattabbo kāyaduccaritena vā vacīduccaritena vā manoduccaritena vā pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cittassa vosaggo vosaggānuppadānaṃ kusalānaṃ vā dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya asakkaccakiriyatā asātaccakiriyatā anaṭṭhitakiriyatā olīnavuttitā nikkhittacchandatā nikkhittadhuratā anāsevanā abhāvanā abahulīkammaṃ {abahulikammaṃ (ka0)} anadhiṭṭhānaṃ ananuyogo pamādo. yo evarūpo pamādo pamajjanā pamajjitattaṃ -- ayaṃ vuccati pamādo. iminā pamādena samannāgatā janā pamattāti -- ruppanti rūpesu janā pamattā.

[03] ^b^tasmā tuvaṃ piṅgiya appamatto^eb^ti. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti tasmā taṃkāraṇā taṃhetu tappaccayā taṃnidānā evaṃ ādīnavaṃ sampassamāno rūpesūti -- tasmā tuvaṃ piṅgiya. ^b^appamatto^eb^ti sakkaccakārī sātaccakārī...pe0... appamādo kusalesu dhammesūti -- tasmā tuvaṃ piṅgiya appamatto.

[03] ^b^jahassu rūpaṃ apunabbhavāyā^eb^ti. ^b^rūpa^eb^nti cattāro ca mahābhūtā catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpaṃ. ^b^jahassu rūpa^eb^nti jahassu rūpaṃ, pajahassu rūpaṃ, vinodehi rūpaṃ, byantīkarohi rūpaṃ, anabhāvaṃ gamehi rūpaṃ. ^b^apunabbhavāyā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0192^ea^ yathā te rūpaṃ idheva nirujjheyya, punapaṭisandhiko bhavo na nibbatteyya kāmadhātuyā vā rūpadhātuyā vā arūpadhātuyā vā, kāmabhave vā rūpabhave vā arūpabhave ^a^T0.0263^ea^ vā, saññābhave vā asaññābhave vā nevasaññānāsaññābhave vā, ekavokārabhave vā catuvokārabhave vā pañcavokārabhave vā, puna gatiyā vā upapattiyā vā paṭisandhiyā vā bhave vā saṃsāre vā vaṭṭe vā na janeyya na sañjaneyya na nibbatteyya nābhinibbatteyya, idheva nirujjheyya vūpasameyya atthaṃ gaccheyya paṭippassambheyyāti -- jahassu rūpaṃ apunabbhavāya. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``disvāna rūpesu vihaññamāne, [piṅgiyāti bhagavā]
[21] ruppanti rūpesu janā pamattā.
[21] tasmā tuvaṃ piṅgiya appamatto, jahassu rūpaṃ apunabbhavāyā''ti..
[21] ^b^disā catasso vidisā catasso, uddhaṃ adho dasa disā imāyo.^eb^
[27] ^b^na tuyhaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ assutaṃ amutaṃ, atho aviññātaṃ kiñci namatthi loke.^eb^
[22] ^b^ācikkha dhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ, jātijarāya idha vippahānaṃ..^eb^
[03] ^b^disā^eb^ ^a^V0.0175^ea^ ^b^catasso vidisā catasso, uddhaṃ adho dasa disā imāyo^eb^ti dasa disā.

[03] ^b^na tuyhaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ assutaṃ amutaṃ, atho aviññātaṃ kiñci namatthi loke^eb^ti na tuyhaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ assutaṃ amutaṃ aviññātaṃ kiñci attattho vā parattho vā ubhayattho vā diṭṭhadhammiko vā attho samparāyiko vā attho uttāno vā attho gambhīro vā attho gūḷho vā attho paṭicchanno vā attho neyyo vā attho nīto vā attho anavajjo vā attho nikkileso vā attho vodāno vā attho paramattho vā natthi na ^a^T0.0264^ea^ sati na saṃvijjati nupalabbhatīti -- na tuyhaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ assutaṃ amutaṃ, atho aviññātaṃ kiñci namatthi loke.

[03] ^b^ācikkha dhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijañña^eb^nti. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti ādikalyāṇaṃ...pe0... nibbānañca nibbānagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi ^a^M0.0193^ea^ pakāsehi. ^b^yamahaṃ vijañña^eb^nti yamahaṃ jāneyyaṃ ājāneyyaṃ vijāneyyaṃ paṭivijāneyyaṃ paṭivijjheyyaṃ adhigaccheyyaṃ phasseyyaṃ sacchikareyyanti -- ācikkha dhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ.
[03] ^b^jātijarāya idha vippahāna^eb^nti idheva jātijarāmaraṇassa pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbānanti -- jātijarāya idha vippahānaṃ. tenāha so brāhmaṇo --
[21] ``disā catasso vidisā catasso, uddhaṃ adho dasa disā imāyo.
[27] na tuyhaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ assutaṃ amutaṃ, atho aviññātaṃ kiñci namatthi loke.
[22] ācikkha dhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ, jātijarāya idha vippahāna''nti..
[21] ^b^taṇhādhipanne manuje pekkhamāno, [piṅgiyāti bhagavā]^eb^
[27] ^b^santāpajāte jarasā parete.^eb^
[22] ^b^tasmā tuvaṃ piṅgiya appamatto, jahassu^eb^ ^a^T0.0265^ea^ ^b^taṇhaṃ apunabbhavāya..^eb^

[03] ^b^taṇhādhipanne manuje pekkhamāno^eb^ti. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti rūpataṇhā...pe0... dhammataṇhā. ^b^taṇhādhipanne^eb^ti taṇhādhipanne {taṇhāya adhipanne (ka0)} taṇhānuge taṇhānugate taṇhānusaṭe taṇhāya panne paṭipanne abhibhūte pariyādinnacitte. ^b^manuje^eb^ti sattādhivacanaṃ. ^b^pekkhamāno^eb^ti pekkhamāno dakkhamāno olokayamāno nijjhāyamāno upaparikkhamānoti -- taṇhādhipanne manuje pekkhamāno. ^b^piṅgiyāti bhagavā^eb^ti. ^b^piṅgiyā^eb^ti ^a^V0.0176^ea^ bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nāmena ālapati. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- piṅgiyāti bhagavā.

[03] ^b^santāpajāte jarasā parete^eb^ti. ^b^santāpajāte^eb^ti jātiyā santāpajāte, jarāya santāpajāte, byādhinā santāpajāte, maraṇena santāpajāte, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsehi santāpajāte, nerayikena dukkhena santāpajāte...pe0... diṭṭhibyasanena dukkhena santāpajāte ītijāte ^a^M0.0194^ea^ upaddavajāte upasaggajāteti -- santāpajāte. ^b^jarasā parete^eb^ti jarāya phuṭṭhe parete samohite samannāgate. jātiyā anugate jarāya anusaṭe byādhinā abhibhūte maraṇena abbhāhate atāṇe aleṇe asaraṇe asaraṇībhūteti -- santāpajāte jarasā parete.

[03] ^b^tasmā tuvaṃ piṅgiya appamatto^eb^ti. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti tasmā taṃkāraṇā taṃhetu tappaccayā taṃnidānā evaṃ ādīnavaṃ sampassamāno taṇhāyāti -- tasmā tuvaṃ piṅgiya. ^b^appamatto^eb^ti sakkaccakārī...pe0... appamādo kusalesu dhammesūti -- tasmā tuvaṃ piṅgiya ^a^T0.0266^ea^ appamatto.

[03] ^b^jahassu taṇhaṃ apunabbhavāyā^eb^ti. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti rūpataṇhā...pe0... dhammataṇhā. ^b^jahassu taṇha^eb^nti jahassu taṇhaṃ pajahassu taṇhaṃ vinodehi taṇhaṃ byantīkarohi taṇhaṃ anabhāvaṃ gamehi taṇhaṃ. ^b^apunabbhavāyā^eb^ti yathā te...pe0... punapaṭisandhiko bhavo na nibbatteyya kāmadhātuyā vā rūpadhātuyā vā arūpadhātuyā vā, kāmabhave vā rūpabhave vā arūpabhave vā, saññābhave vā asaññābhave vā nevasaññānāsaññābhave vā, ekavokārabhave vā catuvokārabhave vā pañcavokārabhave vā, punagatiyā vā upapattiyā vā paṭisandhiyā vā bhave vā saṃsāre vā vaṭṭe vā na janeyya na sañjaneyya na nibbatteyya nābhinibbatteyya, idheva nirujjheyya vūpasameyya atthaṃ gaccheyya paṭippassambheyyāti -- jahassu taṇhaṃ apunabbhavāya. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``taṇhādhipanne manuje pekkhamāno, [piṅgiyāti bhagavā]
[27] santāpajāte jarasā parete.
[22] tasmā tuvaṃ piṅgiya appamatto, jahassu taṇhaṃ apunabbhavāyā''ti..

[03] saha gāthāpariyosānā ye te brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ ekacchandā ekapayogā ekādhippāyā ekavāsanavāsitā, tesaṃ anekapāṇasahassānaṃ ^a^T0.0267^ea^ virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi -- ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti. tassa ca brāhmaṇassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ ^a^V0.0177^ea^ udapādi -- ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti. saha dhammacakkhussa paṭilābhā ajinajaṭāvākacīratidaṇḍakamaṇḍalukesā ca massū ca antarahitā bhaṇḍukāsāyavatthavasano ^a^M0.0195^ea^ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradharo anvatthapaṭipattiyā pañjaliko bhagavantaṃ namassamāno nisinno hoti -- ``satthā me bhante bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī''ti.
[06] piṅgiyamāṇavapucchāniddeso {siṅgiyapañhaṃ (ka0)} soḷasamo.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ ^b^idamavoca^eb^ ^a^T0.0268^ea^ ^b^bhagavā magadhesu viharanto pāsāṇake cetiye, paricārakasoḷasānaṃ^eb^ {paricāritasoḷasannaṃ (syā0 ka0)} ^b^brāhmaṇānaṃ ajjhiṭṭho puṭṭho puṭṭho pañhaṃ byākāsi.^eb^

[03] ^b^idamavoca bhagavā^eb^ti idaṃ pārāyanaṃ avoca. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ bhagavāti -- idamavoca bhagavā. ^b^magadhesu viharanto^eb^ti magadhanāmake janapade viharanto iriyanto vattento pālento yapento yāpento. ^b^pāsāṇake cetiye^eb^ti pāsāṇakacetiyaṃ vuccati buddhāsananti -- magadhesu viharanto pāsāṇake cetiye. ^b^paricārakasoḷasānaṃ brāhmaṇāna^eb^nti piṅgiyo {siṅgiyo (ka0)} brāhmaṇo bāvarissa brāhmaṇassa paddho paddhacaro paricārako {paricāriko (syā0 ka0)} sisso. piṅgiyena {tena (ka0)} te soḷasāti -- evampi paricārakasoḷasānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ. atha vā, te soḷasa brāhmaṇā buddhassa bhagavato paddhā paddhacarā paricārakā sissāti -- evampi paricārakasoḷasānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ.

[03] ^b^ajjhiṭṭho puṭṭho puṭṭho pañhaṃ byākāsī^eb^ti. ^b^ajjhiṭṭho^eb^ti ajjhiṭṭho ajjhesito. ^b^puṭṭho puṭṭho^eb^ti puṭṭho puṭṭho pucchito pucchito yācito yācito ajjhesito ajjhesito ^a^T0.0269^ea^ pasādito pasādito. ^b^pañhaṃ byākāsī^eb^ti pañhaṃ byākāsi ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānīākāsi pakāsesīti -- ajjhiṭṭho puṭṭho puṭṭho pañhaṃ byākāsi. tenetaṃ vuccati --
[02] ``idamavoca bhagavā magadhesu viharanto pāsāṇake cetiye, paricārakasoḷasānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ ajjhiṭṭho puṭṭho puṭṭho pañhaṃ byākāsī''ti.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekamekassa^eb^ ^a^V0.0178^ea^ ^a^M0.0196^ea^ ^b^cepi pañhassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjeyya, gaccheyyeva jarāmaraṇassa pāraṃ. pāraṅgamanīyā ime dhammāti. tasmā imassa dhammapariyāyassa ``pārāyana''nteva adhivacanaṃ.^eb^

[03] ^b^ekamekassa cepi pañhassā^eb^ti ekamekassa cepi ajitapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi tissametteyyapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi puṇṇakapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi mettagūpañhassa, ekamekassa cepi dhotakapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi upasīvapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi nandakapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi hemakapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi todeyyapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi kappapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi jatukaṇṇipañhassa, ekamekassa cepi bhadrāvudhapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi udayapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi posālapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi mogharājapañhassa, ekamekassa cepi piṅgiyapañhassāti -- ekamekassa cepi pañhassa.

[03] ^b^atthamaññāya dhammamaññāyā^eb^ti sveva pañho dhammo, visajjanaṃ {vissajjanaṃ (ka0)} atthoti atthaṃ aññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā ^a^T0.0270^ea^ vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti -- atthamaññāya. ^b^dhammamaññāyā^eb^ti dhammaṃ aññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti -- dhammamaññāyāti -- atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya. ^b^dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjeyyā^eb^ti sammāpaṭipadaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ apaccanīkapaṭipadaṃ anvatthapaṭipadaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjeyyāti -- dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjeyya. ^b^gaccheyyeva jarāmaraṇassa pāra^eb^nti jarāmaraṇassa pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ. yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhippaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ. ^b^gaccheyyeva jarāmaraṇassa pāra^eb^nti jarāmaraṇassa pāraṃ gaccheyya, pāraṃ adhigaccheyya, pāraṃ adhiphasseyya, pāraṃ sacchikareyyāti -- gaccheyyeva jarāmaraṇassa pāraṃ. ^b^pāraṅgamanīyā ime dhammā^eb^ti ime dhammā pāraṅgamanīyā. pāraṃ pāpenti pāraṃ sampāpenti pāraṃ samanupāpenti, jarāmaṇassa taraṇāya {tāraṇāya (syā0)} saṃvattantīti -- pāraṅgamanīyā ime dhammāti.

[03] ^b^tasmā imassa dhammapariyāyassā^eb^ti. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti tasmā taṃkāraṇā taṃhetu tappaccayā taṃnidānāti -- tasmā. ^b^imassa dhammapariyāyassā^eb^ti imassa ^a^M0.0197^ea^ pārāyanassāti -- tasmā imassa dhammapariyāyassa. ^b^pārāyananteva adhivacana^eb^nti pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ...pe0... nirodho nibbānaṃ. ayanaṃ vuccati maggo, seyyathidaṃ ^a^T0.0271^ea^ -- sammādiṭṭhi...pe0... sammāsamādhi. ^b^adhivacana^eb^nti saṅkhā ^a^V0.0179^ea^ samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpoti -- pārāyananteva adhivacanaṃ. tenetaṃ vuccati --

[03] ``ekamekassa cepi pañhassa atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjeyya, gaccheyyeva jarāmaraṇassa pāraṃ. pāraṅgamanīyā ime dhammāti. tasmā imassa dhammapariyāyassa `pārāyana'nteva adhivacana''nti.
[21] ^b^ajito tissametteyyo, puṇṇako atha mettagū.^eb^
[22] ^b^dhotako upasīvo ca, nando ca atha hemako..^eb^
[21] ^b^todeyyakappā dubhayo, jatukaṇṇī ca paṇḍito.^eb^
[27] ^b^bhadrāvudho udayo ca, posālo cāpi brāhmaṇo.^eb^
[22] ^b^mogharājā ca medhāvī, piṅgiyo ca mahāisi..^eb^
[21] ^b^ete buddhaṃ upāgacchuṃ, sampannacaraṇaṃ isiṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^pucchantā nipuṇe pañhe, buddhaseṭṭhaṃ upāgamuṃ..^eb^

[01] ^b^ete buddhaṃ upāgacchu^eb^nti. ^b^ete^eb^ti soḷasa pārāyaniyā brāhmaṇā. ^b^buddho^eb^ti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu ca vasībhāvaṃ. ^b^buddho^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena buddho? bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho, sabbaññutāya buddho, sabbadassāvitāya buddho, abhiññeyyatāya buddho, visavitāya buddho, khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddho, nirupalepasaṅkhātena buddho, ekantavītarāgoti buddho, ekantavītadosoti buddho, ekantavītamohoti buddho, ekantanikkilesoti buddho, ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddho, eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti ^a^T0.0272^ea^ buddho, abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhāti buddho. ^b^buddho^eb^ti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ na pitarā kataṃ na bhātarā kataṃ na bhaginiyā kataṃ na mittāmaccehi kataṃ na ñātisālohitehi kataṃ na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṃ na devatāhi kataṃ. vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutañāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti ^a^M0.0198^ea^, yadidaṃ buddhoti. ^b^ete buddhaṃ upāgacchu^eb^nti ete buddhaṃ upāgamiṃsu upasaṅkamiṃsu payirupāsiṃsu paripucchiṃsu paripañhiṃsūti -- ete buddhaṃ upāgacchuṃ.

[03] ^b^sampannacaraṇaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0180^ea^ ^b^isi^eb^nti caraṇaṃ vuccati sīlācāranibbatti. sīlasaṃvaropi caraṇaṃ, indriyasaṃvaropi caraṇaṃ, bhojane mattaññutāpi caraṇaṃ, jāgariyānuyogopi caraṇaṃ, sattapi saddhammā caraṇaṃ, cattāripi jhānāni caraṇaṃ. ^b^sampannacaraṇa^eb^nti sampannacaraṇaṃ seṭṭhacaraṇaṃ viseṭṭhacaraṇaṃ {visiṭṭhacaraṇaṃ (ka0)} pāmokkhacaraṇaṃ uttamacaraṇaṃ pavaracaraṇaṃ. ^b^isī^eb^ti isi bhagavā mahantaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ esī gavesī pariyesīti isi...pe0... mahesakkhehi vā sattehi esito gavesito pariyesito -- ``kahaṃ buddho, kahaṃ bhagavā, kahaṃ devadevo kahaṃ narāsabho''ti -- isīti -- sampannacaraṇaṃ isiṃ.

[03] ^b^pucchantā nipuṇe pañhe^eb^ti. ^b^pucchantā^eb^ti pucchantā yācantā ajjhesantā pasādentā. ^b^nipuṇe pañhe^eb^ti gambhīre duddase duranubodhe sante paṇīte atakkāvacare nipuṇe paṇḍitavedanīye ^a^T0.0273^ea^ pañheti -- pucchantā nipuṇe pañhe.

[03] ^b^buddhaseṭṭhaṃ upāgamu^eb^nti. ^b^buddho^eb^ti yo so bhagavā...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ buddhoti. ^b^seṭṭha^eb^nti aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ viseṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ buddhaṃ upāgamuṃ upāgamiṃsu upasaṅkamiṃsu payirupāsiṃsu paripucchiṃsu paripañhiṃsūti -- buddhaseṭṭhaṃ upāgamuṃ. tenetaṃ vuccati --
[21] ``ete buddhaṃ upāgacchuṃ, sampannacaraṇaṃ isiṃ.
[22] pucchantā nipuṇe pañhe, buddhaseṭṭhaṃ upāgamu''nti..
[21] ^b^tesaṃ buddho pabyākāsi, pañhaṃ puṭṭho yathātathaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena, tosesi brāhmaṇe muni..^eb^

[03] ^b^tesaṃ buddho pabyākāsī^eb^ti. ^b^tesa^eb^nti soḷasānaṃ pārāyaniyānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ. ^b^buddho^eb^ti yo so bhagavā...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ buddhoti. ^b^pabyākāsī^eb^ti tesaṃ buddho pabyākāsi ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānīakāsi pakāsesīti -- tesaṃ buddho pabyākāsi.

[03] ^b^pañhaṃ puṭṭho yathātatha^eb^nti. ^b^pañhaṃ puṭṭho^eb^ti pañhaṃ puṭṭho pucchito yācito ajjhesito pasādito. ^b^yathātatha^eb^nti yathā ācikkhitabbaṃ tathā ācikkhi ^a^M0.0199^ea^, yathā desitabbaṃ tathā desesi, yathā paññapetabbaṃ tathā paññapesi, yathā paṭṭhapetabbaṃ tathā paṭṭhapesi, yathā vivaritabbaṃ tathā vivari ^a^V0.0181^ea^, yathā vibhajitabbaṃ tathā vibhaji, yathā uttānīkātabbaṃ ^a^T0.0274^ea^ tathā uttānīakāsi, yathā pakāsitabbaṃ tathā pakāsesīti -- pañhaṃ puṭṭho yathātathaṃ.
[03] ^b^pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇenā^eb^ti pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena ācikkhanena desanena paññapanena paṭṭhapanena vivaraṇena vibhajanena uttānīkammena pakāsanenāti -- pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena.

[03] ^b^tosesi brāhmaṇe munī^eb^ti. ^b^tosesī^eb^ti tosesi vitosesi pasādesi ārādhesi attamane akāsi. ^b^brāhmaṇe^eb^ti soḷasa pārāyaniye brāhmaṇe. ^b^munī^eb^ti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ...pe0... saṅgajālamaticca so munīti -- tosesi brāhmaṇe muni. tenetaṃ vuccati --
[21] ``tesaṃ buddho pabyākāsi, pañhaṃ puṭṭho yathātathaṃ.
[22] pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena, tosesi brāhmaṇe munī''ti..
[21] ^b^te tositā cakkhumatā, buddhenādiccabandhunā.^eb^
[22] ^b^brahmacariyamacariṃsu, varapaññassa santike..^eb^

[03] ^b^te tositā cakkhumatā^eb^ti. ^b^te^eb^ti soḷasa pārāyaniyā brāhmaṇā. ^b^tositā^eb^ti tositā vitositā pasāditā ārādhitā attamanā katāti -- te tositā. ^b^cakkhumatā^eb^ti bhagavā pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā -- maṃsacakkhunāpi cakkhumā, dibbacakkhunāpi cakkhumā, paññācakkhunāpi cakkhumā, buddhacakkhunāpi cakkhumā, samantacakkhunāpi cakkhumā. kathaṃ bhagavā maṃsacakkhunāpi cakkhumā...pe0... evaṃ bhagavā ^a^T0.0275^ea^ samantacakkhunāpi cakkhumāti -- te tositā cakkhumatā.

[03] ^b^buddhenādiccabandhunā^eb^ti. ^b^buddho^eb^ti yo so bhagavā...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ buddhoti. ^b^ādiccabandhunā^eb^ti ādicco vuccati sūriyo. so gotamo gottena, bhagavāpi gotamo gottena, bhagavā sūriyassa gottañātako gottabandhu. tasmā buddho ādiccabandhūti -- buddhenādiccabandhunā.

[03] ^b^brahmacariyamacariṃsū^eb^ti ^a^M0.0200^ea^ brahmacariyaṃ vuccati asaddhammasamāpattiyā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī viramaṇaṃ akiriyā akaraṇaṃ anajjhāpatti velāanatikkamo setughāto. api ^a^V0.0182^ea^ ca, nippariyāyavasena brahmacariyaṃ vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ -- sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi. ^b^brahmacariyamacariṃsū^eb^ti brahmacariyaṃ cariṃsu acariṃsu samādāya vattiṃsūti -- brahmacariyamacariṃsu.

[03] ^b^varapaññassa santike^eb^ti varapaññassa aggapaññassa seṭṭhapaññassa viseṭṭhapaññassa pāmokkhapaññassa uttamapaññassa pavarapaññassa. ^b^santike^eb^ti santike sāmantā āsanne avidūre upakaṭṭheti -- varapaññassa santike. tenetaṃ vuccati --
[21] ``te tositā cakkhumatā, buddhenādiccabandhunā.
[22] brahmacariyamacariṃsu, varapaññassa santike''ti..
[21] ^b^ekamekassa pañhassa, yathā buddhena desitaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^tathā^eb^ ^a^T0.0276^ea^ ^b^yo paṭipajjeyya, gacche pāraṃ apārato..^eb^
[03] ^b^ekamekassa pañhassā^eb^ti ekamekassa ajitapañhassa, ekamekassa tissametteyyapañhassa...pe0... ekamekassa piṅgiyapañhassāti -- ekamekassa pañhassa.

[03] ^b^yathā buddhena desita^eb^nti. ^b^buddho^eb^ti yo so bhagavā sayambhū...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ buddhoti. ^b^yathā buddhena desita^eb^nti yathā buddhena ācikkhitaṃ desitaṃ paññapitaṃ paṭṭhapitaṃ vivaritaṃ vibhajitaṃ {vibhattaṃ (syā0)} uttānīkataṃ pakāsitanti -- yathā buddhena desitaṃ.
[03] ^b^tathā yo paṭipajjeyyā^eb^ti sammāpaṭipadaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ apaccanīkapaṭipadaṃ anvatthapaṭipadaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjeyyāti -- tathā yo paṭipajjeyya.

[03] ^b^gacche pāraṃ apārato^eb^ti pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ...pe0... nirodho nibbānaṃ; apāraṃ vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca. ^b^gacche pāraṃ apārato^eb^ti ^a^M0.0201^ea^ apārato pāraṃ gaccheyya, pāraṃ adhigaccheyya, pāraṃ phasseyya, pāraṃ sacchikareyyāti -- gacche pāraṃ apārato. tenetaṃ vuccati --
[21] ``ekamekassa ^a^V0.0183^ea^ pañhassa, yathā buddhena desitaṃ.
[22] tathā yo paṭipajjeyya, gacche pāraṃ apārato''ti..
[21] ^b^apārā pāraṃ gaccheyya, bhāvento maggamuttamaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^maggo^eb^ ^a^T0.0277^ea^ ^b^so pāraṃ gamanāya, tasmā pārāyanaṃ iti.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^apārā pāraṃ gaccheyyā^eb^ti apāraṃ vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca; pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ...pe0... taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ. ^b^apārā pāraṃ gaccheyyā^eb^ti apārā pāraṃ gaccheyya, pāraṃ adhigaccheyya, pāraṃ phasseyya, pāraṃ sacchikareyyāti -- apārā pāraṃ gaccheyya.

[03] ^b^bhāvento maggamuttama^eb^nti maggamuttamaṃ vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ -- sammādiṭṭhi...pe0... sammāsamādhi. ^b^maggamuttama^eb^nti maggaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ viseṭṭhaṃ pāmokkhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ. ^b^bhāvento^eb^ti bhāvento āsevanto bahulīkarontoti -- bhāvento maggamuttamaṃ.
[03] ^b^maggo so pāraṃ gamanāyā^eb^ti --
[21] maggo pantho patho pajjo {addho (ka0)}, añjasaṃ vaṭumāyanaṃ.
[22] nāvā uttarasetu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo {saṅgamo (syā0 ka0) passa-dhātumālāyaṃ maggadhātuvaṇṇanāyaṃ}..
[03] ^b^pāraṃ gamanāyā^eb^ti pāraṃ gamanāya pāraṃ sampāpanāya pāraṃ samanupāpanāya jarāmaraṇassa taraṇāyāti -- maggo so pāraṃ gamanāya.

[03] ^b^tasmā pārāyanaṃ itī^eb^ti. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti tasmā taṃkāraṇā taṃhetu tappaccayā taṃnidānā. pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ...pe0... nirodho nibbānaṃ. ayanaṃ vuccati maggo. ^b^itī^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... padānupubbatāpetaṃ ^a^T0.0278^ea^ itīti -- tasmā pārāyanaṃ iti. tenetaṃ vuccati --
[21] ``apārā pāraṃ gaccheyya, bhāvento maggamuttamaṃ.
[22] maggo so pāraṃ gamanāya, tasmā pārāyanaṃ itī''ti..
[06] pārāyanatthutigāthāniddeso sattarasamo.
[21] ^b^pārāyanamanugāyissaṃ^eb^ ^a^V0.0184^ea^ ^a^M0.0202^ea^, ^b^[iccāyasmā piṅgiyo]^eb^
[27] ^b^yathāddakkhi tathākkhāsi, vimalo bhūrimedhaso.^eb^
[22] ^b^nikkāmo nibbano nāgo, kissa hetu musā bhaṇe.. ^eb^

[03] ^b^pārāyanamanugāyissa^eb^nti gītamanugāyissaṃ kathitamanukathayissaṃ {kathitamanugāyissaṃ (syā0) evaṃ sabbapadesu anugāyissanti āgataṃ} bhaṇitamanubhaṇissaṃ lapitamanulapissaṃ bhāsitamanubhāsissanti -- pārāyanamanugāyissaṃ. ^b^iccāyasmā piṅgiyo^eb^ti. ^b^iccā^eb^ti padasandhi...pe0... padānupubbatāpetaṃ -- iccāti. ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ garuvacanaṃ sagāravasappatissādhivacanametaṃ -- āyasmāti. ^b^piṅgiyo^eb^ti tassa therassa nāmaṃ saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpoti -- iccāyasmā piṅgiyo.

[03] ^b^yathāddakkhi tathākkhāsī^eb^ti yathā addakkhi tathā akkhāsi ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānīakāsi pakāsesi. ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti yathā addakkhi tathā akkhāsi ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānīakāsi pakāsesi. ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti...pe0... ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti yathā addakkhi tathā akkhāsi ācikkhi desesi paññapesi paṭṭhapesi vivari vibhaji uttānīakāsi pakāsesīti ^a^T0.0279^ea^ -- yathāddakkhi tathākkhāsi.

[03] ^b^vimalo bhūrimedhaso^eb^ti. ^b^vimalo^eb^ti rāgo malaṃ, doso malaṃ, moho malaṃ, kodho... upanāho...pe0... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā malā. te malā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. amalo buddho vimalo nimmalo malāpagato malavippahīno malavimutto sabbamalavītivatto. ^b^bhūri^eb^ vuccati pathavī. bhagavā tāya {bhagavā imāya (syā0)} pathavisamāya paññāya vipulāya vitthatāya samannāgato. medhā vuccati paññā. yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi. bhagavā imāya medhāya paññāya upeto samupeto ^a^M0.0203^ea^ upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato, tasmā buddho sumedhasoti -- vimalo bhūrimedhaso.

[03] ^b^nikkāmo^eb^ ^a^V0.0185^ea^ ^b^nibbano nāgo^eb^ti. ^b^kāmā^eb^ti uddānato dve kāmā -- vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca...pe0... ime vuccanti vatthukāmā...pe0... ime vuccanti kilesakāmā. buddhassa bhagavato vatthukāmā pariññātā kilesakāmā pahīnā vatthukāmānaṃ pariññātattā kilesakāmānaṃ pahīnattā. bhagavā na kāme kāmeti na kāme icchati na kāme pattheti na kāme piheti na kāme abhijappati. ye kāme kāmenti kāme icchanti kāme patthenti kāme pihenti kāme abhijappanti te kāmakāmino rāgarāgino saññasaññino. bhagavā na kāme kāmeti na kāme icchati na ^a^T0.0280^ea^ kāme pattheti na kāme piheti na kāme abhijappati. tasmā buddho akāmo nikkāmo cattakāmo vantakāmo muttakāmo pahīnakāmo paṭinissaṭṭhakāmo vītarāgo vigatarāgo cattarāgo vantarāgo muttarāgo pahīnarāgo paṭinissaṭṭharāgo nicchāto nibbuto sītibhūto sukhappaṭisaṃvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharatīti -- nikkāmo.

[03] ^b^nibbano^eb^ti rāgo vanaṃ, doso vanaṃ, moho vanaṃ, kodho vanaṃ, upanāho vanaṃ...pe0... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā vanā. te vanā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. tasmā buddho avano vivano nibbano vanāpagato vanavippahīno vanavimutto sabbavanavītivattoti -- nibbano. ^b^nāgo^eb^ti nāgo; bhagavā āguṃ na karotīti nāgo, na gacchatīti nāgo, na āgacchatīti nāgo...pe0... evaṃ bhagavā na āgacchatīti nāgoti -- nikkāmo nibbano nāgo.

[03] ^b^kissa hetu musā bhaṇe^eb^ti. ^b^kissa hetū^eb^ti kissa hetu kiṃhetu kiṃkāraṇā kiṃnidānā kiṃpaccayāti -- kissa hetu. ^b^musā bhaṇe^eb^ti musā bhaṇeyya katheyya dīpeyya vohareyya; ^b^musā bhaṇe^eb^ti mosavajjaṃ bhaṇeyya, musāvādaṃ bhaṇeyya, anariyavādaṃ bhaṇeyya. idhekacco sabhāgato {sabhaggato (syā0)} vā parisāgato {parisaggato (syā0)} vā ñātimajjhagato vā pūgamajjhagato vā rājakulamajjhagato vā abhinīto sakkhipuṭṭho -- ``ehambho {ehi bho (syā0) passa ma0 ni0 3.112} purisa, yaṃ jānāsi taṃ vadehī''ti, so ajānaṃ vā āha -- ``jānāmī''ti ^a^M0.0204^ea^, jānaṃ vā āha -- ``na jānāmī''ti, apassaṃ vā āha -- ``passāmī''ti, passaṃ vā āha -- ``na passāmī''ti. iti ^a^T0.0281^ea^ attahetu vā parahetu vā āmisakiñcikkhahetu vā sampajānamusā bhāsati, idaṃ vuccati mosavajjaṃ.

[03] api ca, tīhākārehi musāvādo hoti. pubbevassa hoti -- ``musā bhaṇissa''nti, bhaṇantassa hoti -- ``musā bhaṇāmī''ti, bhaṇitassa hoti -- ``musā mayā bhaṇita''nti -- imehi tīhākārehi musāvādo hoti. api ca, catūhākārehi musāvādo hoti. pubbevassa hoti ^a^V0.0186^ea^ -- ``musā bhaṇissa''nti, bhaṇantassa hoti -- ``musā bhaṇāmī''ti, bhaṇitassa hoti -- ``musā mayā bhaṇita''nti, vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ -- imehi catūhākārehi musāvādo hoti. api ca, pañcahākārehi...pe0... chahākārehi... sattahākārehi... aṭṭhahākārehi musāvādo hoti. pubbevassa hoti -- ``musā bhaṇissa''nti, bhaṇantassa hoti -- ``musā bhaṇāmī''ti, bhaṇitassa hoti -- ``musā mayā bhaṇita''nti, vinidhāya diṭṭhiṃ, vinidhāya khantiṃ, vinidhāya ruciṃ, vinidhāya saññaṃ, vinidhāya bhāvaṃ -- imehi aṭṭhahākārehi musāvādo hoti mosavajjaṃ. kissa hetu musā bhaṇeyya katheyya dīpeyya vohareyyāti -- kissa hetu musā bhaṇe. tenāha thero piṅgiyo --
[21] ``pārāyanamanugāyissaṃ, [iccāyasmā piṅgiyo]
[27] yathāddakkhi tathākkhāsi, vimalo bhūrimedhaso.
[22] nikkāmo nibbano nāgo, kissa hetu musā bhaṇe''ti..
[21] ^b^pahīnamalamohassa, mānamakkhappahāyino.^eb^
[22] ^b^handāhaṃ kittayissāmi, giraṃ vaṇṇūpasaṃhitaṃ..^eb^
[03] ^b^pahīnamalamohassā^eb^ti ^a^T0.0282^ea^. ^b^mala^eb^nti rāgo malaṃ, doso malaṃ, moho malaṃ, māno malaṃ, diṭṭhi malaṃ, kileso malaṃ, sabbaduccaritaṃ malaṃ, sabbabhavagāmikammaṃ malaṃ.

[03] ^b^moho^eb^ti yaṃ dukkhe aññāṇaṃ...pe0... avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ. ayaṃ vuccati moho. malañca moho ca buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ ^a^M0.0205^ea^ anuppādadhammā. tasmā buddho pahīnamalamohoti -- pahīnamalamohassa.

[03] ^b^mānamakkhappahāyino^eb^ti. ^b^māno^eb^ti ekavidhena māno -- yā cittassa unnati {uṇṇati (syā0 ka0)}. duvidhena māno -- attukkaṃsanamāno, paravambhanamāno. tividhena māno -- seyyohamasmīti māno, sadisohamasmīti māno, hīnohamasmīti māno. catubbidhena māno -- lābhena mānaṃ janeti, yasena mānaṃ janeti, pasaṃsāya mānaṃ janeti, sukhena mānaṃ janeti. pañcavidhena māno -- lābhimhi manāpikānaṃ rūpānanti mānaṃ janeti, lābhimhi manāpikānaṃ saddānaṃ...pe0... gandhānaṃ... rasānaṃ... phoṭṭhabbānanti mānaṃ janeti. chabbidhena māno -- cakkhusampadāya mānaṃ janeti, sotasampadāya...pe0... ghānasampadāya... jivhāsampadāya... kāyasampadāya... manosampadāya ^a^V0.0187^ea^ mānaṃ janeti. sattavidhena māno -- māno, atimāno, mānātimāno, omāno, avamāno, asmimāno, micchāmāno. aṭṭhavidhena māno -- lābhena mānaṃ janeti, alābhena omānaṃ janeti, yasena mānaṃ janeti, ayasena omānaṃ janeti, pasaṃsāya mānaṃ janeti, nindāya omānaṃ janeti, sukhena mānaṃ janeti ^a^T0.0283^ea^, dukkhena omānaṃ janeti. navavidhena māno -- seyyassa seyyohamasmīti māno, seyyassa sadisohamasmīti māno, seyyassa hīnohamasmīti māno, sadisassa seyyohamasmīti māno, sadisassa sadisohamasmīti māno, sadisassa hīnohamasmīti māno, hīnassa seyyohamasmīti māno, hīnassa sadisohamasmīti māno, hīnassa hīnohamassīti māno. dasavidhena māno -- idhekacco mānaṃ janeti jātiyā vā gottena vā kolaputtiyena vā vaṇṇapokkharatāya vā dhanena vā ajjhenena vā kammāyatanena vā sippāyatanena vā vijjāṭṭhānena {vijjāṭhānena (ka0)} vā sutena vā paṭibhānena vā aññataraññatarena vā vatthunā. yo evarūpo māno maññanā maññitattaṃ unnati unnamo dhajo sampaggāho ketukamyatā cittassa -- ayaṃ vuccati māno.

[03] ^b^makkho^eb^ti yo makkho makkhāyanā makkhāyitattaṃ niṭṭhuriyaṃ niṭṭhuriyakammaṃ {nitthuriyakammaṃ (ka0) passa vibha0 892} -- ayaṃ vuccati makkho. buddhassa bhagavato māno ca makkho ca pahīnā ucchinnamūlā ^a^M0.0206^ea^ tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. tasmā buddho mānamakkhappahāyīti -- mānamakkhappahāyino.

[03] ^b^handāhaṃ kittayissāmi giraṃ vaṇṇūpasaṃhita^eb^nti. ^b^handāha^eb^nti padasandhi padasaṃsaggo padapāripūrī akkharasamavāyo byañjanasiliṭṭhatā padānupubbatāpetaṃ -- handāhanti. ^b^kittayissāmi giraṃ vaṇṇūpasaṃhita^eb^nti vaṇṇena upetaṃ samupetaṃ upāgataṃ samupāgataṃ upapannaṃ samupapannaṃ samannāgataṃ vācaṃ giraṃ byappathaṃ udīraṇaṃ {odīraṇaṃ (syā0)} kittayissāmi desessāmi paññapessāmi paṭṭhapessāmi vivarissāmi vibhajissāmi uttānīkarissāmi ^a^T0.0284^ea^ pakāsessāmīti -- handāhaṃ kittayissāmi giraṃ vaṇṇūpasaṃhitaṃ. tenāha thero piṅgiyo --
[21] ``pahīnamalamohassa, mānamakkhappahāyino.
[22] handāhaṃ kittayissāmi, giraṃ vaṇṇūpasaṃhita''nti..
[21] ^b^tamonudo buddho samantacakkhu, lokantagū sabbabhavātivatto.^eb^
[22] ^b^anāsavo sabbadukkhappahīno, saccavhayo brahme upāsito me..^eb^

[03] ^b^tamonudo^eb^ ^a^V0.0188^ea^ ^b^buddho samantacakkhū^eb^ti. ^b^tamonudo^eb^ti rāgatamaṃ dosatamaṃ mohatamaṃ mānatamaṃ diṭṭhitamaṃ kilesatamaṃ duccaritatamaṃ andhakaraṇaṃ aññāṇakaraṇaṃ paññānirodhikaṃ vighātapakkhikaṃ anibbānasaṃvattanikaṃ nudi panudi pajahi vinodesi byantīakāsi anabhāvaṃ gamesi. ^b^buddho^eb^ti yo so bhagavā...pe0... sacchikā paññatti; yadidaṃ buddhoti. ^b^samantacakkhu^eb^ vuccati sabbaññutañāṇaṃ...pe0... tathāgato tena samantacakkhūti -- tamonudo buddho samantacakkhu.

[03] ^b^lokantagū sabbabhavātivatto^eb^ti. ^b^loko^eb^ti eko loko -- bhavaloko. dve lokā -- bhavaloko ca sambhavaloko ca; sampattibhavaloko ca sampattisambhavaloko ca; vipattibhavaloko ca vipattisambhavaloko ca {dve lokā sampatti ca bhavaloko vipatti ca bhavaloko (syā0)}. tayo lokā -- tisso vedanā. cattāro lokā -- cattāro āhārā. pañca lokā -- pañcupādānakkhandhā. cha ^a^T0.0285^ea^ lokā -- cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni. satta lokā -- sattaviññāṇaṭṭhitiyo ^a^M0.0207^ea^. aṭṭha lokā -- aṭṭha lokadhammā. nava lokā -- nava sattāvāsā. dasa lokā -- dasa āyatanāni. dvādasa lokā -- dvādasāyatanāni. aṭṭhārasa lokā -- aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo. ^b^lokantagū^eb^ti bhagavā lokassa antagato antappatto koṭigato koṭippatto... nibbānagato nibbānappatto. so vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo... jātimaraṇasaṃsāro natthi tassa punabbhavoti -- lokantagū.

[03] ^b^sabbabhavātivatto^eb^ti. ^b^bhavā^eb^ti dve bhavā -- kammabhavo ca paṭisandhiko ca punabbhavo. katamo kammabhavo? puññābhisaṅkhāro apuññābhisaṅkhāro āneñjābhisaṅkhāro -- ayaṃ kammabhavo. katamo paṭisandhiko punabbhavo? paṭisandhikā rūpā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ -- ayaṃ paṭisandhiko punabbhavo. bhagavā kammabhavañca paṭisandhikañca punabbhavaṃ ativatto {upātivatto (ka0)} atikkanto vītivattoti -- lokantagū sabbabhavātivatto.

[03] ^b^anāsavo sabbadukkhappahīno^eb^ti. ^b^anāsavo^eb^ti cattāro āsavā -- kāmāsavo, bhavāsavo, diṭṭhāsavo, avijjāsavo. te āsavā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. tasmā buddho anāsavo. ^b^sabbadukkhappahīno^eb^ti sabbaṃ tassa paṭisandhikaṃ jātidukkhaṃ jarādukkhaṃ byādhidukkhaṃ maraṇadukkhaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhaṃ ^a^T0.0286^ea^ ...pe0... diṭṭhibyasanadukkhaṃ pahīnaṃ samucchinnaṃ vūpasantaṃ paṭippassaddhaṃ abhabbuppattikaṃ ñāṇagginā daḍḍhaṃ. tasmā buddho sabbadukkhappahīnoti -- anāsavo sabbadukkhappahīno.

[03] ^b^saccavhayo^eb^ ^a^V0.0189^ea^ ^b^brahme upāsito me^eb^ti. ^b^saccavhayo^eb^ti saccavhayo sadisanāmo sadisavhayo saccasadisavhayo. vipassī bhagavā, sikhī bhagavā, vessabhū bhagavā, kakusandho bhagavā, koṇāgamano bhagavā, kassapo bhagavā. te buddhā bhagavanto sadisanāmā sadisavhayā. bhagavāpi sakyamuni tesaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sadisanāmo sadisavhayoti -- tasmā buddho saccavhayo.
[03] ^b^brahme upāsito me^eb^ti so mayā bhagavā āsito upāsito payirupāsito paripucchito paripañhitoti -- saccavhayo brahme upāsito me. tenāha thero piṅgiyo --
[21] ``tamonudo ^a^M0.0208^ea^ buddho samantacakkhu, lokantagū sabbabhavātivatto.
[22] anāsavo sabbadukkhappahīno, saccavhayo brahme upāsito me''ti..
[21] ^b^dijo yathā kubbanakaṃ pahāya, bahupphalaṃ kānanamāvaseyya.^eb^
[22] ^b^evamahaṃ appadasse pahāya, mahodadhiṃ haṃsoriva ajjhapatto^eb^ {ajja patto (ka0)} ^b^..^eb^

[03] ^b^dijo yathā kubbanakaṃ pahāya, bahupphalaṃ kānanamāvaseyyā^eb^ti ^a^T0.0287^ea^. ^b^dijo^eb^ vuccati pakkhī. kiṃkāraṇā dijo vuccati pakkhī? dvikkhattuṃ jāyatīti dijo, mātukucchimhā ca aṇḍakosamhā ca. taṃkāraṇā dijo vuccati pakkhīti -- dijo. ^b^yathā kubbanakaṃ pahāyā^eb^ti yathā dijo kubbanakaṃ parittavanakaṃ appaphalaṃ appabhakkhaṃ appodakaṃ pahāya jahitvā atikkamitvā samatikkamitvā vītivattetvā aññaṃ bahupphalaṃ bahubhakkhaṃ bahūdakaṃ {bahurukkhaṃ (syā0)} mahantaṃ kānanaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ adhigaccheyya vindeyya paṭilabheyya, tasmiñca vanasaṇḍe vāsaṃ kappeyyāti -- dijo yathā kubbanakaṃ pahāya bahupphalaṃ kānanaṃ āvaseyya.

[03] ^b^evamahaṃ appadasse pahāya, mahodadhiṃ haṃsoriva ajjhapatto^eb^ti. ^b^eva^eb^nti opammasampaṭipādanaṃ. ^b^appadasse pahāyā^eb^ti yo ca bāvarī brāhmaṇo ye caññe tassa ācariyā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upādāya appadassā parittadassā thokadassā omakadassā lāmakadassā chatukkadassā {jatukkadassā (syā0), jatukadassā (sī0 aṭṭha0)} vā. te appadasse parittadasse thokadasse omakadasse lāmakadasse chatukkadasse pahāya pajahitvā atikkamitvā samatikkamitvā vītivattetvā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ appamāṇadassaṃ aggadassaṃ seṭṭhadassaṃ viseṭṭhadassaṃ pāmokkhadassaṃ uttamadassaṃ pavaradassaṃ asamaṃ asamasamaṃ appaṭisamaṃ appaṭibhāgaṃ appaṭipuggalaṃ devātidevaṃ narāsabhaṃ purisasīhaṃ purisanāgaṃ purisājaññaṃ purisanisabhaṃ ^a^V0.0190^ea^ purisadhorayhaṃ dasabaladhāriṃ {dasabalaṃ tādiṃ (syā0)} adhigacchiṃ vindiṃ paṭilabhiṃ. yathā ca haṃso mahantaṃ ^a^M0.0209^ea^ mānasakaṃ {mānusakataṃ (syā0)} vā saraṃ anotattaṃ vā dahaṃ mahāsamuddaṃ vā akkhobhaṃ amitodakaṃ jalarāsiṃ adhigaccheyya vindeyya paṭilabheyya, evameva ^a^T0.0288^ea^ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ akkhobhaṃ amitatejaṃ pabhinnañāṇaṃ vivaṭacakkhuṃ paññāpabhedakusalaṃ adhigatapaṭisambhidaṃ catuvesārajjappattaṃ suddhādhimuttaṃ setapaccattaṃ advayabhāṇiṃ tādiṃ tathāpaṭiññaṃ aparittaṃ mahantaṃ gambhīraṃ appameyyaṃ duppariyogāhaṃ pahūtaratanaṃ sāgarasamaṃ chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgataṃ atulaṃ vipulaṃ appameyyaṃ, taṃ tādisaṃ pavadataṃ maggavādinaṃ {pavaramaggavādinaṃ (ka0)} merumiva nagānaṃ garuḷamiva dijānaṃ sīhamiva migānaṃ udadhimiva aṇṇavānaṃ adhigacchiṃ, taṃ satthāraṃ jinapavaraṃ mahesinti -- evamahaṃ appadasse pahāya mahodadhiṃ haṃsoriva ajjhapatto. tenāha thero piṅgiyo --
[21] ``dijo yathā kubbanakaṃ pahāya, bahupphalaṃ kānanamāvaseyya.
[22] evamahaṃ appadasse pahāya, mahodadhiṃ haṃsoriva ajjhapatto''ti..
[21] ^b^ye me pubbe viyākaṃsu,^eb^
[27] ^b^huraṃ gotamasāsanā `iccāsi iti bhavissati'.^eb^
[22] ^b^sabbaṃ taṃ itihītihaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhanaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^ye me pubbe viyākaṃsū^eb^ti. ^b^ye^eb^ti yo ca bāvarī brāhmaṇo ye caññe tassa ācariyā, te sakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ sakaṃ khantiṃ sakaṃ ruciṃ sakaṃ laddhiṃ sakaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ sakaṃ adhippāyaṃ byākaṃsu ācikkhiṃsu desayiṃsu ^a^T0.0289^ea^ paññapiṃsu paṭṭhapiṃsu vivariṃsu vibhajiṃsu uttānīakaṃsu pakāsesunti -- ye me pubbe viyākaṃsu.

[01] ^b^huraṃ gotamasāsanā^eb^ti huraṃ gotamasāsanā, paraṃ gotamasāsanā, pure gotamasāsanā, paṭhamataraṃ gotamasāsanā buddhasāsanā jinasāsanā tathāgatasāsanā {tathāgatasāsanā devasāsanā (syā0 ka0)} arahantasāsanāti -- huraṃ gotamasāsanā.
[03] ^b^iccāsi iti bhavissatī^eb^ti evaṃ kira āsi, evaṃ kira bhavissatīti -- iccāsi iti bhavissati.

[03] ^b^sabbaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0210^ea^ ^b^taṃ itihītiha^eb^nti sabbaṃ taṃ itihītihaṃ itikirāya paramparāya piṭakasampadāya takkahetu ^a^V0.0191^ea^ nayahetu ākāraparivitakkena diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā na sāmaṃ sayamabhiññātaṃ na attapaccakkhaṃ dhammaṃ yaṃ kathayiṃsūti -- sabbaṃ taṃ itihītihaṃ.

[01] ^b^sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhana^eb^nti sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhanaṃ vitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ saṅkappavaḍḍhanaṃ kāmavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ byāpādavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ vihiṃsāvitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ ñātivitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ janapadavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ amarāvitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ parānudayatāpaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhanaṃ anavaññattipaṭisaṃyuttavitakkavaḍḍhananti -- sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhanaṃ. tenāha thero piṅgiyo --
[21] ``ye me pubbe viyākaṃsu, huraṃ gotamasāsanā.
[27] `iccāsi iti bhavissa'ti.
[22] sabbaṃ ^a^T0.0290^ea^ taṃ itihītihaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhana''nti..
[21] ^b^eko tamonudāsīno, jutimā so pabhaṅkaro.^eb^
[22] ^b^gotamo bhūripaññāṇo, gotamo bhūrimedhaso..^eb^

[03] ^b^eko tamonudāsīno^eb^ti. ^b^eko^eb^ti bhagavā pabbajjasaṅkhātena eko, adutiyaṭṭhena eko, taṇhāya pahānaṭṭhena eko, ekantavītarāgoti eko, ekantavītadosoti eko, ekantavītamohoti eko, ekantanikkilesoti eko, ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti eko, eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko.

[03] kathaṃ bhagavā pabbajjasaṅkhātena eko? bhagavā daharova samāno susu kāḷakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato paṭhamena vayasā akāmakānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ assumukhānaṃ rodantānaṃ vilapantānaṃ ñātisaṅghaṃ sabbaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhaṃ chinditvā puttadārapalibodhaṃ chinditvā ñātipalibodhaṃ chinditvā mittāmaccapalibodhaṃ chinditvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā akiñcanabhāvaṃ upagantvā eko carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpeti. evaṃ bhagavā pabbajjasaṅkhātena eko.

[03] kathaṃ bhagavā adutiyaṭṭhena eko? evaṃ pabbajito samāno eko araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati appasaddāni appanigghosāni ^a^T0.0291^ea^ ^a^M0.0211^ea^ vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni {manussarāhaseyyakāni (syā0 ka0)} paṭisallānasāruppāni {paṭisallāṇasāruppāni (ka0)}. so eko gacchati, eko tiṭṭhati, eko nisīdati ^a^V0.0192^ea^, eko seyyaṃ kappeti, eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati, eko abhikkamati, eko paṭikkamati, eko raho nisīdati, eko caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, eko carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpeti. evaṃ bhagavā adutiyaṭṭhena eko.

[03] kathaṃ bhagavā taṇhāya pahānaṭṭhena eko? so evaṃ eko adutiyo appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto najjā nerañjarāya tīre bodhirukkhamūle mahāpadhānaṃ padahanto māraṃ sasenaṃ kaṇhaṃ namuciṃ pamattabandhuṃ vidhamitvā taṇhājāliniṃ {taṇhaṃ jāliniṃ (syā0)} visaṭaṃ {saritaṃ (syā0) mahāni0 191} visattikaṃ pajahi vinodesi byantīakāsi anabhāvaṃ gamesi.

[22] itthabhāvaññathābhāvaṃ, saṃsāraṃ nātivattati..
[21] ``etamādīnavaṃ {evamādīnavaṃ (ka0) passa itivu0 15} ñatvā, taṇhaṃ {taṇhā (syā0 ka0) mahāni0 191} dukkhassa sambhavaṃ.
[22] vītataṇho anādāno, sato bhikkhu paribbaje''ti..
[03] evaṃ bhagavā taṇhāya pahānaṭṭhena eko.

[03] kathaṃ bhagavā ekantavītarāgoti eko? rāgassa pahīnattā ekantavītarāgoti eko, dosassa pahīnattā ekantavītadosoti eko, mohassa pahīnattā ekantavītamohoti eko, kilesānaṃ pahīnattā ekantanikkilesoti eko.
[03] kathaṃ ^a^T0.0292^ea^ bhagavā ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti eko? ekāyanamaggo vuccati cattāro satipaṭṭhānā...pe0... ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
[21] ``ekāyanaṃ ^a^M0.0212^ea^ jātikhayantadassī, maggaṃ pajānāti hitānukampī.
[22] etena maggena tariṃsu {atariṃsu (ka0) passa saṃ0 ni0 5.409; mahāni0 191} pubbe, tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha''nti..
[03] evaṃ bhagavā ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti eko.

[03] kathaṃ bhagavā eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko. bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīmaṃsā vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi ^a^V0.0193^ea^. bhagavā tena bodhiñāṇena ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti bujjhi, ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti bujjhi, ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti bujjhi...pe0... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti bujjhi. atha vā, yaṃ bujjhitabbaṃ anubujjhitabbaṃ paṭibujjhitabbaṃ sambujjhitabbaṃ adhigantabbaṃ phassitabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ tena bodhiñāṇena bujjhi anubujjhi paṭibujjhi sambujjhi adhigacchi phassesi sacchākāsi. evaṃ bhagavā eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko.

[03] ^b^passāmi naṃ manasā cakkhunāvā^eb^ti yathā cakkhumā puriso āloke rūpagatāni passeyya dakkheyya olokeyya nijjhāyeyya ^a^T0.0302^ea^ upaparikkheyya, evamevāhaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ manasā passāmi dakkhāmi olokemi nijjhāyāmi upaparikkhāmīti -- passāmi naṃ manasā cakkhunāva.
[03] ^b^rattindivaṃ brāhmaṇa appamatto^eb^ti rattiñca divā ca buddhānussatiṃ manasā bhāvento appamattoti -- rattindivaṃ brāhmaṇa appamatto.

[03] ^b^namassamāno vivasemi ratti^eb^nti. ^b^namassamāno^eb^ti kāyena vā namassamāno, vācāya vā namassamāno, cittena vā namassamāno, anvatthapaṭipattiyā vā namassamāno, dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā vā namassamāno sakkāramāno garukāramāno mānayamāno pūjayamāno rattindivaṃ vivasemi atināmemi atikkamemīti -- namassamāno vivasemi rattiṃ.

[03] ^b^teneva maññāmi avippavāsa^eb^nti tāya buddhānussatiyā bhāvento avippavāsoti taṃ maññāmi, avippavuṭṭhoti taṃ maññāmi jānāmi. evaṃ jānāmi evaṃ ājānāmi evaṃ vijānāmi evaṃ paṭivijānāmi evaṃ paṭivijjhāmīti -- teneva maññāmi avippavāsaṃ. tenāha thero piṅgiyo --
[21] ``passāmi naṃ manasā cakkhunāva, rattindivaṃ brāhmaṇa appamatto.
[22] namassamāno vivasemi rattiṃ, teneva maññāmi avippavāsa''nti..
[21] ^b^saddhā^eb^ ^a^M0.0219^ea^ ^b^ca pīti ca mano sati ca,^eb^ ^b^nāpentime^eb^ ^a^T0.0303^ea^ ^b^gotamasāsanamhā.^eb^
[22] ^b^yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ vajati bhūripañño, sa tena teneva natohamasmi..^eb^

[03] ^b^saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati cā^eb^ti. ^b^saddhā^eb^ti yā ca bhagavantaṃ ārabbha saddhā saddahanā ^a^V0.0200^ea^ {saddhahanā (ka0)} okappanā abhippasādo saddhā saddhindriyaṃ saddhābalaṃ. ^b^pītī^eb^ti yā bhagavantaṃ ārabbha pīti pāmojjaṃ {pāmujjaṃ (syā0)} modanā āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti tuṭṭhi odagyaṃ attamanatā cittassa. ^b^mano^eb^ti yañca bhagavantaṃ ārabbha cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjā manoviññāṇadhātu. ^b^satī^eb^ti yā bhagavantaṃ ārabbha sati anussati sammāsatīti -- saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati ca.

[03] ^b^nāpentime gotamasāsanamhā^eb^ti ime cattāro dhammā gotamasāsanā buddhasāsanā jinasāsanā tathāgatasāsanā arahantasāsanā nāpenti na gacchanti na vijahanti na vināsentīti -- nāpentime gotamasāsanamhā.

[03] ^b^yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ vajati bhūripañño^eb^ti. ^b^yaṃ yaṃ disa^eb^nti puratthimaṃ vā disaṃ pacchimaṃ vā disaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ vā disaṃ uttaraṃ vā disaṃ vajati gacchati kamati abhikkamati. ^b^bhūripañño^eb^ti bhūripañño mahāpañño tikkhapañño puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño nibbedhikapañño ^a^T0.0304^ea^. bhūri vuccati pathavī. bhagavā tāya pathavisamāya paññāya vipulāya vitthatāya samannāgatoti -- yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ vajati bhūripañño.
[03] ^b^sa tena teneva natohamasmī^eb^ti so yena buddho tena teneva nato tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro tadadhimutto tadadhipateyyoti -- sa tena teneva natohamasmi. tenāha thero piṅgiyo --
[21] ``saddhā ^a^M0.0220^ea^ ca pīti ca mano sati ca, nāpentime gotamasāsanamhā.
[22] yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ vajati bhūripañño, sa tena teneva natohamasmī''ti..
[21] ^b^jiṇṇassa me dubbalathāmakassa,^eb^ ^b^teneva kāyo na paleti tattha.^eb^
[22] ^b^saṅkappayantāya vajāmi niccaṃ, mano hi me brāhmaṇa tena yutto..^eb^

[03] ^b^jiṇṇassa me dubbalathāmakassā^eb^ti jiṇṇassa vuḍḍhassa mahallakassa addhagatassa vayoanuppattassa. ^b^dubbalathāmakassā^eb^ti dubbalathāmakassa appathāmakassa parittathāmakassāti -- jiṇṇassa me dubbalathāmakassa.
[03] ^b^teneva^eb^ ^a^V0.0201^ea^ ^b^kāyo na paleti tatthā^eb^ti kāyo yena buddho tena na paleti na vajati na gacchati nātikkamatīti -- teneva kāyo na paleti tattha.

[03] ^b^saṅkappayantāya^eb^ ^a^T0.0305^ea^ ^b^vajāmi nicca^eb^nti saṅkappagamanena vitakkagamanena ñāṇagamanena paññāgamanena buddhigamanena vajāmi gacchāmi atikkamāmīti -- saṅkappayantāya vajāmi niccaṃ.

[03] ^b^mano hi me brāhmaṇa tena yutto^eb^ti. ^b^mano^eb^ti yaṃ cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ...pe0... tajjā manoviññāṇadhātu. ^b^mano hi me brāhmaṇa tena yutto^eb^ti mano yena buddho tena yutto payutto saṃyuttoti -- mano hi me brāhmaṇa tena yutto. tenāha thero piṅgiyo --
[21] ``jiṇṇassa me dubbalathāmakassa, teneva kāyo na paleti tattha.
[22] saṅkappayantāya vajāmi niccaṃ, mano hi me brāhmaṇa tena yutto''ti..
[21] ^b^paṅke sayāno pariphandamāno, dīpā dīpaṃ upallaviṃ. ^eb^
[22] ^b^athaddasāsiṃ sambuddhaṃ, oghatiṇṇamanāsavaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^paṅke^eb^ ^a^M0.0221^ea^ ^b^sayāno pariphandamāno^eb^ti. ^b^paṅke sayāno^eb^ti kāmapaṅke kāmakaddame kāmakilese kāmabaḷise kāmapariḷāhe kāmapalibodhe semāno sayamāno vasamāno āvasamāno parivasamāno {avasemāno parisemāno (syā0)} ti -- paṅke sayāno. ^b^pariphandamāno^eb^ti taṇhāphandanāya phandamāno, diṭṭhiphandanāya phandamāno ^a^T0.0306^ea^, kilesaphandanāya phandamāno, payogaphandanāya phandamāno, vipākaphandanāya phandamāno, manoduccaritaphandanāya phandamāno, ratto rāgena phandamāno, duṭṭho dosena phandamāno, mūḷho mohena phandamāno, vinibandho mānena phandamāno, parāmaṭṭho diṭṭhiyā phandamāno, vikkhepagato uddhaccena phandamāno, aniṭṭhaṅgato vicikicchāya phandamāno, thāmagato anusayehi phandamāno, lābhena phandamāno, alābhena phandamāno, yasena phandamāno, ayasena phandamāno, pasaṃsāya phandamāno, nindāya phandamāno, sukhena phandamāno, dukkhena phandamāno, jātiyā phandamāno, jarāya phandamāno, byādhinā phandamāno, maraṇena phandamāno, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsehi phandamāno, nerayikena dukkhena phandamāno, tiracchānayonikena dukkhena phandamāno, pettivisayikena dukkhena phandamāno, mānusikena dukkhena...pe0... gabbhokkantimūlakena dukkhena... gabbhaṭṭhitimūlakena dukkhena... gabbhavuṭṭhānamūlakena dukkhena... jātassūpanibandhakena dukkhena... jātassa parādheyyakena dukkhena... attūpakkamena ^a^V0.0202^ea^ dukkhena... parūpakkamena dukkhena... saṅkhāradukkhena... vipariṇāmadukkhena... cakkhurogena dukkhena... sotarogena dukkhena... ghānarogena dukkhena... jivhārogena dukkhena... kāyarogena dukkhena... sīsarogena dukkhena... kaṇṇarogena dukkhena... mukharogena dukkhena... dantarogena dukkhena... oṭṭharogena dukkhena... kāsena... sāsena... pināsena... ḍāhena {dāhena (ka0) mahāni0 11} ... jarena... kucchirogena... mucchāya... pakkhandikāya... sūlāya... visūcikāya... kuṭṭhena... gaṇḍena... kilāsena... sosena... apamārena ^a^T0.0307^ea^... dadduyā... kaṇḍuyā... kacchuyā... rakhasāya... vitacchikāya... lohitapittena {lohitena. pittena (syā0 ka0)} ... madhumehena... aṃsāya... piḷakāya... bhagandalena {bhagandalāya (syā0)} ... pittasamuṭṭhānena ābādhena... semhasamuṭṭhānena ābādhena... vātasamuṭṭhānena ābādhena... sannipātikena ābādhena... utupariṇāmajena ābādhena... visamaparihārajena ābādhena... opakkamikena ābādhena... kammavipākajena ābādhena... sītena... uṇhena... jighacchāya ^a^M0.0222^ea^... pipāsāya... uccārena... passāvena... ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassena dukkhena... mātumaraṇena dukkhena... pitumaraṇena dukkhena... puttamaraṇena dukkhena... dhītumaraṇena dukkhena... ñātibyasanena dukkhena... bhogabyasanena dukkhena... rogabyasanena dukkhena... sīlabyasanena dukkhena... diṭṭhibyasanena dukkhena phandamāno pariphandamāno pavedhamāno sampavedhamānoti -- [03] ^b^dīpā dīpaṃ upallavi^eb^nti satthārato satthāraṃ dhammakkhānato dhammakkhānaṃ gaṇato gaṇaṃ diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhiṃ paṭipadāya paṭipadaṃ maggato maggaṃ pallaviṃ upallaviṃ sampallavinti -- dīpā dīpaṃ upallaviṃ.

[03] ^b^athaddasāsiṃ sambuddha^eb^nti. ^b^athā^eb^ti padasandhi padasaṃsaggo padapāripūrī akkharasamavāyo byañjanasiliṭṭhatā padānupubbatāpetaṃ -- athāti. ^b^addasāsi^eb^nti addasaṃ addakkhiṃ apassiṃ paṭivijjhiṃ. ^b^buddho^eb^ti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ buddhoti -- athaddasāsiṃ sambuddhaṃ.

[03] ^b^oghatiṇṇamanāsava^eb^nti. ^b^oghatiṇṇa^eb^nti bhagavā kāmoghaṃ tiṇṇo, bhavoghaṃ tiṇṇo, diṭṭhoghaṃ ^a^T0.0308^ea^ tiṇṇo, avijjoghaṃ tiṇṇo, sabbasaṃsārapathaṃ tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nitthiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivatto, so vutthavāso ciṇṇacaraṇo...pe0... jātimaraṇasaṃsāro, natthi tassa punabbhavoti -- oghatiṇṇaṃ. ^b^anāsava^eb^nti cattāro āsavā -- kāmāsavo, bhavāsavo, diṭṭhāsavo, avijjāsavo. te āsavā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā ^a^V0.0203^ea^ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. tasmā buddho anāsavāti -- oghatiṇṇamanāsavaṃ. tenāha thero piṅgiyo --
[21] ``paṅke sayāno pariphandamāno, dīpā dīpaṃ upallaviṃ.
[22] athaddasāsiṃ sambuddhaṃ, oghatiṇṇamanāsava''nti..
[21] ^b^yathā ahū vakkali muttasaddho,^eb^ ^b^bhadrāvudho āḷavigotamo ca.^eb^

[03] ^b^yathā^eb^ ^a^M0.0223^ea^ ^b^ahū vakkali muttasaddho, bhadrāvudho āḷavigotamo cā^eb^ti yathā vakkalitthero {vakkali (syā0)} saddho saddhāgaruko saddhāpubbaṅgamo saddhādhimutto saddhādhipateyyo arahattappatto, yathā bhadrāvudho thero saddho saddhāgaruko saddhāpubbaṅgamo saddhādhimutto saddhādhipateyyo arahattappatto, yathā āḷavigotamo thero saddho saddhāgaruko ^a^T0.0309^ea^ saddhāpubbaṅgamo saddhādhimutto saddhādhipateyyo arahattappattoti -- yathā ahū vakkali muttasaddho bhadrāvudho āḷavigotamo ca.

[03] ^b^evameva tvampi pamuñcassu saddha^eb^nti evameva tvaṃ saddhaṃ muñcassu pamuñcassu sampamuñcassu adhimuñcassu okappehi. ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti saddhaṃ muñcassu pamuñcassu sampamuñcassu adhimuñcassu okappehi. ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti...pe0... ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti saddhaṃ muñcassu pamuñcassu sampamuñcassu adhimuñcassu okappehi... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti saddhaṃ muñcassu pamuñcassu, sampamuñcassu adhimuñcassu okappehīti -- evameva tvampi pamuñcassu saddhaṃ.

[03] ^b^gamissasi tvaṃ piṅgiya maccudheyyassa pāra^eb^nti maccudheyyaṃ vuccanti kilesā ca khandhā ca abhisaṅkhārā ca. maccudheyyassa pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ, yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ. ^b^gamissasi tvaṃ piṅgiya maccudheyyassa pāra^eb^nti tvaṃ pāraṃ gamissasi, pāraṃ adhigamissasi, pāraṃ phassissasi, pāraṃ sacchikarissasīti -- gamissasi tvaṃ piṅgiya maccudheyyassa pāraṃ. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``yathā ahū vakkali muttasaddho, bhadrāvudho āḷavigotamo ca.
[27] evameva tvampi pamuñcassu saddhaṃ,
[22] gamissasi ^a^V0.0204^ea^ tvaṃ piṅgiya maccudheyyassa pāra''nti..
[21] ^b^esa bhiyyo pasīdāmi, sutvāna munino vaco.^eb^

[03] ^b^esa bhiyyo pasīdāmī^eb^ti esa bhiyyo pasīdāmi, bhiyyo bhiyyo saddahāmi, bhiyyo bhiyyo okappemi, bhiyyo bhiyyo adhimuccāmi; ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīdāmi, bhiyyo bhiyyo saddahāmi ^a^M0.0224^ea^, bhiyyo bhiyyo okappemi, bhiyyo bhiyyo adhimuccāmi; ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīdāmi...pe0... ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīdāmi...pe0... ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīdāmi, bhiyyo bhiyyo saddahāmi, bhiyyo bhiyyo okappemi, bhiyyo bhiyyo adhimuccāmīti -- esa bhiyyo pasīdāmi.

[03] ^b^sutvāna munino vaco^eb^ti. ^b^munī^eb^ti monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ...pe0... saṅgajālamaticca so muni. ^b^sutvāna munino vaco^eb^ti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ byappathaṃ desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ sutvāna uggahetvāna upadhārayitvāna upalakkhayitvānāti -- sutvāna munino vaco.

[03] ^b^vivaṭacchado sambuddho^eb^ti. ^b^chadana^eb^nti pañca chadanāni -- taṇhāchadanaṃ, diṭṭhichadanaṃ, kilesachadanaṃ, duccaritachadanaṃ, avijjāchadanaṃ. tāni chadanāni buddhassa bhagavato vivaṭāni viddhaṃsitāni samugghāṭitāni pahīnāni samucchinnāni vūpasantāni paṭippassaddhāni abhabbuppattikāni ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāni. tasmā buddho vivaṭacchado. ^b^buddho^eb^ti yo so bhagavā...pe0... sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṃ buddhoti -- vivaṭacchado sambuddho.

[03] ^b^akhilo paṭibhānavā^eb^ti. ^b^akhilo^eb^ti rāgo khilo, doso khilo, moho khilo, kodho khilo, upanāho...pe0... sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā khilā. te khilā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. tasmā ^a^T0.0311^ea^ buddho akhilo.

[03] ^b^paṭibhānavā^eb^ti tayo paṭibhānavanto -- pariyatti paṭibhānavā, paripucchāpaṭibhānavā, adhigamapaṭibhānavā. katamo pariyattipaṭibhānavā? idhekaccassa buddhavacanaṃ {pakatiyā (ka0)} pariyāputaṃ {pariyāpuṭaṃ (syā0 ka0)} hoti suttaṃ ^a^V0.0205^ea^ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallaṃ. tassa pariyattiṃ nissāya paṭibhāti {paṭibhāyati (ka0)} -- ayaṃ pariyattipaṭibhānavā.
[03] katamo paripucchāpaṭibhānavā? idhekacco paripucchitā hoti atthe ca ñāye ca lakkhaṇe ca kāraṇe ca ṭhānāṭhāne ca. tassa paripucchaṃ nissāya paṭibhāti -- ayaṃ paripucchāpaṭibhānavā.

[03] katamo ^a^M0.0225^ea^ adhigamapaṭibhānavā? idhekaccassa adhigatā honti cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, cattāro ariyamaggā, cattāri sāmaññaphalāni, catasso paṭisambhidāyo, cha abhiññāyo. tassa attho ñāto, dhammo ñāto, nirutti ñātā. atthe ñāte attho paṭibhāti, dhamme ñāte dhammo paṭibhāti, niruttiyā ñātāya nirutti paṭibhāti. imesu tīsu ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā. bhagavā imāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya upeto samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato. tasmā buddho paṭibhānavā. yassa pariyatti natthi, paripucchā natthi, adhigamo natthi, kiṃ tassa paṭibhāyissatīti -- akhilo paṭibhānavā ^a^T0.0312^ea^. tenāha thero piṅgiyo --
[21] ``esa bhiyyo pasīdāmi, sutvāna munino vaco.
[22] vivaṭacchado sambuddho, akhilo paṭibhānavā''ti..
