[27] ^b^pañhānantakaro satthā, kaṅkhīnaṃ paṭijānataṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^adhideve abhiññāyā^eb^ti. ^b^devā^eb^ti tayo devā -- sammutidevā {sammabhidevā (syā0)}, upapattidevā, visuddhidevā. katame sammutidevā? sammutidevā vuccanti rājāno {katame sammatidevā rājāno (syā0) evamuparipi} ca rājakumāro ca deviyo ca. ime vuccanti sammutidevā. katame upapattidevā? upapattidevā vuccanti cātumahārājikā devā tāvatiṃsā devā...pe0... brahmakāyikā devā, ye ca devā taduttari. ime vuccanti upapattidevā. katame visuddhidevā? visuddhidevā vuccanti tathāgatā tathāgatasāvakā arahanto khīṇāsavā, ye ca paccekasambuddhā. ime vuccanti visuddhidevā. bhagavā sammutideve adhidevāti abhiññāya upapattideve adhidevāti abhiññāya, visuddhideve adhidevāti ^a^V0.0206^ea^ abhiññāya jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvāti -- adhideve abhiññāya.

[03] ^b^sabbaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0226^ea^ ^b^vedi paropara^eb^nti bhagavā attano ca paresañca adhidevakare dhamme vedi aññāsi aphassi paṭivijjhi. katame attano ^a^T0.0313^ea^ adhidevakarā dhammā? sammāpaṭipadā anulomapaṭipadā apaccanīkapaṭipadā anvatthapaṭipadā dhammānudhammapaṭipadā sīlesu paripūrakāritā indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā jāgariyānuyogo satisampajaññaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā...pe0... ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. ime vuccanti attano adhidevakarā dhammā.

[03] katame paresaṃ adhidevakarā dhammā? sammāpaṭipadā...pe0... ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. ime vuccanti paresaṃ adhidevakarā dhammā. evaṃ bhagavā attano ca paresañca adhidevakare dhamme vedi aññāsi aphassi paṭivijjhīti -- sabbaṃ vedi paroparaṃ.

[03] ^b^pañhānantakaro satthā^eb^ti bhagavā pārāyanikapañhānaṃ antakaro pariyantakaro paricchedakaro parivaṭumakaro; sabhiyapañhānaṃ {parisapañhānaṃ (syā0), piṅgiyapañhānaṃ (ka0)} antakaro pariyantakaro paricchedakaro parivaṭumakaro; sakkapañhānaṃ...pe0... suyāmapañhānaṃ... bhikkhupañhānaṃ... bhikkhunīpañhānaṃ... upāsakapañhānaṃ... upāsikāpañhānaṃ... rājapañhānaṃ... khattiyapañhānaṃ... brāhmaṇapañhānaṃ... vessapañhānaṃ... suddapañhānaṃ... devapañhānaṃ... brahmapañhānaṃ antakaro pariyantakaro paricchedakaro parivaṭumakaroti -- pañhānantakaro. ^b^satthā^eb^ti bhagavā satthavāho. yathā satthavāho satthe kantāraṃ tāreti, corakantāraṃ tāreti, vāḷakantāraṃ tāreti, dubbhikkhakantāraṃ tāreti, nirudakakantāraṃ tāreti uttāreti nitthāreti {nittāreti (syā0 ka0)} patāreti, khemantabhūmiṃ ^a^T0.0314^ea^ sampāpeti; evameva bhagavā satthavāho satte kantāraṃ tāreti, jātikantāraṃ tāreti, jarākantāraṃ...pe0... byādhikantāraṃ... maraṇakantāraṃ... sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsakantāraṃ tāreti, rāgakantāraṃ tāreti, dosakantāraṃ... mohakantāraṃ... mānakantāraṃ... diṭṭhikantāraṃ... kilesakantāraṃ... duccaritakantāraṃ tāreti, rāgagahanaṃ tāreti, dosagahanaṃ tāreti, mohagahanaṃ... diṭṭhigahanaṃ... kilesagahanaṃ... duccaritagahanaṃ tāreti uttāreti nitthāreti patāreti; khemantaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ sampāpetīti -- evampi bhagavā satthavāho.

[03] atha vā, bhagavā netā vinetā anunetā paññapetā nijjhāpetā pekkhatā pasādetāti, evaṃ bhagavā satthavāho. atha vā, bhagavā anuppannassa ^a^M0.0227^ea^ maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa ^a^V0.0207^ea^ sañjanetā, anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā, maggaññū maggavidū maggakovido maggānugā ca pana etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatāti, evampi bhagavā satthavāhoti -- pañhānantakaro satthā.

[03] ^b^kaṅkhīnaṃ paṭijānata^eb^nti sakaṅkhā āgantvā nikkaṅkhā sampajjanti, sallekhā āgantvā nillekhā sampajjanti, sadveḷhakā āgantvā nidveḷahakā sampajjanti, savicikicchā āgantvā nibbicikicchā sampajjanti, sarāgā āgantvā vītarāgā sampajjanti, sadosā āgantvā vītadosā sampajjanti, samohā āgantvā vītamohā sampajjanti, sakilesā āgantvā nikkilesā sampajjantīti -- kaṅkhīnaṃ paṭijānataṃ. tenāha thero piṅgiyo --
[21] ``adhideve ^a^T0.0315^ea^ abhiññāya, sabbaṃ vedi paroparaṃ.
[22] pañhānantakaro satthā, kaṅkhīnaṃ paṭijānata''nti..
[21] ^b^asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ,^eb^ ^b^yassa natthi upamā kvaci. ^eb^
[22] ^b^addhā gamissāmi na mettha kaṅkhā, evaṃ maṃ dhārehi adhimuttacittaṃ..^eb^

[03] ^b^asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppa^eb^nti asaṃhīraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ. yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ. ^b^asaṃhīra^eb^nti rāgena dosena mohena kodhena upanāhena makkhena paḷāsena issāya macchariyena māyāya sāṭheyyena thambhena sārambhena mānena atimānena madena pamādena sabbakilesehi sabbaduccaritehi sabbapariḷāhehi sabbāsavehi sabbadarathehi sabbasantāpehi sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārehi asaṃhāriyaṃ nibbānaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti -- asaṃhīraṃ.

[03] ^b^asaṃkuppa^eb^nti asaṃkuppaṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānaṃ. yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho...pe0... nirodho nibbānaṃ. nibbānassa {yassa (syā0)} na uppādo paññāyati, vayo natthi, na tassa aññathattaṃ {tassa aññadatthu (syā0)} paññāyati. nibbānaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassataṃ avipariṇāmadhammanti -- asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ.

[03] ^b^yassa^eb^ ^a^M0.0228^ea^ ^b^natthi upamā kvacī^eb^ti. ^b^yassā^eb^ti nibbānassa. ^b^natthi upamā^eb^ti upamā natthi, upanidhā natthi, sadisaṃ natthi, paṭibhāgo natthi, na sati na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati. ^b^kvacī^eb^ti ^a^V0.0208^ea^ kvaci kimhici ^a^T0.0316^ea^ katthaci ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā ajjhattabahiddhā vāti -- yassa natthi upamā kvaci.

[03] ^b^addhā gamissāmi na mettha kaṅkhā^eb^ti. ^b^addhā^eb^ti ekaṃsavacanaṃ nissaṃsayavacanaṃ nikkaṅkhavacanaṃ advejjhavacanaṃ adveḷhakavacanaṃ niyogavacanaṃ apaṇṇakavacanaṃ aviraddhavacanaṃ avatthāpanavacanametaṃ -- addhāti. ^b^gamissāmī^eb^ti gamissāmi adhigamissāmi phassissāmi sacchikarissāmīti -- addhā gamissāmi. ^b^na mettha kaṅkhā^eb^ti. ^b^etthā^eb^ti nibbāne kaṅkhā natthi, vicikicchā natthi, dveḷhakaṃ natthi, saṃsayo natthi, na sati na saṃvijjati nupalabbhati, pahīno samucchinno vūpasanto paṭippassaddho abhabbuppattiko ñāṇagginā daḍḍhoti -- addhā gamissāmi na mettha kaṅkhā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ maṃ dhārehi adhimuttacitta^eb^nti. ^b^evaṃ maṃ dhārehī^eb^ti evaṃ maṃ upalakkhehi. ^b^adhimuttacitta^eb^nti nibbānaninnaṃ nibbānapoṇaṃ nibbānapabbhāraṃ nibbānādhimuttanti -- evaṃ maṃ dhārehi adhimuttacittanti. tenāha thero piṅgiyo --
[21] ``asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ, yassa natthi upamā kvaci.
[22] addhā gamissāmi na mettha kaṅkhā, evaṃ maṃ dhārehi adhimuttacitta''nti..
[06] pārāyanānugītigāthāniddeso aṭṭhārasamo.
[06] pārāyanavaggo samatto.
[21] ^b^sabbesu^eb^ ^a^T0.0317^ea^ ^a^V0.0209^ea^ ^a^M0.0229^ea^ ^b^bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ,^eb^ ^b^aviheṭhayaṃ aññatarampi tesaṃ.^eb^
[21] ^b^na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāyaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..^eb^

[03] ^b^sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍa^eb^nti. ^b^sabbesū^eb^ti sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ asesaṃ nissesaṃ pariyādiyanavacanametaṃ -- sabbesūti. ^b^bhūtesū^eb^ti bhūtā vuccanti tasā ca thāvarā ca. ^b^tasā^eb^ti yesaṃ tasitataṇhā appahīnā, yesañca bhayabheravā appahīnā. kiṃkāraṇā vuccanti tasā? te tasanti uttasanti paritasanti bhāsanti santāsaṃ āpajjanti, taṃkāraṇā vuccanti tasā. ^b^thāvarā^eb^ti yesaṃ tasitataṇhā pahīnā, yesañca bhayabheravā pahīnā. kiṃkāraṇā vuccanti thāvarā? te na tasanti na uttasanti na paritasanti na bhāyanti na santāsaṃ āpajjanti, taṃkāraṇā vuccanti thāvarā. ^b^daṇḍa^eb^nti tayo daṇḍā -- kāyadaṇḍo vacīdaṇḍo manodaṇḍo. tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ kāyadaṇḍo, catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ vacīdaṇḍo, tividhaṃ manoduccaritaṃ manodaṇḍo. ^b^sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍa^eb^nti sabbesu bhūtesu daṇḍaṃ nidhāya nidahitvā.

[01] ^b^aviheṭhayaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0318^ea^ ^b^aññatarampi tesa^eb^nti ekamekampi sattaṃ pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā anduyā {aruyā (syā0), adduyā (ka0)} vā rajjuyā vā aviheṭhayanto, sabbepi satte pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā anduyā vā rajjuyā vā aviheṭhayantoti -- aviheṭhayaṃ aññatarampi tesaṃ.

[03] ^b^na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāya^eb^nti. ^b^nā^eb^ti paṭikkhepo; ^b^puttā^eb^ti cattāro puttā -- atrajo putto, khettajo putto, dinnako putto, antevāsiko putto. ^b^sahāya^eb^nti sahāyā vuccanti yehi saha āgamanaṃ phāsu, gamanaṃ phāsu, gamanāgamanaṃ phāsu, ṭhānaṃ phāsu, nisajjanaṃ phāsu, sayanaṃ {nipajjanaṃ (syā0)} phāsu, ālapanaṃ phāsu, sallapanaṃ phāsu, ullapanaṃ phāsu, samullapanaṃ phāsu ^a^M0.0230^ea^. ^b^na puttamiccheyya kuto^eb^ ^a^V0.0210^ea^ ^b^sahāya^eb^nti puttampi na iccheyya na sādiyeyya na patthayeyya na pihayeyya nābhijappeyya, kuto mittaṃ vā sandiṭṭhaṃ vā sambhattaṃ vā sahāyaṃ vā iccheyya {icchissati (syā0) evamīdisesu padesu anāgatavibhattiyā} sādiyeyya patthayeyya pihayeyya abhijappeyyāti -- na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāyaṃ.

[03] ^b^eko care khaggavisāṇakappo^eb^ti. ^b^eko^eb^ti so paccekasambuddho pabbajjāsaṅkhātena eko, adutiyaṭṭhena eko, taṇhāya pahānaṭṭhena {taṇhāpahānaṭṭhena (syā0) mahāni0 191} eko, ekantavītarāgoti eko, ekantavītadosoti eko, ekantavītamohoti eko, ekantanikkilesoti eko, ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti eko, eko anuttaraṃ paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti eko.

[03] kathaṃ ^a^T0.0319^ea^ so paccekasambuddho pabbajjāsaṅkhātena eko? so paccekasambuddho sabbaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhaṃ chinditvā puttadārapalibodhaṃ chinditvā ñātipalibodhaṃ chinditvā sannidhipalibodhaṃ chinditvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā akiñcanabhāvaṃ upagantvā eko carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpetīti -- evaṃ so paccekasambuddho pabbajjāsaṅkhātena eko.

[01] kathaṃ so paccekasambuddho adutiyaṭṭhena eko? so evaṃ pabbajito samāno eko araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppāni. so eko gacchati, eko tiṭṭhati, eko nisīdati, eko seyyaṃ kappeti, eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati, eko abhikkamati, eko paṭikkamati, eko raho nisīdati, eko caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, eko carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpetīti -- evaṃ so paccekasambuddho adutiyaṭṭhena eko.

[01] kathaṃ so paccekasambuddho taṇhāya pahānaṭṭhena eko? so evaṃ eko adutiyo appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto mahāpadhānaṃ padahanto māraṃ sasenakaṃ namuciṃ kaṇhaṃ pamattabandhuṃ vidhametvā ca taṇhājāliniṃ visaritaṃ visattikaṃ pajahi vinodesi byantīakāsi anabhāvaṃgamesi.
[21] ``taṇhādutiyo ^a^T0.0320^ea^ ^a^M0.0231^ea^ puriso, dīghamaddhāna saṃsaraṃ.
[22] itthabhāvaññathābhāvaṃ, saṃsāraṃ nātivattati..
[21] ``etamādīnavaṃ ñatvā, taṇhaṃ dukkhassa sambhavaṃ.
[22] vītataṇho anādāno, sato bhikkhu paribbaje''ti..
[03] evaṃ ^a^V0.0211^ea^ so paccekasambuddho taṇhāya pahānaṭṭhena eko.

[03] kathaṃ so paccekasambuddho ekantavītarāgoti eko? rāgassa pahīnattā ekantavītarāgoti eko, dosassa pahīnattā ekantavītadosoti eko, mohassa pahīnattā ekantavītamohoti eko, kilesānaṃ pahīnattā ekantanikkilesoti eko. evaṃ so paccekasambuddho ekantavītarāgoti eko.

[03] kathaṃ so paccekasambuddho ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti eko? ekāyanamaggo vuccati cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
[21] ``ekāyanaṃ jātikhayantadassī, maggaṃ pajānāti hitānukampī.
[22] etena maggena tariṃsu pubbe, tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha''nti..
[03] evaṃ so paccekasambuddho ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti eko.

[01] kathaṃ so paccekasambuddho eko anuttaraṃ paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti ^a^T0.0321^ea^ eko? bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ. paññā paññindriyaṃ paññābalaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīmaṃsā vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi. so paccekasambuddho maggapaccekasambuddho ñāṇapaccekasambuddho ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti bujjhi, ``sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā''ti bujjhi, ``sabbe dhammā anattā''ti bujjhi, ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā''ti bujjhi, ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa''nti bujjhi, ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa''nti bujjhi, ``nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana''nti bujjhi, ``saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso''ti bujjhi, ``phassapaccayā vedanā''ti bujjhi, ``vedanāpaccayā taṇhā''ti bujjhi, ``taṇhāpaccayā upādāna''nti bujjhi, ``upādānapaccayā bhavo''ti bujjhi, ``bhavapaccayā jātī''ti bujjhi, ``jātipaccayā ^a^M0.0232^ea^ jarāmaraṇa''nti bujjhi; ``avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho''ti bujjhi, ``saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho''ti bujjhi, ``viññāṇanirodhā nāmarūpanirodho''ti bujjhi, ``nāmarūpanirodhā saḷāyatananirodho''ti bujjhi, ``saḷāyatananirodhā phassanirodho''ti bujjhi, ``phassanirodhā vedanānirodho''ti bujjhi, ``vedanānirodhā taṇhānirodho''ti bujjhi, ``taṇhānirodhā upādānanirodho''ti bujjhi, ``upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho''ti bujjhi, ``bhavanirodhā jātinirodho''ti bujjhi, ``jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodho''ti ^a^V0.0212^ea^ bujjhi; ``idaṃ dukkha''nti bujjhi, ``ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo''ti bujjhi, ``ayaṃ dukkhanirodho''ti bujjhi, ``ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā''ti bujjhi; ``ime āsavā''ti bujjhi, ``ayaṃ āsavasamudayo''ti bujjhi...pe0... ^a^T0.0322^ea^ ``ayaṃ āsavanirodhagāminī paṭipadā''ti bujjhi; ``ime dhammā abhiññeyyā''ti bujjhi, ``ime dhammā pahātabbā''ti bujjhi, ``ime dhammā sacchikātabbā''ti bujjhi, ``ime dhammā bhāvetabbā''ti bujjhi; channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca bujjhi, pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ samudayañca...pe0... nissaraṇañca bujjhi, catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca bujjhi, ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti bujjhi.

[03] atha vā, yaṃ bujjhitabbaṃ anubujjhitabbaṃ paṭibujjhitabbaṃ sambujjhitabbaṃ adhigantabbaṃ phassitabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ tena paccekabodhiñāṇena bujjhi anubujjhi paṭibujjhi sambujjhi adhigacchi phassesi sacchākāsīti evaṃ so paccekasambuddho eko anuttaraṃ paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti -- eko.

[01] ^b^care^eb^ti aṭṭha cariyāyo -- iriyāpathacariyā, āyatanacariyā, saticariyā, samādhicariyā, ñāṇacariyā, maggacariyā, patticariyā, lokatthacariyā. iriyāpathacariyāti catūsu iriyāpathesu. āyatanacariyāti chasu ajjhattikabāhiresu āyatanesu. saticariyāti catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu. samādhicariyāti catūsu jhānesu. ñāṇacariyāti catūsu ariyasaccesu. maggacariyāti catūsu ariyamaggesu. patticariyāti catūsu sāmaññaphalesu. lokatthacariyāti tathāgatesu arahantesu sammāsambuddhesu padesato paccekasambuddhesu padesato sāvakesu. iriyāpathacariyā ca paṇidhisampannānaṃ, āyatanacariyā ca indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ ^a^M0.0233^ea^, saticariyā ^a^T0.0323^ea^ ca appamādavihārīnaṃ, samādhicariyā ca adhicittamanuyuttānaṃ, ñāṇacariyā ca buddhisampannānaṃ, maggacariyā ca sammāpaṭipannānaṃ, patticariyā ca adhigataphalānaṃ, lokatthacariyā ca tathāgatānaṃ arahantānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ padesato paccekabuddhānaṃ padesato sāvakānaṃ. imā aṭṭha cariyāyo. aparāpi aṭṭha cariyāyo -- adhimuccanto saddhāya carati, paggaṇhanto vīriyena carati, upaṭṭhapento satiyā carati, avikkhepaṃ karonto samādhinā carati, pajānanto paññāya carati, vijānanto viññāṇacariyāya carati. evaṃ paṭipannassa kusalā dhammā āyāpentīti -- āyatanacariyāya carati. evaṃ paṭipanno visesamadhigacchatīti -- visesacariyāya carati. imā aṭṭha cariyāyo.

[03] aparāpi aṭṭha cariyāyo -- dassanacariyā ca sammādiṭṭhiyā, abhiropanacariyā ca sammāsaṅkappassa ^a^V0.0213^ea^, pariggahacariyā ca sammāvācāya, samuṭṭhānacariyā ca sammākammantassa, vodānacariyā ca sammāājīvassa, paggahacariyā ca sammāvāyāmassa, upaṭṭhānacariyā ca sammāsatiyā, avikkhepacariyā ca sammāsamādhissa. imā aṭṭha cariyāyo.

[01] ^b^khaggavisāṇakappo^eb^ti yathā khaggassa nāma visāṇaṃ ekaṃ hoti adutiyaṃ, evameva so paccekasambuddho takkappo tassadiso tappaṭibhāgo. yathā atiloṇaṃ vuccati loṇakappo, atitittakaṃ vuccati tittakappo, atimadhuraṃ vuccati madhurakappo, atiuṇhaṃ vuccati aggikappo ^a^T0.0324^ea^, atisītalaṃ vuccati himakappo, mahāudakakkhandho vuccati samuddakappo, mahābhiññābalappatto sāvako vuccati satthukappoti; evameva so paccekasambuddho tattha takkappo tassadiso tappaṭibhāgo eko adutiyo muttabandhano sammā loke carati viharati iriyati vatteti pāleti yapeti yāpetīti -- eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. tenāha so paccekasambuddho --
[21] ``sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, aviheṭhayaṃ aññatarampi tesaṃ.
[22] na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāyaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo''ti..
[21] ^b^saṃsaggajātassa^eb^ ^a^M0.0234^ea^ ^b^bhavanti snehā,^eb^ ^b^snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahoti.^eb^
[22] ^b^ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..^eb^

[03] ^b^saṃsaggajātassa bhavanti snehā^eb^ti. ^b^saṃsaggā^eb^ti dve saṃsaggā -- dassanasaṃsaggo ca savanasaṃsaggo ca. katamo dassanasaṃsaggo? idhekacco passati itthiṃ vā kumāriṃ vā abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ pāsādikaṃ paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṃ. disvā passitvā anubyañjanaso nimittaṃ gaṇhāti -- kesā vā sobhanā {sobhaṇā (syā0)} mukhaṃ vā sobhanaṃ akkhī vā sobhanā kaṇṇā vā sobhanā ^a^T0.0325^ea^ nāsā vā sobhanā oṭṭhā vā sobhanā dantā vā sobhanā mukhaṃ vā sobhanaṃ gīvā vā sobhanā thanā vā sobhanā uraṃ vā sobhanaṃ udaraṃ vā sobhanaṃ kaṭi vā sobhanā ūrū vā sobhanā jaṅghā vā sobhanā hatthā vā sobhanā pādā vā sobhanā aṅguliyo vā sobhanā nakhā vā sobhanāti. disvā passitvā abhinandati abhivadati abhipattheti anuppādeti {anussarati (ka0)} anubandhati rāgabandhanaṃ -- ayaṃ dassanasaṃsaggo.

[03] katamo savanasaṃsaggo? idhekacco suṇāti -- ``asukasmiṃ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā kumārī vā abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā''ti ^a^V0.0214^ea^. sutvā suṇitvā abhinandati abhivadati abhipattheti anuppādeti anubandhati rāgabandhanaṃ -- ayaṃ savanasaṃsaggo.

[03] ^b^snehā^eb^ti dve snehā -- taṇhāsneho ca diṭṭhisneho ca. katamo taṇhāsneho? yāvatā taṇhāsaṅkhātena sīmakataṃ {sīmakataṃ mariyādikataṃ (syā0)} odhikataṃ pariyantikataṃ pariggahitaṃ mamāyitaṃ -- ``idaṃ mama, etaṃ mama, ettakaṃ mama, ettāvatā mama''. rūpā saddā gandhā rasā phoṭṭhabbā attharaṇā pāvuraṇā dāsidāsā ajeḷakā kukkuṭasūkarā hatthigavāssavaḷavā khettaṃ vatthu hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ gāmanigamarājadhāniyo raṭṭhañca janapado ca koso ca koṭṭhāgārañca, kevalampi mahāpathaviṃ taṇhāvasena mamāyati, yāvatā aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritaṃ ^a^T0.0326^ea^ -- ayaṃ taṇhāsneho.

[03] katamo ^a^M0.0235^ea^ diṭṭhisneho? vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi, dasavatthukā micchādiṭṭhi, dasavatthukā antaggāhikādiṭṭhi. yā evarūpā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāro diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ gāho paṭiggāho {patiṭṭhāho (ka0)} abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo micchāpatho micchattaṃ titthāyatanaṃ vipariyāsaggāho viparītaggāho vipallāsaggāho micchāgāho ayāthāvakasmiṃ yāthāvakanti gāho, yāvatā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni -- ayaṃ diṭṭhisneho.

[03] ^b^saṃsaggajātassa bhavanti snehā^eb^ti dassanasaṃsaggapaccayā ca savanasaṃsaggapaccayā ca taṇhāsneho ca diṭṭhisneho ca bhavanti sambhavanti jāyanti sañjāyanti nibbattanti abhinibbattanti pātubhavantīti -- saṃsaggajātassa bhavanti snehā.

[01] ^b^snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahotī^eb^ti. ^b^sneho^eb^ti dve snehā -- taṇhāsneho ca diṭṭhisneho ca...pe0... ayaṃ taṇhāsneho...pe0... ayaṃ diṭṭhisneho. ^b^dukkhamidaṃ pahotī^eb^ti idhekacco kāyena duccaritaṃ carati, vācāya duccaritaṃ carati, manasā duccaritaṃ carati, pāṇampi hanati, adinnampi ādiyati, sandhimpi chindati, nillopampi {vilopampi (syā0) passa mahāni0 170} harati, ekāgārikampi karoti, paripanthepi tiṭṭhati, paradārampi gacchati, musāpi bhaṇati. tamenaṃ gahetvā rañño dassenti -- ``ayaṃ, deva, coro āgucārī. imassa yaṃ icchasi taṃ daṇḍaṃ paṇehī''ti. tamenaṃ ^a^T0.0327^ea^ rājā taṃ paribhāsati. so paribhāsapaccayāpi dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ {dukkhadomanassaṃ (syā0)} paṭisaṃvedeti. etaṃ bhayaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ kuto jātaṃ? tassa snehapaccayā ca nandipaccayā ca rāgapaccayā ca nandirāgapaccayā ca jātaṃ.

[03] ettakenapi rājā na tussati. tamenaṃ rājā bandhāpeti -- andubandhanena vā rajjubandhanena vā ^a^V0.0215^ea^ saṅkhalikabandhanena vā vettabandhanena vā latābandhanena vā pakkhepabandhanena vā parikkhepabandhanena vā gāmabandhanena vā nigamabandhanena vā raṭṭhabandhanena vā janapadabandhanena vā, antamaso savacanīyampi karoti -- ``na te labbhā ito pakkamitu''nti. so bandhanapaccayāpi dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. etaṃ bhayaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ kuto jātaṃ? tassa snehapaccayā ca nandipaccayā ca rāgapaccayā ca nandirāgapaccayā ca jātaṃ.

[03] ettakenapi ^a^M0.0236^ea^ rājā na tussati. tamenaṃ rājā tasseva {tassa (syā0)} dhanaṃ āharāpeti -- sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā satasahassaṃ vā. so dhanajānipaccayāpi dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. etaṃ bhayaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ kuto jātaṃ? tassa snehapaccayā ca nandipaccayā ca rāgapaccayā ca nandirāgapaccayā ca jātaṃ.

[03] ettakenapi rājā na tussati. tamenaṃ rājā vividhā kammakāraṇā {vividhāni kammakaraṇāni (ka0)} kārāpeti -- kasāhipi tāḷeti, vettehipi tāḷeti, aḍḍhadaṇḍehipi tāḷeti, hatthampi chindati, pādampi chindati, hatthapādampi chindati, kaṇṇampi chindati, nāsampi chindati, kaṇṇanāsampi chindati, bilaṅgathālikampi karoti, saṅkhamuṇḍikampi karoti ^a^T0.0328^ea^, rāhumukhampi karoti, jotimālikampi karoti, hatthapajjotikampi karoti, erakavattikampi {erakavaṭṭikampi (syā0 ka0) passa ma0 ni0 1.169} karoti, cīrakavāsikampi karoti, eṇeyyakampi karoti, baḷisamaṃsikampi karoti, kahāpaṇikampi karoti, khārāpatacchikampi {khārāpaṭicchikampi (ka0)} karoti, palighaparivattikampi karoti, palālapīṭhakampi karoti, tattenapi telena osiñcati, sunakhehipi khādāpeti, jīvantampi sūle uttāseti, asināpi sīsaṃ chindati. so kammakāraṇapaccayāpi dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. etaṃ bhayaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ kuto jātaṃ? tassa snehapaccayā ca nandipaccayā ca rāgapaccayā ca nandirāgapaccayā ca jātaṃ. rājā imesaṃ catunnaṃ daṇḍānaṃ issaro.

[03] so sakena kammena kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati. tamenaṃ nirayapālā pañcavidhabandhanaṃ nāma kammakāraṇaṃ karonti {kārenti (syā0 ka0) passa ma0 ni0 3.267} -- tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ hatthe gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ dutiye hatthe gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ pāde gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ dutiye pāde gamenti, tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ majjhe urasmiṃ gamenti. so tattha dukkhā tibbā {tippā (syā0)} kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedeti; na ca tāva kālaṃ karoti yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantīhoti. etaṃ bhayaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ kuto jātaṃ? tassa snehapaccayā ca nandipaccayā ca rāgapaccayā ca nandirāgapaccayā ca jātaṃ.

[03] tamenaṃ ^a^V0.0216^ea^ ^a^M0.0237^ea^ nirayapālā saṃvesetvā {saṃvesitvā (syā0 ka0) passa ma0 ni0 3.267} kuṭhārīhi {kudhārīhi (syā0 ka0)} tacchanti...pe0... tamenaṃ nirayapālā uddhaṃpādaṃ adhosiraṃ gahetvā vāsīhi tacchanti. tamenaṃ ^a^T0.0329^ea^ nirayapālā rathe yojetvā ādittāya pathaviyā sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya {sañjotibhūtāya (syā0)} sārentipi paccāsārentipi. tamenaṃ nirayapālā mahantaṃ aṅgārapabbataṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ āropentipi oropentipi. tamenaṃ nirayapālā uddhaṃpādaṃ adhosiraṃ gahetvā tattāya lohakumbhiyā pakkhipanti ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya. so tattha pheṇuddehakaṃ paccati. so tattha pheṇuddehakaṃ paccamāno sakimpi uddhaṃ gacchati, sakimpi adho gacchati, sakimpi tiriyaṃ gacchati. so tattha dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedeti; na ca tāva kālaṅkaroti yāva na taṃ pāpakammaṃ byantīhoti. etaṃ bhayaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ kuto jātaṃ? tassa snehapaccayā ca nandipaccayā ca rāgapaccayā ca nandirāgapaccayā ca jātaṃ.
[03] tamenaṃ nirayapālā mahāniraye pakkhipanti. so kho pana mahānirayo --
[21] catukkaṇṇo catudvāro, vibhatto bhāgaso mito.
[22] ayopākārapariyanto, ayasā paṭikujjito..
[21] tassa ayomayā bhūmi, jalitā tejasā yutā.
[22] samantā yojanasataṃ, pharitvā tiṭṭhati sabbadā..
[21] kadariyātapanā {kadariyā tāpanā (ka0) mahāni0 170} ghorā, accimanto durāsadā.
[22] lomahaṃsanarūpā ca, bhesmā paṭibhayā dukhā..
[21] puratthimāya ca bhittiyā, accikkhandho samuṭṭhito.
[22] ḍahanto ^a^T0.0330^ea^ pāpakammante, pacchimāya paṭihaññati..
[21] pacchimāya ca bhittiyā, accikkhandho samuṭṭhito.
[22] ḍahanto pāpakammante, purimāya paṭihaññati..
[21] dakkhiṇāya ca bhittiyā, accikkhandho samuṭṭhito.
[22] ḍahanto pāpakammante, uttarāya paṭihaññati..
[21] uttarāya ^a^M0.0238^ea^ ca bhittiyā, accikkhandho samuṭṭhito.
[22] ḍahanto pāpakammante, dakkhiṇāya paṭihaññati..
[21] heṭṭhato ca samuṭṭhāya, accikkhandho bhayānako.
[22] ḍahanto pāpakammante, chadanasmiṃ paṭihaññati..
[21] chadanamhā ^a^V0.0217^ea^ samuṭṭhāya, accikkhandho bhayānako.
[22] ḍahanto pāpakammante, bhūmiyaṃ paṭihaññati..
[21] ayokapālamādittaṃ, santattaṃ jalitaṃ yathā.
[22] evaṃ avīcinirayo, heṭṭhā upari passato..
[21] tattha sattā mahāluddā, mahākibbisakārino.
[22] accantapāpakammantā, paccanti na ca miyyare {mīyare (ka0)}..
[21] jātavedasamo kāyo, tesaṃ nirayavāsinaṃ.
[22] passa kammānaṃ daḷhattaṃ, na bhasmā hoti napi masi..
[21] puratthimenapi dhāvanti, tato dhāvanti pacchimaṃ.
[22] uttarenapi dhāvanti, tato dhāvanti dakkhiṇaṃ..
[21] yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ padhāvanti, taṃ taṃ dvāraṃ pidhīyati.
[22] abhinikkhamitāsā ^a^T0.0331^ea^ te, sattā mokkhagavesino..
[21] na te tato nikkhamituṃ, labhanti kammapaccayā.
[22] tesañca pāpakammantaṃ, avipakkaṃ kataṃ bahunti..
[03] etaṃ bhayaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ kuto jātaṃ? tassa snehapaccayā ca nandipaccayā ca rāgapaccayā ca nandirāgapaccayā ca jātaṃ.

[03] yāni ca nerayikāni dukkhāni yāni ca tiracchānayonikāni dukkhāni yāni ca pettivisayikāni dukkhāni yāni ca mānusikāni dukkhāni, tāni kuto jātāni kuto sañjātāni kuto nibbattāni kuto abhinibbattāni kuto pātubhūtāni? tassa snehapaccayā ca nandipaccayā ca rāgapaccayā ca nandirāgapaccayā ca bhavanti sambhavanti jāyanti sañjāyanti nibbattanti abhinibbattanti pātubhavantīti -- snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahoti.

[03] ^b^ādīnavaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0239^ea^ ^b^snehajaṃ pekkhamāno^eb^ti. ^b^sneho^eb^ti dve snehā -- taṇhāsneho ca diṭṭhisneho ca...pe0... ayaṃ taṇhāsneho...pe0... ayaṃ diṭṭhisneho. ^b^ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno^eb^ti taṇhāsneho ca diṭṭhisneho ca ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno dakkhamāno olokayamāno nijjhāyamāno upaparikkhamānoti -- ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. tenāha so paccekasambuddho --
[21] ``saṃsaggajātassa ^a^V0.0218^ea^ bhavanti snehā, snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahoti.
[22] ādīnavaṃ ^a^T0.0332^ea^ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo''ti..
[21] ^b^mitte suhajje anukampamāno, hāpeti atthaṃ paṭibaddhacitto^eb^ {paṭibandhacitto (ka0)} ^b^.^eb^
[22] ^b^etaṃ bhayaṃ santhave^eb^ {sandhave (ka0)} ^b^pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..^eb^

[03] ^b^mitte suhajje anukampamāno, hāpeti atthaṃ paṭibaddhacitto^eb^ti. ^b^mittā^eb^ti dve mittā -- agārikamitto ca anāgārikamitto {pabbajitamitto (ka0) evamuparipi} ca. katamo agārikamitto? idhekacco duddadaṃ dadāti, duccajaṃ cajati, dukkaraṃ karoti, dukkhamaṃ khamati, guyhamassa ācikkhati, guyhamassa parigūhati {pariguyhati (syā0 ka0)}, āpadāsu na vijahati, jīvitampissa atthāya pariccattaṃ hoti, khīṇe nātimaññati -- ayaṃ agārikamitto.

[01] katamo anāgārikamitto? idha bhikkhu piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo ca vattā ca vacanakkhamo ca gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no ca aṭṭhāne niyojeti adhisīle samādapeti, catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvanānuyoge samādapeti, catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ...pe0... catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ... pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ... pañcannaṃ balānaṃ... sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ... ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa bhāvanānuyoge samādapeti -- ayaṃ anāgārikamitto.

[01] suhajjā ^a^T0.0333^ea^ ^a^M0.0240^ea^ vuccanti yehi saha āgamanaṃ phāsu gamanaṃ phāsu ṭhānaṃ phāsu nisajjanaṃ {nisajjā (ka0)} phāsu sayanaṃ phāsu ālapanaṃ phāsu sallapanaṃ phāsu ullapanaṃ phāsu samullapanaṃ phāsu. ^b^mitte suhajje anukampamāno hāpeti attha^eb^nti mitte ca suhajje ca sandiṭṭhe ca sambhatte ca sahāye ca anukampamāno anupekkhamāno anugaṇhamāno attatthampi paratthampi ubhayatthampi hāpeti, diṭṭhadhammikampi atthaṃ hāpeti, samparāyikampi atthaṃ hāpeti, paramatthampi hāpeti pahāpeti parihāpeti paridhaṃseti parivajjeti {parisajjeti (syā0)} antaradhāpetīti -- mitte suhajje anukampamāno hāpeti atthaṃ.

[03] ^b^paṭibaddhacitto^eb^ti dvīhi kāraṇehi paṭibaddhacitto hoti -- attānaṃ vā nīcaṃ ṭhapento paraṃ uccaṃ ṭhapento paṭibaddhacitto hoti, attānaṃ vā uccaṃ ṭhapento paraṃ nīcaṃ ṭhapento paṭibaddhacitto hoti. kathaṃ attānaṃ nīcaṃ ṭhapento paraṃ uccaṃ ṭhapento paṭibaddhacitto hoti? tumhe me bahūpakārā, ahaṃ tumhe nissāya labhāmi cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ. yampi {yepi (ka0) evaṃ cūḷani0 khaggavisāṇasuttaniddesa 151} me aññe dātuṃ vā kātuṃ vā maññanti tumhe nissāya tumhe ^a^V0.0219^ea^ sampassantā. yampi me porāṇaṃ mātāpettikaṃ nāmagottaṃ, tampi me antarahitaṃ. tumhehi ahaṃ ñāyāmi -- asukassa kulupako, asukāya kulupakoti ^a^T0.0334^ea^. evaṃ attānaṃ nīcaṃ ṭhapento paraṃ uccaṃ ṭhapento paṭibaddhacitto hoti.

[03] kathaṃ attānaṃ uccaṃ ṭhapento paraṃ nīcaṃ ṭhapento paṭibaddhacitto hoti? ahaṃ tumhākaṃ bahūpakāro, tumhe maṃ āgamma buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā, pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā, adinnādānā paṭiviratā, kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviratā, musāvādā paṭiviratā, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratā; ahaṃ tumhākaṃ uddesaṃ demi, paripucchaṃ demi, uposathaṃ ācikkhāmi, navakammaṃ adhiṭṭhāmi. atha pana tumhe maṃ ujjhitvā {pariccajitvā (syā0)} aññe sakkarotha garuṃ karotha mānetha pūjethāti. evaṃ attānaṃ uccaṃ ṭhapento paraṃ nīcaṃ ṭhapento paṭibaddhacitto hotīti -- mitte suhajje anukampamāno, hāpeti atthaṃ paṭibaddhacitto.

[03] ^b^etaṃ bhayaṃ santhave pekkhamāno^eb^ti. ^b^bhaya^eb^nti jātibhayaṃ jarābhayaṃ byādhibhayaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ rājabhayaṃ corabhayaṃ aggibhayaṃ udakabhayaṃ attānuvādabhayaṃ ^a^M0.0241^ea^ parānuvādabhayaṃ daṇḍabhayaṃ duggatibhayaṃ ūmibhayaṃ kumbhilabhayaṃ āvaṭṭabhayaṃ susumārabhayaṃ {suṃsumārabhayaṃ (syā0)} ājīvikabhayaṃ asilokabhayaṃ parisasārajjabhayaṃ madanabhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso cetaso ubbego utrāso. ^b^santhave^eb^ti dve santhavā -- taṇhāsanthavo ca diṭṭhisanthavo ca...pe0... ayaṃ taṇhāsanthavo...pe0... ayaṃ diṭṭhisanthavo. ^b^etaṃ bhayaṃ santhave pekkhamāno^eb^ti etaṃ bhayaṃ santhave pekkhamāno dakkhamāno olokayamāno nijjhāyamāno ^a^T0.0335^ea^ upaparikkhamānoti -- etaṃ bhayaṃ santhave pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. tenāha so paccekasambuddho --
[21] ``mitte suhajje anukampamāno, hāpeti atthaṃ paṭibaddhacitto.
[22] etaṃ bhayaṃ santhave pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo''ti..
[21] ^b^vaṃso visālova yathā visatto,^eb^ ^b^puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā.^eb^
[22] ^b^vaṃsakkaḷīrova^eb^ {vaṃse kaḷīrova (ka0)} ^b^asajjamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..^eb^

[01] ^b^vaṃso visālova yathā visatto^eb^ti vaṃso vuccati veḷugumbo. yathā veḷugumbasmiṃ porāṇakā vaṃsā sattā {veḷugumbasmiṃ kaṇṭakā jaṭitā saṃsibbitā (syā0)} visattā āsattā laggā laggitā palibuddhā, evameva visattikā vuccati taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo anunayo anurodho nandī nandirāgo cittassa sārāgo icchā mucchā ajjhosānaṃ gedho ^a^V0.0220^ea^ paligedho saṅgo paṅko ejā māyā janikā sañjananī sibbinī jālinī saritā visattikā suttaṃ visaṭā āyūhanī dutiyā paṇidhi bhavanetti vanaṃ vanatho santhavo sineho apekkhā paṭibandhu āsā āsīsanā āsīsitattaṃ rūpāsā saddāsā gandhāsā rasāsā phoṭṭhabbāsā lābhāsā dhanāsā puttāsā jīvitāsā jappā pajappā abhijappā jappanā jappitattaṃ loluppaṃ ^a^T0.0336^ea^ loluppāyanā loluppāyitattaṃ pucchañjikatā sādhukamyatā adhammarāgo visamalobho nikanti nikāmanā patthanā pihanā sampatthanā kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā ^a^M0.0242^ea^ vibhavataṇhā rūpataṇhā arūpataṇhā nirodhataṇhā rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhā ogho yogo gantho upādānaṃ āvaraṇaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ chadanaṃ bandhanaṃ upakkileso anusayo pariyuṭṭhānaṃ latā vevicchaṃ dukkhamūlaṃ dukkhanidānaṃ dukkhappabhavo mārapāso mārabaḷisaṃ māravisayo māranivāso mārabandhanaṃ taṇhānadī taṇhājālaṃ taṇhāgaddulaṃ taṇhāsamuddo abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.

[03] ^b^visattikā^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena visattikā? visālāti visattikā visatāti visattikā, visaṭāti visattikā, visamāti visattikā, visakkatīti visattikā, visaṃharatīti visattikā, visaṃvādikāti visattikā, visamūlāti visattikā, visaphalāti visattikā, visaparibhogāti visattikā. visālā vā pana taṇhā rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe kule gaṇe āvāse lābhe yase pasaṃsāya sukhe cīvare piṇḍapāte senāsane gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāre kāmadhātuyā rūpadhātuyā arūpadhātuyā kāmabhave rūpabhave arūpabhave saññābhave asaññābhave nevasaññānāsaññābhave ekavokārabhave catuvokārabhave pañcavokārabhave atīte anāgate paccuppanne diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu visatā vitthatāti -- visattikāti -- vaṃso visālova ^a^T0.0337^ea^ yathā visatto.

[01] ^b^puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā^eb^ti. ^b^puttā^eb^ti cattāro puttā -- atrajo putto, khettajo putto, dinnako putto, antevāsiko putto. dārā vuccanti bhariyāyo. apekkhā vuccanti taṇhā. yo rāgo sārāgo...pe0... abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlanti -- puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā.

[03] ^b^vaṃsakkaḷīrova asajjamāno^eb^ti vaṃso vuccati veḷugumbo. yathā veḷugumbasmiṃ taruṇakā kaḷīrakā {taruṇakaḷīrā (syā0)} asattā alaggā agadhitā {apaliveṭṭhitā (syā0)} apalibuddhā nikkhantā nissaṭā vippamuttā evameva. ^b^sajjā^eb^ti dve sajjanā -- taṇhāsajjanā ca diṭṭhisajjanā ca...pe0... ayaṃ taṇhāsajjanā...pe0... ayaṃ diṭṭhisajjanā. tassa paccekasambuddhassa ^a^M0.0243^ea^ taṇhāsajjanā pahīnā, diṭṭhisajjanā paṭinissaṭṭhā. taṇhāsajjanāya pahīnattā diṭṭhisajjanāya paṭinissaṭṭhattā so paccekasambuddho ^a^V0.0221^ea^ rūpe na sajjati sadde na sajjati gandhe na sajjati rase na sajjati phoṭṭhabbe na sajjati kule...pe0... gaṇe... āvāse... lābhe... yase... pasaṃsāya... sukhe... cīvare... piṇḍapāte... senāsane... gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāre... kāmadhātuyā... rūpadhātuyā... arūpadhātuyā... kāmabhave... rūpabhave... arūpabhave... saññābhave... asaññābhave... nevasaññānāsaññābhave... ekavokārabhave... catuvokārabhave... pañcavokārabhave... atīte... anāgate... paccuppanne... diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu na sajjati na gaṇhāti na bajjhati na ^a^T0.0338^ea^ palibajjhati na mucchati; nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti -- vaṃsakkaḷīrova asajjamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. tenāha so paccekasambuddho --
[21] ``vaṃso visālova yathā visatto, puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā.
[22] vaṃsakkaḷīrova asajjamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo''ti..
[21] ^b^migo araññamhi yathā abaddho^eb^ {abandho (syā0 ka0)}, ^b^yenicchakaṃ gacchati gocarāya.^eb^
[22] ^b^viññū naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..^eb^

[03] ^b^migo araññamhi yathā abaddho, yenicchakaṃ gacchati gocarāyā^eb^ti. ^b^migo^eb^ti dve migā -- eṇimigo ca pasadamigo ca. yathā āraññiko {āraññako (syā0 ka0)} migo araññe pavane caramāno {araññe vasamāno (syā0)} vissattho gacchati vissattho tiṭṭhati vissattho nisīdati vissattho seyyaṃ kappeti.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, āraññiko migo araññe pavane caramāno vissattho gacchati vissattho tiṭṭhati vissattho nisīdati vissattho seyyaṃ kappeti. taṃ kissa hetu? anāpāthagato, bhikkhave, luddassa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva ^a^T0.0339^ea^ ^a^M0.0244^ea^ kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu andhamakāsi māraṃ, apadaṃ {paraṃ (ka0) ma0 ni0 1.271} vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato'.

[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati ^a^V0.0222^ea^. ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu andhamakāsi māraṃ, apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato'.

[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti `upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī'ti tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu andhamakāsi māraṃ, apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato'.

[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu andhamakāsi māraṃ, apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato'.

[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā `ananto ākāso'ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati. ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu andhamakāsi māraṃ, apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gato pāpimato'.
[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave ^a^T0.0340^ea^, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma `anantaṃ viññāṇa'nti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati...pe0....
[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma `natthi kiñcī'ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati...pe0....
[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati...pe0....

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0245^ea^ caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti. ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, `bhikkhu andhamakāsi māraṃ, apadaṃ vadhitvā māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ ^a^V0.0223^ea^ gato pāpimato', tiṇṇo loke visattikaṃ. so vissattho gacchati vissattho tiṭṭhati vissattho nisīdati vissattho seyyaṃ kappeti. taṃ kissa hetu? anāpāthagato, bhikkhave, pāpimato''ti -- migo araññamhi yathā abaddho, yenicchakaṃ gacchati gocarāya.

[03] ^b^viññū naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno^eb^ti. ^b^viññū^eb^ti paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī. ^b^naro^eb^ti satto māṇavo poso puggalo jīvo jāgu jantu indagu manujo. ^b^serī^eb^ti dve serī -- dhammopi serī puggalopi serī. katamo dhammo serī? cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo -- ayaṃ dhammo serī. katamo puggalo serī? yo iminā serinā dhammena samannāgato, so ^a^T0.0341^ea^ vuccati puggalo serī. ^b^viññū naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno^eb^ti viññū naro seritaṃ dhammaṃ pekkhamāno, dakkhamāno olokayamāno nijjhāyamāno upaparikkhamānoti -- viññū naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. tenāha so paccekasambuddho --
[21] ``migo araññamhi yathā abaddho, yenicchakaṃ gacchati gocarāya.
[22] viññū naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo''ti..
[21] ^b^āmantanā hoti sahāyamajjhe,^eb^ ^b^vāse ṭhāne gamane cārikāya.^eb^
[21] ^b^anabhijjhitaṃ seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..^eb^

[03] ^b^āmantanā hoti sahāyamajjhe, vāse ṭhāne gamane cārikāyā^eb^ti sahāyā vuccanti yehi saha āgamanaṃ phāsu gamanaṃ phāsu gamanāgamanaṃ phāsu ṭhānaṃ phāsu nisajjanaṃ phāsu sayanaṃ phāsu ālapanaṃ phāsu ^a^M0.0246^ea^ sallapanaṃ phāsu ullapanaṃ phāsu samullapanaṃ phāsu. ^b^āmantanā hoti sahāyamajjhe, vāse ṭhāne gamane cārikāyā^eb^ti sahāyamajjhe vāsepi ṭhānepi gamanepi cārikāyapi attatthamantanā paratthamantanā ubhayatthamantanā diṭṭhadhammikatthamantanā samparāyikatthamantanā paramatthamantanā {ubhayatthamantanā (ka0)} ti ^a^T0.0342^ea^ -- āmantanā hoti sahāyamajjhe, vāse ṭhāne gamane cārikāya.

[03] ^b^anabhijjhitaṃ seritaṃ pekkhamāno^eb^ti anabhijjhitaṃ etaṃ vatthu bālānaṃ asappurisānaṃ titthiyānaṃ titthayasāvakānaṃ, yadidaṃ -- bhaṇḍukāsāyavatthavasanatā. abhijjhitaṃ etaṃ vatthu paṇḍitānaṃ sappurisānaṃ buddhasāvakānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ, yadidaṃ -- bhaṇḍukāsāyavatthavasanatā. ^b^serī^eb^ti dve serī -- dhammopi serī puggalopi serī. katamo dhammo serī? cattāro satipaṭṭhānā ^a^V0.0224^ea^ ...pe0... ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo -- ayaṃ dhammo serī. katamo puggalo serī? yo iminā serinā dhammena samannāgato, so vuccati puggalo serī. ^b^anabhijjhitaṃ seritaṃ pekkhamāno^eb^ti seritaṃ dhammaṃ pekkhamāno dakkhamāno olokayamāno nijjhāyamāno upaparikkhamānoti -- anabhijjhitaṃ seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. tenāha so paccekasambuddho --
[21] ``āmantanā hoti sahāyamajjhe, vāse ṭhāne gamane cārikāya.
[22] anabhijjhitaṃ seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo''ti..
[21] ^b^khiḍḍā^eb^ {khiṭṭā (ka0)} ^b^ratī hoti sahāyamajjhe,^eb^ ^b^puttesu ca vipulaṃ hoti pemaṃ.^eb^
[22] ^b^piyavippayogaṃ^eb^ {vippayogampi (ka0)} ^b^vijigucchamāno, eko^eb^ ^a^T0.0343^ea^ ^b^care khaggavisāṇakappo..^eb^

[03] ^b^khiḍḍā ratī hoti sahāyamajjhe^eb^ti. ^b^khiḍḍā^eb^ti dve khiḍḍā -- kāyikā ca khiḍḍā vācasikā ca khiḍḍā. katamā kāyikā khiḍḍā? hatthīhipi kīḷanti, assehipi kīḷanti, rathehipi kīḷanti, dhanūhipi kīḷanti, tharūhipi kīḷanti, aṭṭhapadehipi kīḷanti, dasapadehipi kīḷanti, ākāsepi kīḷanti, parihārapathepi kīḷanti, santikāyapi kīḷanti, khalikāyapi kīḷanti, ghaṭikāyapi ^a^M0.0247^ea^ kīḷanti, salākahatthenapi kīḷanti, akkhenapi kīḷanti, paṅgacīrenapi kīḷanti, vaṅkakenapi kīḷanti, mokkhacikāyapi kīḷanti, ciṅgulakenapi kīḷanti, pattāḷhakenapi kīḷanti, rathakenapi kīḷanti, dhanukenapi kīḷanti, akkharikāyapi kīḷanti, manesikāyapi kīḷanti, yathāvajjenapi kīḷanti. ayaṃ kāyikā khiḍḍā.

[03] katamā vācasikā khiḍḍā? mukhabherikaṃ mukhālambaraṃ mukhaḍiṇḍimakaṃ {mukhadeṇḍimakaṃ (syā0), mukhadindimakaṃ (ka0)} mukhacalimakaṃ mukhakerakaṃ {mukhabherukaṃ (syā0)} mukhadaddarikaṃ nāṭakaṃ lāsaṃ gītaṃ davakammaṃ. ayaṃ vācasikā khiḍḍā.

[03] ^b^ratī^eb^ti anukkaṇṭhitādhivacanametaṃ ratīti. sahāyā vuccanti yehi saha āgamanaṃ phāsu gamanaṃ phāsu gamanāgamanaṃ phāsu ṭhānaṃ phāsu nisajjanaṃ phāsu sayanaṃ phāsu ālapanaṃ phāsu sallapanaṃ phāsu ullapanaṃ phāsu samullapanaṃ phāsu. ^b^khiḍḍā ratī hoti sahāyamajjhe^eb^ti khiḍḍā ca rati ca sahāyamajjhe hotīti -- khiḍḍā ratī hoti sahāyamajjhe.

[03] ^b^puttesu^eb^ ^a^T0.0344^ea^ ^b^ca vipulaṃ hoti pema^eb^nti. ^b^puttā^eb^ti cattāro puttā -- atrajo putto, khettajo putto ^a^V0.0225^ea^, dinnako putto, antevāsiko putto. ^b^puttesu ca vipulaṃ hotiṃ pema^eb^nti puttesu ca adhimattaṃ hoti pemanti -- puttesu ca vipulaṃ hoti pemaṃ.

[03] ^b^piyavippayogaṃ vijigucchamāno^eb^ti dve piyā -- sattā vā saṅkhārā vā. katame sattā piyā? idha yassa te honti atthakāmā hitakāmā phāsukāmā yogakkhemakāmā mātā vā pitā vā bhātā vā bhaginī vā putto vā dhītā vā mittā vā amaccā vā ñātī vā sālohitā vā, ime sattā piyā.

[03] katame saṅkhārā piyā? manāpikā rūpā manāpikā saddā manāpikā gandhā manāpikā rasā manāpikā phoṭṭhabbā, ime saṅkhārā piyā. ^b^piyavippayogaṃ vijigucchamāno^eb^ti piyānaṃ vippayogaṃ vijigucchamāno aṭṭiyamāno harāyamānoti -- piyavippayogaṃ vijigucchamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. tenāha so paccekasambuddho --
[21] ``khiḍḍā ^a^M0.0248^ea^ ratī hoti sahāyamajjhe, puttesu ca vipulaṃ hoti pemaṃ.
[22] piyavippayogaṃ vijigucchamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo''ti..
[21] ^b^cātuddiso^eb^ ^a^T0.0345^ea^ ^b^appaṭigho ca hoti,^eb^ ^b^santussamāno itarītarena.^eb^
[22] ^b^parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..^eb^

[03] ^b^cātuddiso appaṭigho ca hotī^eb^ti. ^b^cātuddiso^eb^ti so paccekasambuddho mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ. iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena {abyāpajjhena (syā0) passa dī0 ni0 3.308} pharitvā viharati. karuṇāsahagatena...pe0... muditāsahagatena...pe0... upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ...pe0... abyāpajjena pharitvā viharati. ^b^cātuddiso appaṭigho ca hotī^eb^ti mettāya bhāvitattā ye puratthimāya disāya sattā te appaṭikūlā {appaṭikulā (bahūsu)} honti, ye dakkhiṇāya disāya sattā te appaṭikūlā honti ^a^V0.0226^ea^, ye pacchimāya disāya sattā te appaṭikūlā honti, ye uttarāya disāya sattā te appaṭikūlā honti, ye puratthimāya anudisāya sattā te appaṭikūlā honti, ye dakkhiṇāya anudisāya sattā te appaṭikūlā honti, ye pacchimāya anudisāya ^a^T0.0346^ea^ sattā te appaṭikūlā honti, ye uttarāya anudisāya sattā te appaṭikūlā honti, ye heṭṭhimāya disāya sattā te appaṭikūlā honti, ye uparimāya disāya sattā te appaṭikūlā honti, ye disāsu vidisāsu sattā te appaṭikūlā honti; karuṇāya bhāvitattā muditāya bhāvitattā upekkhāya bhāvitattā ye puratthimāya disāya sattā te appaṭikūlā honti...pe0... ye disāsu vidisāsu sattā te appaṭikūlā hontīti -- cātuddiso appaṭigho ca hoti.

[03] ^b^santussamāno^eb^ ^a^M0.0249^ea^ ^b^itarītarenā^eb^ti so paccekasambuddho santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena, itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī, na ca cīvarahetu anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ {appaṭirūpaṃ (syā0)} āpajjati. aladdhā ca cīvaraṃ na paritassati, laddhā ca cīvaraṃ agadhito amucchito anajjhāpasanno {anajjhopanno (syā0)} ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati. tāya ca pana itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā nevattānukkaṃseti na paraṃ vambheti. yo hi tattha dakkho analaso sampajāno patissato, ayaṃ vuccati paccekasambuddho porāṇe aggaññe ariyavaṃse ṭhito. santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena piṇḍapātena...pe0... ^a^T0.0347^ea^

[03] santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena senāsanena...pe0... santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena, itarītaragilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī, na ca gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārahetu anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ āpajjati. aladdhā ca gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ na paritassati. laddhā ca gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ agadhito amucchito anajjhāpanno ādīnavadassāvī nissaraṇapañño paribhuñjati. tāya ca itarītaragilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārasantuṭṭhiyā nevattānukkaṃseti na paraṃ vambheti. yo hi tattha dakkho analaso sampajāno patissato, ayaṃ vuccati paccekasambuddho porāṇe aggaññe ariyavaṃse ṭhitoti -- santussamāno itarītarena.

[03] ^b^parissayānaṃ^eb^ ^a^T0.0348^ea^ ^b^sahitā achambhī^eb^ti. ^b^parissayā^eb^ti dve parissayā -- pākaṭaparissayā ca paṭicchannaparissayā ca. katame pākaṭaparissayā? sīhā byagghā dīpī acchā taracchā kokā mahiṃsā {gomahisā (syā0) mahāni0 5} hatthī ahī vicchikā satapadī, corā vā assu mānavā vā katakammā vā akatakammā vā, cakkhurogo sotarogo ghānarogo jivhārogo kāyarogo sīsarogo kaṇṇarogo mukharogo dantarogo kāso sāso pināso ḍāho jaro kucchirogo mucchā pakkhandikā sūlā visūcikā kuṭṭhaṃ gaṇḍo kilāso soso apamāro daddu kaṇḍu kacchu rakhasā vitacchikā lohitapittaṃ madhumeho aṃsā piḷakā bhagandalā, pittasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā semhasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā vātasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā sannipātikā ābādhā utupariṇāmajā ābādhā visamaparihārajā ^a^M0.0250^ea^ ābādhā opakkamikā ābādhā kammavipākajā ābādhā, sītaṃ uṇhaṃ jighacchā ^a^V0.0227^ea^ pipāsā uccāro passāvo ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassā iti vā. ime vuccanti pākaṭaparissayā.

[03] katame paṭicchannaparissayā? kāyaduccaritaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ manoduccaritaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ rāgo doso moho kodho upanāho makkho paḷāso issā macchariyaṃ māyā sāṭheyyaṃ thambho sārambho māno atimāno mado pamādo, sabbe kilesā sabbe ^a^T0.0349^ea^ duccaritā sabbe darathā sabbe pariḷāhā sabbe santāpā sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā. ime vuccanti paṭicchannaparissayā.

[03] ^b^parissayā^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena parissayā? parisahantīti parissayā, parihānāya saṃvattantīti parissayā, tatrāsayāti parissayā. kathaṃ parisahantīti parissayā? te parissayā taṃ puggalaṃ sahanti parisahanti abhibhavanti ajjhottharanti pariyādiyanti maddanti. evaṃ parisahantīti -- parissayā.

[03] kathaṃ parihānāya saṃvattantīti parissayā? te parissayā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ antarāyāya parihānāya saṃvattanti. katamesaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ? sammāpaṭipadāya anulomapaṭipadāya apaccanīkapaṭipadāya anvatthapaṭipadāya dhammānudhammapaṭipadāya sīlesu paripūrakāritāya indriyesu guttadvāratāya bhojane mattaññutāya jāgariyānuyogassa satisampajaññassa catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvanānuyogassa, catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ... catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ... pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ... pañcannaṃ balānaṃ... sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ... ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa bhāvanānuyogassa -- imesaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ antarāyāya parihānāya saṃvattanti. evaṃ parihānāya saṃvattantīti -- parissayā.

[03] kathaṃ tatrāsayāti parissayā? tatthete {tatra te (ka0)} pāpakā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti attabhāvasannissayā. yathā bile bilāsayā pāṇā sayanti, dake dakāsayā {udake udakāsayā (syā0)} pāṇā sayanti, vane vanāsayā pāṇā sayanti ^a^T0.0350^ea^, rukkhe rukkhāsayā pāṇā sayanti; evameva tatthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā uppajjanti attabhāvasannissayāti. evampi tatrāsayāti -- parissayā.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ ^a^M0.0251^ea^ bhagavatā -- ``sāntevāsiko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sācariyako dukkhaṃ na phāsu viharati. kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sāntevāsiko sācariyako dukkhaṃ na phāsu ^a^V0.0228^ea^ viharati? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjanti ye pāpakā akusalā dhammā, sarasaṅkappā saṃññojanīyā {saññojanikā (ka0)}, tyassa anto vasanti anvāssavanti pāpakā akusalā dhammāti. tasmā sāntevāsiko vuccati. tena samudācarena samudācaranti naṃ pāpakā akusalā dhammāti. tasmā sācariyakoti vuccati.

[03] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sotena saddaṃ sutvā...pe0... ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā...pe0... jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā...pe0... kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā...pe0... manasā dhammaṃ viññāya uppajjanti ye pāpakā akusalā dhammā sarasaṅkappā saṃyojanīyā, tyassa anto vasanti anvāssavanti pāpakā akusalā dhammāti. tasmā sāntevāsikoti vuccati. tena samudācarena samudācaranti naṃ pāpakā akusalā dhammāti. tasmā sācariyakoti vuccati. evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sāntevāsiko sācariyako dukkhaṃ na phāsu viharatī''ti. evampi, tatrāsayāti -- parissayā.

[01] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``tayome, bhikkhave, antarāmalā antarāamittā antarāsapattā antarāvadhakā antarāpaccatthikā. katame tayo ^a^T0.0351^ea^? lobho, bhikkhave, antarāmalo {antarāmalaṃ (syā0 ka0) passa itivu0 88} antarāamitto antarāsapatto antarāvadhako antarāpaccatthiko, doso, bhikkhave...pe0... moho, bhikkhave, antarāmalo antarāamitto antarāsapatto antarāvadhako antarāpaccatthiko. ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo antarāmalā antarāamittā antarāsapattā antarāvadhakā antarāpaccatthikā''ti.
[21] anatthajanano lobho, lobho cittappakopano.
[22] bhayamantarato jātaṃ, taṃ jano nāvabujjhati..
[21] luddho atthaṃ na jānāti, luddho dhammaṃ na passati.
[22] andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ lobho sahate naraṃ..
[21] anatthajanano doso, doso cittappakopano.
[22] bhayamantarato jātaṃ, taṃ jano nāvabujjhati..
[21] duṭṭho ^a^M0.0252^ea^ atthaṃ na jānāti, duṭṭho dhammaṃ na passati.
[22] andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ doso sahate naraṃ..
[21] anatthajanano moho, moho cittappakopano.
[22] bhayamantarato jātaṃ, taṃ jano nāvabujjhati..
[21] mūḷho ^a^V0.0229^ea^ atthaṃ na jānāti, mūḷho dhammaṃ na passati.
[22] andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ moho sahate naranti..
[03] evampi, tatrāsayāti -- parissayā.

[03] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``tayo kho, mahārāja, purisassa dhammā ajjhattaṃ uppajjamānā uppajjanti ahitāya dukkhāya aphāsuvihārāya ^a^T0.0352^ea^. katame tayo? lobho kho, mahārāja, purisassa dhammo ajjhattaṃ uppajjamāno uppajjati ahitāya dukkhāya aphāsuvihārāya; doso kho, mahārāja...pe0... moho kho, mahārāja, purisassa dhammo ajjhattaṃ uppajjamāno uppajjati ahitāya dukkhāya aphāsuvihārāya. ime kho, mahārāja, tayo purisassa dhammā ajjhattaṃ uppajjamānā uppajjanti ahitāya dukkhāya aphāsuvihārāya.
[21] ``lobho doso ca moho ca, purisaṃ pāpacetasaṃ.
[22] hiṃsanti attasambhūtā, tacasāraṃva samphala''nti {saphalanti (ka0) passa itivu0 50}..
[03] evampi, tatrāsayāti -- parissayā.
[03] vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --
[21] ``rāgo ca doso ca itonidānā, aratī ratī lomahaṃso itojā.
[22] ito samuṭṭhāya manovitakkā, kumārakā dhaṅkamivossajantī''ti {caṅkamivossajjantīti (syā0 ka0) passa su0 ni0 273-274}..
[03] evampi, tatrāsayāti -- parissayā.

[03] ^b^parissayānaṃ sahitā^eb^ti parissaye sahitā ārādhitā ajjhottharitā pariyāditā paṭinissatāti -- parissayānaṃ sahitā. ^b^achambhī^eb^ti so paccekasambuddho ^a^M0.0253^ea^ abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṃso viharatīti -- parissayānaṃ sahitā acchambhī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. tenāha so paccekasambuddho --
[21] ``cātuddiso ^a^T0.0353^ea^ appaṭigho ca hoti, santussamāno itarītarena.
[22] parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo''ti..
[21] ^b^dussaṅgahā^eb^ ^a^V0.0230^ea^ ^b^pabbajitāpi eke, atho gahaṭṭhā gharamāvasantā.^eb^
[22] ^b^appossukko paraputtesu hutvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..^eb^

[03] ^b^dussaṅgahā pabbajitāpi eke^eb^ti pabbajitāpi idhekacce nissayepi diyyamāne uddesepi diyyamāne paripucchāyapi {paripucchepi (ka0)} diyyamāne cīvarepi diyyamāne pattepi diyyamāne lohathālakepi diyyamāne dhammakaraṇepi {dhammakarakepi (syā0)} diyyamāne parissāvanepi diyyamāne thavikepi diyyamāne upāhanepi diyyamāne kāyabandhanepi diyyamāne na suṇanti na sotaṃ odahanti na aññācittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, anassavā avacanakarā paṭilomavuttino aññeneva mukhaṃ karontīti -- dussaṅgahā pabbajitāpi eke.

[03] ^b^atho gahaṭṭhā gharamāvasantā^eb^ti gahaṭṭhāpi idhekacce hatthimhipi diyyamāne...pe0... rathepi khettepi vatthumhipi hiraññepi suvaṇṇepi diyyamāne gāmepi...pe0... nigamepi nagarepi... raṭṭhepi... janapadepi diyyamāne na suṇanti na sotaṃ odahanti na aññācittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, anassavā avacanakarā ^a^T0.0354^ea^ paṭilomavuttino aññeneva mukhaṃ karontīti -- atho gahaṭṭhā gharamāvasantā.

[03] ^b^appossukko paraputtesu hutvā^eb^ti attānaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbe imasmiṃ atthe paraputtā. tesu paraputtesu appossukko hutvā abyāvaṭo hutvā anapekkho hutvāti -- appossukko paraputtesu hutvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. tenāha so paccekasambuddho --
[21] ``dussaṅgahā ^a^M0.0254^ea^ pabbajitāpi eke, atho gahaṭṭhā gharamāvasantā.
[22] appossukko paraputtesu hutvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo''ti..
[21] ^b^oropayitvā^eb^ {voropayitvā (syā0)} ^b^gihibyañjanāni,^eb^ ^b^sañchinnapatto^eb^ {saṃsīnapatto (sī0 aṭṭha0)} ^b^yathā koviḷāro.^eb^
[22] ^b^chetvāna vīro gihibandhanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo..^eb^

[03] ^b^oropayitvā gihibyañjanānī^eb^ti gihibyañjanāni vuccanti kesā ca massū ca mālā ca gandhañca vilepanañca ābharaṇañca pilandhanañca vatthañca pārupanañca veṭhanañca ucchādanaṃ parimaddanaṃ nhāpanaṃ {nahāpanaṃ (syā0)} sambāhanaṃ ādāsaṃ añjanaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ mukhacuṇṇaṃ ^a^T0.0355^ea^ mukhalepanaṃ hatthabandhaṃ sikhābandhaṃ daṇḍaṃ nāḷikaṃ {nālikaṃ (ka0) passa dī0 ni0 1.16} khaggaṃ chattaṃ citrupāhanaṃ uṇhīsaṃ maṇiṃ vāḷabījaniṃ odātāni vatthāni ^a^V0.0231^ea^ dīghadasāni {dīgharassāni (syā0)} iti vā. ^b^oropayitvā gihibyañjanānī^eb^ti gihibyañjanāni oropayitvā samoropayitvā nikkhipitvā paṭipassambhayitvāti -- oropayitvā gihibyañjanāni.

[03] ^b^sañchinnapatto yathā koviḷāro^eb^ti yathā koviḷārassa pattāni chinnāni sañchinnāni patitāni paripatitāni, evameva tassa paccekasambuddhassa gihibyañjanāni chinnāni sañchinnāni patitānīti -- sañchinnapatto yathā koviḷāro.

[03] ^b^chetvāna vīro gihibandhanānī^eb^ti. ^b^vīro^eb^ti vīriyavāti vīro, pahūti vīro, visavīti vīro, alamattoti vīro, sūroti vīro, vikkanto abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravoti vīro, vigatalomahaṃsoti vīro.
[21] virato idha {ārato idheva (syā0) passa su0 ni0 536} sabbapākehi, nirayadukkhaṃ aticca vīriyavā so.
[22] so vīriyavā padhānavā, dhīro {vīro (syā0 ka0) passa su0 ni0 536} tādi pavuccate tathattā..

[03] gihibandhanāni ^a^M0.0255^ea^ vuccanti puttā ca bhariyā ca dāsā ca dāsī ca ajeḷakā ca kukkuṭasūkarā ca hatthigavāssavaḷavā ca khettañca vatthu ca hiraññañca suvaṇṇañca gāmanigamarājadhāniyo ca raṭṭhañca janapado ca koso ca koṭṭhāgārañca, yaṃ kiñci rajanīyavatthu.

[03] ^b^chetvāna vīro gihibandhanānī^eb^ti ^a^T0.0356^ea^ so paccekasambuddho vīro gihibandhanāni chinditvā samucchinditvā jahitvā vinodetvā byantīkaritvā anabhāvaṃ gametvāti -- chetvāna vīro gihibandhanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo. tenāha so paccekasambuddho --
[21] ``oropayitvā gihibyañjanāni, sañchinnapatto yathā koviḷāro,
[27] chetvāna vīro gihibandhanāni.
[22] eko care khaggavisāṇakappo''ti..
